title: Solution Mode
des: The section describes the text command listing for Fluent in Solution mode.
desTs: 该部分描述了解决方案模式下Fluent的文本命令列表。

contents.des: Menu to configure adjoint solver controls.
contents.desTs: 用于配置伴随求解器控件的菜单。

children.des: Sets parameters for the adjoint solver numerics.
children.desTs: 为伴随解算器数值设置参数。

children.des: Sets parameters for the adjoint stabilization schemes.
children.desTs: 为伴随稳定方案设置参数。

children.des: Enters the stabilization strategy menu, where you can define the stabilization strategy        and settings for the adjoint solver.
children.desTs: 进入稳定策略菜单，您可以在其中定义稳定策略        以及伴随解算器的设置。

children.des: Defines the settings that are recommended for complex cases.
children.desTs: 定义针对复杂情况建议的设置。

children.des: Defines settings that are recommended for standard cases. These settings are used by           default.
children.desTs: 定义标准情况推荐的设置。这些设置由以下人员使用           default.

children.des: Allows you to define a custom settings.
children.desTs: 允许您定义自定义设置。

children.des: Allows you to define the stabilization strategy type.
children.desTs: 允许您定义稳定策略类型。

contents.des: Enters the design-tool menu.
contents.desTs: 进入设计工具菜单。

children.des: Performs optimal shape modification.
children.desTs: 执行最佳形状修改。

children.des: Computes the optimal design change.
children.desTs: 计算最佳设计变更。

children.des: Prints a report in the console that summarizes the control points defined for the           region, the defined constraining and/or deformation conditions, and any possible           conflicts between multiple constraints / deformations applied on a single node.
children.desTs: 在控制台中打印报告，该报告总结了为           区域、定义的约束和/或变形条件以及任何可能的           应用于单个节点的多个约束/变形之间的冲突。

children.des: Displays all of the applied conditions in the graphics window, each type in a unique           color. Note that this includes the selected design conditions, as well as the fixed           conditions applied to zones that are not selected for deformation.
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中显示所有应用条件，每种类型都以唯一的           颜色。请注意，这包括选择的设计条件，以及固定的           应用于未选择变形的区域的条件。

children.des: Exports the computed optimal displacements.
children.desTs: 输出计算出的最佳位移。

children.des: Exports specified surfaces from 3D cases as an.stl           file.
children.desTs: 将3D案例中的指定表面输出为.stl           文件.

children.des: Text commands for fixing surfaces in the morphing region away from applied                      moving conditions.
children.desTs: 用于将变形区域中的表面固定为远离应用的文本命令                      移动条件。

children.des: Displays the surfaces which are allowed to undergo passive morphing                            in the morphing region.
children.desTs: 显示允许进行被动变形的表面                            在变形区域。

children.des: Specifies the number of layers used to create a transition region                            for passive mesh morphing in zones adjacent to the moving                            surface.
children.desTs: 指定用于创建过渡区域的层数                            用于在与移动相邻的区域中进行被动网格变形                            面

children.des: Specifies a distance from the moving surface that will undergo                            passive mesh morphing.
children.desTs: 指定与将经历的移动表面的距离                            被动网格变形。

children.des: Sets the method for defining the fixing of surfaces in the morphing                            region away from applied moving conditions as none, distance, or                            adjacent.
children.desTs: 设置定义变形中表面固定的方法                            远离应用移动条件的区域为无、距离或                            相邻的。

children.des: Saves the fixed condition.
children.desTs: 指定固定条件。

children.des: Provides text commands that allow you to compare the current mesh to a reference           mesh.
children.desTs: 提供文本命令，允许您将当前网格与参考进行比较           网格

children.des: Exports the displacements of nodes in selected surfaces with respect to their              earlier position in a reference mesh.
children.desTs: 输出选定表面中的节点相对于其              参考网格中的早期位置。

children.des: Displays in the graphics window how selected surfaces of the mesh have changed              compared to a reference mesh (reference mesh in green, modified mesh in white).
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中显示网格选定表面的更改情况              与参考网格相比（参考网格为绿色，修改网格为白色）。

children.des: Sets the current mesh as the reference mesh, which can then be compared to later              modified versions of the mesh.
children.desTs: 将当前网格设置为参考网格，然后可以与以后进行比较              网格的修改版本。

children.des: Applies the computed optimal displacement to the mesh.
children.desTs: 将计算出的最佳位移映射到网格。

children.des: Sets the weights for multiple free-form objectives.
children.desTs: 设置多个自由形式目标的权重。

children.des: Displays the planned changes in the graphics window for select surfaces (undeformed           in white, deformed in green).
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中显示选定表面（未变形）的计划更改           白色，绿色变形）。

children.des: Prints the expected changes.
children.desTs: 打印预期的更改。

children.des: Remeshes the geometry after mesh modification.
children.desTs: 网格修改后重新网格化几何体。

children.des: Reverts (rejects) the last mesh modification.
children.desTs: 恢复（拒绝）上次网格修改。

children.des: Selects which conditions to apply to the mesh deformation.
children.desTs: 指定将哪些条件应用于网格变形。

children.des: Specifies the constraint method as standard or enhanced.
children.desTs: 将约束方法指定为标准或增强。

children.des: Selects the morphing method.
children.desTs: 初始化变形方法。

children.des: Selects constraining and/or deformation conditions you want strictly enforced (that           is, applied to all of the nodes of the associated zones).
children.desTs: 指定您想要严格执行的约束和/或变形条件（即           应用于关联区域的所有节点）。

children.des: Selects which zones are allowed to deform.
children.desTs: 指定哪些区域允许变形。

children.des: Specifies global deformation scale and settings.
children.desTs: 指定全局变形比例和设置。

children.des: Writes out the expected changes in the observables for the computed optimal design           change.
children.desTs: 为计算出的最佳设计写出可观测量的预期变化           变化

children.des: Creates, deletes, displays (with various options), renames, and/or sets conditions on        the geometry deformation.
children.desTs: 创建、删除、显示（具有各种选项）、重命名和/或设置条件        几何变形。

children.des: Adjusts numerics settings for computing the optimal displacement.
children.desTs: 调整数字设置以计算最佳位移。

children.des: Menu to configure observable objectives.
children.desTs: 配置可观察目标的菜单。

children.des: Optionally includes the most-recently computed observable sensitivity in                      the multi-objective design computation.
children.desTs: 可选地包括最近计算的可观察灵敏度                      多目标设计计算。

children.des: Menu to import, export, and manage sensitivity data.
children.desTs: 用于导入、输出和管理敏感性数据的菜单。

children.des: Configures the objectives for loaded observables.
children.desTs: 为加载的可观测量配置目标。

children.des: Menu to configure conditions on the deformation region
children.desTs: 用于配置变形区域条件的菜单

children.des: Specifies what degree of continuity to enforce at the boundaries of the                      deformation region.
children.desTs: 对象的边界处强制的连续度                      变形区

children.des: Specifies that the X, Y, and Z motion of the deformation region is                      uniform with respect to one or more of the coordinate directions. You have the                      option of enabling advanced settings if want greater control of this                      invariance (for example, if you only want the X motion to be uniform with                      respect to a particular direction).
children.desTs: 指定变形区域的X、Y和Z运动为                      关于一个或多个坐标方向一致。您有                      如果想要更好地控制此功能，可以选择启用高级设置                      不变性（例如，如果您只希望X运动与                      相对于特定方向）。

children.des: Enables/disables the motion of the control points in each of the                      coordinate directions.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用每个中控制点的运动                      协调方向。

children.des: Specifies the number of control points in the deformation region.
children.desTs: 指定变形区域中控制点的数量。

children.des: Specifies symmetry conditions for the deformation region.
children.desTs: 指定变形区域的对称条件。

children.des: Specifies the desired number of periodic repeats in the theta direction in                      the cylindrical deformation region.
children.desTs: 指定中的theta方向上所需的周期性重复次数                      圆柱形变形区域。

children.des: Menu to define the deformation region.
children.desTs: 定义变形区域的菜单。

children.des: Directly specifies the bounds of the Cartesian deformation region.
children.desTs: 直接指定Cartesian变形区域的边界。

children.des: Directly specifies the bounds of the cylindrical deformation region.
children.desTs: 直接指定圆柱形变形区域的边界。

children.des: Exports the sensitivity to mesh node movement for the currently selected            observable. Sensitivities are only exported for mesh nodes that lie within the specified            deformation region.
children.desTs: 输出当前选定的网格节点移动的敏感性            可观察的。仅针对位于指定范围内的网格节点输出灵敏度            变形区

children.des: Sets the limits for the deformation region to encompass a list of selected            surfaces.
children.desTs: 设置变形区域的限制以涵盖选定的列表            表面。

children.des: Uniformly increases the size of the deformation region.
children.desTs: 均匀增加变形区域的尺寸。

children.des: Specifies whether the deformation region is either a Cartesian or cylindrical            region type.
children.desTs: 指定变形区域是Cartesian还是圆柱形            区域类型。

children.des: Uniformly decreases the size of the deformation region.
children.desTs: 均匀地缩小变形区域的尺寸。

contents.des: Provides text commands that allow you to undo enhancements to the default adjoint solver     behavior.
contents.desTs: 提供文本命令，允许您撤销对默认伴随解算器的增强     行为

children.des: Allows you to undo an enhancement introduced in version 2019 R3 of Ansys Fluent: the use of        a full (rather than a flexible) cycle algebraic multigrid (AMG) solver in the adjoint        solver, which can improve convergence and efficiency.
children.desTs: 允许您撤销Ansys Fluent 2019 R3版本中引入的增强功能：使用        伴随中的完整（而不是灵活）循环代数多重网格（AMG）求解器        求解器，可以提高收敛性和效率。

children.des: Allows you to undo enhancements introduced in version 19.2 of Ansys Fluent, including a        modified Rhie-Chow averaging method (to be consistent with default changes introduced in the        general solver in version 19.0), a non-conservative form of the adjoint equations, an        enhanced method for building the algebraic multigrid (AMG) matrix for the adjoint solver,        and a disabling of the early protection scheme used by the AMG solver for the adjoint        calculations.
children.desTs: 允许您撤销Ansys Fluent版本19.2中引入的增强功能，包括        修改的Rhie-Chow平均方法（与        19.0版中的通用求解器）、伴随方程的非保守形式、        为伴随解算器构建代数多重网格（AMG）矩阵的增强方法，以及禁用AMG解算器为伴随解算器使用的早期保护方案        计算。

children.des: Allows you to undo enhancements introduced in version 22.2 of Ansys Fluent,                including the contribution of the gradient (e.g pressure/velocity gradient) when                building the AMG matrix and freeing the design tool after mesh modification.
children.desTs: 允许您在以下情况下撤销Ansys Fluent 22.2版中引入的增强功能，包括梯度（例如压力/速度梯度）的贡献                构建AMG矩阵并在网格修改后释放设计工具。

contents.des: Menu for design change exploration.
contents.desTs: 设计变更探索菜单。

children.des: Enters the menu for geometry parameterization.
children.desTs: 进入几何参数化菜单。

children.des: Defines the settings for the design change.
children.desTs: 定义设计更改的设置。

children.des: Computes the optimal design change.
children.desTs: 计算最佳设计变更。

children.des: Prints a report in the console that summarizes the control points                            defined for the region, the defined constraining and/or deformation                            conditions, and any possible conflicts between multiple constraints /                            deformations applied on a single node.
children.desTs: 在控制台中打印总结控制点的报告                            为区域定义、定义的约束和/或变形                            条件以及多个约束之间任何可能的冲突/                            在单个节点上应用变形。

children.des: Displays all of the applied conditions in the graphics window, each                            type in a unique color. Note that this includes the selected design                            conditions, as well as the fixed conditions applied to zones that are                            not selected for deformation.
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中显示所有应用条件，每个                            输入独特的颜色。请注意，这包括所选的设计                            条件，以及应用于以下区域的固定条件                            未选择变形。

children.des: Exports the computed optimal displacements.
children.desTs: 输出计算出的最佳位移。

children.des: Exports specified surfaces from 3D cases as                              an.stl file.
children.desTs: 从3D案例导出指定的曲面，                              .stl文件。

children.des: Text commands for fixing surfaces in the morphing region away from                            applied moving conditions.
children.desTs: 用于在变形区域中固定表面的文本命令                            应用移动条件。

children.des: Displays the surfaces which are allowed to undergo passive                                  morphing in the morphing region.
children.desTs: 显示允许进行被动处理的表面                                  在变形区域中变形。

children.des: Specifies the number of layers used to create a transition                                  region for passive mesh morphing in zones adjacent to the moving                                  surface.
children.desTs: 指定用于创建过渡的层数                                  在与移动相邻的区域中进行被动网格变形的区域                                  面

children.des: Specifies a distance from the moving surface that will undergo                                  passive mesh morphing.
children.desTs: 指定与将经历的移动表面的距离                                  被动网格变形。

children.des: Sets the method for defining the fixing of surfaces in the                                  morphing region away from applied moving conditions as none,                                  distance, or adjacent.
children.desTs: 控件中定义曲面固定的方法                                  变形区域远离应用的移动条件，如无、距离或相邻。

children.des: Saves the fixed condition.
children.desTs: 指定固定条件。

children.des: Provides text commands that allow you to compare the current mesh to                            a reference mesh.
children.desTs: 提供文本命令，允许您将当前网格与                            参考网格。

children.des: Exports the displacements of nodes in selected surfaces with                                  respect to their earlier position in a reference mesh.
children.desTs: 使用输出选定表面中节点的位移                                  相对于它们在参考网格中的早期位置。

children.des: Displays in the graphics window how selected surfaces of the                                  mesh have changed compared to a reference mesh (reference mesh in                                  green, modified mesh in white).
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中显示                                  与参考网格相比，网格发生了变化（参考网格                                  绿色，白色修改网状物）。

children.desTs: 将当前网格设置为参考网格，然后可以                                  与网格的后来修改版本相比。

children.des: Applies the computed optimal displacement to the mesh.
children.desTs: 将计算出的最佳位移映射到网格。

children.des: Displays the planned changes in the graphics window for select                            surfaces (undeformed in white, deformed in green).
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中显示计划的更改以供选择                            表面（白色未变形，绿色变形）。

children.des: Creates, deletes, displays (with various options), renames, and/or sets                      conditions on the geometry deformation.
children.desTs: 创建、删除、显示（具有各种选项）、重命名和/或设置                      几何变形的条件。

children.desTs: 调整数字设置以计算最佳位移。

children.des: Specify the conditions for the morphing region
children.desTs: 指定变形区域的条件

children.des: Specifies what degree of continuity to enforce at the boundaries of                            the deformation region.
children.desTs: 指定在边界强制执行什么程度的连续性                            变形区域。

children.des: Specifies the desired number of periodic repeats in the theta                            direction in the cylindrical deformation region.
children.desTs: 指定theta中所需的周期性重复次数                            圆柱形变形区域中的方向。

children.des: Specifies symmetry conditions for the deformation region.
children.desTs: 指定变形区域的对称条件。

children.des: Specifies custom plane of symmetry conditions for the deformation                            region.

children.des: Menu to define the deformation region.

children.desTs: 直接指定了Cartesian变形的界限                            地区

children.des: Sets the limits for the deformation region to encompass a list of                            selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 设置变形区域的限制以涵盖                            选定的表面。

children.des: Uniformly increases the size of the deformation region.

contents.des: Menu to configure adjoint solver settings.
contents.desTs: 用于配置伴随求解器设置的菜单。

children.des: Defines settings such as spatial discretization methods for the        adjoint solver.
children.desTs: 定义设置，例如空间离散化方法        伴随求解器。

children.des: Applies defaults to adjoint solver settings such as spatial        discretization methods.
children.desTs: 收件箱默认为伴随解算器设置，例如空间        离散化方法。

children.des: Defines discretization schemes to achieve a balance between stability and                accuracy.
children.desTs: 定义离散化方案以实现稳定性和                精度

children.des: Defines settings such as spatial discretization methods for the        adjoint solver to match those for the flow solver as closely as possible.
children.desTs: 定义设置，例如空间离散化方法        伴随解算器，以尽可能接近地匹配流量解算器的解算器。

contents.des: Menu to configure monitors for the adjoint solver.
contents.desTs: 用于配置伴随解算器的监视器的菜单。

children.des: Plots the adjoint residuals in the designated graphics window.
children.desTs: 在指定图形窗口中绘制伴随剩余。

children.des: Allows you to configure the monitors and convergence criteria for the adjoint        solver.
children.desTs: 允许您配置伴随的监视器和收敛标准        解决者。

contents.des: Menu to create and configure observables of interest.
contents.desTs: 创建和配置感兴趣的可观察对象的菜单。

children.des: A new observable of the specified type and name is created and the definition is        populated with default parameters.
children.desTs: 将创建一个指定类型和名称的新观察对象，其定义为        使用默认参数填充。

children.des: Removes a named observable.
children.desTs: 验证命名的观察对象。

children.des: Evaluates the current value of the selected observable and prints the result to the        console.
children.desTs: 评估所选观察值的当前值并将结果打印到        console.

children.des: An existing observable is renamed to a new specified name.
children.desTs: 现有观察对象将重命名为新的指定名称。

children.des: A named observable is selected as the one for which an adjoint solution is to be        computed.
children.desTs: 选择命名的观察对象作为伴随解的观察对象        计算。

children.des: The parameters that define a named observable are configured.
children.desTs: 定义命名观察对象的参数已被配置。

children.des: Evaluates the current value of the selected observable and writes the result to a        file.
children.desTs: 评估所选观察值的当前值并将结果写入        文件.

contents.des: Enters the optimizer menu, where you can use a gradient-based optimizer to optimize the     geometry to meet multiple goals for multiple observables at multiple operating     conditions.
contents.desTs: 进入“优化器”菜单，在该菜单中可以使用基于梯度的优化器优化     几何结构，以满足多个目标的多个观测在多个操作     条件

children.des: Enters the calculate menu, for running the gradient-based optimizer.
children.desTs: 进入计算菜单，以运行基于梯度的优化器。

children.des: Initializes the optimizer and clears out the optimization history.
children.desTs: 重新启动优化器并清除优化历史记录。

children.des: Runs adjoint-based optimization.
children.desTs: 基于附件连接的优化。

children.des: Sets the current design iteration as the optimal solution.
children.desTs: 将当前设计迭代设置为最佳解决方案。

children.des: Reports the optimization history.
children.desTs: 报告优化历史记录。

children.des: Enters the calculation-activities menu, for setting activities during the adjoint        optimization.
children.desTs: 进入计算活动菜单，用于设置伴随期间的活动        优化.

children.des: Enters the animate menu, for outputting plots for animations every design           iteration.
children.desTs: 进入动画菜单，用于输出每个设计的动画图           迭代。

children.des: Enters the animation definition menu.
children.desTs: 进入动画定义菜单。

children.des: Defines new animation.
children.desTs: 定义新动画。

children.des: Change animation monitor attributes.
children.desTs: 更改动画监视器属性。

children.des: Enters the objects menu to define, edit, delete solution animation              objects.
children.desTs: 进入对象菜单定义、编辑、删除解决方案动画              对象

children.des: Clears object history.
children.desTs: 清除对象历史记录。

children.des: Copies graphics object.
children.desTs: 复制图形对象。

children.des: Creates new graphics object.
children.desTs: 创建新的图形对象。

children.des: Deletes graphics object.
children.desTs: 图形对象。

children.des: Edits graphics object.
children.desTs: 编辑图形对象。

children.des: Enters the animation playback menu.
children.desTs: 进入动画播放菜单。

children.des: Deletes animation sequence.
children.desTs: 卸载动画序列。

children.des: Plays the selected animation.
children.desTs: 播放选定的动画。

children.des: Reads new animation from file or already-defined animations.

children.des: Sets the verbosity level of the total mass flow rate											at the degassing boundary. If set to 1 (the default),											the information will be reported in the console.											Changing it to 0 disables the reporting. This item is											available only when a degassing boundary condition is											being used in the simulation.
children.desTs: 设置总质量流量的详细级别											在脱气边界处。如果设置为1（默认），											该信息将在控制台中报告。											将其更改为0会禁用报告。此项是											仅当脱气边界条件为											正在模拟中使用。

children.des: Selects method for setting the mass flow rate.
children.desTs: 指定质量流量的设置方法。

children.des: Sets advanced options for pressure outlet boundaries.
children.desTs: 设置压力出口边界的高级选项。

children.des: Sets advanced options for pressure far field											boundaries.
children.desTs: 设置压力远场的高级选项											边界

children.des: Enables/disables the Riemann-invariant tangency correction as described in Tangency Correction.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用如切向修正中所述的Riemann不变切向修正。

children.des: Enables/disables the flux-based treatment of the far-field boundary condition as												described in Flux-based Pressure Far-Field.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用基于通量的远场边界条件处理，												在基于通量的压力远场中描述。

children.des: Copies boundary conditions to other zones.
children.desTs: 将边界条件复制到其他区域。

children.des: Sets boundary conditions for a zone of this type.
children.desTs: 为此类区域设置边界条件。

children.des: Reviews the boundary walls adjacent to solid zones that involve								solid motion, and automatically enables the modeling of boundary								advection where needed, in order to account for the heat that								advects into or out of the domain due to the solid motion. Boundary								advection is enabled for a wall when the average angle of the								velocity of the solid is greater than 2 degrees at the wall. This								text command is only available when the energy equation is enabled								and solid motion is enabled for a solid zone with a nonzero								velocity.
children.desTs: 审查与涉及的实体区域相邻的边界墙								实体运动，并自动启用边界建模								在需要的地方进行平流，以解释								由于固体运动，平流进入或离开区域。边界								当墙壁的平均角度为								固体在壁面的速度大于2度。这								文本命令仅在启用能量方程时可用								并且对于具有非零的实体区域启用实体运动								速度。

children.des: Allows you to automatically or manually assign or modify the electrode and electrolyte								cell zones for the dual-potential electrochemical reaction								model.
children.desTs: 允许您自动或手动分配或修改电极和电解质								双势电化学反应的电池区								模型

children.des: Sets boundary conditions for a zone of this type.
children.desTs: 为此类区域设置边界条件。

children.des: Sets boundary conditions for a zone of this type.
children.desTs: 为此类区域设置边界条件。

children.des: Sets boundary conditions for a zone of this type.
children.desTs: 为此类区域设置边界条件。

children.des: Enters the impedance data fitting menu, which provides text								commands that can be helpful when you are using the impedance								boundary condition (IBC).
children.desTs: 进入提供文本的阻抗数据匹配菜单								使用阻抗时可能有帮助的命令								边界条件（IBC）。

children.des: Reads an input file with experimental absorption coefficient data in the frequency											domain and then computes the terms needed for an											approximation of the reflection coefficient as a series											of poles / residues in the time domain. The resulting											terms are printed in the console, and can be written to											a pole / residue file (which can be imported and the											impedance parameters applied to a boundary condition											using the												define/boundary-conditions/impedance-data-fitting/import-parameters											text command). You can also write a file with fitted											frequency / impedance data, which can be compared to the											input data to evaluate how well it fits.
children.desTs: 读取具有频率中实验吸收系数数据的输入文件											域，然后计算所需的项											反射系数的逼近系列											时间域中的极点/残基。由此产生的											术语打印在控制台中，并且可以写入											极点/残留物文件（可以导入并											应用于边界条件的阻抗参数											使用												定义/边界条件/阻抗数据匹配/导入参数											文本命令）。您还可以用fitted编写文件											频率/阻抗数据，可与											输入数据以评估它的契合程度。

children.des: Sets the convergence tolerance, which is an accuracy											that is used for completing the iterative fitting											procedure in the calculations performed from the												define/boundary-conditions/impedance-data-fitting/											text command menu. By default, the tolerance is set to											1e-6.
children.desTs: 设置收敛容差，这是一个精度											用于完成迭代拟合											在计算过程中，												定义/边界条件/阻抗数据拟合/											文本命令菜单。默认情况下，公差设置为											1 e-6。

children.des: Reads an input file with experimental specific											impedance data in the frequency domain and then computes											the terms needed for an approximation of the reflection											coefficient as a series of poles / residues in the time											domain. The resulting terms are printed in the console,											and can be written to a pole / residue file (which can											be imported and the impedance parameters applied to a											boundary condition using the												define/boundary-conditions/impedance-data-fitting/import-parameters											text command). You can also write a file with fitted											frequency / impedance data, which can be compared to the											input data to evaluate how well it fits.
children.desTs: 读取具有实验特定内容的输入文件											频域中的阻抗数据，然后计算											反射逼近所需的项											系数作为时间中的一系列极点/剩余											域。生成的术语将打印在控制台中，											并且可以写入极点/剩余文件（可以											导入并将阻抗参数应用于											边界条件使用												定义/边界条件/阻抗数据匹配/导入参数											文本命令）。您还可以用fitted编写文件											频率/阻抗数据，可与											输入数据以评估它的契合程度。

children.des: Reads a pole / residue file with impedance parameters											in the time domain and applies them to a specified											boundary condition.
children.desTs: 读取包含阻抗参数的极点/剩余文件											并将它们应用于指定的											边界条件

children.des: Sets the number of internal iterations used for the calculations performed from the												define/boundary-conditions/impedance-data-fitting/											text command menu. By default, the number of iterations											is set to 20.
children.desTs: 方法执行的计算所使用的内部迭代次数												定义/边界条件/阻抗数据拟合/											默认情况下，迭代次数											设置为20。

children.des: Reads an input file with experimental reflection coefficient data in the frequency											domain and then computes the terms needed for an											approximation of the reflection coefficient as a series											of poles / residues in the time domain. The resulting											terms are printed in the console, and can be written to											a pole / residue file (which can be imported and the											impedance parameters applied to a boundary condition											using the												define/boundary-conditions/impedance-data-fitting/import-parameters											text command). You can also write a file with fitted											frequency / impedance data, which can be compared to the											input data to evaluate how well it fits.
children.desTs: 读取具有频率中的实验反射系数数据的输入文件											域，然后计算所需的项											反射系数的逼近系列											时间域中的极点/残基。由此产生的											术语打印在控制台中，并且可以写入											极点/残留物文件（可以导入并											应用于边界条件的阻抗参数											使用												定义/边界条件/阻抗数据匹配/导入参数											文本命令）。您还可以用fitted编写文件											频率/阻抗数据，可与											输入数据以评估它的契合程度。

children.des: Sets the residue tolerance, which is the minimum value of residues that are kept in											the fitting performed from the												define/boundary-conditions/impedance-data-fitting/											text command menu. This residue check helps to eliminate											parasitic poles. By default, the tolerance is set to											1e-6.
children.desTs: 设置残留量容差，即保留的残留量的最小值											试穿从												定义/边界条件/阻抗数据拟合/											文本命令菜单。此残留检查有助于消除											寄生极点。默认情况下，容差设置为											1 e-6。

children.des: Sets the verbosity of the progress messages during the fitting performed from the												define/boundary-conditions/impedance-data-fitting/											text command menu. Setting this to												1 results in messages being											printed in the console as the fitting calculation											progresses. The default value of												0 suppresses this											output.
children.desTs: 在执行的装配期间设置进度消息的详细程度												定义/边界条件/阻抗数据拟合/											文本命令菜单。将其设置为												1导致消息被											作为配合计算打印在控制台中											进展。的默认值												0抑制此											输出.

children.des: Sets boundary conditions for a zone of this type.
children.desTs: 为此类区域设置边界条件。

children.des: Computes the Knudsen number based on a characteristic physical								length and the area-averaged flow quantities along an incoming-flow								boundary. You can use this information to determine flow regime for								selecting the appropriate wall boundary treatment. For details, see									Partial Slip for Rarefied Gases in the Fluent User's Guide.
children.desTs: 根据特征物理计算克努森数								长度和沿来流的面积平均流量								边界。您可以使用此信息来确定流动状态								选择适当的墙边界处理。有关详细信息，请参阅									Fluent用户指南中稀有气体的部分滑动。

children.des: Prints out the types and IDs of all zones in the console window. You can use your mouse to								check a zone ID, following the instructions listed under									Zone in the Boundary Conditions Task Page								section of the User’s Guide.
children.desTs: 在控制台窗口中打印出所有区域的类型和ID。您可以使用鼠标								按照下列出的说明检查区域ID									边界条件任务页面中的区域								用户指南的部分。

children.desTs: 为此类区域设置边界条件。

children.des: Sets boundary conditions for a zone of this type.
children.desTs: 为此类区域设置边界条件。

children.desTs: 进入修改区域菜单。

children.des: Activates cell thread.
children.desTs: 激活细胞线程。

children.des: Appends new mesh.
children.desTs: 赞扬新网格。

children.des: Appends new mesh with data.
children.desTs: 用数据赞扬新网格。

children.des: Sets the state (liquid or vapor) for a specific fluid zone.
children.desTs: 设置特定流体区域的状态（液体或蒸汽）。

children.des: Converts all solid zones using frame motion to instead											use solid motion, copying the motion variable values for											origin, axis, and velocities.
children.desTs: 使用帧运动初始化所有实体区域，以代替											使用实体运动，复制运动变量值											原点、轴和速度。

children.des: Creates one or more copies of one or more cell zones											that are offset from the original zones and each other											by a single specified delta value. The delta value can											be a translational distance or a rotational angle. In											the copied zones: while the face zones that end up being											on the external boundaries are all converted to walls,											any internal face zones (that is, those between cell											zones when copying a cluster of adjacent cell zones)											will retain their original boundary conditions; any											existing cell data is initialized to a constant value;											and non-conformal interfaces and dynamic zones are not											copied. Apart from these changes, the model settings in											the copies are the same as in the original zones. For											further details, see Copying Cell Zones in the Fluent User's Guide.
children.desTs: 创建一个或多个单元区的一个或多个副本											这些区域与原始区域相互抵消											通过单个指定的增量值。增量值可以											是平移距离或旋转角。在											复制的区域：而最终成为											外部边界上都变成了墙壁，											任何内部面区域（即细胞之间的区域											复制相邻单元格区域集群时的区域）											将保留其原来的边界条件;任何											现有单元格数据被初始化为常数值;											而非保形界面和动态区则不是											已复制。除了这些更改外，中的模型设置											副本与原区相同。对于											更多详细信息，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中的Inbox Cell Zones。

children.des: Creates one or more copies of one or more cell zones											that are offset from the original zones by various											specified values. The values can be  translational											distances or rotational angles. In the copied zones:											while the face zones that end up being on the external											boundaries are all converted to walls, any internal face											zones (that is, those between cell zones when copying a											cluster of adjacent cell zones) will retain their											original boundary conditions; any existing cell data is											initialized to a constant value; and non-conformal											interfaces and dynamic zones are not copied. Apart from											these changes, the model settings in the copies are the											same as in the original zones. For further details, see											Copying Cell Zones in the Fluent User's Guide.
children.desTs: 创建一个或多个单元区的一个或多个副本											这些区域与原始区域之间存在各种											指定值。这些值可以是平移的											距离或旋转角度。在复制的区域中：											而最终位于外部的面部区域											边界全部转换为墙壁、任何内部面											区域（即复制时单元区域之间的区域											相邻的细胞区集群）将保留它们的											原始边界条件;任何现有的单元格数据											初始化为常数值;非保形											接口和动态区域不会被复制。除了											这些更改，副本中的模型设置是											与原始区域相同。有关更多详细信息，请参阅											在《Fluent用户指南》中删除单元格区域。

children.des: Creates a single copy of a											single cell zone that is offset from the original either											by a translational distance or a rotational angle. In											the copied zone, the bounding face zones are all											converted to walls, any existing cell data is											initialized to a constant value, and non-conformal											interfaces and dynamic zones are not copied; otherwise,											the model settings are the same as in the original zone.											Note that if you want the copied zone to be connected to											existing zones, you must either fuse the boundaries (see											Fusing Face Zones in the Fluent User's Guide) or set up a non-conformal											interface (see Using a Non-Conformal Mesh in Ansys Fluent in the Fluent User's Guide).
children.desTs: 创建											与原始区域有偏差的单个单元格区域											通过平移距离或旋转角。在											复制区域、边界面区域都是											转换为墙时，											初始化为常数值，并且是非保形的											不复制接口和动态区域;否则，											模型设置与原始区域相同。											请注意，如果希望将复制的区域连接到											现有区域，则必须融合边界（请参见											Fluent用户指南中的融合面部区域）或设置非保形											界面（请参见Fluent用户指南中的在Ansys Fluent中使用非保角网格）。

children.des: Copies motion variable values for origin, axis, and velocities from Frame Motion to											Mesh Motion.
children.desTs: 将原点、轴和速度的运动变量值从帧运动复制到											网格运动。

children.des: Copies motion variable values for origin, axis, and velocities from Mesh Motion to											Frame Motion.
children.desTs: 将原点、轴和速度的运动变量值从网格运动复制到											帧运动。

children.des: Marks all finite thickness walls for shell creation. Shell zones will be created at											the start of the iterations.
children.desTs: 标记所有有限厚度的墙以创建壳。壳区域将在											迭代的开始。

children.des: Creates a conformal or non-conformal periodic											interface.
children.desTs: 创建保形或非保形周期											接口.

children.des: Deactivates cell thread.
children.desTs: 停用细胞线程。

children.des: Deletes all shell zones and switches off shell conduction on all the walls. These											zones can be recreated using the commandrecreate-all-shells.
children.desTs: 初始化所有外壳区域并关闭所有墙壁上的外壳导电。这些											可以使用recreate-all-shell命令重新创建区域。

children.des: Deletes cells that are marked by a specified cell											register, creating one boundary zone of type symmetry											for each cell zone at the faces that the deleted cells											shared with their neighboring cells. You can choose to											augment the list of cells, so that additional adjacent											cells are added to the deletion list that would											otherwise be isolated after deletion, which can help to											ensure numerical validity. This text command is not											supported with overset meshes or shell conduction											walls.
children.desTs: 指定单元格标记的单元格											寄存器，创建类型对称的一个边界区											对于被删除的细胞表面的每个细胞区域											与邻近的细胞共享。您可以选择											增加单元格列表，以便额外的相邻单元格											单元格被添加到删除列表中											否则删除后会被隔离，这可以帮助											确保数字有效性。此文本命令不是											用重叠网格或壳导电支撑											墙

children.des: Deletes a cell thread.
children.desTs: 初始化单元线程。

children.des: Disconnects one or more cell zones from all adjacent											cell zones to which they are connected through shared											faces and/or nodes, so that the cell zones can move											relative to each other (for example, as part of a											sliding mesh or dynamic mesh simulation).
children.desTs: 将一个或多个单元区与所有邻近的单元区断开											它们通过共享连接到的单元区域											面和/或节点，以便单元区可以移动											相对于彼此（例如，作为											滑动网格或动态网格模拟）。

children.des: Extrudes a face thread a specified distance based on a list of deltas.
children.desTs: 根据增量列表将面线程挤出指定距离。

children.des: Extrudes a face thread a specified distance based on a distance and a list of											parametric locations between 0 and 1, for example, 0 0.2											0.4 0.8 1.0.
children.desTs: 根据距离和列表将面线程挤出指定距离											0和1之间的参数位置，例如0 0.2											0.4 0.8 1.0。

children.des: Slits all of the interior zones between cell zones of											differing materials to create coupled wall zone pairs.											This applies to cell zones of differing materials											whether they are fluid or solid zones. You will											generally be prompted by the Fluent software if this											is necessary.
children.desTs: 切割单元区域之间的所有内部区域											不同的材料以创建耦合的壁区对。											这适用于不同材料的单元区											无论它们是流体还是固体区域。您会											如果出现这种情况，通常会由Fluent软件提示											是必要的.

children.des: Sets the type for a zone or multiple zones of the same											category. You will be prompted for the name / ID of the											zone to be changed and the new type for that zone. To											change multiple zones, you can enter a list (separated											by spaces and contained within a pair of parentheses) or											use asterisks (*) as wildcards.
children.desTs: 设置一个或多个相同区域的类型											类别。系统将提示您输入											要更改的区域以及该区域的新类型。要											更改多个区域，可以输入列表（分开											由空白并包含在一对括号内）或											使用星号（*）作为外卡。

children.desTs: 导入动态网格事件文件。

children.des: Enters the transient dynamic mesh settings menu. This text command is only available								when you enable dynamic mesh using the prompts of thedefine/dynamic-mesh/dynamic-mesh? text								command. Solver time must also be set toTransient.
children.desTs: 进入瞬时动态网格设置菜单。此文本命令仅可用								当您使用define/Dynamic-mesh/Dynamic-mesh的提示启用动态网格时？文本								命令。求解器时间也必须设置为“暂时”。

children.des: Enables/disables second order transient scheme for dynamic mesh cases.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用动态网格情况的二阶瞬时方案。

children.des: Enables/disables transient scheme verbosity for dynamic mesh cases.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用动态网格情况的瞬时方案详细性。

children.des: Enters the dynamic mesh zones menu.
children.desTs: 进入动态网格区域菜单。

children.des: Creates or edit a dynamic zone. When Turbo Models is enabled, the prompt allows you											to list one or more cell zones to create multiple											dynamic mesh zones of the same type (for example,											blades) simultaneously.
children.desTs: 创建或编辑动态区域。启用涡轮模型时，提示允许您											列出一个或多个单元区以创建多个											相同类型的动态网格区域（例如，											刀片）同时。

children.des: Deletes a dynamic zone.
children.desTs: 指定动态区域。

children.des: Inserts a new cell zone.
children.desTs: 初始化新的单元区。

children.des: Inserts a new layer cell zone at a specified location.
children.desTs: 在指定位置初始化新的层单元区域。

children.des: Lists the dynamic zones.
children.desTs: 列出动态区域。

children.des: Removes a cell zone.
children.desTs: 指定细胞区。

children.des: Removes an interior layer cell zone.
children.desTs: 内层细胞带。

contents.des: Enables the mesh morpher/optimizer. When the mesh morpher/optimizer is enabled, thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer text command becomes					available.
contents.desTs: 启用网格变形器/优化器。当启用网格变形器/优化器时，thefinee/mesh-morpher-optimizer文本命令变为					available.

contents.des: Enters the gap model menu, where you can define one or more gap regions where the flow is					blocked or decelerated when face zones move within a specified proximity					threshold of each other.
contents.desTs: 进入间隙模型菜单，您可以在其中定义流动所在的一个或多个间隙区域					当面部区域在指定距离内移动时，被阻挡或减速					彼此的门槛。

children.des: Enters the advanced options menu for the gap model.
children.desTs: 进入间隙模型的高级选项菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables the printing of warnings if the time											step size is too large based on a Courant (CFL) number											automatically determined for your specified solution											stability level.
children.desTs: 如果时间有限，启用/禁用警告的打印											根据Courant（CTF）号，步骤太大											为您指定的解决方案自动确定											稳定水平。

children.des: Enables/disables the use of enhanced data											interpolation when updating information in gap regions.											This text command is only available if you have enabled											the											define/gap-model/advanced-options/expert?											text command.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用增强数据的使用											更新间隙区域信息时进行插值。											此文本命令仅在您启用时可用											的											定义/差距模型/高级选项/专家？											文本命令。

children.des: Enables/disables access to expert-level text commands											for the gap model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用对专家级文本命令的访问											对于差距模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the extending of the gap regions by including additional cells in											the vicinity of the gap interfaces during marking. This											is useful when the default shape of the marked cells is											negatively affecting solution stability or convergence											behavior.
children.desTs: 通过在其中包含额外的细胞来启用/禁用间隙区域的延伸											标记期间间隙界面附近。这											当标记单元格的默认形状为											对解决方案的稳定性或收敛产生负面影响											行为

children.des: Enables/disables the interpolation of solution data throughout the gap regions. This											text command is only available if you have enabled the											define/gap-model/advanced-options/expert?											text command.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用在整个间隙区域内对解决方案数据进行插值。											text命令仅在启用了											定义/差距模型/高级选项/专家？											文本命令。

children.des: Enables/disables the use of a more accurate search algorithm for marking cells in											gap regions. Note that it can be costly, particularly											for 3D cases or those with a large number of cells											inside the gap regions. This text command is only											available if you have enabled the											define/gap-model/advanced-options/expert?											text command.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用使用更精确的搜索算法来标记单元格，											间隙区域。请注意，											对于3D情况或具有大量细胞的情况											在间隙区域内。此文本命令仅											如果您已启用											定义/差距模型/高级选项/专家？											文本命令。

children.des: Enables/disables a more restrictive algorithm for marking cells in gap regions. This											text command is only available if you have enabled the											define/gap-model/advanced-options/expert?											text command.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用更严格的算法来标记间隙区域中的细胞。这											text命令仅在启用了											定义/差距模型/高级选项/专家？											文本命令。

children.des: Enables/disables the rendering of the solution in the cells of flow-modeling gap											regions during postprocessing. This text command is only											available if you have enabled the											define/gap-model/advanced-options/expert?											text command.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用流建模间隙单元中的解决方案的渲染											后处理期间的区域。此文本命令仅											如果您已启用											定义/差距模型/高级选项/专家？											文本命令。

children.des: Enables/disables the rendering of the mesh surfaces inside the gap regions when											displaying the mesh with contours. Note that the											solution is still not rendered inside the flow-blocking											gap regions.
children.desTs: 当出现时，启用/禁用间隙区域内网格表面的渲染											显示带有轮廓的网格。请注意											解决方案仍然没有在流阻内部提供											差距区域。

children.des: Reverts the global gap stabilization level and any related											solver settings to the default.
children.desTs: 扭转全球差距稳定水平和任何相关											解算器设置为默认设置。

children.des: Sets the global solution stabilization level for the gap											regions.
children.desTs: 设置差距的全球解决方案稳定水平											地区

children.des: Allows you to edit the solution stabilization settings for flow-modeling gap regions											that have sponge-layer local stabilization											enabled.
children.desTs: 允许您编辑流建模间隙区域的解决方案稳定设置											具有海绵层局部稳定性											启用.

children.des: Sets the verbosity for messages printed in the console											related to the gap model.
children.desTs: 设置控制台中打印的消息的详细程度											与差距模型有关。

children.des: Creates a single gap region, so that when selected face zones move								within a specified proximity threshold of each other, flow blockage								/ deceleration is applied to the cells that lie within the								threshold.
children.desTs: 创建单个间隙区域，以便当选定的面部区域移动								在指定的彼此接近阈值内，流量堵塞								/减速应用于位于								阈值

children.des: Deletes an existing gap region.
children.desTs: 指定现有的差距区域。

children.des: Deletes all of the existing gap regions.
children.desTs: 涵盖所有现有的差距区域。

children.des: Edits an existing gap region.
children.desTs: 编辑现有的间隙区域。

children.des: Enables/disables the gap model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用间隙模型。

children.des: Lists the names of the cell zones that can be excluded for								individual gap regions (so that such cells are not marked for flow								blockage / deceleration).
children.desTs: 列出可以排除的单元区的名称								单独的间隙区域（以便此类单元不会被标记用于流动								阻塞/减速）。

children.des: Lists the names of the face zones that can be used for creating								gap regions.
children.desTs: 列出可用于创建的面部区域的名称								差距区域。

children.des: Lists the properties of the gap regions.
children.desTs: 列出间隙区域的属性。

contents.des: Enters the injections menu.
contents.desTs: 进入注射菜单。

contents.des: Enters the materials menu.
contents.desTs: 进入材料菜单。

children.des: Changes the properties of a locally-stored material or create a								new material.
children.desTs: 更改本地存储材料的属性或创建								新材料。

children.des: Copies a material from the database.
children.desTs: 从数据库中复制材料。

children.des: Copies a material from the database by formula.
children.desTs: 按公式从数据库中复制材料。

children.des: Enters the material database menu.
children.desTs: 进入材料数据库菜单。

children.des: Sets the database type												(fluent-database,												granta-mds, or												user-defined).
children.desTs: 设置数据库类型												（流畅数据库，												赠款-MD，或												用户定义）。

children.des: Edits material.
children.desTs: 编辑材料。

children.des: Lists all materials in the database.
children.desTs: 列出数据库中的所有材料。

children.des: Lists the properties of a material in the											database.
children.desTs: 中列出材料的属性											数据库

children.des: Defines new material.
children.desTs: 定义新材料。

children.des: Saves user-defined database.
children.desTs: 卸载用户定义的数据库。

children.des: Deletes a material from local storage.
children.desTs: 从本地存储中卸载材料。

children.des: Lists all locally-stored materials.
children.desTs: 列出所有本地存储的材料。

children.des: Lists the properties of a locally-stored material.
children.desTs: 列出本地存储材料的属性。

contents.des: Enters the mesh-interfaces menu.
contents.desTs: 进入网格界面菜单。

children.des: Automatically creates mesh interfaces. The kind of boundary zones								that are paired to make the mesh interfaces depends on the creation								method: when the								define/mesh-interfaces/one-to-one-pairing?								text command is enabled, all wall and interface boundary zones are								paired; when the								define/mesh-interfaces/one-to-one-pairing?								text command is disabled, some or all of the interface boundary								zones are paired.
children.desTs: 自动创建网格界面。边界区域的类型								配对以制作网状界面取决于创建								方法：当								定义/网状界面/一对一配对？								启用文本命令，所有墙和界面边界区域均为								配对;当								定义/网状界面/一对一配对？								文本命令被禁用，部分或全部界面边界								区域是配对的。

children.des: Enters the auto-options menu. This menu is								only available when the									define/mesh-interfaces/one-to-one-pairing?								text command is enabled.
children.desTs: 进入自动选项菜单。该菜单是								仅当									定义/网状界面/一对一配对？								文本命令已启用。

children.des: Specifies whether the name of each new one-to-one mesh											interface (as well as existing mesh interfaces, if you											so desire) has no additional suffix, or a suffix that											includes the names of the associated boundary zones, the											IDs of the associated boundary zones, or the names of											the adjacent cell zones.
children.desTs: 指定每个新的一对一网格的名称是否											界面（以及现有的网格界面，如果您											如此渴望）没有额外的后缀，或者后缀											包括相关边界区的名称、											相关边界区的ID，或名称											邻近的细胞区。

children.des: Specifies whether the											one-to-one mesh interfaces are only created between											different cell zones.
children.desTs: 指定是否											一对一网格界面仅在											不同的细胞区域。

children.des: Specifies the default interface											name prefix used for one-to-one mesh interfaces.
children.desTs: 指定默认界面											用于一对一网格接口的名称前置。

children.des: Specifies pairs of zones that are to be excluded when											one-to-one mesh interfaces are created. You must enter											an even number of unique zones.
children.desTs: 指定在以下情况下要排除的区域对											创建一对一网格界面。您必须输入											偶数个独特区域。

children.des: Sets the minimum area percentage of overlap for one-to-one mesh interface creation.											If zones are paired using the automatic method, after											the mesh interfaces are created, a check will be done:											if the area that two zones overlap divided by the area											of the zone is less than this value for both zones in											any mesh interface, then that mesh interface will be											deleted. This can help you avoid unnecessary or											unintentional mesh interfaces. By default the minimum											area percentage is set to 0, so no pairings are deleted.											When you are setting up a sliding mesh simulation in											which the zones begin with little or no overlap and then											slide into a position that includes more overlap, you											should make sure the minimum area percentage is set such											that it does not delete your intended mesh											interface.
children.desTs: 设置一对一网格界面创建的最小重叠面积百分比。											如果使用自动方法配对区域，则在											创建网格界面后，将进行检查：											如果两个区域重叠的面积除以面积											对于中的两个区域，该区域的值都小于此值											任何网格界面，那么该网格界面将是											已删除。这可以帮助您避免不必要的或											无意的网格界面。默认情况下，最小值											面积百分比设置为0，因此不会删除任何配对。											当您在中设置滑动网格模拟时											这些区域开始时几乎没有重叠或没有重叠，然后											滑到一个包含更多重叠的位置，您											应确保最小面积百分比设定为这样											它不会删除您想要的网格											接口.

children.des: Enables/disables the use of adjustable tolerances to determine which of the selected											boundary zones can be paired up to make mesh interfaces.											You can specify whether you want to use an absolute											tolerance or a relative tolerance, and then define the											associated settings. For the absolute tolerance, you											directly specify the distance that is used for pairing.											For the relative tolerance, you specify a relative											length factor, and this is multiplied by the largest											mesh length scale of the interface boundaries to											determine the tolerance. You can reduce the absolute											tolerance / relative length factor if the resulting											interface areas are too large or if boundary zones that											you do not want paired are paired; an increase is											recommended if any expected interfaces are not created,											or if the intersection areas are smaller than											expected.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用使用可调容差来确定选择的											边界区域可以配对以形成网格界面。											您可以指定是否要使用绝对											公差或相对公差，然后定义											相关设置。对于绝对容忍度，您											直接指定用于配对的距离。											对于相对公差，您可以指定相对公差											长度因子，并乘以最大											界面边界的网格长度比例											确定公差。您可以减少绝对值											公差/相对长度因子，如果结果											界面区域太大或边界区											您不希望配对是配对的;增加是											如果没有创建任何预期的接口，建议，											或者如果交叉区域小于											预期

children.des: Allows you to specify that the boundary conditions of the original zones are copied to								the resulting coupled wall pair when a mesh interface is created at								a solid-to-solid zone interface of different materials or a								fluid-to-solid zone interface. This text command is only available								when the								define/mesh-interfaces/one-to-one-pairing?								text command is enabled.
children.desTs: 允许您指定将原始区域的边界条件复制到								当创建网格界面时，产生的耦合墙对								不同材料的固-固区界面或								流体到固体区域界面。此文本命令仅可用								当								定义/网状界面/一对一配对？								文本命令已启用。

children.des: Creates mesh interfaces. When the								define/mesh-interfaces/one-to-one-pairing?								text command is enabled, you can choose to pair all wall and								interface boundary zones, or pair specified cell zones and/or								external boundary zones; when the								define/mesh-interfaces/one-to-one-pairing?								text command is disabled, you can pair specified interface boundary								zones.
children.desTs: 创建网格界面。当								定义/网状界面/一对一配对？								文本命令已启用，您可以选择将所有墙和								接口边界区域，或配对指定的单元区域和/或								外部边界区;当								定义/网状界面/一对一配对？								文本命令被禁用，您可以配对指定的接口边界								区界限

children.des: Creates mesh interfaces by pairing all of the possible								combinations between two specified groups of boundary zones, even if								the zones do not currently overlap, which can be useful for setting								up sliding mesh simulations. If you select a single boundary zone								for both boundary zone lists, you can also use this text command to								enable the matching option for the mesh interface, which ensures								that wall zones are not created where the original zones did not								match well. This text command is only available when the								define/mesh-interfaces/one-to-one-pairing?								text command is enabled.
children.desTs: 通过配对所有可能的创建网格界面								两组指定边界区之间的组合，即使								这些区域当前没有重叠，这对于设置很有用								向上滑动网格模拟。如果选择单个边界区								对于这两个边界区域列表，也可以使用此文本命令来								为网格接口启用匹配选项，这将确保								在原始分区未创建的位置不会创建墙分区								匹配良好。此文本命令仅在								定义/网状界面/一对一配对？								文本命令已启用。

children.des: Deletes a mesh interface.
children.desTs: 初始化网格界面。

children.des: Deletes all mesh interfaces.
children.desTs: 初始化所有网格界面。

children.des: Deletes one-to-one  mesh interfaces that have a small area of								overlap. You define the area percentage that is used for deletion:								if the area that the two zones overlap divided by the area of the								zone is less than this value for both zones in any mesh interface,								then that mesh interface will be deleted.
children.desTs: 具有小面积的一对一网格界面								重叠。您定义用于删除的面积百分比：								如果两个区域重叠的面积除以								对于任何网格界面中的两个区域，区域都小于该值，								那么该网格界面将被删除。

children.des: Displays the specified mesh interface zone.
children.desTs: 显示指定的网格界面区域。

children.des: Edits attributes of existing mesh interfaces. For one-to-one								interfaces, you can edit the name; for many-to-many interfaces, you								can edit the interface options and (for a single interface) the name								and the list of interface zones assigned to the interface.
children.desTs: 编辑现有网格界面的属性。用于一对一								接口，您可以编辑名称;对于多对多接口，您								可以编辑界面选项和（对于单个界面）名称								以及分配给接口的接口区域列表。

children.des: Enables/disables the filling of node coordinates on the zones of								mesh interfaces, so that they can be displayed in the graphics								window.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用区域上的节点坐标的填充								网格界面，以便它们可以显示在图形中								窗口

children.des: Enables/disables continuity across the boundary condition								interface for contour plots in postprocessing.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用跨越边界条件的连续性								后处理中的等值线图界面。

children.des: Enables/disables automatic definition of solid-solid interfaces as								coupled walls. By default this option is disabled and Ansys Fluent								creates interior boundaries at solid-solid interfaces.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用实体-实体界面的自动定义为								连接墙。默认情况下，此选项处于禁用状态，Ansys Fluent								在固-固界面处创建内部边界。

children.des: Checks the quality of all mapped interfaces. If Fluent finds any								mapped interfaces that require improvement it will list them and ask								you if you would like to increase the tolerance to improve the								interfaces.
children.desTs: 检查所有映射界面的质量。如果Fluent找到任何								需要改进的映射接口将列出并询问								如果您想增加容忍度以改善								接口。

children.des: Prints information about the mesh interface(s) in the console.
children.desTs: 打印有关控制台中网格界面的信息。

children.des: Enters the mapped-interface menu. Options are available to convert a non-conformal								interface to a mapped interface. This menu is only available when								the									define/mesh-interfaces/one-to-one-pairing?								text command is disabled.
children.desTs: 进入映射界面菜单。可选择转换非保形								界面到映射界面。此菜单仅在以下情况下可用								的									定义/网状界面/一对一配对？								文本命令已禁用。

children.des: Converts non-conformal mesh interface to mapped												mesh interfaces. Answering												yes to												Convert all mesh interfaces to mapped												mesh interfaces? will enforce the												mapping such that it specifies all interfaces as												mapped interfaces; the mapped interfaces are created												regardless of mesh quality. Answering												yes to												Convert poorly matching mesh												interfaces to mapped mesh interfaces?												will automate the mapping such that all interfaces												that penetrate each other are automatically defined												as mapped interfaces. Note that in all cases, only												interfaces for which at least one side of the												interface consists of only solid zones will be												converted.
children.desTs: 将非共形网格界面复制为已映射												网状界面。志愿服务												yes to												将所有网格界面转换为映射												网状界面？将执行												映射，以便将所有接口指定为												映射的接口;创建映射的接口												无论网格质量如何。志愿服务												yes to												转换匹配不佳的网格												接口到映射网格接口？												将自动化映射，以便所有接口												相互渗透的相互作用是自动定义的												作为映射接口。请注意，在所有情况下，仅												接口的至少一侧												界面仅由实体区域组成												转换。

children.des: Specifies the mapped frequency and												under-relaxation factor for mapped												interfaces.
children.desTs: 指定映射的频率并												映射的欠松弛因子												接口。

children.des: Specifies the mapped interface tolerance. After												changing the tolerance, the existing mapped												interface will be updated.
children.desTs: 指定映射的接口容差。之后												改变容差，现有映射												界面将被更新。

children.des: Enters the non-conformal-interface-numerics menu.
children.desTs: 进入非保形接口数字菜单。

children.des: Provides options to improve numerics for												non-conformal interfaces in some cases.
children.desTs: 提供改进数字的选项												在某些情况下是非保形界面。

children.des: Enables/disables the use of the one-to-one interface creation								method. This method is enabled by default, such that a single zone								is assigned to each side of all of the mesh interfaces when they are								created; otherwise the mesh interfaces may have multiple zones on								one or both sides. Any mesh interfaces that exist when the use of								this method is changed will either be deleted or modified to be								compatible with this method.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用一对一接口创建								方法。默认情况下启用此方法，因此单个区域								被分配给所有网格界面的每一侧，								否则，网格界面上可能有多个区域，								一侧或两侧。使用时存在的任何网格界面								此方法已更改将被删除或修改为								与此方法兼容。

children.des: Removes left-handed faces (which can cause the mesh to be invalid) during mesh								interface creation.
children.desTs: 网格期间删除左手面部（这可能导致网格无效）								界面创建。

children.des: Enables/disables the automatic transfer of motion across a mesh interface when only one								side is moving as a result of user-defined or system coupling								motion. You can specify the method by which the motion is								transferred: transfer-displacements (the								default) interpolates nodal displacement from the active side of the								interface to the passive side, and is recommended when there are								gaps and/or penetrations in the mesh interface that must be								maintained; project-nodes projects the								passive nodes onto the faces of active side, and is recommended when								the active side includes significant tangential motion (as only the								normal displacement is effectively transferred in this								method).
children.desTs: 当只有一个时，启用/禁用跨网格界面的运动自动传递								由于用户定义或系统耦合，侧面正在移动								运动。您可以指定运动的方法								转移：转移-位移（								默认）从活动侧插值节点位移								与被动侧接口，建议在存在时使用								网格界面中必须有间隙和/或渗透								维护;项目节点投影								被动节点位于主动侧的表面上，建议在以下情况下使用								活动侧包括显着的切向运动（因为只有								正常位移在此得到有效转移								方法）。

children.des: Creates a general turbo interface. This text command is only								available if the									define/turbo-model/enable-turbo-model?								text command is enabled.
children.desTs: 创建通用的涡轮界面。此文本命令仅								时可用									定义/涡轮模型/启用涡轮模型？								文本命令已启用。

children.des: Uses new virtual polygon approach for interfaces.
children.desTs: 对界面使用新的虚拟多边形方法。

children.des: Sets the mesh interface verbosity.
children.desTs: 设置网格界面详细程度。

contents.des: Enters the mesh morpher/optimizer menu in order to deform the mesh as part of a shape					optimization problem. This text command is only available when thedefine/enable-mesh-morpher-optimizer? text command					has been enabled.
contents.desTs: 进入网格变形器/优化器菜单，以便将网格变形为形状的一部分					优化问题。此文本命令仅在define/enable-mesh-morpher-optimizer时可用？文本命令					已启用。

children.des: Enters the deformation menu. This text command is only available if you have created a								deformation region using thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/create								or thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/define-bounding-box								text command.
children.desTs: 进入变形菜单。此文本命令仅在您创建了								使用thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/Create的变形区域								或thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/define-bounding-box								文本命令。

children.des: Displays a mesh check report in the console for the mesh displayed in the graphics											window. The mesh check report provides volume											statistics, mesh topology and periodic boundary											information, verification of simplex counters, and											verification of node position with reference to the axis for axisymmetric cases. This text											command is only available if thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer?											text command is disabled.
children.desTs: 在控制台中为图形中显示的网格显示网格检查报告											窗口。网格检查报告提供体积											统计数据、网格布局和周期边界											信息、单工计数器的验证，以及											对于轴对称情况，参考轴验证节点位置。本文											命令仅在thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer时可用？											文本命令已禁用。

children.des: Modifies the mesh and updates the mesh display in the graphics window based on the											parameter and deformation settings. This text command is											only available if thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer?											text command is disabled.
children.desTs: 修改网格并更新图形窗口中的网格显示											参数和变形设置。此文本命令是											仅当thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer时才可用？											文本命令已禁用。

children.des: Enters the motion settings menu, where you can create, modify, and delete the											motions applied to the control points. This text command											is only available if thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/set-control-point-distribution											text command is set to unstructured.
children.desTs: 进入运动设置菜单，您可以在其中创建、修改和删除											应用于控制点的运动。此文本命令											仅当thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/set-control-point-disorder时才可用											文本命令设置为非结构化。

children.des: Creates a new motion, by specifying the parameter, type of motion (translation,												rotation, or radial motion), directional settings,												name, and control points. Note that for												translations, the values you enter for the												direction components are multiplied with the value												of the parameter to define the displacement												applied to the control points.
children.desTs: 通过指定参数、运动类型（平移，												旋转或辐射运动）、方向设置，												名称和控制点。请注意，对于												翻译、您输入的值												方向分量乘以值												定义位移的参数												适用于控制点。

children.des: Deletes an existing motion.
children.desTs: 删除现有动议。

children.des: Modifies the settings for an existing motion.
children.desTs: 修改现有运动的设置。

children.des: Defines the settings for all the motions by reading an ASCII text file.
children.desTs: 通过读取ASC文本文件定义所有动作的设置。

children.des: Writes the settings for all the motions to an ASCII text file.
children.desTs: 将所有动作的设置写入到ASC文本文件中。

children.des: Defines all of the motion settings by reading an ASCII text file. This text command											is only available if thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/set-control-point-distribution											text command is set to regular.
children.desTs: 通过读取ASCII文本文件定义所有运动设置。此文本命令											仅当thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/set-control-point-disorder时才可用											text命令设置为regular。

children.des: Undoes any deformations made to the mesh and updates the mesh display in the											graphics window.
children.desTs: 撤消对网格所做的任何变形，并更新											图形窗口。

children.des: Defines the constraints on a boundary zone, in order to limit the freedom of a											particular zone that falls within the deformation											region(s) during the morphing of the mesh.
children.desTs: 定义边界区域上的约束，以限制											属于变形范围的特定区域											网格变形期间的区域。

children.des: Defines the constraints on multiple boundary zones, in order to limit the freedom of											particular zones that fall within the deformation											region(s) during the morphing of the mesh.
children.desTs: 定义多个边界分区上的约束，以限制											属于变形范围内的特定区域											网格变形期间的区域。

children.des: Assigns translation direction components and a single parameter to a single control											point in a region. Note that the values you enter for											the direction components are multiplied with the value											of the parameter to define the displacement applied to											the control point. This text command is only available											if thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/set-control-point-distribution											text command is set to regular.
children.desTs: 将翻译方向组件和单个参数指定给单个控件											区域中的点。请注意，您输入的值											方向分量乘以值											定义应用于的位移的参数											控制点。此文本命令仅可用											如果定义/网格变形器优化器/集控制点分布											text命令设置为regular。

children.des: Assigns translation direction components and multiple parameters to multiple control											points in a region. Note that the values you enter for											the direction components are multiplied with the value											of the parameter to define the displacement applied to											the control point. This text command is only available											if thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/set-control-point-distribution											text command is set to regular.
children.desTs: 将翻译方向组件和多个参数指定给多个控件											区域中的点。请注意，您输入的值											方向分量乘以值											定义应用于的位移的参数											控制点。此文本命令仅可用											如果定义/网格变形器优化器/集控制点分布											text命令设置为regular。

children.des: Writes the motion settings to an ASCII text file. This text command is only											available if thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/set-control-point-distribution											text command is set to regular.
children.desTs: 将运动设置写入到ASC文本文件。此文本命令仅											如果thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/set-control-point-disorder，则可用											text命令设置为regular。

children.des: Displays a summary of the mesh morpher/optimizer settings in the console. This text								command is only available if you have created a deformation region								using thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/create								or thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/define-bounding-box								text command.
children.desTs: 在控制台中显示网格变形器/优化器设置的摘要。此文本								仅在创建变形区域时，命令才可用								使用thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/Create								或thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/define-bounding-box								文本命令。

children.des: Enters the optimizer menu. This text command is only available when you have created a								deformation region using thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/create								or thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/define-bounding-box								text command and have enabled thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer?								text command.
children.desTs: 进入优化器菜单。此文本命令仅在您创建了								使用thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/Create的变形区域								或thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/define-bounding-box								文本命令并启用了thefefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer？								文本命令。

children.des: Defines the convergence criteria for the optimizer.
children.desTs: 定义优化器的收敛标准。

children.des: Enters the custom calculator menu, in order to define the objective function as a											function of output parameters. This menu is not											available when the NEWUOA optimizer is selected using											thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-parameters/optimizer-type											text command.
children.desTs: 进入自定义计算器菜单，以便将目标函数定义为											输出参数的功能。该菜单不是											当使用选择NEWUOA优化器时可用											thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-参数/optimizer-类型											文本命令。

children.des: Defines the custom objective function that will be minimized by the												optimizer.
children.desTs: 定义将由												优化器。

children.des: Deletes the saved custom objective function.
children.desTs: 初始化保存的自定义目标函数。

children.des: Prints examples of custom objective function definitions in the console.
children.desTs: 在控制台中打印自定义目标函数定义的示例。

children.des: Prints a list of the output parameters that can be used to define the custom												objective function.
children.desTs: 打印可用于定义自定义												目标函数

children.des: Specifies whether you want to disable the general mesh check that is part of the											optimization process. This check is conducted											immediately after the mesh is deformed in every design											stage, and determines whether a solution is calculated.											Disabling this check allows you to use mesh repair											commands (which can be set up using thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-parameters/initial-commands											text command) at the start of a design stage, so that an											accurate solution can be calculated.
children.desTs: 指定是否要禁用属于											优化过程。进行此检查											每种设计中网格变形后立即											阶段，并确定是否计算出解。											禁用此检查允许您使用网格修复											命令（可以使用thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-paramels/initial-commants来设置											文本命令），以便											可以计算出准确的解。

children.des: Specifies the commands (text commands or command macros) that will be executed after											the solution has run and converged for a design stage.											This text command is not available when the NEWUOA											optimizer is selected using thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-parameters/optimizer-type											text command.
children.desTs: 指定将在之后执行的命令（文本命令或命令宏）											该解决方案已在设计阶段运行并融合。											当NEWUOA时，此文本命令不可用											使用thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-paramples/optimizer-类型选择优化器											文本命令。

children.des: Specifies the commands (text commands or command macros) that will be executed after											the design has been modified, but before Ansys Fluent has											started to run the calculation for that design stage.											This text command is not available when the NEWUOA											optimizer is selected using thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-parameters/optimizer-type											text command.
children.desTs: 指定将在之后执行的命令（文本命令或命令宏）											设计已被修改，但在Ansys Fluent之前											开始运行该设计阶段的计算。											当NEWUOA时，此文本命令不可用											使用thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-paramples/optimizer-类型选择优化器											文本命令。

children.des: Specifies how the solution variables should be treated after the mesh is deformed,											that is, whether they should be initialized to the											values defined in theSolution												Initialization task page, remain the											values obtained in the previous design iteration, or be											read from a data file that you specify.
children.desTs: 指定网格变形后应如何处理解变量，											即是否应该将它们初始化为											解决方案中定义的值												删除任务页面，保留											之前设计迭代中获得的值，或者是											从您指定的数据文件中读取。

children.des: Defines the maximum number of iterations Ansys Fluent will perform for each design											change.
children.desTs: 定义Ansys Fluent为每个设计执行的最大迭代次数											变化

children.des: Defines the maximum number of design stages the optimizer will undergo to reach the											specified objective function.
children.desTs: 定义优化器为达到											指定的目标函数。

children.des: Specifies if orthogonal quality should be used to determine whether a solution is calculated											for a mesh, and defines the minimum orthogonal quality											value allowed (values may range from											0–1,											where 0 represents the worst											quality).
children.desTs: 指定是否应使用正交质量来确定是否计算解											对于网格，并定义了最低的垂直质量											允许的值（值的范围可能从											0-1,											其中0代表最差											质量）。

children.des: Enters the monitor menu in order to plot and/or record optimization history data,											that is, how the value of the objective function varies											with each design stage produced by the mesh											morpher/optimizer. This text menu is not available when											the NEWUOA optimizer is selected using thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-parameters/optimizer-type											text command.
children.desTs: 进入监视器菜单以绘制和/或记录优化历史数据，											即目标函数的值如何变化											每个设计阶段都由网格产生											变形器/优化器。当出现时，此文本菜单不可用											使用define/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-parameters/optimizer-type选择NEWUOA优化器											文本命令。

children.des: Discards the optimization history data, including the associated files.
children.desTs: 丢弃优化历史数据，包括关联的文件。

children.des: Displays an XY plot of the optimization history data generated during the last												calculation. Note that no plot will be displayed												if the data was discarded using thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-parameters/monitor/clear-optimization-monitor-data												text command.
children.desTs: 显示上一次期间生成的优化历史数据的XY图												计算。请注意，不会显示任何图												如果使用thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-optimizer/optimizer-paramples/monitor/clear-optimation-monitor-data丢弃数据												文本命令。

children.des: Enables the plotting of the optimization history data in the graphics												window.
children.desTs: 在图形中启用优化历史数据的绘制												窗口

children.des: Enables the saving of the optimization history data to a file.
children.desTs: 支持将优化历史数据保存到文件。

children.des: Defines how much the parameters will be allowed to vary during the initial											calculations. This text command is only available when											the NEWUOA optimizer is selected using thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-parameters/optimizer-type											text command.
children.desTs: 定义初始期间允许参数变化的程度											计算。此文本命令仅在以下情况下可用											使用define/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-parameters/optimizer-type选择NEWUOA优化器											文本命令。

children.des: Specifies whether the format of the objective function is a user-defined function, a											Scheme source file, or a custom function based on output											parameters. The custom function is defined using the											text commands in thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-parameters/custom-calculator											menu. Theobjective-function-definition											text command is not available when the NEWUOA optimizer											is selected using thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-parameters/optimizer-type											text command.
children.desTs: 指定目标函数的格式是否是用户定义的函数、											方案源文件，或基于输出的自定义函数											参数。自定义函数是使用											thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer/optimizer中的文本命令/custom-calculator											菜单。目标功能定义											NEWUOA优化器时文本命令不可用											使用thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer-par参数/optimizer-类型选择											文本命令。

children.des: Initiates the optimization process. This text command is only available if thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer?											text command is enabled.
children.desTs: 启动优化过程。此文本命令仅在thefinee/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer时可用？											文本命令已启用。

children.des: Specifies which optimizer is to be used. You can select one of the six built-in optimizers												(1–5												and7), or specify that you											will use Design Exploration in Ansys Workbench												(6). Note that												6 is only available if you											have launched your Ansys Fluent session from Ansys Workbench. For											information about how the built-in optimizers function											or how to use Design Exploration, see Design Analysis and Optimization in the User's Guide											or Working With Input and Output Parameters in Workbench in the Ansys Fluent in											Workbench User's Guide, respectively.
children.desTs: 指定要使用哪个优化器。您可以选择六个内置优化器之一												（1-5												和7），或指定您											将在Ansys收件箱中使用Design Exploration												（6）.请注意												6仅在您的情况下可用											已从Ansys Workbenchen启动Ansys Fluent会话。对于											有关内置优化器如何运作的信息											或如何使用Design Exploration，请参阅用户指南中的设计分析和优化											或在Ansys Fluent中的收件箱中使用输入和输出参数											分别删除用户指南。

children.des: Sets up the automatic saving of intermediate case and data files during the											optimization run, by specifying: the frequency (in											design iterations) with which file sets are saved; the											maximum number of file sets retained (after the maximum											limit has been saved, the earliest file set will be											overwritten with the latest); and the root name assigned											to the files (which will have the design iteration											number appended to it).
children.desTs: 设置中间案例和数据文件的自动保存											优化运行，通过指定：频率（单位											设计迭代）保存文件集的方法;											保留的最大文件集数（在最大值之后											限制已保存，最早的文件集将是											用最新的覆盖）;以及分配的根名称											文件（其中将包含设计迭代											附加在上面的数字）。

children.des: Enables the use of a built-in optimizer. This text command is only available if you								have created a deformation region using thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/create								or thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/define-bounding-box								text command.
children.desTs: 允许使用内置优化器。此文本命令仅在以下情况下可用：								我使用define/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/create创建了一个变形区域								或thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/region/define-bounding-box								文本命令。

children.des: Enters the parameters menu.
children.desTs: 进入参数菜单。

children.des: Defines the number of parameters that will be used to define the deformation.
children.desTs: 定义将用于定义变形的参数数。

children.des: Defines the minimum and maximum values allowed by the built-in optimizer for the											parameters. This text command is only available if thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer?											text command is enabled.
children.desTs: 属性的内置优化器允许的最小值和最大值											此文本命令仅在define/mesh-morpher-optimizer/optimizer？											文本命令已启用。

children.des: Defines the value of a parameter. This value represents a magnitude that will then											be used along with other direction settings to define											motions that produce an overall displacement for a given											control point. The value will specify a length in meters											for translations and radial motions, and will specify an											angle in degrees for rotations; the units here will be											used regardless of what units you are using in the case.											Note that you can enter a numeric value or define an											input parameter (if you have enabled the definition of											input parameters using thedefine/parameters/enable-in-TUI?											text command). Theparameter-value text											command is only available in the following											situations:
children.desTs: 定义参数的值。此值代表随后将											与其他方向设置一起使用来定义											产生给定总位移的运动											控制点。该值将指定以米为单位的长度											用于平移和辐射运动，并将指定											旋转角度（单位：度）;这里的单位是											无论您在案例中使用什么单位，都会使用。											请注意，您可以输入数字值或定义											输入参数（如果您已启用的定义											使用thedefine/paramels/enable-in-TUI输入参数？											文本命令）。参数值文本											命令仅在以下中可用											情况：

children.des: Enters the region menu in order to define the regions of the domain where the mesh will								be deformed in order to optimize the shape.
children.desTs: 进入区域菜单以定义网格将								以优化形状。

children.des: Enters the control points menu in order to create, modify, and/or delete control											points. This text command is only available if thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/set-control-point-distribution											text command is set to unstructured.
children.desTs: 进入控制点菜单以创建、修改和/或删除控制											points。此文本命令仅在thefeine/mesh-morpher-optimizer/set-control-point-disorder时可用											文本命令设置为非结构化。
