children.des: Creates a new control point by defining the coordinates of a point within an												existing deformation region.
children.desTs: 通过定义内点的坐标来创建新控制点												现有变形区域。

children.des: Deletes existing control points.
children.desTs: 删除现有控制点。

children.des: Creates an approximate number of control points on the mesh nodes of a particular												boundary zone, with a distribution that is based												on the distribution of the cell faces in that												zone.
children.desTs: 在特定的网格节点上创建大约数量的控制点												边界区，其分布基于												细胞面的分布												区

children.des: Modifies the coordinates of existing control points.
children.desTs: 修改现有控制点的坐标。

children.des: Defines all of the control points by reading an ASCII text file.
children.desTs: 通过读取ASC文本文件定义所有控制点。

children.des: Writes the control point coordinates to an ASCII text file.
children.desTs: 将控制点坐标写入ASC文本文件。

children.des: Creates a new deformation region by specifying the name, number of control points											(for a regular distribution), dimensions, origin											coordinates, the components of the direction vectors,											and whether to smooth the transitions of the mesh at the											region boundaries (for an unstructured distribution).											The region will be a “box”, that is, a											rectangle for 2D cases or a rectangular hexahedron for											3D cases. After you have created a deformation region,											additional menus will be available in thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer											menu.
children.desTs: 通过指定名称、控制点数量创建新的变形区域											(for定期分布）、维度、起源											坐标，方向分量，											以及是否平滑网格在											区域边界（对于非结构化分布）。											该地区将是一个“盒子”，即一个											2D情况下的矩形或长方体											3D案例。创建变形区域后，											在define/mesh-morpher-optimizer中可以使用其他菜单											菜单.

children.des: Creates a new deformation region by specifying the name, the bounding zones that											best represent the extents of the deformation region,											the number of control points (for a regular											distribution), and whether to smooth the transitions of											the mesh at the region boundaries (for an unstructured											distribution). The region will be a “box”,											that is, a rectangle for 2D cases or a rectangular											hexahedron for 3D cases. After you have created a											deformation region, additional menus will be available											in thedefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer											menu.
children.desTs: 通过指定名称、边界区来创建新的变形区域											最能代表变形区域的范围，											控制点的数量（对于常规											分布），以及是否平滑的过渡											区域边界处的网格（对于非结构化											分布）。该地区将是一个“盒子”，											即，2D案例的矩形或矩形											用于3D案例的六边形。创建后											变形区域，将提供额外菜单											在thefine/mesh-morpher-optimizer中											菜单.

children.des: Deletes a deformation region.
children.desTs: 指定变形区域。

children.des: Sets the scaling factor applied to the bounding box when you click theEnlarge button in theRegions tab of theMesh Morpher/Optimizer dialog											box.
children.desTs: 当单击“网格变形器/优化器”对话框的“区域”选项卡中的“放大”按钮时，设置应用于边界框的比例因子											盒子

children.des: Sets the scaling factor applied to the bounding box when you click theReduce button in theRegions tab of theMesh Morpher/Optimizer dialog											box.
children.desTs: 当您单击“网格变形器/优化器”对话框的“区域”选项卡中的“缩小”按钮时，设置应用于边界框的比例因子											盒子

children.des: Specifies whether the control point distribution is regular (that is, spread in a								regular distribution throughout the entire deformation region) or								unstructured (that is, distributed at specified locations).
children.desTs: 指定控制点分布是否是规则的（即，分布在								在整个变形区域中规则分布）或								非结构化（即分布在指定位置）。

contents.des: Enters the models menu to configure the solver.
contents.desTs: 进入模型菜单以配置求解器。

children.des: Enables/disables the ablation model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用消融模型。

children.des: Enters the acoustics menu.
children.desTs: 进入声学菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables auto prune of the receiver signal(s) during											read-and-compute.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用期间接收器信号的自动修剪											读取并计算。

children.des: Enables/disables the broadband noise model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用宽带噪音模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the convective effects option.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用对流效果选项。

children.des: Computes sound pressure.
children.desTs: 计算声音压力。

children.des: Enables/disables the export of data in cylindrical coordinates.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用圆柱坐标中的数据输出。

children.des: Enables/disables the display of flow time during read-and-compute.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用读取和计算期间流时间的显示。

children.des: Enables/disables the export of acoustic source data in CGNS format.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用CGNS格式的声学源数据的输出。

children.des: Enables/disables the export of fluid zones.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用流体区域的导出。

children.des: Enables/disables the export of fluid zones.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用流体区域的导出。

children.des: Enables/disables the export of acoustic source data in											ASD format during the wave equation model run.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用中的声学源数据的输出											波动方程模型运行期间的ASD格式。

children.des: Enters the menu to specify the far-field density and											speed of sound. Note that this menu is currently											available only with the acoustics wave equation model.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以指定远场密度并											音速。请注意，该菜单当前是											仅适用于声学波动方程模型。

children.des: Specifies the far-field density value for												the acoustics wave equation model.
children.desTs: 指定的远场密度值												声学波动方程模型。

children.des: Specifies the far-field speed of sound value												for the acoustics wave equation model.
children.desTs: 指定远场音速值												用于声学波动方程模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the Ffowcs-Williams-and-Hawkings model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Ffowcs-Williams-and-Hawkings模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the moving receiver option.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用移动接收器选项。

children.des: Enables/disables the acoustics model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用声学模型。

children.des: Reads acoustic source data files and computes sound pressure.
children.desTs: 读取声学源数据文件并计算声学压力。

children.des: Sets acoustic receivers.
children.desTs: 设置声音接收器。

children.des: Sets acoustic sources.
children.desTs: 设置声学源。

children.des: Enters the acoustic sources fast Fourier transform (FFT) menu, to compute Fourier											spectra from acoustic source data (ASD) files, create											postprocessing variables for the pressure signals, and											write CGNS files of the spectrum data.
children.desTs: 进入声源快速傅立叶变换（FFT）菜单，计算傅立叶											来自声源数据（ASD）文件的光谱，创建											- 对压力信号的变量进行后处理，以及											写入光谱数据的CGNS文件。

children.des: Reads ASD files to perform FFT of the pressure history field.
children.desTs: 读取ASD文件以执行压力历史字段的快速傅立叶变换。

children.des: Computes FFT of the read pressure histories. The computed spectra replace the												pressure histories in memory.
children.desTs: 计算读取压力历史的快速傅里叶变换。计算出的频谱取代												记忆中的压力历史。

children.des: De-allocates memory used to store the pressure histories and their Fourier												spectra, as well as any created surface variables												for the visualization.
children.desTs: 取消分配用于存储压力历史及其傅里叶的内存												光谱以及任何创建的表面变量												用于可视化。

children.des: Writes surface pressure spectra in CGNS format, which can be used for one-way												coupling with Ansys Mechanical in the frequency												domain.
children.desTs: 以CGNS格式写入表面压力谱，可用于单向												与Ansys Mechanism在频率上耦合												域

children.des: Enters the menu to create surface variables from the computed Fourier spectra for												visualization.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以根据计算出的傅里叶光谱创建表面变量												视觉化

children.des: Selects up to 20 constant width bands and												creates either the surface pressures level (SPL)												variables or the PSD of dp/dt variables for												them.
children.desTs: 最多可安装20个恒定宽度的带子，												创建表面压力水平（SPL）												变量或DP/dt变量的SSD												他们

children.des: Creates either the surface pressure level												(SPL) variables or the PSD of dp/dt variables for												17 technical octaves.
children.desTs: 创建表面压力水平												(SPL)变量或DP/dt变量的SSD												17个技术八度音阶。

children.des: Creates either the surface pressure level												(SPL) variables or the PSD of dp/dt variables for												54 technical thirds.
children.desTs: 创建表面压力水平												(SPL)变量或DP/dt变量的SSD												54个技术三分之一。

children.des: Selects up to 20 individual Fourier modes and create variable pairs for them,												containing the real and the imaginary parts of the												complex Fourier amplitudes.
children.desTs: 同步多达20个独立的傅里叶模式并为它们创建可变对，												包含真实和虚构的部分												复傅里叶幅度。

children.des: Removes all variables created in this menu.
children.desTs: 删除此菜单中创建的所有变量。

children.des: Allows you to define sponge layers at boundary zones, so that the density is blended											from the value calculated by the solver to											user-specified far-field values. Such sponge layers can											eliminate non-physical pressure wave reflections from											boundary zones. This text command menu is only available											in transient simulations of single-phase, compressible											flows with the pressure-based solver.
children.desTs: 允许您在边界区域定义海绵层，以便混合密度											从求解器计算的值到											用户指定的远场值。此类海绵层可以											消除非物理压力波反射											边界区域。此文本命令菜单仅可用											在瞬时模拟中，可压缩											使用基于压力的求解器流动。

children.des: Activates a sponge layer definition that you would like to use during the												simulation.
children.desTs: 激活您想在												仿真

children.des: Adds a new sponge layer definition, which by												default is set as active.
children.desTs: 添加新的海绵层定义，通过												默认设置为活动。

children.des: Deactivates an active sponge layer, so that												it is not used during the simulation.
children.desTs: 停用活性海绵层，以便												模拟期间不使用它。

children.des: Deletes an existing sponge layer												definition.
children.desTs: 覆盖现有海绵层												定义.

children.des: Edits an existing sponge layer. You can revise the fields listed previously for												the												define/models/acoustics/sponge-layers/add												text command.
children.desTs: 编辑现有海绵层。您可以修改之前列出的字段												的												定义/模型/声学/海绵层/添加												文本命令。

children.des: Prints a list of the existing sponge layers												in the console.
children.desTs: 打印现有海绵层的列表												在控制台中。

children.des: Prints the names of the active sponge layer												definitions in the console.
children.desTs: 打印活动海绵层的名称												控制台中的定义。

children.des: Prints the properties of an existing sponge												layer of your choice in the console.
children.desTs: 打印现有海绵的属性												您在控制台中选择的层。

children.des: Enables/disables the wave equation model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用波动方程模型。

children.des: Enters the menu to define the acoustics wave equation											model options.
children.desTs: 进入菜单定义声学波动方程											型号选项。

children.des: Enters the menu to define the geometry of												the source mask and sponge layer using the basic												shapes, represented by the cell registers of the												type "Region".
children.desTs: 进入菜单以定义的几何形状												使用基本的源掩模和海绵层												形状，由												输入“区域”。

children.des: Adds a basic shape to the definition of the												source mask geometry.
children.desTs: 将基本形状添加到												源掩模几何形状。

children.des: Adds a basic shape to the definition of the												sponge layer geometry.
children.desTs: 将基本形状添加到												海绵层几何形状。

children.des: List basic shapes, which are currently used												in the definition of the source mask												geometry.
children.desTs: 列出当前使用的基本形状												在源屏蔽的定义中												几何

children.des: List basic shapes, which are currently used												in the definition of the sponge layer geometry.
children.desTs: 列出当前使用的基本形状												在海绵层几何形状的定义中。

children.des: List all available cell registers of the												type "Region".
children.desTs: 列出所有可用的单元格寄存器												输入“区域”。

children.des: Remove a basic shape from the definition of												the source mask geometry.
children.desTs: 从定义中删除基本形状												源掩模几何形状。

children.des: Remove a basic shape from the definition of												the sponge layer geometry.
children.desTs: 从定义中删除基本形状												海绵层的几何形状。

children.des: Enters the menu to define remote receivers for the Kirchhoff integral												model.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以定义Kirchhoff积分的远程接收器												模型

children.des: Selects the integration surface for the												Kirchhoff model.
children.desTs: 将积分曲面												基尔霍夫模型

children.des: Writes the computed receiver signals to the												ASCII files.
children.desTs: 将计算出的接收器信号写入												ASC文件。

children.des: Enables/disables the Kirchhoff integral												model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用基尔霍夫积分												模型

children.des: Specifies the name of a user-defined												function, which defines geometry of the source												mask.
children.desTs: 指定用户定义的名称												函数，定义源的几何形状												面具

children.des: Specifies the base value of the artificial												viscosity coefficient.
children.desTs: 指定人工的基本值												粘性系数。

children.des: Specifies the factor of the artificial												viscosity coefficient.
children.desTs: 指定人工因子												粘性系数。

children.des: Specifies the name of a user-defined												function, which defines geometry of the sponge												layer.
children.desTs: 指定用户定义的名称												函数，定义海绵的几何形状												层.

children.des: Enables/disables a time filter for the sound												source.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用声音的时间过滤器												源头

children.des: Writes on-the-fly sound pressure.
children.desTs: 动态写入压。

children.des: Writes centroid info.
children.desTs: 写入重心信息。

children.des: Loads addon module.
children.desTs: 加载插件模块。

children.des: Specifies whether or not the domain is axisymmetric.
children.desTs: 指定域是否轴对称。

children.des: Enables the dual potential MSMD battery model. For text commands that become available								when the battery model is enabled, refer to Battery Model Text Commands.
children.desTs: 启用双势M贴片电池模型。适用于可用的文本命令								启用电池型号后，请参阅电池型号文本命令。

children.des: Enters the cht (conjugate heat transfer) menu.
children.desTs: 进入cht（结合热传递）菜单。

children.des: Enables the implicit mapping scheme for any											fluid-solid pair with a mapped mesh interface (only											required for cases set up in version 19.2 or											earlier).
children.desTs: 启用任何隐式映射方案											具有映射网格界面的流固对（仅限											对于版本19.2中设置的案例需要或											早些时候）。

children.des: Enters the explicit time averaged thermal coupling											menu.
children.desTs: 进入显式时间平均热耦合											菜单.

children.des: Specify explicit coupling controls for												coupled conformal walls. Note this operation will												slit the coupled wall pair.
children.desTs: 指定显式耦合控制												耦合保形墙。请注意，此操作将												切开连接的壁对。

children.des: Specifies the number of time steps per												coupling iteration.
children.desTs: 指定每个的时间步数												耦合迭代。

children.des: Fuses slitted conformal coupled walls marked												for transient explicit thermal coupling.
children.desTs: 保险丝切开共形耦合壁标记												用于瞬时显式热耦合。

children.des: Enables/disables the crevice model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用缝隙模型。

children.des: Enters the crevice model controls menu.
children.desTs: 进入缝隙模型控制菜单。

children.des: Enters the dispersed phase model menu.
children.desTs: 进入分散相模型菜单。

children.des: Removes/keeps all particles currently in the domain.
children.desTs: 删除/保留当前域中的所有粒子。

children.des: Enters the DEM collisions menu.
children.desTs: 进入EM碰撞菜单。

children.des: Input for the collision mesh.
children.desTs: 碰撞网格的输入。

children.des: Supplies settings for collisions to a pair of collision partners. You will be												prompted to specify theImpact												collision partner and theTarget collision												partner.
children.desTs: 向一对碰撞伙伴提供碰撞设置。您将												提示指定影响												碰撞伙伴和目标碰撞												搭档

children.des: Sets the normal contact force law for this pair of															collision partners.
children.desTs: 设置这对的法向接触力定律															碰撞伙伴。

children.des: Sets the tangential contact force law for this pair of															collision partners.
children.desTs: 设置这对的切向接触力定律															碰撞伙伴。

children.des: Lists the current settings for this pair of collision															partners.
children.desTs: 列出这对碰撞的当前设置															伙伴

children.des: Manages collision partners.
children.desTs: 管理碰撞伙伴。

children.des: Copies a collision partner.
children.desTs: 复制碰撞伙伴。

children.des: Creates a collision partner.
children.desTs: 创建碰撞伙伴。

children.des: Deletes a collision partner.
children.desTs: 指定碰撞伙伴。

children.des: Lists all known collision partners.
children.desTs: 列出所有已知的碰撞伙伴。

children.des: Renames a collision partner.
children.desTs: 重命名碰撞伙伴。

children.des: Enables/disables the DEM collision model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用TEM碰撞模型。

children.des: For each pair of collision partners, lists the collision laws														and their parameters.
children.desTs: 对于每对碰撞伙伴，列出碰撞法														及其参数。

children.des: Sets the maximum particle velocity that may arise from collisions.
children.desTs: 设置碰撞可能产生的最大粒子速度。

children.des: Enters the menu to enable/configure/run the erosion-dynamic mesh interaction.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以启用/配置/运行侵蚀动态网格交互。

children.des: Enables mesh deformation due to wall												erosion.
children.desTs: 使网格因墙壁而变形												侵蚀

children.des: Enters the menu for setting erosion coupling with dynamic mesh.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以设置具有动态网格的侵蚀耦合。

children.des: Sets parameters for dynamic mesh calculations.
children.desTs: 设置动态网格计算的参数。

children.des: Sets parameters for erosion calculations.
children.desTs: 设置侵蚀计算的参数。

children.des: Specifies all participating walls.
children.desTs: 指定所有参与墙。

children.des: Manages erosion-dynamic mesh run												settings.
children.desTs: 管理侵蚀动态网格运行												设置.

children.des: Sets the iteration increment and filename to save data files.
children.desTs: 设置迭代增量和文件名以保存数据文件。

children.des: Sets the iteration increment to save												graphics files.
children.desTs: 设置要保存的迭代增量												图形文件。

children.des: Sets the number of iterations per flow simulation step.
children.desTs: 设置每个流模拟步骤的迭代次数。

children.des: Sets the mesh motion time stepping parameters and method.
children.desTs: 设置网格运动时间步进参数和方法。

children.des: Sets the total time of erosion.
children.desTs: 设置总侵蚀时间。

children.des: Performs a coupled erosion-dynamic mesh simulation.
children.desTs: 执行耦合侵蚀-动态网格模拟。

children.des: Enters the injections menu.
children.desTs: 进入注射菜单。

children.des: Creates an injection.
children.desTs: 进行注射。

children.des: Deletes an injection.
children.desTs: 甘草注射剂。

children.des: Enters the menu to set or display properties for one or more injections.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以设置或显示一次或多次注射的属性。

children.des: Enters the menu to display the current properties for one or more												injections.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以显示一个或多个的当前属性												注射剂

children.des: Lists the injections that have been selected for display usingpick-injections-to-list.
children.desTs: 列出已选择使用pick-injections-to-list显示的注射。

children.des: Lists the properties that have been selected for display usingpick-properties-to-list.
children.desTs: 列出使用pick-Properties-to-list选择显示的属性。

children.des: Lists the settings for the properties selected withpick-properties-to-list.												This text command is only available when a single												injection has been selected withpick-injections-to-list.												This option is available if at least two												injections have been selected.
children.desTs: 列出使用pick-Properties-to-list选择的属性的设置。												此文本命令仅在单个												注射已通过pick-injects-to-list选择。												如果至少有两个，则此选项可用												注射剂已选定。

children.des: Lists the settings for properties selected withpick-properties-to-list												that have uniform values for all of the injections												selected withpick-injections-to-list.												This option is available if at least two												injections have been selected.
children.desTs: 列出使用pick-Properties-to-list选择的属性的设置												所有注射都具有统一的值												通过挑选注射到列表进行选择。												如果至少有两个，则此选项可用												注射剂已选定。

children.des: For each injection selected withpick-injections-to-list,												lists the values for properties selected withpick-properties-to-list.												This option is available if at least two												injections ave been selected.
children.desTs: 对于通过挑选注射列表选择的每次注射，												列出了使用pick-Properties-to-list选择的属性的值。												如果至少有两个，则此选项可用												已选择注射剂。

children.des: For each property selected withpick-properties-to-list,												lists the values for the injections selected withpick-injections-to-list.												This option is available if at least two												injections have been selected.
children.desTs: 对于通过挑选房产列表选择的每个房产，												列出了使用“拾取注射到列表”选择的注射的值。												如果至少有两个，则此选项可用												注射剂已选定。

children.des: Selects the injection or injections for which property values will be												displayed. The use of asterisks												(*) as wildcards is												supported.
children.desTs: 指定属性值的注射或注射												显示。铅笔的使用												（*）作为外卡是												supported.

children.des: Selects the property or properties for which values will be displayed. The use												of asterisks (*) as												wildcards is supported.
children.desTs: 指定将显示其值的属性。使用												的skirks（*）作为												支持外卡。

children.des: Enters the menu to set physical models such as drag and breakup for one or more												injections.
children.desTs: 进入菜单为一个或多个设置物理模型，例如拖曳和分手												注射剂

children.des: Enters the menu to specify file injection												settings.
children.desTs: 进入菜单指定文件注入												设置.

children.des: Specifies the name for the injection												file.
children.desTs: 指定进样的名称												文件.

children.des: Puts the unsteady file injection into a												time-periodic mode. For more information, see												User Input for File Injections in the Fluent User's Guide.
children.desTs: 将不稳定的文件注入放入												时间周期模式。有关更多信息，请参阅												《Fluent用户指南》中的文件注入用户输入。

children.des: Specifies the flow-time in the unsteady												injection file from which Ansys Fluent starts reading												the injection file. For more information, see												User Input for File Injections in the Fluent User's Guide.
children.desTs: 指定非稳态流时间												Ansys Fluent开始读取的注入文件												注入文件。有关更多信息，请参阅												《Fluent用户指南》中的文件注入用户输入。

children.des: Enters the menu for general settings. This												option is available only if at least one injection												has been selected using												define/injections/properties/set/pick-injections-to-set.
children.desTs: 进入常规设置菜单。这												仅在至少注射一次时才可用												已被选择使用												定义/注入/属性/设置/pick-injections-to-set。

children.des: Enables the injection of wall-film												particles.
children.desTs: 可注入壁膜												粒子

children.des: Enters the menu for setting particle												reinjection options. This item is available for												unsteady particle tracking only.
children.desTs: 进入设置粒子的菜单												重新注入选项。该物品适用于												仅不稳定粒子跟踪。

children.des: Specifies whether the injection is used only												for reinjecting particles.
children.desTs: 指定是否仅使用注射剂												用于重新注入颗粒。

children.des: Specifies a time delay for particle												reinjection, thus accounting for a residence time												of the particle outside the CFD mesh domain. This												item is available only when the												use-inj-for-reinjection?												text option or the Reinjection												Only GUI option is enabled.
children.desTs: 指定粒子的时间延迟												重新注入，从而考虑停留时间												计算流体动力学网格域外的颗粒的大小。这												只有当												使用注射剂进行再注射？												文本选项或重新注射												仅启用图形界面选项。

children.des: Sets the reference frame for injection point												properties. You can choose either												global (default) or one												of the local reference frames that you created.												This option is available only if at least one												injection has been selected using												define/injections/properties/set/pick-injections-to-set.
children.desTs: 设置注入点的参考系												房产。您可以选择												全局（默认）或一个												您创建的本地参考系的。												此选项仅在至少一个情况下可用												已选择注射使用												定义/注入/属性/设置/pick-injections-to-set。

children.des: Lists the injections selected for setting withpick-injections-to-set.
children.desTs: 列出选择进行设置的注射。

children.des: Enters the injection location settings menu.
children.desTs: 进入注射位置设置菜单。

children.des: Enters the injection spatial-staggering settings															menu.
children.desTs: 进入注射空间交错设置															菜单.

children.des: Enables/disables spatial staggering of the												hollow cone injection in the injection plane. This												option is available only if a hollow cone												injection has been selected using												define/injections/properties/set/pick-injections-to-set.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用的空间错开												注射平面中的空心锥体注射。这												仅当空心锥体时才可用												已选择注射使用												定义/注入/属性/设置/pick-injections-to-set。

children.des: Enables spatial staggering of the atomizer injection. This option is available												only if at least one atomizer injection has been												selected usingdefine/injections/properties/set/pick-injections-to-set.
children.desTs: 实现雾化器喷射的空间错开。此选项可用												只有至少进行了一次雾化器注射												选择使用define/injections/Properties/set/pick-injections-to-set。

children.des: Specifies the stagger radius of the region from which particles are released.												This option is available only if at least one												standard injection has been selected usingdefine/injections/properties/set/pick-injections-to-set.
children.desTs: 指定释放粒子的区域的交错半径。												此选项仅在至少一个情况下可用												已使用define/injections/properties/set/pick-injections-to-set选择标准进样。

children.des: Enables injection-specific spatial staggering of the particles. This option is												available only if at least one standard injection												has been selected usingdefine/injections/properties/set/pick-injections-to-set.
children.desTs: 实现颗粒注射特定的空间错开。此选项是												仅在至少一次标准注射时可用												已使用define/injections/Properties/set/pick-injections-to-set选择。

children.des: Enters the menu to set physical models such as drag and breakup for the												selected injections. This command is only												available when you select the injection(s) using												the prompts of thedefine/models/dpm/injections/properties/set/pick-injections-to-set												text command.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以设置物理模型，例如												选择的注射。此命令仅												当您选择注射时可用												thefine/models/dPM/injections/Properties/set/pick-injections-to-set的提示												文本命令。

children.des: Enables Brownian motion effects for the currently selected injection(s).
children.desTs: 为当前选择的注射启用布朗运动效果。

children.des: Sets the drag law and corresponding parameters for the currently selected												injection(s).
children.desTs: 为当前选择的设置阻力定律和相应参数												注射。

children.des: Enters the menu for setting the heat												exchange with the continuous phase. This item is												available only for cases with inert or combusting												particles, or with multicomponent particles that												do not contain evaporating species.
children.desTs: 进入设置热量的菜单												与连续阶段交换。该物品是												仅适用于惰性或燃烧的情况												颗粒，或具有多成分颗粒，												不含挥发性物质。

children.des: Allows you to choose the heat transfer												coefficient correlation. The options include												constant-HTC,												Nusselt-number,												Ranz-Marshall (default),												Hughmark,												Tomiyama, and												Gunn.
children.desTs: 允许您选择热传递												系数相关性。选项包括												恒量-HTC，												努塞尔号，												兰兹-马歇尔（默认），												休马克，												富山，还有												冈恩。

children.des: Enters the menu to set-up rotation related models.
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置旋转相关模型。

children.des: Enables/disables solution of ODE for the angular acceleration of												particles.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用角加速度的ODE解决方案												粒子

children.des: Sets the law for the rotational lift coefficient used in the formulation of												Magnus lift force.
children.desTs: 为公式中使用的旋转升力系数设定定律，												马格纳斯升力。

children.des: Sets the law for the rotational drag coefficient.
children.desTs: 设定旋转阻力系数的定律。

children.des: Enables/disables the rough wall model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用粗糙墙模型。

children.des: Enters the menu for setting the breakup model and parameters for the currently												selected injection(s). Available commands are as												those described underdefine/models/dpm/spray-model/												with the addition of the following.
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置当前的分手模型和参数												选择的注射。可用命令如下												描述的那些定义不足/模型/dPM/喷雾模型/												并添加以下内容。

children.des: Selects the injection or injections for which properties will be set. The use												of asterisks (*) as												wildcards is supported.
children.desTs: 指定将设置属性的注射剂或注射剂。用途												的skirks（*）作为												支持外卡。

children.des: Enters the menu for setting the initial conditions for the injection selected												using												define/injections/properties/set/pick-injections-to-set.												The available options include the following text												commands. See Setting Initial Conditions for the Discrete Phase in the Fluent User's Guide for a complete list												of point properties for the specific injection												type.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以设置所选注射的初始条件												使用												定义/注入/属性/设置/pick-injections-to-set。												可用选项包括以下文本												命令。有关完整列表，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中的“设置离散阶段的初始条件”												特定注射的点属性												类型.

children.des: Together with unsteady-stop, defines the interval of the												simulated time during which the injection can												create particles or release trajectories. In												conjunction with an unsteady injection file, it												determines which simulated time in the current												simulation corresponds to the												flow-time in the file												specified as												start-at-flow-time-in-unsteady-inj-file.												For more information, see User Input for File Injections in the Fluent User's Guide.
children.desTs: 与不稳定停止一起定义了												注射可以的模拟时间												创建粒子或释放轨迹。在												与不稳定的注入文件相结合，它												确定当前模拟时间												模拟对应于												文件中的流动时间												指定为												start-at-Flow-time-in-stainable-inj-file。												有关更多信息，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中的文件注入的用户输入。

children.des: Together with												unsteady-start, defines												the interval of the simulated time during which												the injection can create particles or release												trajectories.
children.desTs: 连同												非稳态启动，定义												模拟时间的间隔，												注射可以产生颗粒或释放												轨迹

children.des: Enters the menu for linking the size distribution variables to the tabulated												distribution data. This item is available only												with surface, cone and volume injections. Prior to												using this menu, you must read a table into your												case using the												file/table-manager/read-matrix-data-file												text command.
children.desTs: 进入将尺寸分布变量链接到列表的菜单												分发数据。此商品仅可用												表面注射、锥形注射和体积注射。在												使用此菜单，您必须将表格读到您的												使用的案例												文件/表管理器/读矩阵数据文件												文本命令。

children.des: Enables/disables the use of the tabulated												size distribution for your injection.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用使用列表												注射的大小分布。

children.des: Selects the column name where data for the												reference diameters is stored. Note that you must												first select the table name using the												define/models/dpm/injections/injection-properties/set/size-distribution/table-name												text command.
children.desTs: 删除列名称，其中的数据												存储参考直径。请注意，您必须												首先使用选择表名称												define/models/dPM/injections/injections/set/size-disposal/table-Name												文本命令。

children.des: Selects the column name where data for the												mass fractions is stored. Note that you must first												select the table name using the												define/models/dpm/injections/injection-properties/set/size-distribution/table-name												text command.
children.desTs: 删除列名称，其中的数据												存储质量分数。请注意，您必须首先												使用选择表名称												define/models/dPM/injections/injections/set/size-disposal/table-Name												文本命令。

children.des: Selects the column name where data for the												number fractions is stored. Note that you must												first select the table name using the												define/models/dpm/injections/injection-properties/set/size-distribution/table-name												text command.
children.desTs: 删除列名称，其中的数据												数字分数被存储。请注意，您必须												首先使用选择表名称												define/models/dPM/injections/injections/set/size-disposal/table-Name												文本命令。

children.des: Specify the name of the table containing												discrete diameter distribution data.
children.desTs: 指定包含的表的名称												离散的直径分布数据。

children.des: Enables/disables linear interpolation of												particle diameters between neighboring diameter												classes.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用的线性插值												相邻直径之间的颗粒直径												班

children.des: Enables/disables the use of the randomized diameter sampling for the tabulated												size distribution. When this text option is												disabled, particles from each tabulated diameter												class are injected from each particle starting												position.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用对列表中的随机直径采样												大小分布。当此文本选项为												禁用，每个表格直径的颗粒												类从每个粒子开始注入												位置

children.des: Lists properties of the selected												injection(s) in the console window.
children.desTs: 列出选定的属性												在控制台窗口中进行注射。

children.des: Lists particle streams in an injection.
children.desTs: 列出注射中的粒子流。

children.des: Enters the menu to set properties for all injections.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以设置所有进样的属性。

children.des: Defines injection type.
children.desTs: 定义注入类型。

children.des: Sets the number of stochastic tries.
children.desTs: 设置随机尝试的次数。

children.des: Turns enable/disable a random eddy lifetime.
children.desTs: 转弯启用/禁用随机涡流寿命。

children.des: Turns enable/disable stochastic tracking.
children.desTs: 转弯启用/禁用随机跟踪。

children.des: Sets the time scale constant.
children.desTs: 设置时间尺度恒定。

children.des: Renames an injection.
children.desTs: 重新命名注射。

children.des: Sets injection properties.
children.desTs: 设置注入属性。

children.des: Sets parameters for coupled discrete phase calculations.
children.desTs: 为耦合离散相计算设置参数。

children.des: Selects whether or not to couple continuous and discrete phase												calculations.
children.desTs: 指定是否将连续相和离散相结合												计算。

children.des: Enables/disables the energy coupling between												the discrete phases (DDPM) and the primary phase												via the source term. Note that when this option is												enabled, the Total Heat Transfer												Rate flux report for the mixture												currently generates inaccurate results.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用之间的能量耦合												离散阶段（DDPM）和主阶段												通过源术语。请注意，当此选项是												启用时，总热传递												混合物的速率通量报告												目前生成不准确的结果。

children.des: Enables/disables the enhanced Eulerian												inter-phase exchange. This option is available												only for cases with the energy equation enabled												and is recommended for simulations with												poly-dispersed particles.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用增强的欧拉式												阶段间交换。该选项可用												仅适用于启用能量方程的情况												建议用于模拟												多分散颗粒。

children.des: Sets the frequency with which the particle												trajectory calculations are introduced.
children.desTs: 设置粒子的频率												介绍了轨迹计算。

children.des: When enabled, uses an enhanced source-term linearization method for the discrete												phase. The method can improve solution convergence												in some cases. This command is available only when												the												define/models/dpm/interaction/linearized-dpm-source-terms?												option is enabled.
children.desTs: 启用后，对离散的使用增强的源项线性化方法												阶段。该方法可以提高解的收敛性												在某些情况下。此命令仅在以下情况下可用												的												define/models/dPM/interaction/linerized-dPM-source-terms？												选项已启用。

children.des: Enables/disables the inclusion of DPM volume												fraction in continuous flow.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用包含收件箱卷												连续流中的分数。

children.des: Enables/disables implicit treatment for the DPM momentum source terms.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用对RST动量源项的隐式处理。

children.des: Enables/disables implicit treatment for all DPM source terms.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用对所有收件箱源术语的隐式处理。

children.des: Enables/disables the linear ramping up of												the DPM source terms at every DPM												iteration.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用的线性上升												每个收件箱上的收件箱来源术语												迭代。

children.des: Enables/disables linearization of mixture fraction source terms. This command is												available only for non- or partially-premixed												combustion cases.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用混合分数源项的线性化。此命令是												仅适用于非预混合或部分预混合												燃烧案例。

children.des: Enables/disables linearization of source												terms for the discrete phase.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用源线性化												离散相的术语。

children.des: Enables/disables the linearization of the												species source terms for the discrete phase. This												item is available with the species transport												model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用线性化												离散相的物种源项。这												该物品可与物种运输一起提供												模型

children.des: Sets the maximum DPM volume fraction in the												continuous flow. This item is available only when												the												define/models/dpm/interaction/enable-flow-blocking-by-particles?												option is enabled.
children.desTs: 设置中的最大毛刺体积分数												连续流动。此物品仅在以下情况下可用												的												define/models/dPM/interaction/enable-fl-blocking-by-plants？												选项已启用。

children.des: When enabled, recalculates the mixture												fraction source terms as a function of the primary												mixture fraction. This command is available for												non- or partially-premixed combustion cases												only.
children.desTs: 启用后，重新计算混合物												分数源项作为主要项的函数												混合分数。此命令适用于												非预混或部分预混燃烧情况												只.

children.des: Enables/disables flush of DPM source terms at beginning of every time												step.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用每次开始时刷新收件箱源术语												步

children.des: When enabled, uses the second-order accurate formulation for transient DPM source												terms. The method may improve the solution												accuracy. The command is available only for the												pressure-based solver when the												define/models/unsteady-2nd-order?												option is enabled.
children.desTs: 启用时，使用瞬时RST源的二阶精确公式												术语。该方法可以改进解决方案												准确性。该命令仅适用于												当												定义/模型/不稳定-二阶？												选项已启用。

children.des: Sets the under-relaxation factor for the discrete phase sources.
children.desTs: 设置离散相位源的欠松弛因子。

children.des: Enables/disables the update of DPM source terms every flow iteration (if this												option is not enabled, the terms will be updated												every DPM iteration).
children.desTs: 启用/禁用每次流迭代的收件箱源术语的更新（如果是												选项未启用，条款将更新												每次收件箱迭代）。

children.des: Enters the numerics menu to set numerical solution parameters.
children.desTs: 进入数字菜单设置数字解参数。

children.des: Enables/disables the adaptation of integration step length based on a maximum												error.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用根据最大值调整积分步进长度												错误.

children.des: Enables/disables mesh node averaging of DDPM quantities.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用DDPM数量的网格节点平均值。

children.des: Enables/disables mesh node averaging during integration time step.
children.desTs: 在集成时间步期间启用/禁用网格节点平均。

children.des: Specifies the averaging kernel to use for mesh node averaging.
children.desTs: 指定用于网格节点平均的平均核。

children.des: Enables/disables mesh node averaging of DPM source terms.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用收件箱源项的网格节点平均值。

children.des: Enables/disables coupled heat and mass update.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用耦合热量和质量更新。

children.des: Sets the drag law.
children.desTs: 设定阻力定律。

children.des: Enable/disable the dynamic interaction												range. This option can be helpful for cases where												the particle diameter may be too large compared to												the local mesh cell size. See Using the Dynamic Interaction Range in the Fluent User's Guide for more information.												This option is available only with high-resolution												tracking.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用动态交互												范围。此选项对于以下情况很有帮助												与之相比，颗粒直径可能太大												本地网格单元大小。有关更多信息，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中的使用动态交互范围。												此选项仅适用于高分辨率												跟踪.

children.des: Enables/disables mesh node averaging of DPM quantities.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用网格节点对收件箱数量进行平均。

children.des: Enables/disables enhanced packing limit												numerics to avoid exceeding the packing limit for												granular phases. This item is available only when												the DDPM model is used.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用增强包装限制												数字以避免超出包装限制												颗粒相。此商品仅在以下情况下可用												使用DDPM模型。

children.des: Adapts integration step length based on a maximum error.
children.desTs: 根据最大误差调整积分步进长度。

children.des: Specifies the Gaussian constant when using thegaussian												kernel for mesh node averaging.
children.desTs: 指定使用高斯时的高斯常数												网格节点平均的核心。

children.des: Enters the high resolution tracking menu. See Tracking Settings for the Discrete Phase Model in the Fluent User's Guide for more information												about these options.
children.desTs: 进入高分辨率跟踪菜单。有关详细信息，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中离散相模型的跟踪设置												关于这些选择。

children.des: When enabled, Ansys Fluent uses quad face												centroids when creating subtets in cases with												periodic boundaries.
children.desTs: 启用时，Ansys Fluent使用四边形面												在以下情况下创建子组时的质心												周期边界

children.des: Enter the barycentric interpolation												menu.
children.desTs: 进入重心插值												菜单.

children.des: Enables/disables the barycentric interpolation of specific heat to the particle												position. This option is recommended when the												specific heat varies with position to avoid												discontinuities in the interpolated variable at												cell boundaries. For flows with constant specific												heat, this option is unnecessary.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用对粒子进行比热的重心插值												位置。当												特定热量因避免的位置而异												内插变量的不连续性												单元格边界。对于具有恒定特定的流												热量，此选项是不必要的。

children.des: Enables/disables the barycentric												interpolation of the flow density. This option is												recommended when the density varies with position												to avoid discontinuities in the interpolated												variable at cell boundaries. For constant density												flows, this option is unnecessary.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用重心												流量密度的插值。此选项是												当密度因位置而异时建议使用												为了避免内插的不连续性												在像元边界处可变。对于恒定密度												流量，这个选项是不必要的。

children.des: When enabled, flow solution gradients are												interpolated to the particle position. This can be												useful when using physical models that depend on												these gradients (for example, the thermophoretic												force, pressure-gradient force, or virtual mass												force). Interpolating the gradients also improves												the accuracy and robustness of the trapezoidal												numerics scheme, which is the default method for												pathlines.
children.desTs: 启用后，流量解决方案梯度为												内插到粒子位置。这可以是												当使用依赖于												这些梯度（例如，热泳												力、压力梯度力或虚质量												内插梯度还可以提高												梯形的准确性和鲁棒性												数值方案，这是												路径。

children.des: Enables/disables the barycentric interpolation of flow viscosity to the particle												position. This option is recommended when the flow												viscosity varies with position to avoid												discontinuities in the interpolated variable at												cell boundaries. For flows with constant												viscosity, this option is unnecessary.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用对颗粒的流动粘性的重心插值												位置。当流动时，建议使用此选项												粘性因避免的位置而异												内插变量的不连续性												单元边界。对于具有常数的流												粘性，此选项是不必要的。

children.des: Enables/disables the barycentric												interpolation of temperature to the particle												position. The cell temperature is used by default												in calculations of heat transfer to/from the												particle.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用重心												粒子温度插值												位置。默认使用单元温度												在热传递的计算中，												粒子。

children.des: When enabled, the wall film properties (film												height, film mass, and wall shear) are												interpolated to the particle position.
children.desTs: 启用后，墙膜属性（膜												高度、膜质量和壁面剪切），												插入到粒子位置。

children.des: When this option is enabled for premixed or												non-premixed combustion simulations, the species												composition in each cell is precomputed prior to												tracking particles. This approach may improve												performance for cases with many particles and												relatively few cells. By default, this option is												set to no, and Ansys Fluent												calculates the species composition during particle												tracking. The solution results will be identical												for both methods.
children.desTs: 当为预混合或												非预混燃烧模拟，物种												每个单元格中的组成在												跟踪粒子。这种方法可以改善												适用于具有许多颗粒和												相对较少的单元格。默认情况下，此选项为												设置为否，然后Ansys Fluent												计算颗粒过程中的物种组成												跟踪。解决方案结果将相同												对于这两种方法。

children.des: Provides a hook for the												DEFINE_DPM_INTERPOLATION												user-defined function (UDF) used to interpolate												cell UDM to the particle position when using												high-resolution particle tracking. See DEFINE_DPM_BODY_FORCE in the Fluent Customization Manual for more information												about this UDF.
children.desTs: 为												定义__插值												用于内插的用户定义函数（ADF）												使用时将单元UDM移至粒子位置												高分辨率粒子跟踪。有关更多信息，请参阅《Fluent定制手册》中的DEFINE_SYS_BODY_FORCE												关于这个自定义框架。

children.des: When enabled, sets the velocity at wall												nodes to zero. (By default, the nodal velocities												on walls are first reconstructed from cell and												face values and then corrected to ensure that												there are no velocity components directed towards												the walls). This may be useful if you want to												consider particle impingement on the walls. Note												that enabling this option will more likely produce												incomplete particles as some particles may settle												on the walls.
children.desTs: 启用时，设置壁面速度												节点为零。(By默认情况下，节点速度												首先从细胞中重建，												面值，然后进行纠正，以确保												没有指向的速度分量												墙壁）。如果您愿意，这可能很有用												考虑颗粒对墙壁的撞击。注意												启用此选项更有可能产生												不完整的颗粒，因为一些颗粒可能会沉降												在墙上。

children.des: Enables/disables the calculation of the												particle time step that considers both the cell												aspect ratio and the particle trajectory. This												method improves the accuracy of the predictions in												boundary layer cells, particularly in layers where												flow gradients are large.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用												粒子时间步长，同时考虑像元												纵横比和粒子轨迹。这												方法提高了预测的准确性，												边界层单元，特别是在层中												流量梯度很大。

children.des: When enabled, checks the validity of a												subtet when the particle first enters it. If the												subtet is found to be degenerate, the tracking												algorithm modifies to accommodate it.
children.desTs: 启用后，检查												当粒子第一次进入它时，微妙。如果												发现Subtet退化，跟踪												算法进行修改以适应它。

children.des: Enables/disables the automatic calculation												of intersection tolerance. By default, the												tolerance used in intersection calculations is												scaled by the residence time of the particle in												the cell to improve robustness. For most cases,												the scaled tolerance is sufficient to identify all												intersections of the particle trajectory and the												subtet faces. You can set the intersection												tolerance manually using theset-subtet-intersection-tolerance												text command.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用自动计算												交叉点容差。默认情况下，												交叉点计算中使用的容差为												根据颗粒在其中的停留时间进行缩放												提高稳健性的细胞。对于大多数情况下，												缩放的容差足以识别所有												粒子轨迹和												Subtet面。您可以设置交叉点												使用theset-subtet-interction-tolance手动公差												文本命令。

children.des: Enables/disables an alternative method of												calculating intersections with cell boundaries.												Barycentric intersections are linear calculations												and are faster than the default intersection												algorithm. The default intersection algorithm is												second-order for stationary meshes; therefore,												using the barycentric intersection may sacrifice												accuracy. You must verify that the barycentric												intersections provide comparable results to the												default intersection method. This option is												available only for 3D stationary meshes and the												double precision solver.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用替代方法												计算与单元边界的交叉点。												重心相交是线性计算												并且比默认交叉路口更快												算法。默认的交叉算法是												对于静止网格来说是二阶;因此，												使用重心交叉点可能会牺牲												准确性。您必须验证重心												交叉点提供了与												默认相交方法。此选项为												仅适用于3D静止网格和												双精度求解器。

children.des: Enables/disables high resolution												tracking.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用高分辨率												跟踪.

children.des: Enters the particle relocation menu.
children.desTs: 进入粒子重新定位菜单。

children.des: When enabled, Ansys Fluent uses a more rigorous												method of locating the cell in which the particle												is currently contained. This approach is												computationally more expensive than the default												method; however, it is recommended for cases when												Fluent reports that particles are lost after the												mesh has been changed due to MDM, dynamic												adaption, or repartitioning.
children.desTs: 启用后，Ansys Fluent使用更严格的												定位颗粒所在单元的方法												当前包含。这种方法是												计算上比默认更昂贵												方法;但是，建议在以下情况下												Fluent报告称，												由于MDM，网格已更改，动态												适应或重新划分。

children.des: When enabled, Ansys Fluent uses a more robust												method of locating the wall film particles on the												film zone after the domain has been remeshed												either due to dynamic mesh movement or automatic												adaption. The improved robustness involves a												performance penalty. This method is recommended												for cases when Fluent reports that wall film												particles are lost during relocation.
children.desTs: 启用后，Ansys Fluent使用更强大的												将壁膜颗粒定位在												重新划分域后的电影区												要么是由于动态网格移动，要么是自动移动												适应。改进的鲁棒性涉及												性能损失。建议使用此方法												当Fluent报告说，												粒子在重新定位期间丢失。

children.des: Allows you to use a Fluent data file												containing particles that were tracked without the												high-resolution tracking option. When this option												is enabled, the particles that are found outside												the associated cells in the data file will be												moved inside these cells prior to tracking.												Neither the mesh nor the partitioning should be												modified prior to the first time the particles are												tracked. If you need to perform manual or dynamic												mesh adaption, you must first disable this option.												This option can be enabled before or after reading												the data file into Ansys Fluent.
children.desTs: 允许您使用Fluent数据文件												包含未经跟踪的粒子												高分辨率跟踪选项。当此选项												在外部发现的粒子被启用												数据文件中的关联单元格将是												在跟踪之前在这些细胞内移动。												网格和分区都不应该												在颗粒第一次被修改之前												跟踪。如果您需要执行手动或动态												网格自适应，您必须首先禁用此选项。												此选项可以在阅读之前或之后启用												将数据文件放入Ansys Fluent中。

children.des: Sets the performance/robustness trade-off												when relocating particles in overset meshes. The												default value is 1, which corresponds to a more												robust algorithm. Performance may be improved by												setting the value to 0; however, this may result												in particle loss, particularly if the mesh is												moving. You need to make sure that no particle												loss occurs.
children.desTs: 设置性能/稳健性权衡												当在重叠网格中重新定位粒子时。												默认值为1，对应于更多												鲁棒的算法。性能可以通过以下方式提高												将值设置为0;但是，这可能会导致												颗粒损失，特别是如果网格												移动。您需要确保没有粒子												损失发生。

children.des: Provides the ability to use the legacy												particle location method with high-resolution												tracking to improve performance. This option												allows the faster but less accurate particle												location method to be used with high-resolution												tracking. This option is useful when tracking in												polyhedral meshes, particularly when unsteady												particles that evaporate quickly are injected												frequently (for example, gas turbine combustors).												Note that it does not improve the particle												tracking speed, only the time it takes to inject												the particles.
children.desTs: 提供使用遗产的能力												高分辨率粒子定位方法												跟踪以提高性能。此选项												允许更快但不太准确的粒子												高分辨率使用的定位方法												跟踪。此选项在跟踪时很有用												多边形网格，特别是当不稳定时												快速蒸发的颗粒被注入												经常（例如，燃气涡轮燃烧室）。												请注意，它不会改善颗粒												跟踪速度，仅注射所需的时间												颗粒。

children.des: Sets a scaling factor to modify the												tolerance for locating Lagrangian wall film (LWF)												particles on a film face during the relocation.												The default value is 1.0. Increasing the tolerance												may help when Ansys Fluent fails to locate LWF												particles in such cases.
children.desTs: 设置缩放因子以修改												拉格朗日壁膜定位公差												在重新定位过程中胶片表面上的颗粒。												默认值为1.0。增加容差												当Ansys Fluent未能定位LWF时可能会有所帮助												在这种情况下，颗粒。

children.des: Enables/disables projecting existing												particles to Lagrangian wall film to track using												high-resolution tracking.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用投影现有的												粒子到拉格朗日壁膜进行跟踪												高分辨率跟踪。

children.des: Provides the ability to add a random												component to the Lagrangian wall-film particle												acceleration to reduce streaking that may result												from tracking particles on faceted geometry. As												small variations in face normals can produce												streaks in the wall-film appearance, this												parameter makes the film look smoother. The value												of this parameter should range between 0 and 1.0.												The default value of 0 prevents any artificial												smoothing.
children.desTs: 提供添加随机的能力												拉格朗日壁膜粒子的成分												加速以减少可能导致的条纹												从跟踪刻面几何上的粒子。作为												面部正常值的微小变化可能会产生												壁纸外观上有条纹，这												参数使影片看起来更流畅。值												此参数的范围应在0和1.0之间。												默认值0防止任何人为												平滑。

children.des: Specifies the tolerance used in intersection calculations. This tolerance will be scaled by												the characteristic cell crossing time of the												particle if the												enable-automatic-intersection-tolerance?												text command is enabled. If that option is												disabled, the specified tolerance will be used												without scaling. The default intersection												tolerance is												10-5.
children.desTs: 指定相交计算中使用的容差。此容差将通过												特征细胞穿越时间												如果粒子												启用自动交叉容忍？												文本命令已启用。如果该选项为												禁用，将使用指定的公差												无需缩放。默认交叉点												宽容是												10-5.

children.des: Specifies the fraction of the distance to												the subtet center to move the particle.
children.desTs: 指定距离的分数												移动粒子的子组中心。

children.des: When enabled, this option provides improved												accuracy and parallel consistency when sampling												particles at planes. This item is available only												with the 3D solver. Using the double-precision												solver and bounded planes is recommended.
children.desTs: 启用后，此选项提供了改进的												采样时的准确性和平行一致性												平面上的粒子。此物品仅适用												使用3D求解器。使用双精度												建议使用求解器和有界平面。

children.des: Enables/disables using quad face centroids												when creating subtets. This option changes the way												hexahedral cells are decomposed to avoid creating												degenerate subtets.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用使用四方心												创建子组时。此选项改变了												六边形细胞被分解以避免产生												堕落的亚群。

children.des: Enables/disables the use of the particle												timestep for the subtet intersection tolerance												with axisymmetric grids (default: enabled). If												disabled, the tolerance will be calculated in the												same manner as non-axisymmetric meshes (a scaled												value of the tolerance which is set using the												define/models/dpm/numerics/high-resolution-tracking/set-subtet-intersection-tolerance												text command).
children.desTs: 启用/禁用粒子的使用												子集交集容差的时间步												具有轴对称网格（默认：启用）。如果												禁用时，公差将在												与非轴对称网格（缩放												使用												define/models/dPM/numerics/high-resolution-Tracking/set-subtet-interruption-tolerance												文本命令）。

children.des: Enables/disables an alternative method of												timestep adaption. By default, Ansys Fluent uses the												half-step method of timestep adaption with												particle integration. This alternative method of												controlling the integration timestep based upon												velocity changes is faster; however, you need to												ensure that the accuracy is comparable for your												specific application.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用替代方法												时步适应。默认情况下，Ansys Fluent使用												时步适应的半步方法												粒子积分。这种替代方法												基于以下因素控制集成时间步												速度变化更快;但是，您需要												确保准确性与您的												具体应用。

children.des: A droplet evaporates completely when the remaining mass is														below this fraction of the initial droplet mass.
children.desTs: 当剩余质量为														低于初始液滴质量的这一部分。

children.des: Sets parameters for increasing or decreasing												the number of DPM numerical parcels to meet												resolution requirements.
children.desTs: 设置增加或减少的参数												要满足的预设数字包裹数量												分辨率要求。

children.des: Determines whether or not the initial												particle positions will vary from iteration to												iteration.
children.desTs: 确定初始是否												粒子位置将因迭代而异，												迭代。

children.des: Determines whether or not the initial												particle positions will vary from time step to												time step.
children.desTs: 确定初始是否												粒子位置将随时间步长变化，												时间步长

children.des: Sets parameters for the (initial) tracking step length.
children.desTs: 设置（初始）跟踪步进长度的参数。

children.des: Specifies a tracking scheme.
children.desTs: 指定跟踪方案。

children.des: Controls the format of the one-line tracking												statistics to be printed after every DPM tracking												pass. A value of 0 (the												default) prints only fates with non-zero values. A												value of 1 prints all												fates, including fates with zero values.
children.desTs: 控制一行跟踪的格式												每次收件箱跟踪后打印统计数据												pass.A值0（												默认）仅打印具有非零值的命运。A												值1打印全部												命运，包括零价值的命运。

children.des: Sets the under-relaxation factor for the film height calculation. The recommended values range												between 0.5 (default) and 0.9. This text command												is not available for high resolution tracking												cases with enabled barycentric interpolation of												wall-film properties (that is,												define/models/dpm/numerics/high-resolution-tracking/barycentric-interpolation/interpolate-wallfilm-properties?												is set to yes).
children.desTs: 设置薄膜高度计算的欠松弛因子。推荐值范围												介于0.5（默认）和0.9之间。此文本命令												不适用于高分辨率跟踪												启用重心插值的案例												壁膜性质（即，												定义/模型/dPM/numerics/高分辨率跟踪/重心插值/插值墙-属性？												设置为是）。

children.des: Sets the Vaporization Fractional Change Limits.
children.desTs: 设置蒸发分数变化限制。

children.des: Enters the options menu to set optional models.
children.desTs: 进入选项菜单以设置可选型号。

children.des: Enforces the switching from vaporization to boiling even if the boiling point is												not calculated from the vapor pressure data. If												the pressure in your model is above critical you												must retain the default setting												(yes). This options is												available only if whenPressure												Dependent Boiling is enabled in thePhysical Models tab of theDiscrete Phase Models dialog												box. For more details, see Considering Pressure Dependence in Boiling in the Fluent User's Guide.
children.desTs: 强制从汽化切换到沸腾，即使沸点												而不是根据蒸汽压数据计算。如果												模型中的压力高于临界压力，												必须保留默认设置												（是）。这个选项是												仅在压力时可用												在离散相模型对话框的物理模型选项卡中启用了相关沸腾												box。有关更多详细信息，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中的考虑沸腾中的压力依赖性。

children.des: Enables/disables Brownian motion of particles.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用粒子的布朗运动。

children.des: When enabled, generates a file containing												particle current positions (step-by-step history												report for unsteady tracking) in the sampling file												format.
children.desTs: 启用后，生成一个文件，其中包含												粒子当前位置（逐步历史												不稳定跟踪报告）在采样文件中												格式.

children.des: Enables/disables the convective wall-film												heat transfer model. See Film Boiling Model with Convective Heat Transfer Model in the Fluent Theory Guide for more information												about this model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用对流墙膜												热传递模型。有关更多信息，请参阅Fluent理论指南中的膜沸腾模型和对流热传递模型												关于这个模型。

children.des: Enables computation of mean and/or RMS values of additional discrete phase												variables for postprocessing.
children.desTs: 支持计算附加离散相位的平均值和/或RMS值												后处理的变量。

children.des: Enables/disables erosion/accretion.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用侵蚀/堆积。

children.des: When enabled, the mass of the Lagrangian												wall film particles is included in the calculation												of the concentration. This option is disabled by												default.
children.desTs: 启用后，拉格朗日量的质量												计算中包含了壁膜颗粒												浓度。此选项被禁用												default.

children.des: Initializes the erosion/accretion rates with zero.
children.desTs: 将侵蚀/堆积率设为零。

children.des: Specifies the maximum number of species that will be accessible from discrete												phase model UDFs. Only species with indices up to												this value are accessible in discrete phase model												UDFs.
children.desTs: 指定可从离散访问的最大物种数量												阶段模型ADF。仅指数高达												该值可以在离散相模型中访问												自定义框架。

children.des: Enables/disables particle radiation.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用粒子辐射。

children.des: Enables/disables inclusion of pressure												gradient effects in the particle force												balance.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用压力的纳入												粒子力的梯度效应												平衡

children.des: Answering yes at the												first prompt removes the wall temperature limiter												for walls with the Lagrangian wall-film boundary												condition. If you enter no												(default), then you will be prompted for the												temperature difference above the boiling point.												You will be also prompted whether you want to												enable the reporting of the Leidenfrost												temperature on the wall faces.
children.desTs: 在												第一个提示删除壁温限制器												对于具有拉格朗日墙膜边界的墙												条件。如果您输入否												（默认），然后系统会提示您输入												沸点以上的温度差。												系统还会提示您是否要												使莱顿弗罗斯特能够报道												墙壁表面的温度。

children.des: Sets the minimum particle diameter permitted												during tracking. By default, Ansys Fluent limits the												smallest particle diameter to 10 nm. Evaporating												and reacting particles that are smaller than this												limit will be removed. If inert particles are												injected with diameters below this limit, the												results may be inaccurate. When tracking smaller												particles, you can use this text command to reduce												the minimum particle diameter.
children.desTs: 设置允许的最小颗粒直径												在跟踪期间。默认情况下，Ansys Fluent限制												最小颗粒直径为10纳米。蒸发												和比这个小的反应粒子												限制将被取消。如果惰性颗粒												注射直径低于此限制时，												结果可能不准确。跟踪较小时												粒子，您可以使用此文本命令来减少												最小颗粒直径。

children.des: Enters the menu for setting up options for urea deposition in Selective Catalytic Reduction												(SCR) simulations. For more information about risk												for solids deposit formation for the SCR process,												see Assessing the Risk for Solids Deposit Formation During Selective Catalytic Reduction    Process in the Fluent User's Guide.
children.desTs: 进入菜单，设置选择性催化还原中的尿素沉积选项												(SCR)模拟。有关风险的更多信息，												对于SCR工艺的固体沉积物形成，												参见《评估选择性催化还原过程中固体沉积物形成的风险》    Fluent用户指南中的过程。

children.des: Enables/disables the level-based risk												analysis.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用基于级别的风险												分析.

children.des: Enables/disables the SCR urea deposition												weight-based risk analysis.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用可控硅尿沉积												基于权重的风险分析。

children.des: Specifies viscosity and surface tension of												the deposited urea-liquid by-products.
children.desTs: 指定的粘性和表面张力												沉积的尿液副产物。

children.des: Sets the limit for the thermolysis												model.
children.desTs: 设置温度限制												模型

children.des: Enables/disables spatial staggering for atomizer and solid-cone												injections.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用雾化器和固体圆锥体的空间错开												注射剂

children.des: Enables/disables spatial staggering for standard (non-atomizer and												non-solid-cone) injections.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用标准（非雾化器和												非固体圆锥体）注射。

children.des: Enables/disables temporal staggering.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用时间错开。

children.des: Controls the percentage of every particle's initial time step that will be												sampled.
children.desTs: 控制每个粒子的初始时间步的百分比												抽检

children.des: Enables/disables Saffman lift force.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Saffman提升力。

children.des: Specifies the region over which to spatially stagger particles when												particle-staggering is enabled for non-atomizer												injections.
children.desTs: 指定在以下情况下要在其上空间错开粒子的区域												非雾化器启用颗粒错开												注射剂

children.des: Sets significant figures in the step-by-step report.
children.desTs: 在分步报告中设置重要数字。

children.des: Enables/disables thermophoretic force.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用热泳力。

children.des: Enables/disables tracking in absolute frame.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用绝对帧中的跟踪。

children.des: Sets the limit for the two-step												devolatilization reaction.
children.desTs: 设置两步的限制												脱挥发分反应。

children.des: Enables/disables dumping multicomponent												particle mass into the continuous phase if the												saturation temperature calculation fails.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用转储多组件												颗粒质量进入连续相，如果												饱和温度计算失败。

children.des: Enables/disables calculation of DPM sources in TKE equation.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用TKE方程中RST源的计算。

children.des: Specifies a uniform distribution of mass over the cross-section of solid cone and												atomizer injections. This can become important												when the mesh is smaller than the diameter (or												another characteristic size) of the												injection.
children.desTs: 指定实体圆锥横剖面上质量的均匀分布，												雾化器注射。这可能变得重要												当网格小于直径（或												另一个特征尺寸）												注射

children.des: Determines whether the absolute pressure or												constant operating pressure (specified indefine/operating-conditions/operating-pressure)												will be used in vaporization rates												calculations.
children.desTs: 确定绝对压力或												恒定工作压力（指定不确定/工作条件/工作压力）												将用于蒸发率												计算。

children.des: Enables averaging of the Spalding heat transfer term for the														convection/diffusion-controlled model.
children.desTs: 实现Spalding热传递项的平均值														对流/扩散控制模型。

children.des: Sets Vaporization options.
children.desTs: 设置蒸发选项。

children.des: Enables/disables inclusion of the virtual mass force in the particle force												balance.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用将虚拟质量力包含在粒子力中												平衡

children.des: Enters the parallel menu to set parameters for parallel DPM calculations.
children.desTs: 进入并行菜单以设置并行计算的参数。

children.des: Turns on/off particle workpile algorithm. This option is only available when thedefine/models/dpm/parallel/use-shared-memory												option is selected.
children.desTs: 打开/关闭粒子工作堆算法。此选项仅在thefeine/models/dPM/parallel/use-share-memorial时可用												选择选项。

children.des: Enters the menu for expert DPM parallel text commands.
children.desTs: 进入专家收件箱并行文本命令的菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables a partitioning method that												is more granular and can yield faster calculations												(especially for cases that are running on a low to												moderate number of processors). This partitioning												method is only applied when you use the DPM domain												for the hybrid parallel DPM tracking mode (that												is, when you have enabled thedefine/models/dpm/parallel/hybrid-2domain?												text command).
children.desTs: 启用/禁用分区方法，												更细粒度，可以产生更快的计算												（特别是对于运行率较低的情况												中等数量的处理器）。这种分区												方法仅在使用收件箱域时应用												对于混合并行收件箱跟踪模式（												是，当您启用thefine/models/dPM/parallel/hybrid-2域时？												文本命令）。

children.des: Enables/disables the deterministic tracking order of particles. This option is												available only for fully coupled DPM cases that												involve the hybrid parallel method.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用粒子的确定性跟踪顺序。此选项为												仅适用于完全耦合的收件箱，												涉及混合并行方法。

children.des: Enables/disables the use of a second domain for DPM particle tracking.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用第二个域用于粒子跟踪。

children.des: Sets the number of processors to use for DPM. This option is only available when												thedefine/models/dpm/parallel/enable-workpile?												option is enabled.
children.desTs: 设置用于收件箱的处理器数量。此选项仅在以下情况下可用												thefine/models/dPM/parallel/enable-workpile？												选项已启用。

children.des: Prints particle workpile statistics. This option is only available when thedefine/models/dpm/parallel/enable-workpile?												option is enabled.
children.desTs: 打印粒子工作堆统计信息。此选项仅在define/models/dPM/parallel/enable-workpile时可用？												选项已启用。

children.des: Specifies that the calculations are performed using multicore cluster computing												or shared-memory machines. This option works in												conjunction withopenmpi												for a dynamic load balancing without migration of												cells.
children.desTs: 指定使用多核集群计算执行计算												或共享内存机器。此选项适用于												与openmpi的连接												实现动态负载平衡，无需迁移												细胞

children.des: Specifies that the calculations are performed using cluster computing or												shared-memory machines. With this option, the												compute node processes themselves perform the												particle work on their local partitions and												particle migration to other compute nodes is												implemented using message passing												primitives.
children.desTs: 指定使用集群计算执行计算，或												共享内存机器。使用此选项，												计算节点进程本身执行												对他们的本地分区进行粒子工作，												粒子迁移到其他计算节点是												使用消息传递实现												原始人。

children.des: Specifies that the calculations are performed on shared-memory multiprocessor												machines.
children.desTs: 指定在共享内存多处理器上执行计算												机械.

children.des: Enters the splash option menu.
children.desTs: 进入启动选项菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables the O’Rourke formulation (default for the Lagrangian Wall												Film (LWF) model). If the O’Rourke												formulation is disabled, the Stanton formulation												(default for the Eulerian Wall Film (EWF) model)												is used in a simulation.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用O ' Rourke公式（拉格朗日墙的默认值												电影（LWF）模型）。如果奥罗克												配方已禁用，斯坦顿配方												（默认为Eulerian Wall Film（EWF）模型）												用于模拟。

children.des: Sets the splash pdf limiting method. Available methods are: the splash pdf tail												limiting (default for the LWF model) and the												splash pdf peak limiting (default for the EWF												model). For the splash pdf peak limiting, you will												be prompted to specify the peak limiting												value.
children.desTs: 设置飞溅pdf限制方法。可用方法有：飞溅pdf尾部												限制（LWF模型的默认值）和												splash pdf峰值限制（EWF默认												型号）。对于飞溅pdf峰值限制，您将												系统提示指定峰值限制												值

children.des: Enters the spray model menu. This command is available only if the breakup model											enabled globally.
children.desTs: 进入喷雾模型菜单。此命令仅在分手模型时可用											全球启用。

children.des: Current spray model settings.
children.desTs: 当前喷雾模型设置。

children.des: Enables/disables collecting and tracking new generated child droplets within the												same time step.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用收集和跟踪内新产生的儿童飞沫												相同的时间步。

children.des: Enables/disables droplet coalescence when using the stochastic collision model.												This option is available if all injections have												been selected and the DEM model is												disabled.
children.desTs: 使用随机碰撞模型时启用/禁用液滴聚并。												如果所有注射都有，则此选项可用												已被选择，并且数字地形图模型是												禁用.

children.des: Enables/disables droplet collision model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用液滴碰撞模型。

children.des: Enables/disables breakup globally, but does not alter injection settings other												than enable/disable.
children.desTs: 全局启用/禁用分解，但不更改进样设置												启用/禁用。

children.des: Sets the KHRT breakup model.
children.desTs: 设置KHRT分手模型。

children.des: Sets the Madabhushi breakup model.
children.desTs: 设定马达布什分手模式。

children.des: Disables the currently enabled breakup model. This option is available only if												the breakup model is enabled globally and for the												selected injections, and not all injections have												been selected.
children.desTs: 禁用当前启用的分手模型。此选项仅在以下情况下可用												分手模型在全球范围内启用，为												选择注射，但并非所有注射都有												被选中。

children.des: Sets the Schmehl breakup model.
children.desTs: 设置Schmehl分手模型。

children.des: Enables/disables breakup model globally and uniformly specifies injection breakup												parameters.
children.desTs: 全局启用/禁用分解模型并统一指定注射分解												参数

children.des: Sets the SSD breakup model.
children.desTs: 设置SSD拆分模型。

children.des: Sets the TAB breakup model.
children.desTs: 设置Tab分手模型。

children.des: Sets the number of parcels to break up a droplet in the TAB model.
children.desTs: 设置在Tab模型中分解液滴的地块数量。

children.des: Enables sampling of diameter for each TAB breakup parcel from a Rosin-Rammler												distribution using a random number.
children.desTs: 支持对来自Rosin-Rammler的每个TAB破碎宗地的直径进行采样												使用随机数进行分配。

children.des: Allows treatment of the Rayleigh regime, in which a cylindrical liquid jet breaks												into droplets of larger diameter. This option is												available only if the WAVE model is												enabled.
children.desTs: 允许治疗Rayleigh状态，其中圆柱形液体喷射破裂												变成更大直径的液滴。这个选项是												仅当WAVE模型为												启用.

children.des: Sets the minimum percentage of parent parcel mass shed before new parcel												creation. This option is available only if the												WAVE model is enabled.
children.desTs: 设置新地块之前的父地块批量剔除的最小百分比												创建。此选项仅在												WAVE模型已启用。

children.des: Sets the WAVE breakup model.
children.desTs: 设置WAVE分手模型。

children.des: Sets the spray-angle constant to compute orthogonal velocity components of child												droplets after breakup. This option is available												only if the WAVE model is enabled.
children.desTs: 设置喷雾角常数以计算孩子的垂直速度分量												分手后飞沫。此选项可用												仅当启用WAVE模型时。

children.des: Enters the stripping options menu.
children.desTs: 进入剥离选项菜单。

children.des: Sets the diameter coefficient ( in Equation 17–20												in the Theory Guide)
children.desTs: 设置直径系数（公式17-20												在理论指南中）

children.des: Sets the mass coefficient ( in Equation 17–21												in the Theory Guide)
children.desTs: 设置质量系数（在公式17-21中												在理论指南中）

children.des: Enables/disables unsteady particle tracking.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用不稳定粒子跟踪。

children.des: Sets DPM user-defined functions.
children.desTs: 设置收件箱用户定义的函数。

children.des: Enter the electrolysis and H2 pump model setup menu. This item is only available if the								electrolysis and H2 pump model is enabled using the									define/models/potential-and-li-ion-battery?								text command.
children.desTs: 进入电解和H2泵型号设置菜单。此项目仅在								使用启用电解和H2泵模型									定义/模型/潜在和锂离子电池？								文本命令。

children.des: Enter the advanced setup menu.
children.desTs: 进入高级设置菜单。

children.des: Specifies contact-resistivity for the												specified zones.
children.desTs: 指定的接触电阻率												指定区域。

children.des: Enter the anode setup menu.
children.desTs: 进入阳极设置菜单。

children.des: Specifies the settings for the catalyst												layer.
children.desTs: 指定催化剂的设置												层.

children.des: Specifies the settings for current												collector.
children.desTs: 指定当前设置												收藏家

children.des: Specifies the settings for the flow												channel.
children.desTs: 指定流的设置												频道

children.des: Specifies the settings for the												porous-layer.
children.desTs: 指定												多孔层。

children.des: Enter the cathode setup menu.
children.desTs: 进入阴极设置菜单。

children.des: Specifies the settings for the catalyst												layer.
children.desTs: 指定催化剂的设置												层.

children.des: Specifies the settings for current												collector.
children.desTs: 指定当前设置												收藏家

children.des: Specifiesthe settings for the flow												channel.
children.desTs: 指定流的设置												频道

children.des: Specifies the settings for the												porous-layer.
children.desTs: 指定												多孔层。

children.des: Allows you to hook up your												DEFINE_ELECTROLYSIS_ECHEM_RATE											and												DEFINE_ELECTROLYSIS_RELATIVE_PERMEABILITY											user-defined functions only if you previously compiled											and loaded UDF library. See DEFINE_ELECTROLYSIS_ECHEM_RATE and												DEFINE_ELECTROLYSIS_RELATIVE_PERMEABILITY       in the Fluent Customization Manual for more											information.
children.desTs: 允许您连接您的												定义_电解_ECHEM_速率											和												定义_电解_相对_渗透性											仅在您之前编译时才使用用户定义的函数											并加载了ADF库。请参阅DEFINE_ELLUYSIS_ECHEM_RATE和												定义_电解_相对_渗透性       在Fluent定制手册中了解更多信息											信息.

children.des: Enters the menu for setting											electrolyte/membrane.
children.desTs: 进入菜单进行设置											电解质/膜。

children.des: Specifies the electrolyte/membrane												settings.
children.desTs: 指定电解质/膜												设置.

children.des: Sets the electrolysis and H2 pump model											options.
children.desTs: 设置电解和H2泵模型											选项.

children.des: Sets the electrolysis and H2 pump model											parameters.
children.desTs: 设置电解和H2泵模型											参数

children.des: Enables/disables the energy model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用能量模型。

children.des: Enters the Eulerian wall film model menu.
children.desTs: 进入欧拉墙壁电影模型菜单。

children.des: Enters the Coupled-Solution menu.
children.desTs: 进入“耦合解决方案”菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables the coupled solution												method.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用耦合解决方案												法

children.des: Enables/disables the film curvature												smoothing option and sets the smoothing												parameters.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用胶片弯曲												平滑选项并设置平滑												参数

children.desTs: 启用/禁用显示Film/VOF的消息											所选电影墙上的过渡标准。这											仅当Film/VOF时，命令才可用												过渡和标准已											在“墙”对话框中启用												(VOF交互选项卡）。

children.desTs: 列出了欧拉式建筑的所有墙壁的名称和ID											已启用壁挂膜模型。
