children.desTs: 定义热交换器组。

children.des: Reports the computed values of heat rejection, outlet temperature, and inlet												temperature for the macroscopic cells (macros) in												a heat exchanger.
children.desTs: 报告散热量、出口温度和入口温度的计算值												宏观细胞（macros）的温度，												热交换器。

children.des: Defines heat-exchanger core model.
children.desTs: 定义热交换器核心模型。

children.des: Reports the computed values of total heat rejection, outlet temperature, and												inlet temperature for a specified heat-exchanger												core.
children.desTs: 报告总散热量、出口温度和												指定热交换器的入口温度												核心

children.des: Specifies the zone that represents the heat exchanger, the dimensions of the heat												exchanger, the macro grid, and the coolant												direction and properties.
children.desTs: 指定表示热交换器的区域、热交换器的尺寸												交换器、宏网格和冷却剂												方向和性质。

children.des: Plots NTU vs. primary mass flow rate for each auxiliary mass flow rate.
children.desTs: 绘制每个辅助质量流率的NTU与主质量流率的关系。

children.des: Writes NTU vs. primary mass flow rate for each auxiliary mass flow rate.
children.desTs: 写入每个辅助质量流率的NTU与主质量流率的关系。

children.des: Enters the multiphase model menu.
children.desTs: 进入多相模型菜单。

children.des: Specifies body force formulation.
children.desTs: 指定体积力公式。

children.desTs: 启用耦合水平集界面跟踪方法。

children.des: Enters the menu to set explicit VOF expert											options.
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置显式VOF专家											选项.

children.des: If you enter yes, the												volume fraction equations will be solved every												iteration. By default, the volume fraction												equations will be solved only once per time												step.
children.desTs: 如果您输入是，则												体积分数方程将每年求解												迭代。默认情况下，体积分数												方程每次只解一次												步

children.des: Selects the sub-time step method.
children.desTs: 初始化子时间步法。

children.des: Enters the volume fraction filtering												menu.
children.desTs: 进入体积分数过滤												菜单.

children.des: Enables/disables the volume fraction												filtering treatment.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用体积分数												过滤处理

children.des: Selects the volume fraction filtering												method. This command becomes available once the												define/models/multiphase/explicit-expert-options/volume-fraction-filtering/enable?												text option has been set to												yes.
children.desTs: 初始化体积分数过滤												方法。一旦												定义/模型/多相/显式专家-选项/体积分数-过滤/启用？												文本选项已设置为												是的

children.des: Specifies a cut-off value for the volume												fraction filtering. This command becomes available												after you select the node averaged cutoff method												using the												define/models/multiphase/explicit-expert-options/volume-fraction-filtering/filtering-options												text command.
children.desTs: 指定体积的截止值												分数过滤。此命令可用												选择节点平均截止方法后												使用												定义/模型/多相/显式专家-选项/体积分数-过滤/过滤-选项												文本命令。

children.des: Enters the flow regime modeling menu. See Algebraic Interfacial Area Density Method for Flow Regime Blending in the Fluent Theory Guide for details about the											below parameters.
children.desTs: 进入流态建模菜单。有关的详细信息，请参阅《Fluent Theory Guide》中的流态混合的代数界面面积密度方法											下面的参数。

children.des: Enters the menu for setting the AIAD parameters. This item is available only when												the flow regime modeling is enabled.
children.desTs: 进入设置AIAD参数的菜单。此项目仅在以下情况下可用												使能流状态建模。

children.des: Specifies the critical volume fraction of												either gas or liquid for calculating the blending												factors for the bubbly and droplet flows ( and  in Equation 14–178 in the Fluent Theory Guide).
children.desTs: 指定的临界体积分数												用于计算混合的气体或液体												气泡和液滴流动的系数（以及Fluent理论指南中的公式14-178）。

children.des: Specifies the critical gradient fraction for												determining the intermediate transition width for												the free surface blending factor ( in Equation 14–183 in the Fluent Theory Guide).
children.desTs: 指定临界梯度分数												确定中间过渡宽度												自由表面混合因子（在《流利理论指南》中的方程14-183中）。

children.des: Specifies the volume fraction width for the												intermediate transition ( in Equation 14–178 in the Fluent Theory Guide).
children.desTs: 指定的体积分数宽度												中间过渡（在《流利理论指南》中的方程14-178中）。

children.des: Specifies the cell number across the												interface for determining the interfacial width												for free surface flow ( in Equation 14–182 in the Fluent Theory Guide).
children.desTs: 指定中的单元格号												用于确定界面宽度的界面												对于自由表面流（在Fluent理论指南中的方程14-182中）。

children.des: Enables/disables the flow regime												modeling.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用流动状态												建模

children.desTs: 进入选择混合型号的菜单。

children.desTs: 启用/禁用密集离散相												模型

children.des: Enables/disables the multi-fluid VOF												model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用多流体VOF												模型

children.des: Specifies interface modeling options.
children.desTs: 指定界面建模选项。

children.des: Specifies mixture parameters.
children.desTs: 指定混合参数。

children.des: Specifies multiphase model.
children.desTs: 指定多相模型。

children.des: Specifies the number of phases.
children.desTs: 指定阶段数。

children.des: Enters the population balance models menu.
children.desTs: 进入人口平衡模型菜单。

children.des: Enters the population balance expert												menu.
children.desTs: 进入人口平衡专家												菜单.

children.des: Enter the menu for the quadrature method of												moments (QMOM).
children.desTs: 进入积分法的菜单												时刻（QRST）。

children.des: If enabled, retains the QMOM sources for the low volume fraction of the secondary												phase.
children.desTs: 如果启用，将保留次要数据的低容量部分的QSYS源												相位

children.des: Enters the menu for the quadrature-based												moments method (QBMM). For more information about												the options below, see Expert Parameters for the QBMM in the Fluent User's Guide.
children.desTs: 进入基于象限的菜单												矩法（QBMM）。有关的更多信息												下面的选项，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中QBMM的专家参数。

children.des: Specifies the Courant number for the QBMM												advection. This value must be less than or equal												to 0.5.
children.desTs: 指定QBMM的Courant号												平流。该值必须小于或等于												到0.5。

children.des: Allows you to select the method for the												maximum Courant number calculation from the												following options:
children.desTs: 允许您选择												从												以下选项：

children.des: Specifies the maximum number of advection												integration time steps. Default: 250.
children.desTs: 指定最大平流次数												集成时间步。默认：250。

children.des: Allows you to select the time advection time												integration from the following options:
children.desTs: 允许您选择时间平流时间												从以下选项集成：

children.des: Specifies the minimum moment-based volume												fraction, below which the moments are considered												negligible. (Default: 1e-8.)
children.desTs: 指定最小基于动量的音量												分数，低于分数考虑时刻												微不足道的。（默认：1 e-8。）

children.des: Specifies the absolute error of the source												time integration in Equation 14–825 in the Fluent Theory Guide. (Default:												1.0e-8)
children.desTs: 指定源的绝对误差												《流利理论指南》中方程14-825中的时间积分。（默认：												1.0e-8）

children.des: Specifies the relative error of the source												time integration in Equation 14–825 in the Fluent Theory Guide. (Default:												1.0e-6)
children.desTs: 指定源的相对误差												《流利理论指南》中方程14-825中的时间积分。（默认：												1.0e-6）

children.des: Allows you to select the source time												integration schemes for the embedded SSP-RK method												described in Sources in the Fluent Theory Guide. The following												options are available:
children.desTs: 允许您选择源时间												嵌入式SSP-RK方法的集成方案												在《流利理论指南》中的来源中进行了描述。以下是												有可用选项：

children.des: Specifies the minimum allowed source												integration time step. Violation of this boundary												may indicate a solution divergence. (Default:												1.0e-8)
children.desTs: 指定最小允许的来源												积分时间步。违反此边界												可能表明解决方案存在分歧。（默认：												1.0e-8）

children.des: Specifies the source time integration factor												for error estimation in Equation 14–826 in the Fluent Theory Guide. (Default:												0.9)
children.desTs: 指定源时间积分因子												用于《流利理论指南》中方程14-826中的误差估计。（默认：												0.9）

children.des: Specifies the maximum source time												integration factor for error estimation in Equation 14–826 in the Fluent Theory Guide. (Default:												2.0)
children.desTs: 指定最大源时间												流畅理论指南中方程14-826中误差估计的积分因子。（默认：												2.0）

children.des: Specifies the minimum source time												integration factor for error estimation in Equation 14–826 in the Fluent Theory Guide. (Default:												0.5)
children.desTs: 指定最小源时间												流畅理论指南中方程14-826中误差估计的积分因子。（默认：												0.5）

children.des: Specifies how much information should be												displayed during the simulation. The following												options are available:
children.desTs: 指定应该包含多少信息												模拟期间显示。以下内容												有可用选项：

children.des: Specifies the lower threshold above which												the moments are considered to be negligible. This												parameter should be set to a small negative												number. The default value is -1e-12. If												non-realizable moments are generated during the												simulation, you can decrease this parameter (even												by a few orders of magnitude, for example,												-1e-9).
children.desTs: 指定高于该阈值的下限												这些时刻被认为可以忽略不计。这												参数应设置为小负值												数字。默认值为-1 e-12。如果												不可实现的时刻是在												模拟时，可以减小此参数（甚至												比如说，几个数量级的变化，												-1e-9）。

children.des: Specifies the upper threshold below which												the moments are considered to be negligible. This												parameter should be set to a small positive												number. The default value is 1e-12. If												non-realizable moments are generated during the												simulation, you can increase this parameter (even												by a few orders of magnitude, for example,												1e-9).
children.desTs: 指定上限阈值，低于该阈值												这些时刻被认为可以忽略不计。这												参数应设置为小正值												数字。默认值为1 e-12。如果												不可实现的时刻是在												模拟时，可以增加这个参数（甚至												比如说，几个数量级的变化，												1 e-9）。

children.des: Specifies the lower threshold above which												the auxiliary quantities are considered to be												negligible. This parameter should be set to a												small negative number. The default value is												-1e-12. If non-realizable moments are generated												during the simulation, this parameter can be												lowered by a few orders of magnitude (for example,												-1e-9).
children.desTs: 指定高于该阈值的下限												辅助量被认为是												可忽略不计。该参数应设置为												小负值。默认值为												-1 e-12.如果产生不可实现的时刻												在模拟过程中，该参数可以												降低了几个数量级（例如，												-1e-9）。

children.des: Specifies the upper threshold below which												the auxiliary quantities are considered to be												negligible. This parameter should be set to a												small positive number. The default value is 1e-12.												If non-realizable moments are generated during the												simulation, this parameter can be increased by a												few orders of magnitude (for example,												1e-9).
children.desTs: 指定上限阈值，低于该阈值												辅助量被认为是												可忽略不计。该参数应设置为												小正值。默认值为1 e-12。												如果在												模拟时，该参数可以增加一个												几个数量级（例如，												1 e-9）。

children.des: Allows you to account for bubble expansion												due to large changes in hydrostatic pressure in												compressible flows. This option is available with												the inhomogeneous discrete method.
children.desTs: 允许你解释气泡膨胀												由于流体静压的巨大变化，												可压缩流。此选项可用于												非齐次离散方法

children.des: Allows you to select the population balance												model and set its parameters.
children.desTs: 允许您选择人口平衡												模型并设置其参数。

children.des: Enters the phenomena menu for population												balance.
children.desTs: 进入人口现象菜单												平衡

children.des: Sets the aggregation kernel.
children.desTs: 设置聚合内核。

children.des: Specifies a factor that controls the												intensity of the selected aggregation												kernel.
children.desTs: 指定控制												所选聚集的强度												内核。

children.des: Sets the breakage kernel.
children.desTs: 设置破碎内核。

children.des: specifies a cutoff limit for the volume												fraction values for the breakage and aggregation												kernels.
children.desTs: 指定卷的截止限制												破碎和聚集的分数值												果仁。

children.des: Specifies a factor that controls the												intensity of the selected breakage kernel.
children.desTs: 指定控制												所选破碎粒的强度。

children.des: Specifies the growth rate.
children.desTs: 指定增长率。

children.des: Specifies the nucleation rate.
children.desTs: 指定成核率。

children.des: Gives you recommendations for appropriate												bubble sizes and/or droplet size limits.
children.desTs: 为您提供适当的建议												气泡尺寸和/或液滴尺寸限制。

children.des: enables the Algebraic Interfacial Area Density (AIAD)											model and sets the AIAD secondary continuous phase and											the secondary entrained phase. Entering0 as a phase ID cancels any											previous phase selection. Note that you must define the											phases in your simulation using thedefine/phases/ text command											prior to using theregime-transition-modeling											text command. This option is available only with the											Eulerian multiphase model.
children.desTs: 启用代数界面面积密度（AIAD）											模型并设置AIAD二级连续阶段，											二次带入相。输入0作为相ID会取消任何											上一阶段选择。请注意，您必须定义											使用define/phrases/ text命令在仿真中添加阶段											在使用区域转换建模之前											text命令。此选项仅适用于											欧拉多相模型

children.des: Enters the sub-model menu.
children.desTs: 进入子模型菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables the boiling model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用沸腾模型。

children.des: Enters the boiling model options												menu.
children.desTs: 进入沸腾模式选项												菜单.

children.des: Enables/disables the non-local boundary												field (NLBF) model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用非本地边界												场（NLBF）模型。

children.des: Allows you to choose the boiling model												option (RPI boiling model, non-equilibrium												boiling, or critical heat flux).
children.desTs: 允许您选择沸腾型号												选项（RPI沸腾模型，非平衡												沸腾，或临界热通量）。

children.des: Enables the Open Channel sub-model and/or the Open Channel Wave Boundary Condition											sub-model.
children.desTs: 启用明航道子模型和/或明航道波浪边界条件											子模型。

children.des: Enters the menu for setting the volume fraction											parameters.
children.desTs: 进入设置体积分数的菜单											参数

children.des: Specifies the maximum Courant number allowed												near the free surface. This item is available with												the explicit formulation for the volume												fraction.
children.desTs: 指定允许的最大Courant数												在自由表面附近。此项目可与												体积的显式表示												分数。

children.des: Allows you to choose the volume tracking												formulation (implicit or explicit).
children.desTs: 允许您选择音量跟踪												公式（隐含或明确）。

children.des: Specifies a cutoff limit for the volume												fraction values. This item is available with the												explicit formulation for the volume												fraction.
children.desTs: 指定卷的截止限制												分数值。此物品可通过												体积的显式公式												分数。

children.des: Enters the wet steam model menu.
children.desTs: 进入湿蒸汽模式菜单。

children.des: Compiles user-defined wet steam library.
children.desTs: 编制用户定义的湿蒸汽库。

children.des: Enables/disables the wet steam model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用湿蒸汽模型。

children.des: Loads or unloads user-defined wet steam library.
children.desTs: 加载或卸载用户定义的湿蒸汽库。

children.des: Enters the set menu for setting wet steam model options.
children.desTs: 进入设置菜单以设置湿蒸汽模型选项。

children.des: Sets the droplet growth rate to either												Young's formulation (default) or Hill's.
children.desTs: 将液滴生长率设置为												Young的公式（默认）或Hill的公式。

children.des: Enables/disables the enhancement of the												source linearization which can help in cases with												robustness or convergence issues.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用												源线性化，这可以帮助												稳健性或收敛问题。

children.des: Sets the RGP (real gas property) table to be												used with the Wet Steam model.
children.desTs: 将RGP（真实气体属性）表设置为												与湿蒸汽模型一起使用。

children.des: Sets the equation of state for steam to												either Vukalovich formulation (default) or Young												formulation.
children.desTs: 将蒸汽的状态方程设置为												Vukalovich公式（默认）或Young												配方。

children.des: Sets the maximum limit on the condensed												liquid-phase mass-fraction to prevent												divergence.
children.desTs: 设置浓缩的最大限制												防止液态质量分数												分歧。

children.des: Computes stagnation conditions using either gas phase only, or mixture. For												details, see Computing Stagnation Conditions for the Wet Steam Model in the Fluent Theory Guide.
children.desTs: 仅使用气态或混合物计算停滞条件。对于												详细信息，请参阅《Fluent Theory Guide》中计算湿蒸汽模型的停滞条件。

children.des: Switches off the phase change model in												specific cell zones.
children.desTs: 关闭相变化模型												特定的细胞区域。

children.des: Enables/disables noniterative time advancement scheme.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用非迭代时间推进计划。
