children.des: Enters the structure controls menu.
children.desTs: 进入结构控制菜单。

children.des: Sets the algebraic multigrid (AMG)												stabilization method for the structural model												calculations.
children.desTs: 设置代数多重网格（AMG）												结构模型的稳定化方法												计算。

children.des: Sets the maximum number of iterations for												the structural model calculations.
children.desTs: 设置的最大迭代次数												结构模型计算。

children.des: Sets the damping factor for the structural model (that is, the amplitude decay												factor in Equation 16–16 in the Theory Guide).
children.desTs: 设置结构模型的衰减因子（即幅度衰减												理论指南中方程16-16中的因子）。

children.des: When enabled, includes the effects of												thermal load on solid structure deformation in a												linear or nonlinear thermo-elasticity simulation.												Thermal effects are available only for the linear												or nonlinear structural model if the energy												equation is enabled.
children.desTs: 启用时，包括以下效果												热负荷对实体结构变形的影响												线性或非线性热弹性模拟。												热效应仅适用于线性												或非线性结构模型，如果能量												等式已启用。

children.des: Enters the structure expert menu.
children.desTs: 进入结构专家菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables an explicit fluid-structure interaction force.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用显式流体-结构相互作用力。

children.des: Enables/disables the inclusion of operating												pressure into the fluid-structure interaction												force.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用包含操作												压力进入流体-结构相互作用												力

children.des: Enables/disables the inclusion of a viscous												fluid-structure interaction force.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用包含粘性												流体-结构相互作用力。

children.des: Re-assigns the starting temperature as a temperature field from a previous												calculation, then re-initializes the new starting												temperature field.
children.desTs: 将开始温度重新指定为上一个温度场												计算，然后重新启动新的开始												温度场。

children.des: Enables the linear elasticity model.
children.desTs: 启用线性弹性模型。

children.des: Disables the structural model.
children.desTs: 禁用结构模型。

children.des: Enables/disables axisymmetric swirl velocity.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用轴对称漩涡速度。

children.des: Enters the system coupling menu.
children.desTs: 进入系统耦合菜单。

children.des: Enables a previously defined UDM to be specified as a											data transfer variable for use in System Coupling.
children.desTs: 使之前定义的UDM能够指定为											用于系统耦合的数据传输变量。

children.des: Answering yes at the prompt											enables Fluent to use element data for mapping surface											conservative quantities such as surface forces and heat											flows.
children.desTs: 在提示时回答是											使Fluent能够使用元素数据来绘制表面											表面力和热量等保守量											流动。

children.des: Enters the Two-Temperature model menu.
children.desTs: 进入“双温度”模型菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables the Two-Temperature model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用双温度模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the robustness enhancement, which is											on by default.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用稳健性增强，即											默认打开。

children.des: Specifies the level of detail printed in the console											about the Two-Temperature model. For a verbosity of one,											Fluent will print the number of cells that reach the											temperature limit, have an excessive temperature change,											or get a negative temperature.
children.desTs: 指定控制台中打印的详细程度											关于双温度模型。对于一个的详细程度，											Fluent将打印达到											温度限制，温度变化过大，											或者获得负温。

children.des: Enters the two-temperature translational-vibrational											energy relaxation model menu.
children.desTs: 进入双温恒温振动											能量放松模型菜单。

children.des: Specifies the model for												translational-vibrational energy relaxation. The												available options are												Millikan-White or												Park, with Park set as the												default option.
children.desTs: 指定型号												摩擦振动能量松弛。												可用选项为												密立根-怀特或												公园，公园设置为												默认选项。

children.des: Enters the expert menu for Park’s												model.
children.desTs: 进入帕克的专家菜单												模型

children.des: Specifies the number of collisions for												Park’s model.
children.desTs: 指定的碰撞次数												帕克的模型。

children.des: Lists the vibrational constants for all												collisions.
children.desTs: 列出所有的振动常数												碰撞。

children.des: Lists the vibrational constants for the												specified collision.
children.desTs: 列出了												指定碰撞。

children.des: Edits the vibrational constants for the												specified collision.
children.desTs: 编辑												指定碰撞。

children.des: Deletes the vibrational constants for the specified collision.
children.desTs: 初始化指定碰撞的振动常数。

children.des: Selects the first-order implicit formulation for transient simulations.
children.desTs: 初始化用于瞬时模拟的一阶隐式公式。

children.des: Selects the bounded second-order implicit formulation for transient simulations.
children.desTs: 验证用于瞬时模拟的有界二阶隐式公式。

children.des: Selects the second-order implicit formulation for transient								simulations.
children.desTs: 初始化瞬时值的二阶隐式公式								模拟。

children.des: Selects the explicit transient formulation. This text command is								only available for unsteady cases that use the density-based solver								with the explicit formulation.
children.desTs: 初始化显式瞬时公式。此文本命令是								仅适用于使用基于密度的求解器的不稳定情况								有明确的公式。

children.des: Selects the backward Euler method for the direct time integration								of the finite element semi-discrete equation of motion. This text								command is only available for transient simulations that use the								structural model.
children.desTs: 直接积分的向后欧拉法								的有限元半离散运动方程。本文								命令仅适用于使用								结构模型

children.des: Selects the Newmark method for the direct time integration of the								finite element semi-discrete equation of motion. This text command								is only available for transient simulations that use the structural								model.
children.desTs: 使用Newmark方法进行直接时间积分								有限元素半离散运动方程。此文本命令								仅适用于使用结构性的瞬时模拟								模型

children.des: Enters the VBM menu.
children.desTs: 进入VBM菜单。

children.des: Enable/disable VBM.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用VBM。

children.des: Enters the Viscous model menu.
children.desTs: 进入Viscous模型菜单。

children.des: Sets Transition model to account for transitional effects. The default is											none, however you can select											gamma-algebraic or											gamma-transport-eqn.
children.desTs: 设置过渡模型以考虑过渡效应。默认值为											没有，但您可以选择											伽玛代数或											伽玛传输方程。

children.des: Sets the strength of the quadratic term of the corner flow correction. The default											value is 1. This is available after the												corner-flow-correction?											option is enabled.
children.desTs: 设置拐角流量修正的二次项的强度。默认值											值为1。这在												角流修正？											选项已启用。

children.des: Enables/disables the corner flow correction.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用拐角流量修正。

children.des: Sets the strength of the curvature correction term.											The default value is 1. This is available after thecurvature-correction?											option is enabled.
children.desTs: 设置弯曲修正项的强度。											默认值为1。曲线修正后可用吗？											选项已启用。

children.des: Enables/disables the curvature correction.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用弯曲修正。

children.des: Selects the DES limiter option (none, F1, F2, Delayed DES, or Improved Delayed											DES).
children.desTs: 删除DES限制器选项（无、F1、F2、延迟DES或改进延迟											DES）。

children.des: Enters the GEKO model menu..
children.desTs: 进入GEKO型号菜单。

children.des: Setscsep, the												parameter to optimize flow separation from smooth												surfaces.
children.desTs: 塞斯克塞普												优化流量与平滑分离的参数												表面。

children.des: Setscnw, the												parameter to optimize flow in non-equilibrium near												wall regions.
children.desTs: Setscnw，the												参数来优化非平衡附近的流量												墙壁区域。

children.des: Setscmix, the												parameter to optimize strength of mixing in free												shear flows.
children.desTs: Setscmix												自由搅拌强度优化参数												剪切流

children.des: Setscjet, the												parameter to optimize free shear layer mixing												(optimize free jets independent of mixing												layer).
children.desTs: 塞特克捷												优化自由剪切层混合的参数												（优化独立于混合的自由喷射												层）。

children.des: Sets the blending function, which												deactivatescmix andcjet inside boundary												layers.
children.desTs: 设置混合函数，该函数												禁用边界内的scmix和cjet												层。

children.des: Setscreal,  a												realizability limiter that ensures positive normal												stresses in the entire domain.
children.desTs: 尖叫声，a												确保正常态的实现限制器												整个领域的压力。

children.des: Setscnw_sub, which												allows the adjustment of log-layer and cf.
children.desTs: Setscnw_subt，其中												允许调整日志层和CF。

children.des: Setscjet_aux,												which allows fine-tuning of the parameter to												optimize free jets.
children.desTs: Setscjet_aux，												这允许微调参数，												优化自由喷射。

children.des: Setscbf_tur, a												factor for the main blending factor, controlling												the thickness of the layer near walls.
children.desTs: SetscBF_tur，a												主要混合因子的因子，控制												靠近墙壁的层的厚度。

children.des: Setscbf_lam, a												part of the blending function and shields the												laminar boundary layer.
children.desTs: SetscBF_lam，a												混合功能的一部分并屏蔽												片状边界层。

children.des: Restores the defaults of all GEKO												parameters.
children.desTs: 恢复所有GEKO的默认设置												参数

children.des: Enables/disables the wall distance free												version of the GEKO model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用自由墙距离												GEKO模型的版本。

children.des: Enables/disables detached eddy simulation.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用分离涡流模拟。

children.des: Enables/disables inviscid flow model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用无粘流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the EASM- turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用EASM-湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the realizable- turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用可实现湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the RNG- turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用RNG-湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the standard- turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用标准湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the k-kl- turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用k-kl-湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the EASM- turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用EASM-湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the- low Re option.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用-低Re选项。

children.des: Enables/disables the- shear-flow correction option. This											text command is only available for the standard- model and the stress-omega RSM											model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用- shear-Flow修正选项。这											文本命令仅适用于标准型号和压力欧米茄RSM											模型

children.des: Enables/disables the baseline (BSL)- turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用基线（BSL）-湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the generalized- (GEKO) turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用广义（GEKO）湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the SST- turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用CST-湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the standard- turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用标准湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the WJ-BSL-EARSM - turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用WJ-BSL-EARSM -湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables laminar flow model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables large eddy simulation.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用大涡流模拟。

children.des: Enables/disables the dynamic sub-grid scale turbulent Prandtl Number.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用动态子网格尺度湍流Prandti数。

children.des: Enables/disables the dynamic sub-grid scale turbulent Schmidt Number.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用动态子网格尺度湍流施密特数。

children.des: Enters the LES model options menu.
children.desTs: 进入LES模型选项菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables the algebraic RANS model in												the thin near wall part of the boundary layer. For												details, see Generic Algebraic WMLES: LES with a Near Wall RANS Layer in the Fluent Theory Guide.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用中的代数RANS模型												边界层的薄近壁部分。对于												详细信息，请参阅《流利理论指南》中的通用代数WMLES：具有近壁RANS层的LES。

children.des: Sets the constant cw1 which controls the												size of the RANS layer and the steepness of the												RANS/LES switch.
children.desTs: 设置控制												RANS层的大小和												RANS/LES开关。

children.des: Sets the constant cw2 which controls the												size of the RANS layer and the steepness of the												RANS/LES switch.
children.desTs: 设置控制												RANS层的大小和												RANS/LES开关。

children.des: Enables/disables the dynamic subgrid-scale mixture fraction variance model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用动态次网格规模混合分数方差模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the Smagorinsky-Lilly subgrid-scale model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Smagorinsky-Lilly子网格规模模型。

children.des: Enables/disables kinetic energy transport subgrid-scale model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用动能传输次网格规模模型。

children.des: Enables/disables WALE subgrid-scale model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用WADE子网格规模模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the WMLES- subgrid-scale model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用WMLES子网格规模模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the WMLES subgrid-scale model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用WMLES子网格尺度模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the slip boundary formulation for											low-pressure gas systems.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用滑动边界公式											低压气体系统。

children.des: Enables/disables mixing-length (algebraic) turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用混合长度（代数）湍流模型。

children.des: Enters the multiphase turbulence menu.
children.desTs: 进入多相湍流菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables multiphase options.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用多相选项。

children.des: Selects Reynolds Stress multiphase model.
children.desTs: 雷诺兹应力多相模型。

children.des: Selects- multiphase model.
children.desTs: - 多相模型。

children.des: Enters the near wall treatment menu.
children.desTs: 进入近墙处理菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables enhanced wall functions.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用增强墙功能。

children.des: Enables/disables harmonic blended wall												functions based on r+.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用和谐混合墙												基于r+的函数。

children.des: Enables/disables the Menter-Lechner near-wall treatment.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Menter-Lechner近壁治疗。

children.des: Enables/disables non-equilibrium wall functions.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用非平衡墙功能。

children.des: Enables/disables scalable wall functions.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用可扩展墙功能。

children.des: Enables/disables standard wall functions.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用标准墙壁功能。

children.des: Enables/disables user-defined wall functions.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用用户定义的墙功能。

children.des: Sets the wall omega treatment.
children.desTs: 设置墙壁欧米茄治疗。

children.des: Enables/disables Werner-Wengle wall functions.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Werner-Wengle墙功能。

children.des: Enables/disables wall function pressure- gradient effects.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用壁功能压力-梯度效应。

children.des: Enables/disables wall function thermal effects.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用墙功能热效应。

children.des: Enables/disables the Reynolds-stress turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用涡轮应力湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the differential-viscosity model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用差粘性模型。

children.des: Enables/disables swirl corrections for rng-model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用rng-型号的漩涡修正。

children.des: Enables/disables the stress-BSL Reynolds stress model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用应力-BSL雷诺应力模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the linear pressure-strain model in RSM.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用RSM中的线性压力-应变模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the stress-omega Reynolds stress model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用压力-欧米茄Reynolds压力模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the RSM version of the GEKO model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用GEKO型号的RSM版本。

children.des: Enables/disables the solution of T.K.E. in RSM model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用T.K.E.in RSM模型的解决方案。

children.des: Enables/disables quadratic pressure-strain model in RSM.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用RSM中的二次压力-应变模型。

children.des: Enables/disables wall-echo effects in RSM model.
children.desTs: 在RSM模型中启用/禁用壁回波效果。

children.des: Enables/disables strain/vorticity production in Spalart-Allmaras model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Spalart-Allmaras模型中的应变/涡旋产生。

children.des: Enables/disables full low-Reynolds number form of Spalart-Allmaras model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Spalart-Allmaras模型的完整低雷诺数形式。

children.des: Enables/disables the enhanced wall treatment for the Spalart-Allmaras model. If											disabled, no smooth blending between the viscous											sublayer and the log-law formulation is employed, as was											done in versions previous to Fluent 14.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Spalart-Allmaras模型的增强型墙壁处理。如果											禁用，粘稠之间没有顺利混合											子层和log定律公式被采用，就像以前一样											在Fluent 14之前的版本中完成。

children.des: Enables/disables Scale-Adaptive Simulation (SAS) in combination with the SST- turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用规模自适应模拟（SAS）与CST-湍流模型相结合。

children.des: Enables/disables Spalart-Allmaras turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Spalart-Allmaras湍流模型。

children.des: Enters the transition model options menu.
children.desTs: 进入过渡模型选项菜单。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient CAPG_HIGHTU.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数CAPG_HIHTU。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient CAPG_LOWTU.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数CAPG_LOWTU。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient CBUBBLE_C1.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数CBUBBLE_C1。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient CBUBBLE_C2.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数CBUBBLE_C2。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient CFPG_HIGHTU.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数CFPG_HIGHTU。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient CFPG_LOWTU.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数CFPG_LOWTU。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient CLAMBDA_SCALE.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数CLAMBDA_SCALE。

children.des: Sets the critical Reynolds number												correlation.
children.desTs: 设置临界雷诺数												相关性

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient CTU_HIGHTU.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数CTO_HIHTU。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient CTU_LOWTU.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数CTO_LOWTU。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient REC_C1.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数REC_C1。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient REC_C2.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数REC_C2。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient REC_MAX.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数REC_MAX。

children.des: Sets the algebraic transition model												coefficient RV1_SWITCH.
children.desTs: 设置代数过渡模型												系数RV1_RST。

children.des: Enables/disables the effects of crossflow												instability.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用交叉流的影响												不稳定

children.des: Enables/disables the transition SST turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用转变CST湍流模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the Transition-SST roughness correlation option.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Transition-CST粗糙度相关选项。

children.des: Enables/disables effects of buoyancy on											turbulence.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用浮力对											急流.

children.des: Enables/disables the compressibility correction option.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用压缩性修正选项。

children.des: Enters the turbulence expert menu.
children.desTs: 进入湍流专家菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables Kato-Launder modification.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Kato-Launder修改。

children.des: Enables/disables Detached Eddy Simulation (DES) in combination with the currently												selected BSL- model or transition SST model.												This text command is only available for transient												cases.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用分离涡流模拟（DES）与当前的												选择BSL-模型或过渡期海平面模型。												此文本命令仅适用于暂时												例

children.des: Enables/disables Scale-Adaptive Simulation (SAS) in combination with the												currently selected-based URANS turbulence model.												This text command is only available for transient												cases.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用规模自适应模拟（SAS）与												当前选择的基于URANS湍流模型。												此文本命令仅适用于暂时												例

children.des: Enables/disables vorticity-based production.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用基于涡旋的生产。

children.des: Enables/disables the low-Re- turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用低Re湍流模型。

children.des: Specifies which low-Reynolds-number- model is to be used. Six models												are available:
children.desTs: 指定使用哪种低雷诺数模型。六种模型												有：

children.des: Enables/disables Production Limiter modification.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用生产限制器修改。

children.des: Enables/disables non-Newtonian modification for Lam-Bremhorst model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Lam-Bremhorst模型的非牛顿修改。

children.des: Enables/disables SST formulation of v6.1.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用v6.1的CST公式。

children.des: Modifies the  definition for the realizable												- model.
children.desTs: 修改了可实现的												- 模型

children.des: Selects the hybrid model, to specify whether you want to apply the Shielded												Detached Eddy Simulation (SDES) model,												Stress-Blended Eddy Simulation (SBES), or SBES												with a user-defined function.
children.desTs: 初始化混合模型，以指定是否要应用屏蔽												分离式涡流模拟（SDES）模型，												压力混合涡流模拟（SBES），或SBES												具有用户定义的功能。

children.des: Selects the subgrid-scale model for the LES portion of your Stress-Blended Eddy												Simulation (SBES).
children.desTs: 为压力混合涡流的LES部分初始化次网格比例模型												模拟（SBES）。

children.des: Sets the number of time steps between updates of the k-ω part of the SBES												model.
children.desTs: 设置SBES k-ω部分更新之间的时间步数												模型

children.des: Enables/disables Jayatilleke P function.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Jayatilleke P功能。

children.des: Enables/disables the Stress-Blended Eddy Simulation (SBES) model or Shielded												Detached Eddy Simulation (SDES) model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用压力混合涡流模拟（SBES）模型或屏蔽												分离式涡流模拟（SDES）模型。

children.des: Enables/disables turbulence for non-Newtonian fluids.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用非牛顿流体的湍流。

children.des: Enables/disables turbulence damping and sets turbulence damping												parameters.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用湍流衰减并设置湍流衰减												参数

children.des: Enables/disables turbulent production due to compressible divergence.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用由于可压缩发散而产生的湍流。

children.des: Selects user-defined functions to define the turbulent viscosity and the turbulent											Prandtl and Schmidt numbers.
children.desTs: 用户定义的函数用于定义湍流粘性和湍流											普兰特和施密特数字。

children.des: Sets user-defined transition correlations.
children.desTs: 设置用户定义的过渡相关性。

children.des: Enables/disables zero-equation HVAC turbulence model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用零方程空调湍流模型。

contents.des: Enters the motion definitions menu, where you can manage motion					definitions.
contents.desTs: 进入运动定义菜单，您可以在其中管理运动					定义.

children.des: Adds a new motion definition. After you enter a name for the definition, you can define								the following settings:
children.desTs: 添加新的运动定义。输入定义的名称后，您可以定义								以下设置：

children.des: Deletes a specified motion definition.
children.desTs: 指定指定的运动定义。

children.des: Edits an existing motion definition. After you enter the name of the definition you								want to edit, you can edit the following settings:
children.desTs: 编辑现有的运动定义。输入定义的名称后，								想要编辑，可以编辑以下设置：

children.des: Lists all of the motion definitions in the console.
children.desTs: 列出控制台中的所有运动定义。

children.des: Lists the settings for a specified motion definition in the								console.
children.desTs: 中指定运动定义的设置								console.

contents.des: Enters the named expressions menu.
contents.desTs: 进入命名表情菜单。

children.des: Creates a new named expression.
children.desTs: 创建一个新的命名表达。

children.des: Computes and prints the value of an expression. This is only								available for expressions that evaluate to a single value.
children.desTs: 计算和打印运算式的值。这只是								适用于计算结果为单个值的表达。

children.des: Allows you to copy an existing named expression.
children.desTs: 允许您复制现有的命名运算式。

children.des: Allows you to delete a named expression, as long as it is not in								use.
children.desTs: 允许您删除已命名的表达，只要它不在								使用.

children.des: Export one or more named expressions to a file in TSV								format.
children.desTs: 将一个或多个命名表达输出到TSA中的文件								格式.

children.des: Import one or more named expressions saved in TSV format.
children.desTs: 导入以TSA格式保存的一个或多个命名表达。

children.des: Allows you to edit the definition of a named expression.
children.desTs: 允许您编辑命名表达式的定义。

children.des: Lists all of the currently defined named expressions.
children.desTs: 列出当前定义的所有命名表达式。

contents.des: Enters the define operating conditions menu.
contents.desTs: 进入定义工作条件菜单。

children.des: Sets gravitational acceleration.
children.desTs: 设置重力加速度。

children.des: Enables/disables the fixing of the gravity vector in the stationary reference frame. When								enabled, the gravity vector rotates with respect to the moving								reference frame such that the direction of gravity in the global								stationary coordinates remains fixed. When disabled, the gravity								vector is fixed in the moving reference frame. This item is								available only for transient cases with moving reference frames and								gravity enabled.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用固定参考系中的重力矢量。当								启用时，重力矢量相对于移动方向旋转								参考框架，这样的重力方向在全球								静止坐标保持固定。禁用时，重力								在移动参考系中，该项是固定的。								仅适用于具有移动参考系的暂时病例，并且								重力启用。

children.des: Enables/disables use of a specified operating density. This command is available only								for single-phase flows.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用指定的工作密度。此命令仅适用于								对于单相流。

children.des: Enters the operating density menu. This menu is available only for								multiphase flows.
children.desTs: 进入工作密度菜单。该菜单仅适用于								多相流。

children.des: Prints the operating density value.
children.desTs: 打印工作密度值。

children.des: Allows you to select the operating density method in your simulation. You can choose											from:
children.desTs: 允许您在模拟中选择操作密度方法。您可以选择											来自：

children.des: Sets the operating pressure.
children.desTs: 设置操作压力。

children.des: Sets the operating temperature for Boussinesq.
children.desTs: 设置Boussinesq的工作温度。

children.des: Sets a location that determines the reference pressure cell or								cells (depending on the selected reference pressure method). The								pressure value in such cells can be used to adjust the gauge								pressure field after each iteration to keep it from floating.
children.desTs: 设置确定参考压力单元的位置或								单元格（取决于选择的参考压力方法）。								此类单元中的压力值可用于调整仪表								每次迭代后的压力场以防止其浮动。

children.des: Specifies the method used for adjusting the gauge pressure field								after each iteration to keep it from floating: the method can assume								that all of the cell zones are connected by internal boundary zones								(such as interior zones), or can account for connected and								disconnected cell zones. Such adjustment is only allowed for								incompressible flows, and will be limited partially or entirely by								the presence of a pressure boundary.
children.desTs: 指定用于调整表压力场的方法								每次迭代后以防止其浮动：方法可以假设								所有单元区都通过内部边界区连接起来								(such作为内部区域），或者可以考虑连接和								已断开的单元区域。仅允许进行此类调整								不可压缩的流动，并且将部分或完全受到限制								压力边界的存在。

children.des: Selects state for real gas EOS subcritical condition.
children.desTs: 真实气体EOS亚临界条件的初始状态。

children.des: Prints the coordinates of the reference pressure cell or cells								(depending on the selected reference pressure method). The pressure								value in such cells can be used to adjust the gauge pressure field								after each iteration to keep it from floating.
children.desTs: 打印参考压力单元的坐标								（取决于选择的参考压力方法）。压力								此类单元中的值可用于调整表压力场								每次迭代后以防止其浮动。

children.des: Uses inlet temperature to calculate operating density.
children.desTs: 使用入口温度计算工作密度。

contents.des: Enters the overset interfaces menu.
contents.desTs: 进入重叠界面菜单。

children.des: Enters the overset adaption menu.
children.desTs: 进入重叠调整菜单。

children.des: Marks and adapts the mesh to improve your overset											mesh.
children.desTs: 标记并调整网格以改善溢出											网格

children.des: Marks cells to identify those that can be adapted in											order to improve your overset mesh.
children.desTs: 标记细胞以识别那些可以适应的细胞											以改善您的重叠网格。

children.des: Enters the overset adaption set menu.
children.desTs: 进入重叠自适应集菜单。

children.des: Sets the number of rounds of adaption												applied during each adaption cycle.
children.desTs: 设置适应轮数												在每个适应周期中应用。

children.des: Enables/disables the												option to automatically adapt overset meshes												during the calculation, to remove orphans, reduce												size mismatches between donor and receptor cells,												and/or increase the mesh resolution in gaps as												needed (in order to prevent the creation of orphan												cells). This option is disabled by default.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用												自动适应重叠网格的选项												在计算过程中，删除孤儿，减少												供体细胞和受体细胞之间的大小不匹配，												和/或增加间隙中的网格分辨率，												需要（为了防止孤儿的产生												单元格）。默认情况下该选项处于禁用状态。

children.des: Sets the number of cell layers marked in												addition to the cells marked for orphan												adaption.
children.desTs: 设置中标记的单元格层数量												除了标记为孤儿的细胞												适应

children.des: Sets the target (minimum) gap resolution												used when marking cells for gap adaption. This is												set to 4 by default and is only available when												define/overset-interfaces/adapt/set/mark-gaps?												is enabled.
children.desTs: 设置目标（最小）间隙分辨率												当标记细胞的间隙适应时使用。这是												默认设置为4，仅在以下情况下可用												define/overset-interlines/adapt/set/mark-gaps？												已启用。

children.des: Sets the length scale												ratio threshold used to determine which cells are												marked for adaption based on donor-receptor cell												size differences. This is set to 3 by default and												is only available when												define/overset-interfaces/adapt/set/mark-size?												is enabled.
children.desTs: 设置长度比例												用于确定哪些单元的比率阈值												基于供体受体细胞标记适应												大小差异。默认设置为3，												仅在以下情况下可用												define/overset-interlines/adapt/set/mark-size？												已启用。

children.des: Enables/disables the option to coarsen the												mesh if mesh refinement is no longer needed. This												option is enabled by default.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用粗化												如果不再需要网格细化，则需要网格。这												默认情况下启用该选项。

children.des: Enables/disables the												option to also adapt based on cells that are not												actual orphans because they were fixed by												accepting neighbor donors. This option is only												available when												define/overset-interfaces/adapt/set/mark-orphans?												is enabled.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用												还可以选择根据不适合的细胞进行调整												真正的孤儿，因为他们是由												接受邻居捐助者。这个选择只是												时可用												定义/overset-interfaces/adapt/set/mark-orphans？												已启用。

children.des: Enables/disables the option to adapt												under-resolved gaps in order to prevent the												creation of orphan cells. This option is disabled												by default.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用适应选项												未充分解决的差距，以防止												创建孤立单元。此选项已禁用												在默认情况下

children.des: Enables/disables the option to adapt for												orphan reduction.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用选项以适应												孤儿减少

children.des: Enables/disables the option to adapt based												on donor-receptor cell size differences.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用基于调整的选项												关于供体-受体细胞大小差异。

children.des: Sets the maximum level of refinement during												overset adaption, in conjunction with the value												set using themesh/adapt/set/maximum-refinement-level												text command (the larger of the two values is												used).
children.desTs: 设置期间的最大细化级别												与值一起叠加调整												使用themesh设置/adapt/set/maintimum-enefinement-level												文本命令（两个值中较大的是												使用）。

children.des: Enables/disables the option to use												anisotropic refinement for the prismatic cells												adapted as part of overset orphan adaption and/or												overset gap adaption. Instead of being												isotropically refined, these cells will not be												split on particular edges, in order to reduce the												resulting cell count. This anisotropic adaption												option is available only for 3D cases and is												applied only to prismatic cells that are deemed												suitable. For orphan adaption, the goal is to												produce cells that have a lower aspect ratio; for												gap adaption, the goal is to produce a mesh												resolution that is suitable for boundary layers												near walls.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用使用选项												棱镜单元的各向异性细化												作为重叠孤儿改编的一部分进行改编和/或												改写差距适应。而不是												各向同性细化，这些细胞将不会												在特定的边缘上分裂，以减少												这种各向异性的适应性												选项仅适用于3D病例，												仅适用于被认为是												适合。对于孤儿适应，目标是												产生具有较低长宽比的细胞;对于												间隙适应，目标是产生网格												适用于边界层的分辨率												靠近墙壁。

children.des: Checks the integrity of the overset interfaces. Reports orphan cells and errors in the								domain connectivity.
children.desTs: 检查重叠接口的完整性。报告孤立单元格和错误								域连接性。

children.des: Clears the domain connectivity of an overset interface. This text command is only available								when									define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?								is set to yes.
children.desTs: 清除重叠接口的域连接性。此文本命令仅可用								当									定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？								设置为是。

children.des: Clears the domain connectivity of all overset interfaces. This text command is only available								when									define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?								is set to yes.
children.desTs: 清除所有溢出接口的域连接。此文本命令仅适用于								当									define/overset-interfaces/options/expert？								设置为是。

children.des: Enters the overset collar mesh definition menu, which provides text commands for								managing the list of defined collar meshes. You can ensure that the								overset meshes on this list are protected from cutting during the								hole cutting step based on the setting of the								define/overset-interfaces/options/protect-collar-meshes?								text command.
children.desTs: 进入重叠衣领网格定义菜单，该菜单提供文本命令								管理已定义的衣领网格列表。您可以确保								此列表上的重叠网格在								基于设置的孔切割步骤								define/overset-interfaces/options/protect-collar-mesh？								文本命令。

children.des: Adds an overset component mesh to the list of defined											collar meshes.
children.desTs: 将重叠组件网格添加到已定义的列表											衣领网格。

children.des: Removes an overset component mesh from the list of											defined collar meshes.
children.desTs: 从列表中删除重叠组件网格											定义的衣领网格。

children.des: Removes all overset component meshes from the list of											defined collar meshes.
children.desTs: 从列表中删除所有重叠的组件网格											定义的衣领网格。

children.des: Prints the list of defined collar meshes in the											console.
children.desTs: 在											console.

children.des: Creates an overset interface.
children.desTs: 创建一个重叠界面。

children.des: Enters the overset hole cut control menu.
children.desTs: 进入溢流孔切割控制菜单。

children.des: Adds a hole cut control, so that a boundary zone does											not cut specified cell zones.
children.desTs: 添加孔切割控制，以便边界区											不切割指定的细胞区域。

children.des: Enters the overset hole cut seeds menu.
children.desTs: 进入重叠洞切种子菜单。

children.des: Specifies whether all component zones get cut seeds, which cut pilot holes into												the overlapping meshes that will then be enlarged												during overlap minimization.
children.desTs: 指定所有零部件区域是否都获得切割种子，从而切割导孔												然后将被放大的重叠网格												在重叠最小化期间。

children.des: Deletes the hole cut control for a boundary											zone.
children.desTs: 指定边界的孔剪切控制柄											区

children.des: Deletes the hole cut controls for all boundary											zones.
children.desTs: 指定所有边界的孔切割控制											区界限

children.des: Lists the defined hole cut controls.
children.desTs: 列出定义的孔切割控制。

children.des: Debugging tool to troubleshoot hole cutting of overset interfaces. This text command is only								available when									define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?								is set to yes.
children.desTs: 可用于排除重叠接口的孔切割的调试工具。此文本命令仅用于								时可用									定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？								设置为是。

children.des: Deletes an overset interface.
children.desTs: 指定一个重叠的界面。

children.des: Deletes all overset interfaces in the domain.
children.desTs: 删除域中所有重叠的接口。

children.des: Displays the overset cells marked using the text commanddefine/overset-interfaces/mark-cells.
children.desTs: 显示使用文本命令define/overset-internals/mark-cell标记的重叠单元格。

children.des: Allows you to specify grid priorities on background and component meshes, used in the								overlap minimization of an overset interface.
children.desTs: 允许您指定背景网格和组件网格上的网格优先级，用于								重叠界面的重叠最小化。

children.des: Executes the hole cutting of an overset interface and establishes the domain connectivity.								This text command is only available when									define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?								is set to yes.
children.desTs: 执行重叠界面的孔切割并建立域连接。								此文本命令仅在以下情况下可用									定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？								设置为是。

children.des: Executes hole cutting for all overset interfaces in the domain. This text command is only								available when									define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?								is set to yes.
children.desTs: 对域中所有重叠的接口执行打孔。此文本命令仅								时可用									定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？								设置为是。

children.des: Lists information about the overset interfaces. The output depends on the overset								verbosity setting.
children.desTs: 列出有关重叠接口的信息。输出取决于重叠								冗长设置。

children.des: Marks cells that have undergone a specified overset cell type change (from									solve,receptor,								or dead to any other type) in the last time								step. Adaption registers are automatically filled based on these								markings. This text command is only available for unsteady								simulations and if									define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?								is set to yes.
children.desTs: 标记已经历指定重叠单元格类型更改（从									解决，受体，								或者对任何其他类型来说都是死的）在上次								步骤。根据这些自动填充适应寄存器								标记。此文本命令仅适用于不稳定								模拟和如果									定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？								设置为是。

children.des: Marks the specified overset cells (solve, receptor, donor,								orphan, or dead) and fills registers based on the markings. Display								the marked cells via the text commanddefine/overset-interfaces/display-cells.
children.desTs: 标记指定的重叠细胞（溶液、受体、供体、								孤儿或死亡）并根据标记填充登记册。显示								通过文本命令定义/覆盖界面/显示单元格标记的单元格。

children.des: Enters the overset interface options menu.
children.desTs: 进入叠加界面选项菜单。

children.des: Enables the automatic creation of a default overset interface during											initialization or mesh motion update.
children.desTs: 启用自动创建默认溢出接口，											初始化或网格运动更新。

children.des: Enables/disables the updating of dead cells during the solution process, which may											be helpful for some moving and dynamic mesh simulations											(though at the cost of solver performance). You can											enter the number of layers of dead cells adjacent to the											receptor cells that you want updated, or enter												-1 to request that all dead											cells are updated. This text command is only available											for transient simulations when												define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?											is set to yes.
children.desTs: 在解决方案过程中启用/禁用更新死单元，这可能											有助于一些移动和动态网格模拟											（尽管以牺牲求解器性能为代价）。您可以											输入与											您想要更新或输入的受体细胞												-1要求全部死亡											单元格已更新。此文本命令仅可用											对于瞬时模拟，												定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？											设置为是。

children.des: Allows you to specify whether the cell donor priority used in the overlap											minimization of an overset interface is inversely proportional to either the											cell size or the distance to the nearest boundary.
children.desTs: 允许您指定重叠中是否使用细胞供体优先级											重叠界面的最小化与											单元大小或到最近边界的距离。

children.des: Enables / disables overset-related expert tools.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用与冲销相关的专家工具。

children.des: Allows the inclusion of non-conformal mesh interfaces											inside overset cell zones, as long as the mesh											interfaces do not spatially overlap with the cells where											the overset interfaces lie.
children.desTs: 允许包含非保形网格界面											在重叠的单元区域内，只要网格长											界面在空间上不与单元重叠，											重叠的界面谎言。

children.des: Allows you to disable overlap minimization during hole cutting.
children.desTs: 允许您在孔切割过程中禁用重叠最小化。

children.des: Enables / disables modified donor search parameters. When enabled, these parameters result in											a more extended donor search, which can be helpful for											meshes with orphans. This text command is only available											when												define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?											is set to yes.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用修改后的捐赠者搜索参数。启用后，这些参数将导致											更广泛的捐赠者搜索，这可能有助于											与孤儿网格网格。此文本命令仅可用											当												定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？											设置为是。

children.des: Enables / disables modified hole cutting parameters. When enabled, the parameters used can											help avoid dead cell zones that result from a hole											cutting failure. This text command is only available											when												define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?											is set to yes.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用修改的孔切割参数。启用后，所用参数可以											有助于避免因孔洞而导致的死细胞区											切割失败。此文本命令仅适用于											当												定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？											设置为是。

children.des: Allows you to switch between face or node connected donor cells. This text command is only											available when												define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?											is set to yes.
children.desTs: 允许您在面部或节点连接的供体细胞之间切换。此文本命令仅限											时可用												定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？											设置为是。

children.des: Allows you to disable the detection of overlapping boundaries during hole cutting,											in order to reduce the computational expense for cases											that do not include such boundaries. When enabled, this											text command also allows you to specify which boundary											zones should be considered when detecting overlapping											boundaries; this can be helpful when the default hole											cutting process fails.
children.desTs: 允许您在孔切割过程中禁用重叠边界的检测，											为了减少计算费用的情况下											不包括此类边界。启用后，											text命令还允许您指定											检测重叠时应考虑区域											边界;当默认孔											切割过程失败。

children.des: Allows you to select the algorithm used for overset parallel processing. You can											select from the default cell exchange model or the local											cell zone replication model; the cell exchange model											should require less memory and may result in faster											calculations.
children.desTs: 允许您选择用于重叠并行处理的算法。您可以											从默认细胞交换模型或本地											细胞区复制模型;细胞交换模型											应该需要更少的内存，并且可能会导致更快											计算。

children.des: Enables/disables enhanced hole cutting, where partially overlapping cut faces are											decomposed into overlapping and non-overlapping											fractions, and only the non-overlapping fractions											participate in the hole cutting. This can help avoid the											situation where a region or cell zone is erroneously											identified as dead because of leakage during flood											filling, even though it has overlapping boundaries that											match well. When this text command is disabled, the											partially overlapping faces are entirely protected from											cutting.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用增强型孔切割，其中部分重叠的切割面											分解为重叠和非重叠											分数，并且仅为非重叠分数											参与切洞。这可以帮助避免											区域或单元区被错误地											洪水期间漏水被确认死亡											填充，尽管它有重叠的边界，											匹配得很好。禁用此文本命令时，											部分重叠的面完全受到保护											切割.

children.des: Enables/disables the protection of defined collar meshes to ensure that they are not											cut during the hole cutting step. The list of defined											collar meshes is managed using the text commands in the											define/overset-interfaces/collar-meshes/											menu.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用对定义的衣领网格的保护，以确保它们不会											在钻孔步骤期间进行切割。已定义的列表											使用中的文本命令管理衣领网格											define/overset-interfacers/collar-mesh/											菜单.

children.des: Allows you to enable visualization of receptor cells in contour and mesh											displays.
children.desTs: 使您能够在轮廓和网格中可视化受体细胞											显示屏

children.des: Sets the method used to control the removal of isolated patches of solve cells. This text											command is only available when												define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?											is set to yes.
children.desTs: 设置用于控制求解单元格的孤立面片的移除的方法。此文本											命令仅在以下情况下可用												定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？											设置为是。

children.des: Sets the options to control caching of entities in transient overset simulations. This text											command is only available when												define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?											is set to yes.
children.desTs: 设置选项以控制瞬时重叠模拟中实体的缓存。此文本											命令仅在以下情况下可用												定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？											设置为是。

children.des: Enables/disables the updating of the overset interfaces before writing a case file in the											Common Fluids Format (CFF). This text command is only											available when												define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?											is set to yes.
children.desTs: 在将案例文件写入到											常见液体格式（CFF）。此文本命令仅											时可用												定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？											设置为是。

children.des: Specifies the level of detail printed in the console about overset											interfaces.
children.desTs: 指定控制台中打印的有关重叠的详细级别											接口。

children.des: Allows you to set bounds so that any marking of cells is performed within a spherical								region based on a specified origin and radius. This can be useful								when diagnosing a local problem on a large mesh. This text command								is only available if									define/overset-interfaces/options/expert?								is set to yes. After defining the bounds,								you can then mark the cells using the									define/overset-interfaces/mark-cell-change								or define/overset-interfaces/mark-cells								text command. To disable the bounds, enter a radius of									0.
children.desTs: 允许您设置界限，以便在球体内执行单元格的任何标记								基于指定原点和半径的区域。这可能很有用								诊断大型网格上的局部问题时。此文本命令								仅在以下情况下可用									定义/覆盖界面/选项/专家？								设置为是。定义界限后，								然后您可以使用标记细胞									定义/覆盖界面/标记单元-改变								或定义/覆盖界面/标记单元格								文本命令。要禁用边界，请输入半径									0.

contents.des: Enters the parameters menu.
contents.desTs: 进入参数菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables parameters in the text user interface.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用文本用户界面中的参数。

children.des: Enters the input-parameters menu.
children.desTs: 进入输入参数菜单。

children.des: Deletes an input parameter.
children.desTs: 设置输入参数。

children.des: Edits an input parameter.
children.desTs: 编辑输入参数。

children.des: Enters the output-parameters menu.
children.desTs: 进入输出参数菜单。

children.des: Creates an output parameter.
children.desTs: 创建输出参数。

children.des: Deletes an output parameter.
children.desTs: 初始化输出参数。

children.des: Edits an output parameter.
children.desTs: 编辑输出参数。

children.des: Displays all parameter values in the console.
children.desTs: 在控制台中显示所有参数值。

children.des: Displays parameter value in the console.
children.desTs: 在控制台中显示参数值。

children.des: Renames an output parameter.
children.desTs: 重命名输出参数。

children.des: Writes all parameter values to file.
children.desTs: 将所有参数值写入文件。

children.des: Writes parameter value to file.
children.desTs: 将参数值写入文件。

contents.des: Enters the periodic conditions menu.
contents.desTs: 进入定期条件菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables specification of mass flow rate at the periodic boundary.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用周期边界处质量流量的规范。

children.des: Enables/disables specification of pressure gradient at the periodic boundary.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用周期边界处的压力梯度指定。

contents.des: Enters the phases menu.
contents.desTs: 进入阶段菜单。

children.des: Enters the IAC expert setting menu.
children.desTs: 进入IAC专家设置菜单。

children.des: Sets Hibiki-Ishii model coefficients.
children.desTs: 设置Hibiki-Ishii模型系数。

children.des: Sets Ishii-Kim model coefficients.
children.desTs: 设置石井金模型系数。

children.des: Sets Yao-Morel model coefficients.
children.desTs: 设置Yao-Morel模型系数。

children.des: Enters the menu to set phase domain properties.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以设置阶段域属性。

children.des: Allows you to change the names of all the phases in your simulation.
children.desTs: 允许您更改模拟中所有阶段的名称。

children.des: Enters the menu to set the interaction domain											properties.
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置交互域											特性.

children.des: Enters the menu to set interfacial forces												models.
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置界面力												模型

children.des: Specifies the drag function, drag												modification, and drag factor for each pair of												phases. This command is available only with the												Eulerian and Mixture multiphase models.
children.desTs: 指定拖动函数，												修改，和阻力系数为每对												阶段。此命令仅在												欧拉和混合多相模型。

children.des: Enters the menu to set the lift force. This												item is available only with the Eulerian												multiphase model.
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置提升力。这												该物品仅适用于Eulerian												多相模型。

children.des: Specifies the lift function for each pair of												phases.
children.desTs: 指定每对的提升功能												阶段。

children.des: Enables/disables the Shaver-Podowski lift												correction.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用Shaver-Podowski提升												纠正一下

children.des: Specifies the restitution coefficient for												collisions between each pair of granular phases,												and for collisions between particles of the same												granular phase. This command is available only for												multiphase flows with two or more granular												phases.
children.desTs: 指定恢复系数												每对颗粒相之间的碰撞，												以及相同粒子之间的碰撞												颗粒阶段。此命令仅适用于												具有两个或更多颗粒的多相流												阶段。

children.des: Specifies the slip velocity function for												each secondary phase with respect to the primary												phase. This command is available only for the												Mixture multiphase model.
children.desTs: 指定滑动速度函数												每个第二阶段相对于第一阶段												阶段。此命令仅适用于												混合多相模型。

children.des: Enters the menu to set surface tension models.
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置表面张力模型。

children.des: Enables/disables the treatment of the												contact angle specification at the porous jump												boundary. This command is available only for the												VOF multiphase model with the continuum surface												stress model option and whensfc-modeling? is												enabled.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用治疗												多孔跳跃处的接触角规格												边界。此命令仅适用于												具有连续体表面的VOF多相模型												压力模型选项以及何时进行FC建模？是												启用.

children.des: Allows you to include the effects of surface												tension along the fluid-fluid interface. This												option is only available for the VOF and Eulerian												multiphase models.
children.desTs: 允许您包括表面的影响												沿着液-液界面的张力。这												该选项仅适用于VOF和Eulerian												多相模型。

children.des: Selects the surface tension model. You can												choose between the continuum surface force and												continuum surface stress methods. This item is												available only whensfc-modeling? is												enabled.
children.desTs: 初始化表面张力模型。您可以												在连续体表面力和												连续表面应力法。该项目是												仅在FC建模时可用？是												启用.

children.des: Specifies the surface tension coefficient												for each pair of phases.
children.desTs: 指定表面张力系数												对于每一对相位。

children.des: Enables/disables the specification for a												wall adhesion angle. This item is available only												whensfc-modeling? is												enabled.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用的规范												墙壁粘合角。此商品仅限供应												什么时候FC建模？是												启用.

children.des: Specifies the turbulent dispersion model for												each primary-secondary phase pair. This command is												available only with the Eulerian multiphase												model.
children.desTs: 指定湍流扩散模型												每个初级-次级相对。此命令是												仅适用于欧拉多相												模型

children.des: Specifies the turbulence interaction model												for each primary-secondary phase pair. This												command is available only with the Eulerian												multiphase model.
children.desTs: 指定湍流相互作用模型												对于每个初级-次级相对。这												命令仅适用于Eulerian												多相模型。

children.des: Enters the menu to set virtual mass												models.
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置虚拟质量												模型

children.des: Allows you to include the virtual mass force												effect that occurs when a secondary phase												accelerates relative to the primary phase. This												command is available only with the Eulerian												multiphase model.
children.desTs: 允许您包含虚拟质量力												第二阶段时发生的影响												相对于初级阶段加速。这												命令仅适用于Eulerian												多相模型。

children.des: Specifies the virtual mass coefficient for												each pair of phases. This option is available only												ifvirtual-mass? is												enabled.
children.desTs: 指定的虚拟质量系数												每对相。此选项仅可用												如果虚拟质量？是												启用.

children.des: Enables/disables the implicit method for the												virtual mass force. This option can improve												convergence in some cases. This option is												available only ifvirtual-mass? is enabled.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用												虚拟质量力。此选项可以改善												在某些情况下是收敛的。这个选项是												仅在虚拟大规模时可用？已启用。

children.des: Specifies what form of the implicit method												to use (default,option-2, oroption-3).default models the entire												virtual mass force whileoption-2 andoption-3 model truncated												expressions which may further improve convergence.												This option is available only ifvmass-implicit? is												enabled.
children.desTs: 指定隐式方法的形式												要使用（默认，选项-2，或选项-3）。默认模型整个												选项2和选项3模型截断时的虚拟质量力												可以进一步改善收敛性的公式。												此选项仅在vmass隐式的情况下可用？是												启用.

children.des: Specifies the wall lubrication model for												each primary-secondary phase pair. This command is												available only with the Eulerian multiphase												model.
children.desTs: 指定壁润滑模型												每个初级-次级相对。此命令是												仅适用于欧拉多相												模型

children.des: Enters the menu to set heat, mass-transfer,												and reaction models.
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置热量，质量传递，												反应模型。

children.des: Enters the menu to set cavitation models. This option is available only for the												Mixture multiphase model with the Singhal-et-al												cavitation model enabled viasolve/set/advanced/singhal-et-al-cavitation-model.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以设置气穴模型。此选项仅适用于												Singhal等人的混合多相模型												气穴模型启用了viasolve/set/advanced/singhal-et-al-气穴模型。

children.des: Allows you to include the effects of cavitation. When the cavitation is enabled,												you must specify vaporization pressure, surface												tension coefficient, and non-condensable gas mass												fraction using thedefine/phases/set-domain-properties/interaction-domain/heat-mass-reactions/cavitation/caviation												text command. If multiple species are included in												one or more secondary phases, or the heat transfer												due to phase change is considered, the mass												transfer mechanism must be defined before enabling												the cavitation model.
children.desTs: 允许您包括气穴的影响。启用气穴时，												您必须指定蒸发压力、表面												张力系数和不凝结气体质量												使用定义/阶段/集域属性/相互作用域/热质反应/气穴/Causeal的分数												文本命令。如果包含多个物种												一个或多个次级相，或热传递												由于考虑到相变化，质量												启用之前必须定义转移机制												气穴模型。

children.des: Sets the vaporization pressure, surface												tension coefficient, and non-condensable gas mass												fraction. This command is available only whencavitation? is												enabled.
children.desTs: 设置汽化压力、表面												张力系数和不凝结气体质量												分数。此命令仅在空化？是												启用.

children.des: Species the heat transfer coefficient												function between each pair of phases												(constant-htc,												nusselt-number,												ranz-marshall,												hughmark,												tomiyama,												fixed-to-sat-temp,												two-resistance, or												user-defined). This												command is enable only with the Eulerian												multiphase model.
children.desTs: 物种热传递系数												每对相之间的功能												（constant-HTC，												nusselt-number，												兰兹马歇尔，												休斯马克，												富山，												固定到饱和温度，												两种阻力，或者												用户定义）。这												命令仅在欧拉式下启用												多相模型。

children.des: Sets the mass transfer mechanisms.
children.desTs: 设置质量传递机制。

children.des: Allows you to define multiple heterogeneous												reactions and stoichiometry. This option is												available only with the species model.
children.desTs: 允许您定义多个异类												反应和化学计量。这个选项是												仅适用于物种模型。

children.des: Enters the menu to set interfacial area models. This menu is available only for												the Mixture and Eulerian multiphase models.
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置界面区域模型。该菜单仅适用于												混合和欧拉多相模型。

children.des: Specifies the interfacial area model for each pair of phases.
children.desTs: 指定每对相的界面面积模型。

children.des: Enters the menu to set model transition												mechanisms.
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置模型转换												机制等

children.des: Sets the VOF-to-DPM model transition												mechanism.
children.desTs: 设置VOF到RST模型转换												机制

children.des: Enters the menu to set numerics models. This menu is available for multiphase												models with the sharp-dispersed and phase												localized discretization interface modeling												options (set indefine/models/multiphase/interface-modeling-options).
children.desTs: 进入菜单设置数字模型。该菜单适用于多相												具有尖锐分散和相的模型												局部离散化界面建模												选项（设置indefine/models/pharmacies/interface-modeling-ensions）。

children.des: Enters the menu to set interphase discretization models.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以设置相间离散化模型。

children.des: Enables/disables phase localized compressive												scheme.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用相局部压缩												计划。

children.des: Specifies the slope limiter to set a												specific discretization scheme for each phase												pair. A value of 0 corresponds to first order												upwind, a value of 1 corresponds to second order												upwind, a value of 2 applies the compressive												scheme, and a value between 0 and 2 corresponds to												a blended scheme. This option is available only												wheninterphase-discr? is												enabled.
children.desTs: 指定要设置的斜坡限制器												每个阶段的具体离散化方案												pair。0的值对应于第一阶												逆风，值1对应于二阶												逆风，值2适用于压缩												方案，0和2之间的值对应于												混合计划。此选项仅可用												何时相间发现？是												启用.

children.des: Enters the menu to select a specific phase.
children.desTs: 进入菜单选择特定阶段。

children.des: Enters the menu for setting properties for the selected phasephasename, wherephasename is the name												of the phase you selected using thephase-domains/ text												command.
children.desTs: 进入设置所选相位的属性的菜单phasephase，其中phasephase是名称												您使用phase-domains/ text选择的阶段												命令

children.des: Sets the diameter of the particles of the												selected phasephasename. This text												command is available for secondary phases												only.
children.desTs: 设置粒子的直径												选择的相。此文本												命令可用于二次阶段												只.

children.des: Enters the menu for setting properties for												the granular phase. This text command is available												only when thegranular?												text command is enabled.
children.desTs: 进入设置属性的菜单												颗粒阶段。此文本命令可用												只有当颗粒状时？												文本命令已启用。

children.des: Sets the solids bulk viscosity (constant,												lun-et-al, or user-defined).
children.desTs: 设置固体体积粘性（恒定，												lun-et-al，或用户定义）。

children.des: Specifies the elasticity modulus (derived or												user-defined).
children.desTs: 指定弹性系数（推导或												用户定义）。

children.des: Sets the angle of internal friction												(constant or user-defined). This text command is												available only whenschaeffer is selected as												the friction viscosity model.
children.desTs: 设置内摩擦角度												（常数或用户定义）。此文本命令是												仅当舍费尔被选为												摩擦粘性模型。

children.des: Sets a threshold volume fraction at which												the frictional regime becomes dominant (constant												or user-defined). The default value is 0.61. This												text command is available only whenschaeffer is selected as												the friction viscosity model.
children.desTs: 设置阈值体积分数												摩擦状态变得主导（恒定												或用户定义）。默认值为0.61。这												文本命令仅当选择为时才可用												摩擦粘性模型。

children.des: Specifies a shear viscosity based on the viscous-plastic flow (none, constant,												schaeffer, or user-defined). By default, the												frictional viscosity is neglected												(none).
children.desTs: 基于粘塑性流指定剪切粘度（无、常数、												schaeffer或用户定义）。默认情况下，												忽略摩擦粘度												（无）。

children.des: Sets the frictional modulus (derived or												user-defined). This text command is available only												whenschaeffer is												selected as the friction viscosity model.
children.desTs: 设置摩擦系数（推导或												用户定义）。此文本命令仅可用												当谢弗在												选择作为摩擦粘性模型。

children.des: Sets the pressure gradient term in the												granular-phase momentum equation (none,												johnson-et-al, syamlal-et-al, based-ktgf, or												user-defined). This text command is available only												whenschaeffer is												selected as the friction viscosity model.
children.desTs: 在中设置压力梯度项												颗粒相动量方程（无，												johnson-et-al、syamlal-et-al、based-ktgf或												用户定义）。此文本命令仅可用												当谢弗在												选择作为摩擦粘性模型。

children.des: Sets temperature for the solids phase												(constant, syamlal-obrien, gidaspow, or												user-defined). This text command is available only												if thepde-granular? text												command is enabled.
children.desTs: 设定固相温度												（constant、syamlal-obrien、gidaspow或												用户定义）。此文本命令仅可用												如果thepde颗粒？文本												命令已启用。

children.des: Sets temperature for the solids phase												(algebraic, constant, dpm-averaged, or												user-defined). Thedpm-averaged option is												available only when using the Dense Discrete Phase												Model (DDPM). This text command is available only												if thepde-granular? text												command is disabled.
children.desTs: 设定固相温度												（代数、常数、dpm平均或												用户定义）。Thedpm平均选项是												仅在使用密集离散相时可用												模型（DDPM）。此文本命令仅可用												如果thepde颗粒？文本												命令已禁用。

children.des: Enables/disables the packed bed model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用填充床模型。

children.des: Sets the maximum volume fraction for the												granular phase (constant or user-defined). For												monodispersed spheres the packing limit is about												0.63.
children.desTs: 设置的最大体积分数												颗粒相（恒定或用户定义）。对于												单分散球体的包装极限大约是												0.63.

children.des: Enables/disables the partial differential												equation (PDE) model for granular temperature.												When the PDE model is enabled, you must specifygranular-conductivity.												Otherwise, you must specifygranular-temperature.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用偏差												颗粒温度方程（PCE）模型。												启用PDL模型后，您必须指定颗粒导电率。												否则，您必须指定粒度温度。

children.des: Sets a correction factor that modifies the												probability of collisions between grains when the												solid granular phase becomes dense (lun-et-al,												syamlal-obrien, ma-ahmadi, arastoopour, or												user-defined).
children.desTs: 设置修改												当颗粒之间碰撞的可能性												固体颗粒相变得致密（Lun-et-al，												syamlal-obrien、ma-ahmadi、arastoopour或												用户定义）。

children.des: Sets the pressure gradient term in the												granular-phase momentum equation (lun-et-al,												syamlal-obrien, ma-ahmadi, user-defined, or												none).
children.desTs: 在中设置压力梯度项												颗粒相动量方程（Lun-et-al，												syamlal-obrien、ma-ahmadi、用户定义或												无）。

children.des: Sets the kinetic part of the granular												viscosity of the particles (constant,												syamlal-obrien, gidaspow, or user-defined).
children.desTs: 设置颗粒的动力学部分												颗粒的粘性（恒定，												syamlal-obrien、gidaspow或用户定义）。

children.des: Enables/disables the granular approach for the solid phase. This text command is												available only for secondary phases in a Eulerian												multiphase case. This approach is not compatible												with the interfacial area concentration approach.												For more details, see Defining a Granular Secondary Phase in the Fluent User's Guide.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用固体相的粒度方法。此文本命令是												仅适用于欧拉式的第二阶段												多阶段情况。这种方法不兼容												采用界面面积浓度法。												有关更多详细信息，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中的定义颗粒二级相。

children.des: Enters the menu for setting model properties												for the interfacial area concentration. This text												command is available only when theiac? text command is												enabled.
children.desTs: 进入设置模型属性的菜单												用于界面面积浓度。本文												命令仅在theiac？文本命令是												启用.

children.des: Sets the breakage kernel (none, constant,												hibiki-ishii, ishii-kim, yao-morel, or												user-defined).
children.desTs: 设置破坏核（无、恒定、												ihiki-Ishii、Ishi-Kim、Yao-morel或												用户定义）。

children.des: Sets the coalescence kernel (none, constant,												hibiki-ishii, ishii-kim, yao-morel, or												user-defined).
children.desTs: 设置合并核心（无、恒定、												ihiki-Ishii、Ishi-Kim、Yao-morel或												用户定义）。

children.des: Sets the critical Weber number. This value												is required if you selectedyao-morel as the breakage												kernel.
children.desTs: 设置关键韦伯数。该值												如果您选择dyao-morel作为破损物，则需要												内核。

children.des: Allows you to choose the dissipation												function (constant, wu-ishii-kim, fluent-ke, or												user-defined).
children.desTs: 允许您选择耗散												函数（常量、wu-ishii-kim、fluent-ke或												用户定义）。

children.des: Sets the hydraulic diameter. This value is required when you selectedwu-ishii-kim for the IAC												dissipation rate function.
children.desTs: 设置水力直径。当您选择wu-ishii-kim作为IAC时，该值是必需的												消散率函数。

children.des: Sets the maximum for the bubble												diameters.
children.desTs: 设置气泡的最大值												直径。

children.des: Sets the minimum for the bubble												diameters.
children.desTs: 设置气泡的最小值												直径。

children.des: Sets the source term for the interfacial												area concentration that models the rate of												formation of the dispersed phase (none, constant,												yao-morel, or user-defined).
children.desTs: 设置界面的源项												区域集中度，												分散相的形成（无，恒定，												yao-morel或用户定义的）。

children.des: Sets the attractive forces between the												interfaces.
children.desTs: 设定了												接口。

children.des: Enables/disables the interfacial area concentration (IAC) approach. This text												command is available for secondary phases only.												The IAC approach is not compatible with the												granular approach. See Defining the Interfacial Area Concentration via the Transport Equation and Defining the Interfacial Area Concentration in the Fluent User's Guide for details about												using the IAC approach for the Mixture and												Eulerian multiphase flows.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用界面面积浓度（IAC）方法。本文												命令仅适用于次要阶段。												IAC方法与												颗粒方法。请参阅通过传输方程定义界面面积浓度和《Fluent用户指南》中定义界面面积浓度，了解有关的详细信息												对混合物使用IAC方法和												欧拉多相流。

children.des: Sets a material for the selected												phase.
children.desTs: 为所选对象设置材质												相位
