children.des: Loads interpreted user-defined functions.
children.desTs: 加载解释的用户定义函数。

children.des: Enters the real-gas menu to enable/configure real gas model.
children.desTs: 进入真实气体菜单以启用/配置真实气体模型。

children.des: Loads the NIST real-gas library.
children.desTs: 加载NIH真实气体库。

children.des: Loads the NIST real-gas library.
children.desTs: 加载NIH真实气体库。

children.des: Selects the state for NIST real gas model.
children.desTs: 为NIH真实气体模型初始化状态。

children.des: Loads a user-defined multispecies real-gas library.
children.desTs: 加载用户定义的多物种真实气体库。

children.des: Loads the user-defined real-gas library.
children.desTs: 加载用户定义的真实气体库。

children.des: Enables/disables the use of a built-in compiler (Clang) when the									define/user-defined/compiled-functions								text command is used. This text command / compiler is available for								Windows only, and is provided as part of the Ansys Fluent installation.								It is recommended that you enable this text command when the								compiler you installed on your machine is an older version that is								no longer supported. Note that the built-in compiler is used								automatically if Fluent determines that you have not installed								Microsoft Visual Studio or Clang on your computer, whether this text								command is enabled or not.
children.desTs: 当									定义/用户定义/编译函数								使用文本命令。此文本命令/编译器可用于								仅限Windows，并且作为Ansys Fluent安装的一部分提供。								建议您在								您在计算机上安装的编译器是较旧版本，								不再支持。请注意，使用内置编译器								如果Fluent确定您尚未安装，则自动								您计算机上的Microsoft Visual Studio或Clang，无论是此文本								命令是否启用。

children.des: Enables/disables use of the cpp utility included with the Ansys Fluent				installation.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用使用Ansys Fluent中包含的cpp实用程序				安装.

children.des: Allows you to allocate the user-defined memory to the specified zones,				rather than the default of the entire domain.
children.desTs: 允许您将用户定义的内存分配给指定的区域，				而不是整个域的默认值。

children.des: Allocates user-defined memory.
children.desTs: 分配用户定义的内存。

children.des: Defines user-defined scalars.
children.desTs: 定义用户定义的缩放。

list.des: commands related to problem definition, such as    models, boundary conditions, materials, etc.
list.desTs: 与问题定义相关的命令，例如    模型、边界条件、材料等

contents.des: Adds new custom vector definition.
contents.desTs: 添加新的自定义载体定义。

contents.des: Adds annotation text to a graphics window. It will prompt you for a string to use as          the annotation text, and then a dialog box will prompt you to select a screen location          using the mouse-probe button on your mouse.
contents.desTs: 将注释文本添加到图形窗口。它会提示您输入字符串以用作          注释文本，然后对话框将提示您选择屏幕位置          使用鼠标上的鼠标探针按钮。

contents.des: Contains options for controlling the status of annotations including creating new          annotations, editing existing ones, showing or hiding them, and deleting them.
contents.desTs: 包含用于控制注释状态的选项，包括创建新的          注释、编辑现有注释、显示或隐藏注释以及删除注释。

children.des: Creates a new annotation.
children.desTs: 创建新注释。

children.des: Deletes the specified annotation(s).
children.desTs: 删除指定的注释。

children.des: Edits the properties of the specified annotation.
children.desTs: 编辑指定注释的属性。

children.des: Prints the names of the defined annotations to the console.
children.desTs: 将定义的注释的名称打印到控制台。

children.des: Prints the properties of the specified annotation to the console.
children.desTs: 将指定注释的属性打印到控制台。

contents.des: Shows or hides annotations from the active graphics window.
contents.desTs: 显示或隐藏活动图形窗口中的注释。

contents.des: Close a "user" graphics window. User windows are specified by number (1-50), with the          associated number corresponding to the order, left-to-right, that the windows were created          in.
contents.desTs: 关闭“用户”图形窗口。用户窗口由数字（1-50）指定，其中          与窗口创建顺序（从左到右）对应的关联编号          in.

contents.des: Close a reserved graphics window (windows used for residuals, report plots, and animation     definitions).
contents.desTs: 关闭保留的图形窗口（用于残留、报告图和动画的窗口     定义）。

contents.des: [Only available when            preferences/graphics/enable-non-object-based-workflow is          enabled] Displays a contours plot of the specified variable on the specified location(s).          This does not create an object that is stored with the case file.
contents.desTs: [Only时可用            首选项/图形/启用非基于对象的工作流程是          启用]在指定位置上显示指定变量的等值线图。这不会创建与案例文件一起存储的对象。

contents.des: Enter the menu for defining displays.
contents.desTs: 进入定义显示的菜单。

children.des: Enter the menu for defining materials for realistic display.
children.desTs: 进入定义真实显示的材质的菜单。

children.des: Create a new material for realistic display by copying the properties of                      an existing material.
children.desTs: 通过复制的属性来创建真实显示的新材料                      现有材料。

children.des: Create a new material for realistic display.
children.desTs: 创建新材质以进行真实显示。

children.des: Delete a previously-defined material. Only user-defined                      materials may be deleted.
children.desTs: 删除之前定义的材料。仅限用户定义                      材料可能会被删除。

children.des: Edit the properties of a previously-defined material. Only                      user-defined materials may be edited.
children.desTs: 编辑先前定义的材料的属性。仅                      可以编辑用户定义的材料。

contents.des: Prompts for a scalar field and minimum and maximum values, and then displays a contour          plot.
contents.desTs: 指定纯量字段以及最小和最大值，然后显示轮廓          剧情

contents.des: Enter the display states menu.
contents.desTs: 进入显示状态菜单。

children.des: Apply a display state to the active graphics window.
children.desTs: 将显示状态应用于活动图形窗口。

children.des: Copy the settings of an existing display state to another existing display        state.
children.desTs: 将现有显示状态的设置复制到其他现有显示        状态

children.des: Create a new display state.
children.desTs: 创建新的显示状态。

children.des: Delete a display state.
children.desTs: 删除显示状态。

children.des: Edit a display state. Enter quit (or a substring, such                as q or qui) to exit the editing                loop.
children.desTs: 编辑显示状态。输入quit（或子字符串，例如                作为q或qui）退出编辑                循环.

children.des: Print the names of the existing display states to the console.
children.desTs: 将现有显示状态的名称打印到控制台。

children.des: Read in display states from a file.
children.desTs: 从文件中读取显示状态。

children.des: Save the display state settings of the active graphics window to an existing display                state. This command is not available when the active window is displaying                  a 2D plot.
children.desTs: 将活动图形窗口的显示状态设置保存到现有显示器                状态。显示活动窗口时此命令不可用                  2D情节。

children.des: Write one or more of the saved display states to a file.
children.desTs: 将一个或多个保存的显示状态写入文件。

contents.des: [Only available when            preferences/graphics/enable-non-object-based-workflow is          enabled] Displays custom vector.
contents.desTs: [Only时可用            首选项/图形/启用非基于对象的工作流程是          启用]显示自定义载体。

contents.des: Enter the embedded window menu.
contents.desTs: 进入嵌入式窗口菜单。

children.des: Close an embedded window.
children.desTs: 关闭嵌入窗口。

children.des: Close all the embedded windows within the specified parent window.
children.desTs: 关闭指定父窗口中的所有嵌入窗口。

children.des: Specify a window to embed and a parent window to receive the embedded                window.
children.desTs: 指定要嵌入的窗口和要接收嵌入的父窗口                窗口

children.des: Move an embedded window out of the parent window, returning the embedded window                to a non-embedded state.
children.desTs: 将嵌入窗口移出父窗口，返回嵌入窗口                到非嵌入状态。

children.des: Move all the embedded windows out of the specified parent window.
children.desTs: 将所有嵌入的窗口移出指定的父窗口。

contents.des: Displays flamelet data.
contents.desTs: 显示火焰数据。

children.des: Enables/disables display of carpet plot of a property.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用显示房产的地毯地块。

children.des: Enables/disables display of the numbers box.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用数字框的显示。

children.des: Enables/disables plot of the 1D-slice.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用1D切片的绘图。

children.des: Enables/disables writing the 1D-slice to file instead of plot.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用将1D切片写入文件而不是绘图。

contents.des: Arranges the graphics window layout.
contents.desTs: 安排图形窗口布局。

contents.des: Loads an HSF file for viewing.
contents.desTs: 加载HSF文件以供查看。

contents.des: [Only available when            preferences/graphics/enable-non-object-based-workflow is          enabled] Displays the entire mesh. For 3D, you will be asked to confirm that you really          want to draw the entire mesh (not just the mesh-outline).
contents.desTs: [Only时可用            首选项/图形/启用非基于对象的工作流程是          启用]显示整个网格。对于3D，您将被要求确认您确实          想要绘制整个网格（而不仅仅是网格轮廓）。

contents.des: [Only available when            preferences/graphics/enable-non-object-based-workflow is          enabled] Displays the mesh boundaries.
contents.desTs: [Only时可用            首选项/图形/启用非基于对象的工作流程是          启用]显示网格边界。

contents.des: Displays mesh partition boundaries.
contents.desTs: 显示网格分区边界。

contents.des: Displays a coarse mesh level from the last multigrid coarsening.
contents.desTs: 显示上次多重网格粗化的粗网格级别。

contents.des: Enters the graphics objects menu.
contents.desTs: 进入图形对象菜单。

children.des: Adds a contour, vector, pathline, particle track, scene, LIC, or mesh plot to                the existing content in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 将轮廓、载体、路径线、粒子轨迹、场景、LIC或网格图添加到                图形窗口中的现有内容。

children.des: Copies an existing contour, vector, pathline, particle track, scene, mesh, LIC,                or XY plot definition.
children.desTs: 复制现有的轮廓、载体、路径线、粒子轨迹、场景、网格、LIC或XY图定义。

children.des: Creates a contour, vector, pathline, particle track, scene, mesh, LIC, or XY                plot definition.
children.desTs: 创建轮廓、载体、路径线、粒子轨迹、场景、网格、LIC或XY                情节定义。

children.des: Deletes a contour, vector, pathline, particle track, scene, mesh, LIC, or XY                plot definition.
children.desTs: 指定轮廓、载体、路径线、粒子轨迹、场景、网格、LIC或XY                情节定义。

children.des: Displays a contour, vector, pathline, particle track, scene, mesh, LIC, or XY                plot in the graphic windows replacing the existing content.
children.desTs: 显示轮廓、载体、路径线、粒子轨迹、场景、网格、LIC或XY                图形窗口中的绘图替换现有内容。

children.des: Displays as many contour, vector, pathline, particle track, scene, mesh, LIC, or                XY plot objects as specified. Each object is displayed in a new window.
children.desTs: 显示尽可能多的轮廓、矢量、路径线、粒子轨迹、场景、网格、LIC或                指定的XY绘图对象。每个对象都显示在一个新窗口中。

children.des: Edits a contour, vector, pathline, particle track, scene, mesh, LIC, or XY plot                definition.
children.desTs: 编辑轮廓、矢量、路径线、粒子轨迹、场景、网格、LIC或XY图                定义.

contents.des: Opens a graphics window.
contents.desTs: 打开图形窗口。

contents.des: [Only available when            preferences/graphics/enable-non-object-based-workflow is          enabled] Enters the particle tracks menu.
contents.desTs: [Only时可用            首选项/图形/启用非基于对象的工作流程是          启用]进入粒子轨迹菜单。

children.des: Calculates and displays particle tracks from defined injections.
children.desTs: 计算和显示定义注入的粒子轨迹。

children.des: Plots or writes an XY plot of particle tracks.
children.desTs: 绘制或写入粒子轨迹的XY图。

contents.des: [Only available when            preferences/graphics/enable-non-object-based-workflow is          enabled] Enters the pathlines menu.
contents.desTs: [Only时可用            首选项/图形/启用非基于对象的工作流程是          启用]进入路径线菜单。

children.des: Displays pathlines from a surface.
children.desTs: 显示表面的路径线。

children.des: Plots or writes an XY plot of pathlines.
children.desTs: 绘制或写入路径线的XY图。

children.des: Writes pathlines to a file.
children.desTs: 将路径线写入文件。

contents.des: Enters the PDF data menu.
contents.desTs: 进入PDF数据菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables the display of a carpet plot of a property.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用显示房产的地毯地块。

children.des: Enables/disables the display of the numbers box.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用数字框的显示。

children.des: Enables/disables a plot of the 1D-slice.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用1D切片的绘图。

children.des: Enables/disables writing the 1D-slice to file instead of plot.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用将1D切片写入文件而不是绘图。

contents.des: Plots the reacting channel variables.
contents.desTs: 绘制反应通道变量。

contents.des: Displays profiles of a flow variable.
contents.desTs: 显示流量变量的配置文件。

contents.des: Contains raytracer settings.
contents.desTs: 包含光线追踪器设置。

children.des: Contains raytracer backplate and environment settings.
children.desTs: 包含光线追踪器背板和环境设置。

children.des: Displays the shadow cast by the displayed object due to the lights defined                      in Fluent and the environment lighting.
children.desTs: 显示显示对象因定义的灯光而投射的阴影                      流畅和环境照明。

children.des: Locks the displayed object's location in the environment, so that when the                      model is rotated, it appears at the same place. This takes the                        boundless environment and makes it finite.
children.desTs: 锁定显示对象在环境中的位置，以便当                      模型被旋转，它出现在同一位置。这需要                        环境无限，使其有限。

children.des: Specifies the backplate color. This color is only shown if                      display/raytracer/background/show-backplate? is set                      to yes and                      display/raytracer/background/backplate-image is set                      to none.
children.desTs: 指定背板颜色。仅在以下情况下才会显示此颜色                      显示/光线追踪器/背景/显示背板？设置                      是的，                      显示/射线追踪器/背景/背板图像已设置                      对任何人来说。

children.des: Specifies the image used as a backplate for the raytracer display.
children.desTs: 指定用作光线跟踪器显示的背板的图像。

children.des: Specifies the color of the lighting in the environment.
children.desTs: 指定环境中照明的颜色。

children.des: Specifies the intensity of the lighting in the environment.
children.desTs: 指定环境中照明的强度。

children.des: When                        display/raytracer/background/activate-env-ground?                      is enabled, this setting allows you to modify the mid-point of the                      environment, which can help mitigate the distortion that may appear due to the                      environment being spherical.
children.desTs: 当                        显示/射线追踪器/背景/activate-env-ground？                      已启用，则此设置允许您修改                      环境，这可以帮助减轻由于                      环境是球形的。

children.des: Specifies the image used as the environment for the raytracer                      display.
children.desTs: 指定用作光线追踪器环境的图像                      显示.

children.des: When                        display/raytracer/background/activate-env-ground?                      and                        display/raytracer/background/is-ground-shadow-at-fix-axis?                      are enabled, this setting allows you to specify which direction is opposite to                      gravity, which is the plane perpendicular to the ground, where the shadows                      should appear.
children.desTs: 当                        显示/射线追踪器/背景/activate-env-ground？                      和                        显示/射线追踪器/背景/is-ground-shadow-at-fix-axis？                      启用时，此设置允许您指定哪个方向与                      重力，即垂直于地面的平面，其中的阴影                      应该出现。

children.des: Controls whether the environment is shown in the raytracer display window                      or if just the environment's effects on the model are shown.
children.desTs: 控制环境是否显示在光线追踪器显示窗口中                      或者是否仅显示了环境对模型的影响。

children.des: Rotates the environment horizontally along its view direction by the                      specified degrees.
children.desTs: 将环境沿着其视图方向水平旋转                      指定程度。

children.des: When                      display/raytracer/background/activate-env-ground? is                      enabled, this controls whether or not the plane where the shadows appear is                      locked to be at the positive or negative X, Y, or Z plane. If this                      option is enabled, the plane shadow plane is controlled by                      display/raytracer/background/ground-shadow-axis.
children.desTs: 当                      显示/射线追踪器/背景/activate-env-ground？是                      启用时，这控制出现阴影的平面是否是                      锁定为正或负X、Y或Z平面。如果                      选项，则平面阴影平面由                      display/raytracer/background/ground-shadow-axis。

children.des: Controls the scale of the displayed object within the environment.
children.desTs: 控制环境中显示对象的比例。

children.des: Controls whether a backplate is shown behind the model. If set to                      yes, the backplate will be a color, if                      display/raytracer/background/backplate-image is set                      to none, otherwise it will display the specified                      backplate image. Note that enabling this option will display the backplate                      over-top of any environment that is specified.
children.desTs: 控制模型后面是否显示背板。如果设置为                      是的，背板将是一种颜色，如果                      显示/射线追踪器/背景/背板图像已设置                      为无，否则将显示指定的                      背板图像。请注意，启用此选项将显示背板                      超出指定的任何环境。

children.des: Rotates/spins the environment along its view direction according to the                      number of degrees provided.
children.desTs: 根据                      提供的学位数量。

children.des: Rotates the environment vertically along its view direction by the                      specified degrees.
children.desTs: 沿着其视图方向垂直旋转环境                      指定程度。

children.des: Controls the field of view, which can also be described as the zoom level                      of both the model and the displayed environment. The zoom-level of                      the model can always be adjusted after modifying this setting without further                      impacting the zoom-level of the environment.
children.desTs: 控制视野，也可以描述为缩放级别                      模型和显示环境的缩放级别。                      修改此设置后，模型始终可以调整，无需进一步                      影响环境的缩放级别。

children.des: Produces USD output for hardcopies for use with NVIDIA Omniverse.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成美元输出，供NVIDIA Omniverse使用。

children.des: Displays the raytracer rendering for the active graphics window.
children.desTs: 显示活动图形窗口的光线追踪器渲染。

children.des: Contains raytracer rendering options.
children.desTs: 包含光线追踪器渲染选项。

children.des: Specified how long (in seconds) the raytracer will spend on rendering to                      reach the specified quality prior to the image being captured.
children.desTs: 指定光线追踪器将花费多长时间（以秒为单位）渲染到                      在捕获图像之前达到指定的质量。

children.des: Specifies the quality of the raytracer image that is displayed or                      saved.
children.desTs: 指定显示的光线追踪器图像的质量或                      得救了

children.des: Specifies the number of CPU cores used by the raytracer for rendering the                      image. Note that if the number of threads specified is greater than the number                      of cores available, the raytracer will use the maximum number                      available.
children.desTs: 指定光线追踪器用于渲染                      图片。请注意，如果指定的线程数大于数量                      可用的核心数，光线追踪器将使用最大数量                      available.

contents.des: Re-renders the last contour, profile, or vector plot with updated surfaces, meshed, lights,     colormap, rendering options, and so on, without recalculating the contour data.
contents.desTs: 使用更新的表面、网格、灯光、色彩图、渲染选项等重新渲染最后的轮廓、轮廓或向图，而无需重新计算轮廓数据。

contents.des: Re-renders the last contour, profile, or vector plot with updated scale, surfaces, meshes,     lights, colormap, rendering options, and so on, but without recalculating the field     data.
contents.desTs: 使用更新的比例、表面、网格、灯光、色彩映射表、渲染选项等重新渲染上一个等高线、剖面图或矢量图，但不重新计算字段     数据

contents.des: Generates a “hardcopy" of the active window.
contents.desTs: 生成活动窗口的“硬副本”。

contents.des: Enters the set menu to set display parameters.
contents.desTs: 进入设置菜单设置显示参数。

children.des: Enters the color map menu, which contains names of predefined and user-defined (in the   Colormap Editor panel) colormaps that can be selected. It prompts you        for the name of the colormap to be used.
children.desTs: 进入颜色图菜单，其中包含预定义和用户定义的名称（在   色彩图编辑器面板）可以选择的色彩图。它会提示您        获取要使用的色彩映射的名称。

children.des: Enters the color options menu.
children.desTs: 进入颜色选项菜单。

children.des: Specify whether the number of colormap labels is determined automatically. The           default is yes.
children.desTs: 指定是否自动确定色彩映射标签的数量。           默认为是。

children.des: Sets the color of axisymmetric faces.
children.desTs: 设置轴对称面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the background (window) color.
children.desTs: 设置背景（窗口）颜色。

children.des: Enter the menu for specifying global surface rendering properties, for all                      mesh displays colored by surface.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以指定所有的全局表面渲染属性                      网格显示按表面着色。

children.des: Prints the names of each color that is in use, and the surfaces                            assigned that color, to the console.
children.desTs: 打印正在使用的每种颜色的名称以及表面                            将该颜色分配给控制台。

children.des: Prints the names of each material that is in use, and the surfaces                            assigned that material, to the console.
children.desTs: 打印每种正在使用的材料的名称以及表面                            将该材料分配到控制台。

children.des: Overwrites any color/material assignments and reverts to the default                            colors.
children.desTs: 覆盖任何颜色/材质指定并恢复为默认值                            颜色.

children.des: Asks for the names/IDs of one or more surfaces and allows you to                            specify a color and/or material for the provided surfaces.
children.desTs: 询问一个或多个表面的名称/ID并允许您                            为提供的表面指定颜色和/或材料。

children.des: Enter the menu for specifying global zone type color and material                      assignments, for all mesh displays colored by type.
children.desTs: 进入指定全局区域类型颜色和材质的菜单                      指定，适用于按类型着色的所有网格显示。

children.des: Only the boundary types used in this case are listed, rather than                            all possible boundary types.
children.desTs: 仅列出这种情况下使用的边界类型，而不是                            所有可能的边界类型。

children.des: Overwrites any color/material assignments and reverts to the default                            colors.
children.desTs: 覆盖任何颜色/材质指定并恢复为默认值                            颜色.

children.des: Asks for the boundary type and allows you to assign a color and/or                            material to the specified type.
children.desTs: 询问边界类型，并允许您指定颜色和/或                            材料为指定类型。

children.des: Determines whether to color meshes by type or by ID.
children.desTs: 确定是按类型还是按ID对网格进行着色。

children.des: Sets the color of far field faces.
children.desTs: 设置远场面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of free-surface faces.
children.desTs: 设置自由表面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color theme for the graphics window. The color options are for the           background display, but changing the theme also changes the default colors for items that           display in the graphics windows, like faces and edges.
children.desTs: 设置图形窗口的颜色主题。颜色选项用于           背景显示，但更改主题也会更改以下项目的默认颜色           显示在图形窗口中，例如面和边。

children.des: Sets the foreground (text, ruler, and window frame) color.
children.desTs: 设置前景（文本、尺子和窗框）颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of inlet faces.
children.desTs: 设置入口面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of mesh interfaces.
children.desTs: 设置网格界面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of interior faces.
children.desTs: 设置内部面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of internal interface faces.
children.desTs: 设置内部界面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of outlet faces.
children.desTs: 设置出口面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of periodic faces.
children.desTs: 设置周期面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of RANS/LES interface faces.
children.desTs: 设置RANS/LES界面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of symmetric faces.
children.desTs: 设置对称面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of traction faces.
children.desTs: 设置牵引面的颜色。

children.des: Sets the color of wall faces.
children.desTs: 设置墙壁面的颜色。

children.des: Lists available colors.
children.desTs: 列出可用的颜色。

children.des: Resets individual mesh surface colors to the defaults.
children.desTs: 将各个网格表面颜色重置为默认值。

children.des: Sets the number of labels to be skipped in the colormap scale.
children.desTs: 设置色彩映射比例中要跳过的标签数量。

children.des: Sets the color of surfaces.
children.desTs: 设置表面的颜色。

children.des: Enters the contour options menu.
children.desTs: 进入轮廓选项菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables auto-computation of the contour range.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用等高线范围的自动计算。

children.des: Turns the clip to range option for filled contours on/off.
children.desTs: 打开/关闭填充轮廓的剪辑到范围选项。

children.des: Specifies whether contours are displayed in bands or with smooth transitions. Note           that you can only display smooth contours if node-values are enabled.
children.desTs: 指定轮廓是以带状形式显示还是以平滑过渡显示。注意           如果启用了节点值，则只能显示平滑轮廓。

children.des: With thefilled-contours? and  node-values? options enabled, this sets the use of lines to           delineate the bands of color to coincide with the colormap.
children.desTs: 有填充的轮廓吗？和节点值？启用选项，这将线的使用设置为           描绘色彩带以与色彩图一致。

children.des: Turns the filled contours option on/off (deselects line-contours?).
children.desTs: 打开/关闭填充轮廓选项（是否取消选择线轮廓？）。

children.des: Turns the global range for contours on/off.
children.desTs: 打开/关闭轮廓的全球范围。

children.des: Turns the line contours option on/off (deselects filled-contours?).
children.desTs: 打开/关闭线条轮廓选项（取消选择填充轮廓？）。

children.des: Specifies a decimal or logarithmic color scale for contours.
children.desTs: 指定等高线的小数或对数色标。

children.des: Sets the number of contour levels.
children.desTs: 设置等高线级别数。

children.des: Sets the option to use scalar field at nodes when computing the contours.
children.desTs: 设置计算轮廓时在节点上使用纯量场的选项。

children.des: Determines whether or not to render the mesh on top of contours, vectors, and so on.
children.desTs: 确定是否在轮廓、载体等顶部渲染网格。

children.des: Sets the surfaces on which contours are drawn. You can include a wildcard            (*) within the surface names.
children.desTs: 设置绘制轮廓的表面。您可以包括一个子菜单            （*）在表面名称内。

children.des: Sets shrinkage of both faces and cells. A value of zero indicates no shrinkage, while a value        of one will shrink each face or cell to a point.
children.desTs: 设置面和单元格的收缩率。零值表示没有收缩，而值        的一个会将每个面或细胞缩小到一个点。

children.des: Determines whether the meshes are drawn as wireframe or solid.
children.desTs: 确定网格是绘制为线框还是实体。

children.des: Sets coarse mesh level to be drawn.
children.desTs: 设置要绘制的粗网格级别。

children.des: Enables/disables option to draw mesh partition boundaries.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用绘制网格分区边界的选项。

children.des: Sets surface IDs to be drawn as meshes. You can include a wildcard         (*) within the surface names.
children.desTs: 设置要绘制为网格的表面ID。您可以包括一个子菜单         （*）在表面名称内。

children.des: Sets zone IDs to be drawn as meshes.
children.desTs: 设置要绘制为网格的区域ID。

children.des: Enters thesave-picture options menu.
children.desTs: 进入保存图片选项菜单。

children.des: Enters the hardcopy/save-picture color mode menu.
children.desTs: 进入硬拷贝/保存图片颜色模式菜单。

children.des: Plots hardcopies in color.
children.desTs: 以彩色绘制硬拷贝。

children.des: Converts color to grayscale for hardcopy.
children.desTs: 对于硬拷贝，将颜色复制为灰度。

children.des: Displays the current hardcopy color mode.
children.desTs: 显示当前硬拷贝颜色模式。

children.des: Converts color to monochrome (black and white) for hardcopy.
children.desTs: 对于硬拷贝，将颜色切换为单色（黑色和白色）。

children.des: Sets the resolution for EPS and Postscript files; specifies the resolution                      in dots per inch (DPI) instead of setting the width and height.
children.desTs: 设置PS和PostScript文件的分辨率;指定分辨率                      单位为每英寸点（DPA），而不是设置宽度和高度。

children.des: Enters the set hardcopy driver menu.
children.desTs: 进入设置硬拷贝驱动程序菜单。

children.des: Produces 3D images in Ansys Viewer (AVZ) output for                            hardcopies.
children.desTs: 在Ansys Viewer（AVZ）输出中生成3D图像                            硬拷贝。

children.des: Produces encapsulated PostScript (EPS) output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成封装的EPS输出。

children.des: Produces GLB output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成GLB输出。

children.des: Produces HOOPS Visualize Stream Format (HSF) output for                            hardcopies.
children.desTs: 生成HOOPS可视化流格式（HSF）输出                            硬拷贝。

children.des: Produces JPEG output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成JPEG输出。

children.des: Lists the current hardcopy driver.
children.desTs: 列出当前硬拷贝驱动程序。

children.des: Sets the hardcopy options. Available options are: “no gamma                            correction", disables gamma correction of colors; “pen speed =                            f", where f is a real number in [0,1]; “physical size = (width,                            height)", where width and height are the actual measurements of the                            printable area of the page in centimeters; “subscreen = (left,                            right, bottom, top)", where left, right, bottom, and top are numbers in                            [-1,1] describing a subwindow on the page in which to place the                            hardcopy. The options may be combined by separating them with commas.                            The pen speed option is only meaningful to the HPGL driver.
children.desTs: 设置硬拷贝选项。可用选项包括：“无伽玛                            修正”，禁用颜色的伽玛修正;“笔速=                            f”，其中f是[0，1]中的真实数字;“物理尺寸=（宽度，高度）”，其中宽度和高度是实际测量值                            页面的可打印区域以厘米为单位;“subscreen =（左、右、底部、顶部）”，其中左、右、底部和顶部是数字                            [-1，1]描述页面上的子窗口，其中放置                            硬拷贝。这些选项可以通过用逗号分隔来组合。笔速选项仅对HPGL驱动程序有意义。

children.des: Uses PNG output for hardcopies. (This is the default file                            type.)
children.desTs: 硬拷贝使用PNG输出。(This是默认的文件                            类型。）

children.des: Enters the PostScript driver format menu.
children.desTs: 进入收件箱驱动程序格式菜单。

children.des: Enables a raster file that may be larger than the standard                                  raster file, but will print much more quickly.
children.desTs: 启用可能大于标准的格栅文件                                  格栅文件，但打印速度要快得多。

children.des: Enables the standard raster file.
children.desTs: 启用标准格栅文件。

children.des: Enables a run-length encoded raster file that will be about                                  the same size as the standard raster file, but will print slightly                                  more quickly.
children.desTs: 启用行程长度编码的格栅文件，大约                                  与标准格栅文件大小相同，但会稍微打印                                  更快。

children.des: Enables the standard vector file.
children.desTs: 启用标准载体文件。

children.des: Produces PostScript output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成收件箱输出。

children.des: Produces PPM output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成PPM输出。

children.des: Produces TIFF output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成Tivf输出。

children.des: Produces USD output for hardcopies for use with NVIDIA                            Omniverse.
children.desTs: 生成美元输出，用于硬拷贝，供NVIDIA使用                            全宇宙。

children.des: Uses VRML output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 使用TLR输出进行硬拷贝。

children.des: Sets the command used to dump the graphics window to a file.
children.desTs: 设置用于将图形窗口转储到文件的命令。

children.des: Save the image with a white background.
children.desTs: 将图像保存为白色背景。

children.des: In some instances, the image may appear darker after being saved in AVZ or                      GLB format than it appears in graphics window. Inverting the normals can                      correct the issue.
children.desTs: 在某些情况下，图像保存在AVZ或                      GLB格式比图形窗口中显示的格式。倒置法向可以                      纠正这个问题。

children.des: Controls the size and quality of how JPEG files are saved based on a scale                      of 0-100, with zero being low quality small files and 100 being high quality                      larger files.
children.desTs: 根据比例控制JPEG文件的保存大小和质量                      0-100，0表示低质量小文件，100表示高质量                      更大的文件。

children.des: Specify the orientation of the picture. If this option is enabled, the                      picture is made in landscape mode; otherwise, it is made in portrait                      mode.
children.desTs: 指定图片的方向。如果启用此选项，                      图片以风景模式制作;否则，以肖像模式制作                      模式

children.des: Applies the settings of the color-mode, invert-background (white or as                      seen in the graphics window), and landscape options to the currently active                      graphics window to preview the appearance of printed hardcopies.
children.desTs: 初始化颜色模式、倒置背景（白色或as                      在图形窗口中可见），以及当前活动的风景选项                      图形窗口用于预览打印硬拷贝的外观。

children.des: Controls whether or not a raytracer is used to render the image prior to                      saving it. Additional raytracer settings are controlled under                      display/raytracer/.
children.desTs: 控制在                      保存它。其他光线追踪器设置由下控制                      显示/射线追踪器/。

children.des: Disables/enables the use of the current graphics window resolution when                      saving an image of the graphics window. If disabled, the resolution will be as                      specified for x-resolution                        andy-resolution.
children.desTs: 禁用/启用使用当前图形窗口分辨率时                      保存图形窗口的图像。如果禁用，分辨率将为                      指定用于x分辨率                        andy分辨率。

children.des: Sets the width of raster-formatted images in pixels (0 implies current window size).
children.desTs: 以像素为单位设置格栅格式图像的宽度（0表示当前窗口大小）。

children.des: Sets the height of raster-formatted images in pixels (0 implies current window size).
children.desTs: 以像素为单位设置格栅格式图像的高度（0表示当前窗口大小）。

children.des: Enters the lights menu.
children.desTs: 进入灯光菜单。

children.des: Turns the light that moves with the camera on or off. This is controlled automatically by           default.
children.desTs: 打开或关闭相机时移动的灯光。这由以下方式自动控制           default.

children.des: Sets lighting interpolation method.
children.desTs: 设置照明插值方法。

children.des: Fluent automatically picks the best lighting method for the display in the              graphics window.
children.desTs: Fluent自动选择显示的最佳照明方法              图形窗口。

children.des: Uses flat shading for meshes and polygons.
children.desTs: 对网格和多边形使用平面着色。

children.des: Uses Gouraud shading to calculate the color at each vertex of a polygon and interpolates it in              the interior.
children.desTs: 使用Gouraud着色计算多边形每个顶点的颜色，并将其插值到              了室内这

children.des: Uses Phong shading to interpolate the normals for each pixel of a polygon and computes a color              at every pixel.
children.desTs: 使用Phong着色为多边形的每个像素插入法线并计算颜色              每一个像素。

children.des: Turns all active lighting on/off.This command is only available when theheadlight-on? option is turned off (lights-on? is enabled when the headlight is on).
children.desTs: 打开/关闭所有活动照明。此命令仅在前灯打开时可用？选项已关闭（灯打开？当前灯打开时启用）。

children.des: Sets the ambient color for the scene. The ambient color is the background light color in a           scene.
children.desTs: 设置场景的环境色。环境色是中的背景光色           现场

children.des: Adds or modifies a directional, colored light.
children.desTs: 添加或修改方向性彩色光。

children.des: Sets the line-weight factor for the window.
children.desTs: 设置窗口的线重系数。

children.des: Sets the size of markers used to represent points.
children.desTs: 设置用于表示点的标记的大小。

children.des: Sets the type of markers used to represent points.
children.desTs: 设置用于表示点的标记类型。

children.des: Changes the default mesh display. If set tomeshing, it draws the mesh on        edges and faces of the outline surfaces, colored by their zone ID with lighting enabled. If        set tosolution, it draws the mesh on edges and faces of the outline        surfaces, colored by their zone type with lighting enabled. If set to   post-processing, it draws the object outline with lighting disabled.        If set toclassic, it draws the mesh on all edges of the outline        surfaces.
children.desTs: 更改默认网格显示。如果设置为网格化，则会在其上绘制网格        轮廓表面的边缘和面，在启用照明的情况下通过其区域ID进行着色。如果        设置为解决方案，它会在轮廓的边和面上绘制网格        表面，根据其区域类型着色，并启用照明。如果设置为   后处理后，它会在禁用照明的情况下绘制对象轮廓。如果设置为经典，它会在轮廓的所有边缘绘制网格        表面。

children.des: Sets number of iterations used in computing stream function.
children.desTs: 设置计算流函数中使用的迭代次数。

children.des: Disables/enables the use of node weights for node-based gradients in postprocessing.
children.desTs: 禁用/启用在后处理中对基于节点的梯度使用节点权重。

children.des: Enables/disables overlays.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用覆盖。

children.des: Enters the particle-tracks menu to set parameters for display of particle tracks.
children.desTs: 进入粒子轨迹菜单以设置粒子轨迹显示的参数。

children.des: Sets the scale factor for arrows drawn on particle tracks.
children.desTs: 设置粒子轨迹上绘制的箭头的比例因子。

children.des: Sets the spacing factor for arrows drawn on particle tracks.
children.desTs: 设置在粒子轨迹上绘制的箭头的间距因子。

children.des: Sets the coarsening factor for particle tracks.
children.desTs: 设置粒子轨迹的粗化因子。

children.des: Determines whether particle tracks shall be displayed or only tracked.
children.desTs: 确定是显示还是仅跟踪粒子轨迹。

children.des: Sets filter for particle display.
children.desTs: 设置粒子显示的滤镜。

children.des: Specifies whether particle display is filtered.
children.desTs: 指定是否过滤粒子显示。

children.des: Selects a variable used for filtering of particles.
children.desTs: 指定用于过滤颗粒的变量。

children.des: Specifies whether filter variable must be inside min/max to be displayed (else               outside min/max).
children.desTs: 指定过滤器变量是否必须在最小/最大范围内才能显示（否则               外部最小/最大）。

children.des: Specifies the upper bound for the filter variable.
children.desTs: 指定过滤器变量的上限。

children.des: Specifies the lower bound for the filter variable.
children.desTs: 指定过滤器变量的下限。

children.des: Specifies the name of the particle history file.
children.desTs: 指定粒子历史文件的名称。

children.des: Sets the width for particle track.
children.desTs: 设置粒子轨迹的宽度。

children.des: Sets the size of markers used to represent particle tracks.
children.desTs: 设置用于表示粒子轨迹的标记的大小。

children.des: Specifies how many particle tracks should be displayed.
children.desTs: 指定应显示多少个粒子轨迹。

children.des: Sets the radius for particle track (ribbon/cylinder only) cross-section.
children.desTs: 设置粒子轨迹（仅限带状体/圆柱体）横截面的半径。

children.des: Specifies the destination for the report (console, file, none).
children.desTs: 指定报告的目标（控制台、文件、无）。

children.des: Sets the report type for particle tracks.
children.desTs: 设置粒子轨迹的报告类型。

children.des: Sets the report variables.
children.desTs: 设置报告变量。

children.des: Sets the report variables to default.
children.desTs: 将报告变量设置为默认值。

children.des: Specifies the size and number of slices to be used in drawing spheres.
children.desTs: 指定要在绘制球体时使用的切片的大小和数量。

children.des: Sets filter for particle display.
children.desTs: 设置粒子显示的滤镜。

children.des: Specifies whether displayed spheres should include auto range of variable to               size spheres.
children.desTs: 指定显示的球体是否应包括变量的自动范围               大小球体。

children.des: Diameter of the spheres whenvary-diameter is               disabled.
children.desTs: 当不同直径为时，球体的直径               禁用.

children.des: Sets the maximum value of the sphere to be displayed.
children.desTs: 设置要显示的球体的最大值。

children.des: Sets the minimum value of the sphere to be displayed.
children.desTs: 设置要显示的球体的最小值。

children.des: Specifies a scale factor to enlarge/reduce the size of spheres.
children.desTs: 指定放大/缩小球体大小的比例因子。

children.des: Selects a particle variable to size the spheres.
children.desTs: 初始化粒子变量来确定球体的大小。

children.des: Specifies number of slices to be used in drawing spheres.
children.desTs: 指定用于绘制球体的切片数量。

children.des: Specifies whether the spheres can vary with another variable.
children.desTs: 指定球体是否可以随其他变量而变化。

children.des: Sets the display style for particle track (line/ribbon/cylinder/sphere).
children.desTs: 设置粒子轨迹的显示样式（线/带状/圆柱体/球体）。

children.des: Specifies the stream ID to be tracked.
children.desTs: 指定要跟踪的流ID。

children.des: Sets the scale factor for twisting (ribbons only).
children.desTs: 设置扭曲的比例因子（仅限丝带）。

children.des: Sets vector specific input.
children.desTs: 设置特定于载体的输入。

children.des: Specifies whether the vectors should be colored by variable specified in               /display/particle-track/particle-track (if false use a constant color).
children.desTs: 指定是否应通过中指定的变量对向               /show/Particle-track/Particle-track（如果为假，使用恒定颜色）。

children.des: Specifies a constant color for the vectors.
children.desTs: 指定载体的恒定颜色。

children.des: Specifies ratio of length to head for vectors and length to diameter for               cylinders.
children.desTs: 指定长度与头部的比率以及长度与直径的比率               钢瓶.

children.des: Specifies whether the displayed vectors have length varying with another               variable.
children.desTs: 指定显示的载体的长度是否随另一个而变化               变量

children.des: Specifies a scale factor to enlarge/reduce the length of vectors.
children.desTs: 指定比例因子以放大/缩小矢量的长度。

children.des: Enables and sets the display style for particle vectors               (none/vector/centered-vector/centered-cylinder).
children.desTs: 启用和设置粒子载体的显示样式               (none/vector/centered-vector/centered-cylinder）。

children.des: Specifies the length of constant vectors.
children.desTs: 指定常变量的长度。

children.des: Selects a particle variable to specify the length of vectors.
children.desTs: 初始化粒子变量以指定载体的长度。

children.des: Selects a particle vector function to specify vector direction.
children.desTs: 初始化粒子向函数以指定向度。

children.des: Sets parameters for display of pathlines.
children.desTs: 设置用于显示路径线的参数。

children.des: Sets the scale factor for arrows drawn on pathlines.
children.desTs: 设置在路径线上绘制的箭头的比例因子。

children.des: Sets the spacing factor for arrows drawn on pathlines.
children.desTs: 设置在路径线上绘制的箭头的间距系数。

children.des: Sets the display stepping for pathlines.
children.desTs: 设置路径线的显示步进。

children.des: Sets error control during pathline computation.
children.desTs: 在路径线计算期间设置错误控制。

children.des: Sets the width for pathlines.
children.desTs: 设置路径线的宽度。

children.des: Sets the marker size for particle drawing.
children.desTs: 设置粒子绘制的标记大小。

children.des: Sets the maximum error allowed while computing the pathlines.
children.desTs: 设置计算路径线时允许的最大误差。

children.des: Sets the maximum number of steps to take for pathlines.
children.desTs: 设置路径线要采取的最大步骤数。

children.des: Sets the radius for pathline (ribbons/cylinder only) cross-section.
children.desTs: 设置路径线（仅限带状/圆柱体）横剖面的半径。

children.des: Enables/disables the tracking of pathlines in a relative coordinate system.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用相对坐标系中路径线的跟踪。

children.des: Sets direction of path tracking.
children.desTs: 设置路径跟踪的方向。

children.des: Specifies the size and number of slices to be used in drawing spheres.
children.desTs: 指定要在绘制球体时使用的切片的大小和数量。

children.des: Sets the step length between particle positions for pathlines.
children.desTs: 设置路径线粒子位置之间的步进长度。

children.des: Selects the pathline style (line, point, ribbon, triangle, cylinder).
children.desTs: 指定路径线样式（直线、点、带状、三角形、圆柱体）。

children.des: Sets the time step between particle positions for pathlines.
children.desTs: 设置路径线的粒子位置之间的时间步长。

children.des: Selects the phase in which particle pathlines will be computed (Multiphase Eulerian           Model only).
children.desTs: 指定计算粒子路径线的阶段（多相欧拉           仅限型号）。

children.des: Sets the scale factor for twisting (ribbons only).
children.desTs: 设置扭曲的比例因子（仅限丝带）。

children.des: Sets the number of periodic repetitions.
children.desTs: 设置周期性重复的次数。

children.des: Sets the number of periodic repetitions.
children.desTs: 设置周期性重复的次数。

children.des: Sets zones to be used for boundary cell distance and boundary proximity.
children.desTs: 设置用于边界像元距离和边界接近度的区域。

children.des: Enables/disables rendering the mesh on top of contours, vectors, and so on.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用在轮廓、载体等顶部渲染网格。

children.des: Enters the rendering options menu, which contains the commands that allow you to set options        that determine how the scene is rendered.
children.desTs: 进入渲染选项菜单，其中包含允许您设置选项的命令        这决定了场景的渲染方式。

children.des: Uses ofwireframe orall during           animation.
children.desTs: 使用线框或所有期间           动画

children.des: Enables/disables mouse view rotations to continue to spin the display after the button is           released.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用鼠标视图旋转，以便在按钮关闭后继续旋转显示           发布

children.des: Sets the color bar alignment.
children.desTs: 设置色条对齐方式。

children.des: Prints out information about your graphics driver.
children.desTs: 打印出有关图形驱动程序的信息。

children.des: Enables/disables double buffering. Double buffering dramatically reduces screen flicker during           graphics updates. If your display hardware does not support double buffering and you turn           this option on, double buffering will be done in software. Software double buffering uses           extra memory.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用双重缓冲。双重缓冲极大地减少了屏幕闪烁           图形更新。如果您的显示硬件不支持双缓冲并且您将           打开此选项，双缓冲将在软件中完成。软件双缓冲使用           额外的内存。

children.des: Changes the current graphics driver. When enabling graphics display, you                      have various options: for Linux, the available drivers include                        opengl2, opengl2-mesa and                        x11; for Windows, the available drivers include                        opengl2, opengl2-mesa,                        dx11 (for DirectX 11), and                        msw (for Microsoft Windows). You can also disable                      the graphics display window by entering null. For a                      comprehensive list of the drivers available to you, press the                        Enter key at the driver>                      prompt.
children.desTs: 更改当前图形驱动程序。启用图形显示时，您                      有各种选项：对于Linux，可用的驱动程序包括                        opengl 2、opengl 2-mesa和                        x11;对于Windows，可用的驱动程序包括                        opengl 2、opengl 2-mesa、dx 11（用于Hotmail 11）和                        msw（适用于Microsoft Windows）。您还可以禁用                      通过输入空来显示图形显示窗口。对于                      您可用的司机的全面列表，请按                        在司机处输入键>                      提示。

children.des: Sets face displacement value in Z-buffer units along the Camera Z-axis.
children.desTs: 沿着摄像机Z轴以Z缓冲区单位设置面部位移值。

children.des: Specifies the method to perform hidden line rendering. This command will appear only when  hidden-lines? is true.
children.desTs: 指定执行隐藏线渲染的方法。此命令仅在隐藏线时才会出现？是真的

children.des: Normal hidden lines algorithm. This is the default.
children.desTs: 正常隐藏线算法。这是默认值。

children.des: For removing hidden lines for surfaces that are veryclose together. Use this ifnormal-hlr-algorithm is not working. This will only work for meshes.
children.desTs: 用于删除非常接近的表面的隐藏线。使用此ifnormal-hlr-算法不起作用。这仅适用于网格。

children.des: Turns hidden line removal on/off.
children.desTs: 打开/关闭隐藏线删除。

children.des: Turns hidden surface removal on/off.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用隐藏曲面移除。

children.des: Allows you to choose from among the hidden surfaceremoval methods that Ansys Fluent supports. These options (listed below)are display hardware dependent.
children.desTs: 允许您从Ansys Fluent支持的隐藏表面去除方法中进行选择。这些选项（如下所列）取决于显示硬件。

children.des: Is the fastest method if your hardware supports it. The accuracy and speed of this method is              hardware dependent.
children.desTs: 如果您的硬件支持，这是最快的方法。这种方法的准确性和速度是              取决于硬件。

children.des: Will show less edge-aliasing effects than hardware-z- buffer. This method is often used              instead of software-z-buffer when memory is limited.
children.desTs: 将显示比硬件z缓冲区更少的边缘锯齿效果。这种方法经常使用              而不是在存储器受限时使用软件z缓冲器。

children.des: Is the fastest of the accurate software methods available (especially for complex scenes), but              it is memory intensive.
children.desTs: 是可用的准确软件方法中最快的（尤其是对于复杂场景），但              它是记忆密集型的。

children.des: Is a fast software method, but it is not as accurate as software-z-buffer.
children.desTs: 是一种快速的软件方法，但不如software-z-buffer准确。

children.des: Enables/disables the visibility of outer faces during display.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用显示期间外部面的可见性。

children.des: Sets the rendering options.
children.desTs: 设置渲染选项。

children.des: Sets edge visibility flags for surfaces.
children.desTs: 设置表面的边缘可见性标志。

children.des: Resets the graphics system.
children.desTs: 重置图形系统。

children.des: Sets problem title. This text only appears if the                  display/set/windows/text/company? text command is set to                  yes and if Titles is enabled in the                  Display Options dialog box.
children.desTs: 设置问题标题。此文本仅在                  显示/设置/窗口/文本/公司？text命令设置为                  是，如果在                  显示选项对话框。

children.des: Sets the title text for left top in title segment.
children.desTs: 设置标题段左上角的标题文本。

children.des: Sets the title text for left bottom in title segment.
children.desTs: 将标题文本设置为标题段左下方。

children.des: Sets the title text for right top in title segment.
children.desTs: 设置标题段右上角的标题文本。

children.des: Sets the title text for right middle in title segment.
children.desTs: 设置标题段右中间的标题文本。

children.des: Sets the title text for right bottom in title segment.
children.desTs: 设置标题段右下角的标题文本。

children.des: Enters the menu to set parameters for display of velocity vectors.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以设置显示速度载体的参数。

children.des: Auto-scales all vectors so that vector overlap is minimal.
children.desTs: 自动缩放所有载体，使载体重叠最小化。

children.des: Sets the color of all velocity vectors to the color specified. The color scale is ignored.           This is useful when overlaying a vector plot over a contour plot.
children.desTs: 将所有速度载体的颜色设置为指定的颜色。颜色比例被忽略。当将载体图叠加在等值线图上时，这很有用。

children.des: Sets the number of colors used from the colormap.
children.desTs: 设置色彩图中使用的颜色数量。

children.des: Sets the option to use only the component of the velocity vectors during display.
children.desTs: 将选项设置为在显示期间仅使用速度载体的分量。

children.des: Sets the option to use only the component of the velocity vectors during display.
children.desTs: 将选项设置为在显示期间仅使用速度载体的分量。

children.des: Sets the option to use only the component of the velocity vectors during display.
children.desTs: 将选项设置为在显示期间仅使用速度载体的分量。

children.des: Sets the option to draw velocity vectors of constant length. This shows only the direction of           the velocity vectors.
children.desTs: 设置绘制恒长速度方向的选项。这仅显示           速度载体。

children.des: Turns global range for vectors on/off.
children.desTs: 打开/关闭载体的全局范围。

children.des: Toggles the display of velocity vector components in the plane of the surface selected for           display.
children.desTs: 切换所选的表面平面中速度向量分量的显示           显示.

children.des: Toggles whether color scale is logarithmic or linear.
children.desTs: 切换颜色比例是对数还是线性。

children.des: Enables/disables the plotting of node values. Cell values will be plotted if "no".
children.desTs: 启用/禁用节点值的绘制。如果为“否”，则将绘制单元格值。

children.des: Toggles the display of relative velocity vectors.
children.desTs: 切换相对速度载体的显示。

children.des: Enables/disables rendering the mesh on top of contours, vectors, and so on.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用在轮廓、载体等顶部渲染网格。

children.des: Sets the value by which the vector length will be scaled.
children.desTs: 设置缩放方向长度的值。

children.des: Sets the value by which the vector head will be scaled.
children.desTs: 设置缩放向头的值。

children.des: Specifies the vector style that will be used when the vectors are displayed. You can           choose from:3d arrow,3d arrowhead,  cone,filled-arrow, arrow,harpoon, or  headless.
children.desTs: 指定显示载体时将使用的载体样式。您可以           可选择：3D箭头、3D箭头、圆锥体、填充箭头、箭头、鱼叉或无头。

children.des: Sets surfaces on which vectors are drawn. You can include a wildcard            (*) within the surface names.
children.desTs: 设置绘制载体的表面。您可以包括一个子菜单            （*）在表面名称内。

children.des: Enters the windows option menu, which contains commands that allow you to customize the        relative positions of subwindows inside the active graphics window.
children.desTs: 进入Windows选项菜单，其中包含允许您自定义        活动图形窗口内子窗口的相对位置。

children.des: Sets the aspect ratio of the active window.
children.desTs: 设置活动窗口的长宽比。

children.des: Enters the axes window options menu (3D only).
children.desTs: 进入轴窗口选项菜单（仅限3D）。

children.des: Sets whether to draw a border around the axes window.
children.desTs: 设置是否在轴窗口周围绘制边界。

children.des: Sets the bottom boundary of the axes window.
children.desTs: 设置轴窗口的底部边界。

children.des: Sets the transparency of the axes window.
children.desTs: 设置轴窗口的透明度。

children.des: Enables/disables visibility of the logo in graphics window.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用图形窗口中徽标的可见性。

children.des: Sets logo color to white/black in graphics window.
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中将徽标颜色设置为白/黑。

children.des: Sets the right boundary of the axes window.
children.desTs: 设置轴窗口的右边界。

children.des: Turns axes visibility on/off.
children.desTs: 打开/关闭轴可见性。

children.des: Enters the main view window options menu.
children.desTs: 进入主视图窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Sets whether or not to draw a border around the main viewing window.
children.desTs: 设置是否在主查看窗口周围绘制边界。

children.des: Sets the bottom boundary of the main viewing window.
children.desTs: 设置主查看窗口的底部边界。

children.des: Sets the left boundary of the main viewing window.
children.desTs: 设置主查看窗口的左边界。

children.des: Sets the right boundary of the main viewing window.
children.desTs: 设置主查看窗口的右边界。

children.des: Sets the top boundary of the main viewing window.
children.desTs: 设置主查看窗口的顶部边界。

children.des: Turns visibility of the main viewing window on/off.
children.desTs: 打开/关闭主查看窗口的可见性。

children.des: Turns the ruler on/off. Note that if you are running Fluent in 3D, then the view must be set           toorthographic.
children.desTs: 打开/关闭尺子。请注意，如果您在3D中运行Fluent，则必须设置视图           地形学的。

children.des: Enters the color scale window options menu.
children.desTs: 进入颜色比例窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Sets the colormap position to the bottom, left, top, or right.
children.desTs: 将色彩映射位置设置为底部、左侧、顶部或右侧。

children.des: Sets whether or not to draw a border around the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置是否在颜色比例窗口周围绘制边界。

children.des: Sets the bottom boundary of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的底部边界。

children.des: Sets the transparency of the scale window.
children.desTs: 设置比例窗口的透明度。

children.des: Sets the number format of the color scale window. (for example, %0.2e)
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的数字格式。(for示例，%0.2e）

children.des: Sets the font size of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的字体大小。

children.des: Sets the left boundary of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的左边界。

children.des: Sets the margin of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的页边距。

children.des: Sets the right boundary of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的右边界。

children.des: Sets the top boundary of the color scale window.
children.desTs: 设置颜色比例窗口的顶部边界。

children.des: Turns visibility of the color scale window on/off.
children.desTs: 打开/关闭颜色比例窗口的可见性。

children.des: Enters the text window options menu.
children.desTs: 进入文本窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Shows/hides the application name in the picture.
children.desTs: 显示/隐藏图片中的应用程序名称。

children.des: Sets whether or not to draw a border around the text window.
children.desTs: 设置是否在文本窗口周围绘制边界。

children.des: Sets the bottom boundary of the text window.
children.desTs: 设置文本窗口的底部边界。

children.des: Enables/disables text window transparency.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用文本窗口透明度。

children.des: Enables/disables the display of your company name or other text defined using thedisplay/set/titles/ text command. The text appears in the              title box. See Controlling the Titles, Axes, Ruler, Logo, and Colormap in the Fluent User's Guide for additional information.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用显示您的公司名称或使用select/set/title/ text命令定义的其他文本。文本显示在              标题框。有关其他信息，请参阅《流利用户指南》中的控制标题、轴、尺子、徽标和色彩图。

children.des: Shows/hides the date in the picture.
children.desTs: 在图片中显示/隐藏日期。

children.des: Sets the left boundary of the text window.
children.desTs: 设置文本窗口的左边界。

children.des: Sets the right boundary of the text window.
children.desTs: 设置文本窗口的右边界。

children.des: Sets the top boundary of the text window.
children.desTs: 设置文本窗口的顶部边界。

children.des: Turns visibility of the text window on/off.
children.desTs: 打开/关闭文本窗口的可见性。

children.des: Enters the video window options menu.
children.desTs: 进入视频窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Sets the background color of the graphics window. The color is specified as a string of three              comma-separated numbers between 0 and 1, representing red, green, and blue. For              example, to change the background from black (default) to gray, you would enter".5,.5,.5" after selecting thebackground command.
children.desTs: 设置图形窗口的背景颜色。颜色被指定为三个字符的字符串              0和1之间的逗号分隔的数字，表示红色、绿色和蓝色。对于              例如，要将背景从黑色（默认）更改为灰色，您可以在选择background命令后输入”.5，.5，.5”。

children.des: Sets the video color filter. For example, to change the color filter from its default setting              to PAL video with a saturation of 80% and a brightness of 90%, you would enter"video=pal,sat=.8,gain=.9" after selecting thecolor-filter command.
children.desTs: 设置视频色彩滤镜。例如，从默认设置更改色彩滤镜              对于饱和度为80%、亮度为90%的PAL视频，选择彩色滤镜命令后输入“video=pal，sat=.8，gain =.9”。

children.des: Sets the foreground (text) color of the graphics window. The color is specified as a string of              three comma-separated numbers between 0 and 1, representing red, green, and blue. For              example, to change the foreground from white (default) to gray, you would enter".5,.5,.5" after selecting theforeground command.
children.desTs: 设置图形窗口的前景（文本）颜色。颜色指定为字符串              0和1之间的三个逗号分隔的数字，代表红色、绿色和蓝色。对于              例如，要将前景从白色（默认）更改为灰色，您需要在选择前景命令后输入“.5，.5，.5”。

children.des: Enables/disables video picture settings.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用视频图片设置。

children.des: Sets the window size in pixels.
children.desTs: 以像素为单位设置窗口大小。

children.des: Enters the XY plot window options menu.
children.desTs: 进入XY打印窗口选项菜单。

children.des: Sets whether or not to draw a border around the XY plot window.
children.desTs: 设置是否在XY打印窗口周围绘制边界。

children.des: Sets the bottom boundary of the XY plot window.
children.desTs: 设置XY打印窗口的底部边界。

children.des: Sets the left boundary of the XY plot window.
children.desTs: 设置XY打印窗口的左边界。

children.des: Sets the right boundary of the XY plot window.
children.desTs: 设置XY打印窗口的右边界。

children.des: Sets the top boundary of the XY plot window.
children.desTs: 设置XY打印窗口的顶部边界。

children.des: Turns visibility of the XY plot window on/off.
children.desTs: 打开/关闭XY打印窗口的可见性。

children.des: Sets the vector having zero angular coordinates.
children.desTs: 设置角坐标为零的载体。

contents.des: Sets the separator character for list tree.
contents.desTs: 设置列表树的分隔符。

contents.des: Sets a "user" graphics window to be the active window. User windows are specified by     number (1-50), with the associated number corresponding to the order, left-to-right, that the     windows were created in.
contents.desTs: 将“用户”图形窗口设置为活动窗口。用户窗口由     数字（1-50），相关数字对应于从左到右的顺序     窗口创建于中。

contents.des: Sets the specified graphics window as active. The graphics windows specified using this     command are "reserved" windows, that is, residual monitors, report plots, and animation     definitions. The name will match the name you provided when creating the object (report plots     and animation definitions).
contents.desTs: 将指定的图形窗口设置为活动的。使用此指定的图形窗口     命令是“保留”窗口，即剩余监视器、报告图和动画     定义。名称将与创建对象时提供的名称匹配（报告图     和动画定义）。

contents.des: Enters the data surface-manipulation menu. For a description of the items in this menu, seesurface/.
contents.desTs: 进入数据表面操作菜单。有关此菜单中项目的描述，请参阅seesurface/。

contents.des: Draws the cells on the specified surfaces. You can include a wildcard      (*) within the surface names.
contents.desTs: 在指定表面上绘制单元格。您可以包括子菜单      （*）在表面名称内。

contents.des: Draws the mesh defined by the specified surfaces. You can include a wildcard      (*) within the surface names.
contents.desTs: 绘制由指定表面定义的网格。您可以包括子菜单      （*）在表面名称内。

contents.des: Enters the scene options menu.
contents.desTs: 进入场景选项菜单。

children.des: Deletes selected geometries.

children.desTs: 显示选定的几何图形。

children.desTs: 启用/禁用绘制边界框。

children.des: Changes iso-sweep values.
children.desTs: 更改等扫描值。

children.des: Enables/disables the overlays option.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用叠加选项。

children.des: Changes pathline attributes.

children.des: Selects geometry to be updated.
children.desTs: 要更新的几何图形。

children.des: Changes frame options.
children.desTs: 更改框架选项。

children.des: Changes time-step value.
children.desTs: 更改时间步长值。

contents.des: [Only available when            preferences/graphics/enable-non-object-based-workflow is          enabled] Displays vectors of a space vector variable.
contents.desTs: [Only时可用            preferences/graphics/enable-non-object-based-workflow是          enabled]显示空间向量变量的向量。

contents.des: Prompts for a scalar field by which to color the vectors,the minimum and maximum values, and the scale factor, and then drawsthe velocity vectors.
contents.desTs: 指定用于对载体着色的纯量场、最小值和最大值以及比例因子，然后绘制速度载体。

contents.des: Enters the view manipulation menu. For a description of the items in this menu, seeviews/.
contents.desTs: 进入视图操作菜单。有关此菜单中项目的描述，请参阅views/。

contents.des: Draws the mesh defined by specified face zones. Zone names can be indicated using wildcards      (*).
contents.desTs: 绘制由指定的面区域定义的网格。区域名称可以使用外卡指示      (*).

list.des: commands used to control the rendering of your    model and mesh in the graphical window.
list.desTs: 用于控制渲染的命令    图形窗口中的模型和网格。

contents.des: Exits program.
contents.desTs: 退出计划。

contents.des: (Ansys Fluent in Workbench only) Exits program.
contents.desTs: （Ansys Fluent仅适用于收件箱）退出程序。

list.des: the command to close the program.
list.desTs: 关闭程序的命令。

contents.des: Chooses whether to optimize file I/O using scratch disks and asynchronous operations.
contents.desTs: 建议是否使用临时磁盘和同步操作优化文件I/O。

contents.des: Enters the auto save menu.
contents.desTs: 进入自动保存菜单。

children.des: Sets the suffix for auto-saved files. The file name can be appended by flow-time, time-step                value, or by user-specified flags in file name.
children.desTs: 设置自动保存文件的后缀。文件名可以通过流时间、时间步来附加                值，或通过文件名中的用户指定标志。

children.des: Specifies the frequency (in iterations, time steps, or flow time) with which case files are                saved.
children.desTs: 指定案例文件的频率（以迭代、时间步或流程时间为单位）                得救了

children.des: Specifies the frequency (in iterations, time steps, or flow time) with which data files are                saved.
children.desTs: 指定数据文件的频率（以迭代、时间步或流动时间为单位）                得救了

children.des: Sets the maximum number of files. Once the maximum is reached, files will be erased as new                files are written.
children.desTs: 设置最大文件数。达到最大值后，文件将被删除为新文件                文件已写入。

children.des: Overwrites existing files when files are automatically saved.
children.desTs: 自动保存文件时覆盖现有文件。

children.des: Sets autosave to retain the 5 most recent files.
children.desTs: 设置自动保存以保留最近的5个文件。

children.des: Specifies the root name for the files that are saved.
children.desTs: 指定保存文件的根名称。

children.des: Specifies the type and frequency of the data file to be saved.
children.desTs: 指定要保存的数据文件的类型和频率。

contents.des: Indicates whether to write binary or text format case and data files.
contents.desTs: 指示是否编写二进制或文本格式的大小写和数据文件。

contents.des: Specifies which format used to write mesh, case, and data          files, and which format is prioritized when reading. Answering yes          specifies that the Common Fluids Format (.msh.h5,            .cas.h5, and .dat.h5) is used, whereas            no specifies that the legacy format            (.msh, .cas, and            .dat) is used.
contents.desTs: 指定用于写入网格、大小写和数据的格式          文件，以及读取时优先考虑哪种格式。确认是          指定使用通用流体格式（.msh.h5、.cas.h5和.dat.h5），而            no指定传统格式            (.msh、.cas和            .dat）已使用。

contents.des: Enters the cffio options menu, which provides options for the I/O of case and data          files in the Common Fluids Format (CFF).
contents.desTs: 进入cffio选项菜单，该菜单提供案例和数据的I/O选项          常见流体格式（CFF）的文件。

children.des: Sets the compression level for CFF files. The compression level can be set                between 0 and 9 with 0 being least compression (fastest) and 9 being highest                compression (slowest).
children.desTs: 设置CFF文件的压缩级别。压缩级别可以设置                0到9之间，0表示最小压缩（最快），9表示最高压缩                压缩（最慢）。

children.des: Sets the I/O mode for writing CFF files.
children.desTs: 设置写入CFF文件的I/O模式。

children.des: Specifies whether the double-precision solver saves single-precision data when                writing CFF data files, in order to reduce the size of the files.
children.desTs: 指定双精度解算器是否在以下情况下保存单精度数据                编写CFF数据文件，以减少文件的大小。

contents.des: Exits Ansys Fluent without saving data in Workbench. Thiscommand is only available when running Ansys Fluent in Workbench.
contents.desTs: 退出Ansys Fluent，而不在收件箱中保存数据。此命令仅在收件箱中运行Ansys Fluent时可用。

contents.des: Confirms attempts to overwrite existing files.
contents.desTs: 确认尝试覆盖现有文件。

contents.des: Enables/disables the automatic conversion of 2D and 3D cells adjacent to hanging nodes          / edges to polyhedra when the file is read, and ensures that the adaption method is set to          the polyhedral unstructured mesh adaption (PUMA) method. By default this text command is          enabled.
contents.desTs: 启用/禁用悬挂节点附近的2D和3D像元的自动转换          /边到多面体，并确保适配方法设置为          多面体非结构化网格自适应（PONA）方法。默认情况下，此文本命令为          启用.

contents.des: Sets derived quantities to be written in data file.
contents.desTs: 设置要写入数据文件的派生量。

contents.des: Saves input to a named macro.
contents.desTs: 将输入指定宏。

contents.des: Enters the electromagnetic loss mapping menu.
contents.desTs: 进入电磁损耗映射菜单。

children.des: Maintains the loss data provided by Maxwell even if solution is initialized.
children.desTs: 即使解决方案已初始化，也会维护Maxwell提供的损失数据。

children.des: Removes the loss data provided by Maxwell and keeps all other solution data.
children.desTs: 验证Maxwell提供的损失数据并保留所有其他解决方案数据。

children.des: Maps the total surface loss (that is, heat source) from Maxwell to                Ansys Fluent so that you can perform a thermal analysis. This option is only available                when there is a connection detected between the Ansys Fluent and Maxwell                applications.
children.desTs: 将总表面损失（即热源）从麦克斯韦映射到                Ansys Fluent，以便您可以执行热分析。此选项仅可用                当Ansys Fluent和Maxwell之间检测到连接时                应用.

children.des: Maps the total volumetric loss (that is, heat source) from Maxwell to                Ansys Fluent so that you can perform a thermal analysis. This option is only available                when there is a connection detected between the Ansys Fluent and Maxwell                applications.
children.desTs: 将麦克斯韦的总体积损失（即热源）映射到                Ansys Fluent，以便您可以执行热分析。此选项仅可用                当Ansys Fluent和Maxwell之间检测到连接时                应用.

contents.des: Runs a previously defined macro.
contents.desTs: 初始化之前定义的宏。

contents.des: Exports data files that are compatible with CFD-Post and EnSight (that is,            .cdat and .cst files) and opens          CFD-Post, if desired.
contents.desTs: 输出与CFD-Post和EnSight兼容的数据文件（即.CDat和.cst文件）并打开          如果需要，差价合约-后。

children.des: Writes an ASCII file.
children.desTs: 写入ASCI文件。

children.des: Writes data files that are compatible with CFD-Post and EnSight (that is,                  .cdat and .cst files).
children.desTs: 写入与CFD-Post和EnSight兼容的数据文件（即.CDat和.cst文件）。

children.des: Writes a CGNS file. You can specify whether data is exported on the full domain                (default), on specific cell zones (volume-select), or on                specific surfaces (surface-select).
children.desTs: 写入CGNS文件。您可以指定是否在完整域上输出数据                （默认）、在特定单元格区域（卷选择）上，或在                特定表面（表面选择）。

children.des: Writes common fluids format files (.cas.post and                  .dat.post) for mesh and data, respectively. These files                are saved in the hierarchical data format.
children.desTs: 写入常见流体格式文件（. cas.post和                  。dat.post）分别用于网格和数据。这些文件                以分层数据格式保存。

children.des: Writes EnSight geometry, velocity, and scalar files.
children.desTs: 写入EnSight几何、速度和纯量文件。

children.des: Writes an EnSight DVS file for the specified volumes, surfaces, and quantities.                Note that the face zones adjacent to selected cell zones are automatically selected                for export, even if they are not specified in the face zone list. This text command                is only available when using the Fluent native GPU solver.
children.desTs: 为指定的体积、表面和数量写入EnSight DVS文件。请注意，与选定单元区域相邻的面区域将自动选择                用于输出，即使它们没有在面部区域列表中指定。此文本命令                仅在使用Fluent原生图形求解器时可用。

children.des: Writes an EnSight DVS file for the specified volumes, surfaces, and                quantities.
children.desTs: 为指定体积、表面和写入EnSight DVS文件                是介于

children.des: Writes an EnSight DVS file for the specified surfaces and quantities.

children.des: Writes an EnSight DVS file for the specified volumes and quantities.

children.desTs: 将单元格区域的EnSight Gold几何体、速度和标量文件写入                适合EnSight Enterprise的并行格式。

children.des: Enabled by default, this setting ensures the cellSize property is reported                      according to CGNS expectations when only the mesh is exported. Some                      third-party software, such as Tecplot, may require that the cellSize be                      reported differently. In such cases, disable this setting.
children.desTs: 默认启用时，此设置可确保报告cellSize属性                      根据CGNS的预期，当仅输出网格时。一些                      第三方软件（例如Tecplot）可能要求cellSize为                      报告不同。在这种情况下，请禁用此设置。

children.des: Controls whether or not family names (FamilyName_t) are exported to                      CGNS.
children.desTs: 控制是否将姓氏（FamilyName_t）输出到                      CGNS。

children.des: Controls whether multiple CGNS NGON_n's are merged into a single                      NGON_n.
children.desTs: 控制是否将多个CGNS NGON_n合并为一个                      NGON_n.

children.des: Controls the type of mesh exported by CGNS. You can choose whether the                      mesh is mixed (default), its native format, or polyhedral (NGON_n +                      NFACE_n).
children.desTs: 控制CGNS输出的网格类型。您可以选择是否                      网格是混合（默认）、其原生格式或多边形（NGON_n +                      NFACE_n）。

children.des: Controls the number of CPU cores that are used to export CGNS Polyhedral                      elements.
children.desTs: 控制用于输出CGNS多边形的中央处理器核数                      元素

children.des: Controls whether Fluent exports separate CGNS zone_t for each cell                      zone.
children.desTs: 控制Fluent是否为每个单元格输出单独的CGNS zone_t                      区

children.des: Specifies whether the mesh is exported in the ADF or HDF5 file                      type.
children.desTs: 指定是否将网格输出到ADF或HDF5文件中                      类型.

children.des: enables/disables automatically writing a .scp                      every time a case file is written.

children.des: Reads a CFX definition file as a case file.

children.desTs: 将EnSight文件作为案例文件读取。

children.desTs: 进入导入FMU文件菜单。

children.desTs: 将FMU变量与Fluent输出参数链接起来。

children.des: Imports an FMU file.
children.desTs: 导入FMU文件。

children.des: Allows you to select FMU local variables to be monitored during the                      calculation.
children.desTs: 允许您选择要在                      计算.

children.des: Allows you to select FMU parameter variables and change their                      values.
children.desTs: 允许您选择FMU参数变量并更改其                      价值观

contents.desTs: 将数据内插到另一个网格/从另一个网格内插数据。

children.desTs: 写入用于插值的数据。

children.des: Defines a list of cell zone IDs. If specified, interpolation data will be read/written for                these cell zones only.
children.desTs: 定义单元区ID列表。如果指定，将读取/写入插值数据                仅限这些细胞区。

contents.des: Reads a case file.
contents.desTs: 阅读案件档案。

contents.des: Reads a case and a data file.
contents.desTs: 读取案例和数据文件。

contents.des: Prints a summary of the properties of a case file in the Common Fluids Format (with          the .cas.h5 extension) in the console, which you can review prior          to reading the file. The summary includes the Fluent version that last saved the case,          case precision and dimension, and the total number of cells, faces, and nodes.
contents.desTs: 以Common Fluids格式打印案例文件的属性摘要（使用          . cas.h5扩展名），您可以在之前查看          阅读文件。摘要包括上次保存案例的Fluent版本、案例精度和维度以及单元格、面和节点的总数。

contents.des: Reads the lightweight data of a mesh or case file in the Common Fluids Format (with          the .msh.h5 or .cas.h5 extension,          respectively), that is, only the case settings of the file without any of the data          associated with the mesh. When setting up a case with a large cell count, this allows you          to review and/or modify the settings without having to wait for the reading of the mesh,          on a machine that does not have the memory needed for the mesh (such as a personal          computer or laptop).
contents.desTs: 以Common Fluids格式读取网格或案例文件的轻量级数据（带有          分别为.msh.h5或.cas.h5扩展名），即仅包含文件的大小写设置，没有任何数据          与网格关联。当设置具有较大单元格计数的案例时，这允许您          在不具有网格所需内存的机器（例如个人）上审查和/或修改设置，而不必等待网格的读取          计算机或笔记本电脑）。

contents.des: Reads a data file.
contents.desTs: 读取数据文件。

contents.des: Reads custom field function definitions from a file.
contents.desTs: 从文件中读取自定义字段函数定义。

contents.des: Reads all DPM injections from a file.
contents.desTs: 从文件中读取所有收件箱注入。

contents.des: Reads ISAT Table.
contents.desTs: 读取ISAT表。

contents.des: Reads command input from one or more files.
contents.desTs: 从一个或多个文件读取命令输入。

contents.des: Reads macro definitions from a file.
contents.desTs: 从文件中读取宏定义。

contents.des: Reads a PDF file.
contents.desTs: 读取PDF文件。

contents.des: Reads boundary profile data.
contents.desTs: 读取边界轮廓数据。

contents.des: Reads a ray file.
contents.desTs: 读取射线文件。

contents.des: Reads and sets boundary conditions from a specified file.
contents.desTs: 从指定文件读取并设置边界条件。

contents.des: Reads surface clusters from a file.
contents.desTs: 从文件中读取表面簇。

contents.des: Reads table of transient boundary profile data.
contents.desTs: 读取瞬时边界轮廓数据表。

contents.des: Reads view factors from a file.
contents.desTs: 从文件中读取视图因子。

contents.des: Discards any changes in the current Ansys Fluent in Workbench sessionand removes any corresponding data from the Solution cell. This command is only available when running Ansys Fluent in Workbench.
contents.desTs: 在收件箱会话中放弃当前Ansys Fluent中的任何更改，并从解决方案单元格中删除任何相应的数据。此命令仅在收件箱中运行Ansys Fluent时可用。

contents.des: Replaces the mesh with a new one while preserving settings.
contents.desTs: 用新网格替换网格，同时保留设置。

contents.des: Sets the batch options.
contents.desTs: 设置批处理选项。

contents.des: Specifies whether to abort a journal replay on encountering an invalid command. By          default, this option is enabled.
contents.desTs: 指定遇到无效命令时是否中止日记重播。通过          默认情况下，此选项处于启用状态。

contents.des: Allows you to set an idle timeout so that an idle Ansys Fluent session will automatically          save and close after the specified time.
contents.desTs: 允许您设置空闲超时，以便空闲的Ansys Fluent会话将自动          在指定时间后保存并关闭。

contents.des: Specifies which reference frame is used when you write a profile using the            file/write-profile text command.
contents.desTs: 指定当使用编写配置文件时使用哪个参考系            file/write-Profile文本命令。

contents.des: Allows you to improve backwards compatibility for journal files. This command hides          any new TUI prompts that are added at a future release of Ansys Fluent and reverts to the          arguments of the release that you specify using the command (within two full releases of          the current release). The command is automatically added to a journal file as soon as you          start the recording.
contents.desTs: 允许您提高日记文件的向后兼容性。此命令隐藏          在Ansys Fluent的未来版本中添加并恢复到          使用命令指定的版本参数（在的两个完整版本内          当前版本）。一旦您使用，该命令就会自动添加到日记文件中          开始录音。

contents.des: Displays current release and version information.
contents.desTs: 显示当前版本和版本信息。

contents.des: Specifies whether the nodal coordinates should be written in single precision (rather than          the default double precision). This text command is only available in the single-precision          version of Ansys Fluent.
contents.desTs: 指定是否应以单精度（而不是          默认双精度）。此文本命令仅在单精度          使用Ansys Fluent。

contents.des: Enters the solution files menu.
contents.desTs: 进入解决方案文件菜单。

children.des: Deletes solution files.
children.desTs: 卸载解决方案文件。

children.des: Loads a solution file.
children.desTs: 加载解决方案文件。

children.des: Prints a list of available solution files.
children.desTs: 打印可用解决方案文件的列表。

contents.des: Starts recording all input in a file. Note that commands entered using paths from older          versions of Fluent will be upgraded to their current path in the journal file.
contents.desTs: 开始记录文件中的所有输入。请注意，使用旧路径输入的命令          Fluent版本将升级到日记文件中的当前路径。

contents.des: Starts recording input and output in a file.
contents.desTs: 开始在文件中记录输入和输出。

contents.des: Stops recording input and closes journal file.
contents.desTs: 停止记录输入并关闭日记文件。

contents.des: Stops recording input to a macro.
contents.desTs: 停止记录宏的输入。

contents.des: Stops recording input and output and closes transcript file.
contents.desTs: 停止记录输入和输出并关闭转录文件。

contents.des: Directly updates Workbench with the most recent Fluent changes. This command is only          available when running Ansys Fluent in Workbench.
contents.desTs: 使用最新的Fluent更改直接更新收件箱。此命令仅          在收件箱中运行Ansys Fluent时可用。

contents.des: Enters the table file manager menu.
contents.desTs: 进入表文件管理器菜单。

children.des: Deletes a table from local storage.
children.desTs: 从本地存储中删除表。

children.des: Lists the data of a “matrix” type locally-stored table.
children.desTs: 列出“矩阵”类型本地存储表的数据。

children.des: Lists the properties of a locally-stored table.
children.desTs: 列出本地存储表的属性。

children.des: Lists all locally-stored tables.
children.desTs: 列出所有本地存储的表。

children.des: Imports a “matrix” type table from a file into local storage.
children.desTs: 将“矩阵”类型表从文件导入本地存储。

children.des: Imports a set of Real Gas Property (RGP) tables from a file into local                storage.
children.desTs: 将一组Real Gas Property（RGP）表从文件导入本地                存储.

children.des: Renames a locally-stored table.
children.desTs: 重命名本地存储的表。

children.des: Sets the persistence mode for RGP tables (embedded in case file or rely on                external file).
children.desTs: 设置RGP表的持久性模式（嵌入案例文件或依赖                外部文件）。

contents.des: Enters the transient export menu, where you can manage definitions for the automatic          exporting of data during the calculation.
contents.desTs: 进入暂时输出菜单，您可以在其中管理自动          计算期间数据的输出。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more ABAQUS files during the                calculation.
children.desTs: 添加在期间自动输出一个或多个SBA文件的定义                计算.

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more ASCII files during the                calculation.
children.desTs: 添加在期间自动输出一个或多个ASC文件的定义                计算.

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more data files that are                compatible with CFD-Post and EnSight (that is, .cdat and                .cst files).
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一个或多个数据文件的定义                与CFD-Post和EnSight兼容（即.CDat和                .cst文件）。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more CGNS files during the                calculation.
children.desTs: 添加在期间自动输出一个或多个CGNS文件的定义                计算.

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more Common Fluids                Format - Post files during the calculation.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一种或多种常见液体的定义                格式-计算期间发布文件。

children.des: Deletes an automatic export definition.
children.desTs: 验证自动输出定义。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more IBM Data Explorer format files                during the calculation.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一个或多个IBM Data Explorer格式文件的定义                在计算过程中。

children.des: Edits an automatic export definition.
children.desTs: 编辑自动输出定义。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more EnSight DVS files                for the specified volumes, surfaces, and quantities.
