Note that the face zones                adjacent to selected cell zones are automatically selected for export, even if they                are not specified in the face zone list. This text command is only available when                using the Fluent native GPU solver.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一个或多个EnSight DVS文件的定义                对于指定的体积、表面和数量。请注意，面区域                与所选单元区域相邻的区域会自动选择进行输出，即使它们                未在面部区域列表中指定。此文本命令仅在以下情况下可用                使用Fluent原生图形处理器。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more EnSight DVS files                for the specified volumes, surfaces, and quantities.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一个或多个EnSight DVS文件的定义                针对指定的体积、表面和数量。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more EnSight DVS files                for the specified surfaces and quantities.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一个或多个EnSight DVS文件的定义                对于指定的表面和数量。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more EnSight DVS files                for the specified volumes and quantities.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一个或多个EnSight DVS文件的定义                对于指定的体积和数量。

children.des: Writes EnSight Gold files using Ansys Fluent case files.
children.desTs: 使用Ansys Fluent案例文件写入EnSight Gold文件。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of EnSight Gold geometry,                velocity, and scalar files for surfaces in a parallel format suitable for EnSight                Enterprise.
children.desTs: 添加以适合EnSight的并行格式自动输出EnSight Gold几何、速度和表面的纯量文件的定义                企业.

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of EnSight Gold geometry,                velocity, and scalar files for cell zones in a parallel format suitable for EnSight                Enterprise.
children.desTs: 添加以适合EnSight的并行格式自动输出单元区域的EnSight Gold几何、速度和纯量文件的定义                企业.

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of EnSight Gold geometry,                velocity, and scalar files.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出EnSight Gold几何体、速度和纯量文件的定义。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more FAST/Plot3D unstructured mesh                velocity scalar files during the calculation.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一个或多个Fast/Plot 3D非结构化网格的定义                计算期间的速度纯量文件。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more FAST/Plot3D unstructured                solution files during the calculation.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一个或多个Fast/Plot 3D非结构化的定义                计算过程中的解决方案文件。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more FIELDVIEW unstructured combined                files during the calculation.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一个或多个FIELDVIEW非结构化组合的定义                计算期间的文件。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more FIELDVIEW                unstructured results only files during the calculation.
children.desTs: 添加用于自动导出一个或多个FIELDVIEW的定义                在计算过程中，非结构化结果仅文件。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more FIELDVIEW unstructured mesh only                files during the calculation.
children.desTs: 仅添加用于自动输出一个或多个FIELDVIEW非结构化网格的定义                计算期间的文件。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more FIELDVIEW unstructured combined                files for surfaces.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一个或多个FIELDVIEW非结构化组合的定义                表面的文件。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more Mechanical APDL input files during the                calculation.
children.desTs: 添加在期间自动输出一个或多个Mechanical APDL输入文件的定义                计算.

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more NASTRAN files during the                calculation.
children.desTs: 添加在期间自动输出一个或多个NASTRAN文件的定义                计算.

children.des: Sets up an automatic particle-history data export.
children.desTs: 设置自动粒子历史数据导出。

children.des: Enters the automatic export settings menu.
children.desTs: 进入自动输出设置菜单。

children.des: Specifies when case files are written with the                      .cdat and .cst files                      exported for Ansys CFD-Post. Note that this setting is ignored if the                      Write Case File Every Time option is enabled in the                      Automatic Export dialog box, which is always the case                      starting in Release 2021 R1.
children.desTs: 指定何时使用                      .CDat和.CST文件                      为Ansys CFD-Post输出。请注意，如果                      中启用了“每次写入案例文件”选项                      自动输出对话框，始终是这种情况                      从2021年R1版本开始。

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more TAITherm files during the                calculation.
children.desTs: 添加在期间自动输出一个或多个TAISTherm文件的定义                计算.

children.des: Adds a definition for the automatic exporting of one or more Tecplot files                during the calculation.
children.desTs: 添加自动输出一个或多个Tecplot文件的定义                在计算过程中。

contents.des: Writes the boundary mesh to a file.
contents.desTs: 将边界网格写入文件。

contents.des: Writes a case file.
contents.desTs: 编写案件档案。

contents.des: Writes a case and a data file.
contents.desTs: 写入案例和数据文件。

contents.des: Writes a circumferential-averaged profile for an axial or radial turbomachine.
contents.desTs: 为轴向或辐射式涡轮机写入周向平均轮廓。

contents.des: Writes the cleanup-script-file for Ansys Fluent.
contents.desTs: 为Ansys Fluent写入清理脚本文件。

contents.des: Writes a data file.
contents.desTs: 写入数据文件。

contents.des: Computes radial profiles for a fan zone and writes them to a profile file.
contents.desTs: 计算风扇区的辐射轮廓并将其写入轮廓文件。

contents.des: Writes the currently defined custom field functions to a file.
contents.desTs: 将当前定义的自定义字段函数写入文件。

contents.des: Writes a flamelet file.
contents.desTs: 写入Flamelet文件。

contents.des: Writes out selected DPM injections to a file.
contents.desTs: 将选定的收件箱注入写入文件。

contents.des: Writes ISAT Table.
contents.desTs: 写入ISAT表。

contents.des: Writes the currently defined macros to a file.
contents.desTs: 将当前定义的宏写入文件。

contents.des: Writes a .csv file with the selected surfaces consolidated into one set of data          points.
contents.desTs: 写入将选定表面合并到一组数据中的.CSV文件          点

contents.des: Enables / disables the attempt to save            .pdat files. Note that this text command is no longer          supported.
contents.desTs: 启用/禁用保存尝试            .pdat文件。请注意，此文本命令不再是          supported.

contents.des: Writes a pdf file.
contents.desTs: 写入pdf文件。

contents.des: Writes surface data as a boundary profile file.
contents.desTs: 将曲面数据作为边界纵断面文件写入。

contents.des: Writes out the specified profiles that are defined in the current case.
contents.desTs: 写出当前案例中定义的指定配置文件。

contents.des: Writes out current boundary conditions in use.
contents.desTs: 写出当前使用的边界条件。

list.des: commands used to input and output your data.
list.desTs: 用于输入和输出数据的命令。

contents.des: Enters the mesh adaption menu.
contents.desTs: 进入网格适应菜单。

children.des: Performs manual adaption on the mesh                according to the methods and settings that you specified.
children.desTs: 对网格执行手动调整                根据您指定的方法和设置。

children.des: Enters the cell registers menu.
children.desTs: 进入单元格寄存器菜单。

children.des: Creates a new cell register.
children.desTs: 创建新的单元格寄存器。

children.des: Performs manual adaption to coarsen the mesh based on a specified cell                      register.
children.desTs: 根据指定单元执行手动调整以粗化网格                      注册.

children.des: Deletes a cell register.
children.desTs: 删除单元格寄存器。

children.des: Displays a cell register.
children.desTs: 显示单元寄存器。

children.des: Allows you to edit an existing cell register. After you enter the name of                      the cell register, you can specify the following parameters:
children.desTs: 允许您编辑现有的单元格寄存器。输入名称后                      单元格寄存器中，您可以指定以下参数：

children.des: Sets the following display options for cell registers:
children.desTs: 为单元格寄存器设置以下显示选项：

children.des: Sets the color for the wireframe or marker for the                                  cells.
children.desTs: 设置线框或标记的颜色                                  细胞

children.des: Enables / disables the drawing of the mesh with the cell                                  register display.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用使用单元格绘制网格                                  寄存器显示。

children.des: Enables/disables the solid shading of the cell                                  wireframe.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用单元格的实体着色                                  线框。

children.des: Sets the size of the cell marker. A symbol of size 1.0 is 3.0%                                  of the height of the display screen.
children.desTs: 设置单元格标记的大小。大小为1.0的符号为3.0%                                  显示屏的高度。

children.des: Sets the symbol used to mark the cells.
children.desTs: 设置用于标记单元格的符号。

children.des: Enables/disables the display of the cell marker.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用单元格标记的显示。

children.des: Specifies the name of the cell register.
children.desTs: 指定单元格寄存器的名称。

children.des: Specifies the cell register. You can select from the following                            options:
children.desTs: 指定单元格寄存器。您可以从以下内容中进行选择                            选项：

children.des: Specifies the cell register region as a hexahedron                                  (quadrilateral in 2D). For this option, you need to enter the                                  following data (see  Setting Up a Region Cell     Register in the Fluent User's Guide for more information):
children.desTs: 将单元格寄存器区域指定为六边形                                  （2D中的四方形）。对于此选项，您需要输入                                  以下数据（请参阅设置区域单元格     请在Fluent用户指南中注册以获取更多信息）：

children.des: Specifies the cell register region as a sphere (circle in 2D).                                  For this option, you need to enter the following data (see  Setting Up a Region Cell     Register in the Fluent User's Guide for more information):
children.desTs: 将单元格寄存器区域指定为球体（2D中的圆形）。对于此选项，您需要输入以下数据（请参阅设置区域单元格     请在Fluent用户指南中注册以获取更多信息）：

children.des: Specifies the cell register region as a cylinder (rectangle in                                  2D). For this option, you need to enter the following data (see                                     Setting Up a Region Cell     Register in the Fluent User's Guide for more information):
children.desTs: 将单元寄存器区域指定为圆柱体（                                  对于此选项，您需要输入以下数据（请参见                                     设置区域单元格     请在Fluent用户指南中注册以获取更多信息）：

children.des: Allows you to mark cells within the proximity of a boundary.                                  The following options are available (for more information, see                                    Boundary in the Fluent User's Guide):
children.desTs: 允许您标记边界附近的单元格。以下选项可用（有关详细信息，请参阅                                    边界在流利的用户指南）：

children.des: Allows you to mark the cells that have reached a solution                                  limit while solving. You can specify the variable that can be                                  saved for marking cells during the solution process.
children.desTs: 允许您标记已达到解决方案的细胞                                  求解时的限制。您可以指定可以的变量                                  保存用于在溶液过程中标记细胞。

children.des: Allows you to mark cells based on the value of a field                                  variable. You can use the following options.
children.desTs: 允许您根据字段的值标记单元格                                  变量。您可以使用以下选项。

children.des: Allows you to mark cells based on their residuals values. You                                  can visualize the cells with the highest residual values and know                                  their location. You can use the following options:
children.desTs: 允许您根据残差值标记单元格。您可以                                  可以可视化具有最高残差值的单元格，                                  您可以使用以下选项：

children.des: Allows you to mark cells based on the volume of the cells,                                  either the volume magnitude (the minimum size of the cells) or the                                  volume change (the change in volume of the cells).
children.desTs: 允许您根据单元格的体积标记单元格，无论是体积大小（单元格的最小大小）还是                                  体积变化（细胞体积的变化）。

children.des: Lists all of the currently defined cell                                                  registers.
children.desTs: 列出所有当前定义的单元格                                                  登记册。

children.des: Lists the properties of a cell                                                  register.
children.desTs: 列出单元格的属性                                                  注册.

children.des: Performs manual adaption to refine the mesh                      based on a specified cell register.
children.desTs: 执行手动调整以细化网格                      基于指定的单元寄存器。

children.des: Displays the cells that are marked for                                                  adaption in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 显示标记的单元格                                                  在图形窗口中进行调整。

children.des: Deletes the defined adaption                                                  hierarchy.
children.desTs: 初始化定义的适应                                                  等级制度。

children.des: Enters the geometry menu.
children.desTs: 进入几何菜单。

children.des: Enters the manage menu, where you can manage the pairings of wall zones                      with auxiliary geometry definitions as part of geometry-based adaption. This                      text command menu is only available when using the PUMA adaption method, when                      the mesh/adapt/geometry/reconstruct-geometry text                      command is enabled.
children.desTs: 进入管理菜单，您可以在其中管理墙区域的配对                      作为基于几何的适应的一部分，辅助几何定义。这                      文本命令菜单仅在使用DeliverA适应方法时可用，当                      网格/适应/几何/重建-几何文本                      命令已启用。

children.des: Adds a new pairing of a wall zone with the auxiliary geometry                            definition to which you want it to conform as it undergoes adaption.                            After you enter the name of the wall zone, you can define the                            following:
children.desTs: 添加墙区域与辅助几何图形的新配对                            您希望其在适应时符合的定义。输入墙区域的名称后，您可以定义                            以下：

children.des: Deletes a pairing of a wall zone with an auxiliary geometry                            definition that was previously defined for geometry-based                            adaption.
children.desTs: 指定墙区域与辅助几何图形的配对                            之前为基于几何定义的定义                            适应

children.des: Edits a pairing of a wall zone and an auxiliary geometry definition.                            After you enter the name of the wall zone, you can define the                            following:
children.desTs: 编辑墙分区和辅助几何图形定义的配对。输入墙分区的名称后，可以定义                            以下：

children.des: Lists all of the pairings of wall zones with auxiliary geometry                            definitions that are defined for geometry-based adaption.
children.desTs: 列出墙分区与辅助几何图形的所有配对                            为基于几何的自适应定义。

children.des: Lists the geometry-based adaption settings that are defined for a                            specific wall zone.
children.desTs: 列出为定义的基于几何的适应设置                            特定的墙壁区域。

children.des: Enables / disables geometry-based adaption.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用基于几何的自适应。

children.des: Sets geometry controls for wall zones. This text                      command is only available when using the hanging node adaption method.
children.desTs: 设置墙区域的几何控件。此文本                      该命令仅在使用挂点适配方法时可用。

children.des: Prints the number of cells marked for                                                  refinement, coarsening, and both to the                                                  console.
children.desTs: 打印标记的单元格数                                                  细化、粗化，两者兼而有之                                                  console.

children.des: Enters the manage criteria menu, which provides text commands for managing                automatic adaption criteria.
children.desTs: 进入管理条件菜单，该菜单提供用于管理的文本命令                自动适应标准。

children.des: Adds a new automatic adaption criterion.
children.desTs: 添加新的自动适应标准。

children.des: Deletes an existing automatic adaption criterion.
children.desTs: 初始化现有的自动适应标准。

children.des: Edits an existing automatic adaption criterion.
children.desTs: 编辑现有的自动适应标准。

children.des: Lists all the existing automatic adaption criteria.
children.desTs: 列出所有现有的自动调整标准。

children.des: Lists the properties of an existing automatic adaption criterion.
children.desTs: 列出现有自动适应条件的属性。

children.des: Allows you to define the coarsening criterion for manual adaption by entering an                expression or the name of an existing named expression or cell register.
children.desTs: 允许您通过输入                运算式或现有命名运算式或单元格寄存器的名称。

children.des: Allows you to define the refinement criterion for manual adaption by entering an                expression or the name of an existing named expression or cell register.
children.desTs: 允许您通过输入                运算式或现有命名运算式或单元格寄存器的名称。

children.des: Enters the predefined-criteria menu, which allows you to select commonly used                criteria for adapting the mesh.
children.desTs: 进入预定义条件菜单，允许您选择常用的                调整网格的标准。

children.des: Enters the aerodynamics menu, which provides text commands that create                      cell registers and define adaption criteria that can be useful for aerodynamic                      simulations.
children.desTs: 进入空气动力学菜单，该菜单提供创建的文本命令                      单元注册并定义对空气动力学有用的适应标准                      模拟。

children.des: Enters the error-based menu, which provides text commands that                            create cell registers and define adaption criteria based on the solution                            error.
children.desTs: 进入基于错误的菜单，该菜单提供文本命令，                            创建单元寄存器并根据解决方案定义适配标准                            错误.

children.des: Creates cell registers and defines an adaption criterion based                                  on an error indicator that includes the Hessian of several flow                                  fields (pressure, temperature, velocity, density, and turbulence,                                  when each is applicable). It is suitable for use across a range of                                  Mach numbers, and can target key areas for adaption in cases with                                  a variety of different scales and flow phenomena.
children.desTs: 创建单元格寄存器并定义基于                                  在包括几个流的黑森的错误指示器上                                  场（压力、温度、速度、密度和湍流，如果每种都适用）。它适合在一系列范围内使用                                  马赫数，并且可以针对关键区域进行调整                                  各种不同的尺度和流动现象。

children.des: Creates cell registers and defines an adaption criterion based                                  on an error indicator that includes the Hessian of the Mach                                  number. It targets adaption for a wider range of Mach number flows                                  compared to the                                  pressure-hessian-indicator, while being                                  based on only a single scalar value for the input field, in                                  contrast to the multiple flow fields used in the                                  combined-hessian-indicator. The                                  mach-hessian-indicator text command is                                  only available if the density of the fluid material is defined                                  using the ideal gas law or a real gas model.
children.desTs: 创建单元格寄存器并定义基于                                  错误指示器上包括马赫黑森                                  数量。它的目标是适应更广泛的马赫数流量范围                                  相比                                  压力指标，同时                                  仅基于输入字段的单个纯量值，在                                  与中使用的多个流场相比，                                  combined-hessian-indicator.The                                  mach-hessian-indicator文本命令是                                  仅在定义了流体材料的密度时才可用                                  使用理想气体定律或真实气体模型。

children.des: Creates cell registers and defines an adaption criterion based                                  on a pressure Hessian indicator, which is suitable for simulations                                  that have significant pressure variations.
children.desTs: 创建单元格寄存器并定义基于                                  适用于模拟的压力Hessian指标                                  压力变化很大。

children.des: Enters the shock indicator menu, which provides text commands that                            create cell registers and define adaption criteria that can be useful                            for simulations with shocks.
children.desTs: 进入电击指示器菜单，该菜单提供文本命令，                            创建单元寄存器并定义可能有用的适应标准                            用于模拟冲击。

children.des: Creates cell registers and defines an adaption criterion that                                  is suitable for simulations with shocks that use the density-based                                  solver or the pressure-based solver with a fluid that uses a                                  real-gas or ideal-gas model for the density.
children.desTs: 创建单元格寄存器并定义自适应标准，                                  适合使用基于密度的冲击模拟                                  解算器或基于压力的解算器，具有使用                                  密度的真实气体或理想气体模型。

children.des: Enters the boundary layer menu, which provides text commands that create                      the necessary cell registers for refinement and define adaption criteria for                      the manual adaption of boundary layers.
children.desTs: 进入边界层菜单，该菜单提供创建的文本命令                      必要的单元注册以进行细化并定义适应标准                      边界层的手动调整。

children.des: Creates a cell register and adaption settings                            suitable for the manual adaption of a boundary layer. Prismatic adaption                            is used where possible (so that the cells are only split along certain                            directions) and is based on a cell's proximity to one or more                            boundaries.
children.desTs: 创建单元格寄存器和适应设置                            适合边界层的手动调整。棱镜调整                            尽可能使用（以便细胞仅沿着某些                            方向）并且基于细胞与一个或多个                            边界

children.des: Enters the combustion menu, which provides text commands that create named                      expressions and cell registers and define adaption criteria that can be useful                      for combustion simulations.
children.desTs: 进入燃烧菜单，该菜单提供创建名为                      表达和单元格寄存器并定义可能有用的适应标准                      用于燃烧模拟。

children.des: Creates named expressions and cell registers and defines adaption                            criteria that are suitable for combustion simulations, so that the mesh                            is refined along a progressing flame front using various criteria like                            temperature, vorticity, species, and DPM concentration (depending on                            which models are used). There is also an option for refining a spherical                            spark region prior to a transient run, which after a specified time is                            then coarsened back to the original mesh.
children.desTs: 创建命名运算式和单元格寄存器并定义自适应                            适合燃烧模拟的标准，以便网格                            使用各种标准沿着前进的火焰锋面进行细化，例如                            温度、涡旋度、物种和蚯蚓浓度（取决于                            使用哪些型号）。还有一个用于细化球形的选项                            瞬时运行之前的火花区域，在指定时间后为                            然后粗化回原始网格。

children.des: Enters the multiphase menu, which provides text                      commands that create named expressions and cell registers and define adaption                      criteria that can be useful for Volume of Fluid (VOF) simulations.
children.desTs: 进入提供文本的多相菜单                      创建命名运算式和单元格寄存器并定义自适应的命令                      可用于流体体积（VOF）模拟的标准。

children.des: Creates a named expression and cell                            registers, and defines adaption settings that are suitable for standard                            Volume of Fluid (VOF) simulations.
children.desTs: 创建已命名的运算式和单元格                            注册并定义适合标准的适应设置                            流体体积（VOF）模拟。

children.des: Sets up adaption that is suitable when using                            the VOF-to-DPM model transition mechanism; the resulting adaption                            criteria will be defined by complex expressions that draw upon cell                            registers, as well as parameters that you will need to define.
children.desTs: 设置适合使用时的适配                            VOF到RST模型转换机制;由此产生的适应                            标准将由利用单元格的复杂表达来定义                            寄存器以及您需要定义的参数。

children.des: Sets up adaption that is suitable when using                            the VOF-to-DPM model transition mechanism; the resulting adaption                            criteria will be defined by a named expression and cell registers that                            are fairly straightforward, as well as parameters that you will need to                            define.
children.desTs: 设置适合使用时的适配                            VOF到RST模型转换机制;由此产生的适应                            标准将由命名的表达和单元格寄存器定义，                            相当简单，以及您需要的参数                            定义。

children.des: Creates adaption settings suitable for the automatic adaption of overset                      meshes during the calculation, to remove orphans, reduce size mismatches                      between donor and receptor cells, and/or increase the mesh resolution in gaps                      as needed (in order to prevent the creation of orphan cells). For 2D and 3D                      cases, anisotropic refinement is used by default for suitable prismatic cells                      adapted as part of overset orphan adaption and/or overset gap adaption, in                      order to produce cells that have a lower aspect ratio and/or a mesh resolution                      that is suitable for boundary layers near walls, respectively.
children.desTs: 创建适合自动调整重叠的调整设置                      计算过程中网格，删除孤立子，减少大小不匹配                      供体细胞和受体细胞之间，和/或增加间隙中的网格分辨率                      根据需要（为了防止孤儿细胞的产生）。适用于2D和3D                      在某些情况下，默认情况下，对合适的棱柱体像元使用各向异性细化                      适配为溢出孤儿适配和/或溢出间隙适配的一部分，                      为了产生具有较低纵横比和/或网格分辨率的单元                      分别适用于壁面附近的边界层。

children.des: Enters the profile menu.
children.desTs: 进入个人资料菜单。

children.des: Clears the adaption profiling counters.
children.desTs: 清除自适应分析计数器。

children.des: Disables adaption profiling.
children.desTs: 禁用适应分析。

children.des: Enables adaption profiling.
children.desTs: 启用适应分析。

children.des: Prints adaption profiling results.
children.desTs: 打印适应分析结果。

children.des: Enters the set menu.
children.desTs: 进入设置菜单。

children.des: Allows you to specify additional refinement layers                      (this is an advanced control that is applied globally).
children.desTs: 允许您指定其他细化层                      (this是全球应用的高级控制）。

children.des: Sets cell zones to be                                                  used for marking adaption. An empty list specifies                                                  that all zones are considered for adaption.
children.desTs: 将单元格区域设置为                                                  用于标记适应。空列表指定                                                  所有区域都被考虑进行调整。

children.des: Sets the graphics display options for the                                                  refinement, coarsening, and common cells.
children.desTs: 设置的图形显示选项                                                  细化、粗化和常见细胞。

children.des: Enables / disables the encapsulation of child cells                      of a refined parent within its respective partition in parallel when using the                      PUMA method. By default this encapsulation is disabled, in order to improve                      the load balance of cells across partitions (particularly for higher levels                      for refinement). Note that when encapsulation is enabled, prismatic adaption                      is not permitted.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用子单元格的封装                      方法时，                      方法。默认情况下，此封装是禁用的，以提高                      跨分区的单元的负载平衡（特别是对于更高级别                      用于细化）。请注意，当启用封装时，棱镜自适应                      是不允许的。

children.des: Sets an approximate limit to the total cell count of the mesh during                      adaption. Fluent uses this value to determine when to stop marking cells for                      refinement. A value of zero places no limits on the number of cells.
children.desTs: 设置期间网格总单元数的大致限制                      adaption。Fluent使用此值来确定何时停止标记单元格                      细化。零值不会限制单元格的数量。

children.des: Controls the number of levels of refinement                                                  used to split cells during the adaption.
children.desTs: 控制优化的级别数                                                  用于在适应过程中分裂细胞。

children.des: Sets the adaption method.
children.desTs: 设置适应方法。

children.des: Sets the minimum value allowed for the orthogonal quality of cells during                      adaption. If your solution diverges, you may find that using a higher minimum                      quality value resolves the issue. This text command is only available with the                      PUMA adaption method.
children.desTs: 设置期间允许的像元垂直质量的最小值                      适应。如果您的解决方案存在分歧，您可能会发现使用更高的最低限度                      质量值解决了问题。此文本命令仅适用于                      一种适应方法。

children.des: sets an approximate limit to the edge length for cells that are considered                      for refinement. Even if a cell is marked for refinement, it will not be                      refined if (for 3D) its volume is less than the cube of this field or (for 2D)                      its area is less than the square of this field. The default value of zero                      places no limits on the size of cells that are refined.
children.desTs: 为所考虑的像元设置边长度的大致限制                      用于细化。即使单元格被标记为细化，它也不会被                      如果（对于3D）其体积小于该字段的立方体或（对于2D），则进行细化                      其面积小于该字段的平方。默认值为零                      对细化的单元格的大小没有限制。

children.des: Enables/disables the adaption of dead cells in overset meshes.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用重叠网格中死单元格的适应。

children.des: Enables / disables anisotropic adaption for prismatic cells as part of                      manual adaption. Note that this text command requires that the adaption method                      is set to PUMA.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用棱镜单元的各向异性自适应，作为                      手动自适应。请注意，此文本命令要求自适应方法                      被设置为A。

children.des: Allows you to select the boundary zones that specify directions for                      anisotropic refinement on prismatic cells with the PUMA method.
children.desTs: 允许您选择指定方向的边界区域                      用CLARA方法对棱镜单元进行各向异性细化。

children.des: Sets the split ratio for the cells as part of anisotropic refinement  on                      prismatic cells with the PUMA method.
children.desTs: 作为各向异性细化的一部分，设置单元格的分割比                      采用CLARA方法的方形细胞。

children.des: Allows you set how much information about                                                  the adaption is printed to the console.
children.desTs: 允许您设置有关的信息                                                  适配将打印到控制台。

contents.des: Views and renames face zones adjacent to selected cell                                        zones.
contents.desTs: 查看和重命名与选定单元相邻的面区域                                        区界限

contents.des: Performs various mesh consistency checks and displays a report in the console that lists the     domain extents, the volume statistics, the face area statistics, and any warnings, as well as     details about the various checks and mesh failures (depending on the setting specified for      mesh/check-verbosity).
contents.desTs: 执行各种网格一致性检查，并在控制台中显示一个报告，其中列出     域范围、体积统计信息、面面积统计信息和任何警告，以及     有关各种检查和网格故障的详细信息（取决于为      mesh/check-verbosity）。

contents.des: The default value for mesh/check-before-solve is          “no”. If mesh/check-before-solve is set to          “yes”, a mesh check operation will be invoked prior to starting solver. If          grid check fails, solver will be interrupted, and relevant information will be printed in          the Fluent console.
contents.desTs: 网格/求解前检查的默认值为          “否”。如果网格/求解前检查设置为          “是”，在启动求解器之前将调用网格检查操作。如果          网格检查失败，求解器将被中断，相关信息将打印在          流畅的控制台。

contents.des: Sets the level of details that will be added to the mesh check report generated by          mesh/check. A value of 0 (the default) notes when checks are          being performed, but does not list them individually. A value of 1 lists the individual          checks as they are performed. A value of 2 enables the availability of additional mesh          field variables, lists the individual checks as they are performed, and lists up to 100          messages that provide additional details (for example, the location of the problem, the          affected cells). A value of 3 enables the availability of additional mesh field variables,          lists the individual checks as they are performed, and lists unlimited messages that          provide additional details (for example, the location of the problem, the affected          cells).
contents.desTs: 设置将添加到由生成的网格检查报告中的详细信息级别          mesh/check.0值（默认）表示检查何时          正在执行，但不会单独列出它们。值1会列出个体          执行时进行检查。值为2可启用额外网格          字段变量，列出执行的各个检查，最多列出100个          提供其他详细信息的消息（例如，问题的位置、          受影响的单元格）。值3使能提供额外的网格字段变量，列出执行时的各个检查，并列出无限的消息          提供其他详细信息（例如，问题的位置、受影响的人          细胞）。

contents.des: Enables / disables an enhanced definition when calculating the orthogonal quality.          When enabled, the orthogonal quality is defined using a variety quality measures,          including: the orthogonality of a face relative to a vector between the face and cell          centroids; a metric that detects poor cell shape at a local edge (such as twisting and/or          concavity); and the variation of normals between the faces that can be constructed from          the cell face. This enhanced definition is optimal for evaluating thin prism cells.
contents.desTs: 在计算垂直质量时启用/禁用增强的定义。启用后，使用各种质量测量来定义垂直质量，包括：面部相对于面部和细胞之间的载体的垂直性          重心;检测局部边缘不良细胞形状的指标（例如扭曲和/或          ）;以及可以构建的面之间法向的变化          细胞面。这种增强的定义非常适合评估薄棱镜细胞。

contents.des: Enters the geometry menu, where you can manage auxiliary geometry definitions.
contents.desTs: 进入几何菜单，您可以在其中管理辅助几何定义。

children.des: Adds a new auxiliary geometry definition. After you enter a name for the                definition, you can define the following:
children.desTs: 添加新的辅助几何定义。输入                定义，您可以定义以下内容：

children.des: Deletes a specified auxiliary geometry definition.
children.desTs: 初始化指定的辅助几何图形定义。

children.des: Displays a specified auxiliary geometry definition in the graphics                window.
children.desTs: 在图形中显示指定的辅助几何定义                窗口

children.des: Sets the options for how the auxiliary geometry definition is displayed in the                graphics window when using the mesh/geometry/display text                command. The following options are available:
children.desTs: 设置辅助几何定义在                使用网格/几何/显示文本时的图形窗口                命令。以下选项可用：

children.des: Edits an existing auxiliary geometry definition. After you enter the name of the                definition that you want to edit, you can edit the following:
children.desTs: 编辑现有辅助几何定义。输入                要编辑的定义，可以编辑以下内容：

children.des: Lists all of the auxiliary geometry definitions in the console.
children.desTs: 列出控制台中的所有辅助几何图形定义。

children.des: Lists the settings for a specified auxiliary geometry definition in the                console.
children.desTs: 列出中指定辅助几何定义的设置                console.

contents.des: Reports solver memory use.
contents.desTs: 报告求解器内存使用情况。

contents.des: Prints zone information size.
contents.desTs: 打印区域信息大小。

contents.des: Enters the zone modification menu. For a description of the items in this menu, see      define/boundary-conditions/modify-zones.
contents.desTs: 进入区域修改菜单。有关此菜单中项目的描述，请参阅      定义/边界条件/修改区域。

contents.des: Enters the polyhedra menu.
contents.desTs: 进入多边形菜单。

children.des: Converts the entire 3D domain to polyhedra cells.
children.desTs: 将整个3D域初始化到多边体单元。

children.des: Converts 3D cells with hanging nodes/edges to polyhedra.
children.desTs: 将具有悬挂节点/边的3D单元格复制到多边体。

children.des: Converts skewed 3D cells to polyhedra.
children.desTs: 将倾斜的3D单元复制为多边形。

children.des: Enters the polyhedra options menu.
children.desTs: 进入多边形选项菜单。

children.des: Enables / disables the migration of newly created partitions to the                                                  compute-nodes and the reordering of the domain as                                                  part of polyhedra conversion. This is disabled by                                                  default, because it requires significant                                                  additional memory; when disabled, it is                                                  recommended that you save the case file after                                                  conversion, read it in a new Fluent session (so                                                  that the new / stored partitions become active),                                                  and then manually reorder using the                                                  mesh/reorder/reorder-domain                                                  text command. If you want to run the calculation                                                  in the current Fluent session you can enable the                                                  migrate-and-reorder? text                                                  command prior to conversion, but you must ensure                                                  that no more than half of the available memory of                                                  your system is currently used.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用将新创建的分区迁移到                                                  计算节点和域的重新排序                                                  多边形转换的一部分。这由以下人员禁用                                                  默认，因为它需要大量                                                  额外内存;禁用时，它是                                                  建议您保存案件档案后                                                  转换，在新的Fluent会话中阅读它（所以                                                  新/存储的分区变为活动状态），然后使用手动重新排序                                                  网格/重新排序/重新排序-域                                                  文本命令。如果您想运行计算                                                  在当前的Fluent会话中，您可以启用                                                  迁移并重新排序？文本                                                  转换之前的命令，但您必须确保                                                  不超过的可用内存的一半                                                  您的系统当前正在使用。

children.des: Specifies whether boundary layer cells will be preserved when the domain                      is converted to polyhedra. When the value is set to 0                      (default) Ansys Fluent checks for high aspect ratio cells at the boundary layer                      and if any are found, Fluent asks if you want to preserve the boundary layer.                      When the value is set to 1, the boundary layer cells                      are never preserved; when it is set to 2, the                      boundary layer cells are always preserved (regardless of the aspect ratio of                      the boundary layer cells).
children.desTs: 指定当域                      转换为多面体。当该值设置为0时，                      （默认）Ansys Fluent检查边界层处的高纵横比单元                      如果找到任何边界层，Fluent会询问您是否要保留边界层。当该值设置为1时，                      永远不会保留;当设置为2时，                      边界层单元始终保留（无论的长宽比如何                      边界层细胞）。

children.des: Enables the preservation of surfaces (that is, manifold zones of type            interior) during the conversion of the domain to polyhedra. Note           that only those zones with a name that includes the string you specify will be           preserved.
children.desTs: 能够保存表面（即，类型的多个区域            内部）在域转换为多边体期间。注意           只有那些名称包含您指定字符串的区域才会被           保存的。

contents.des: Displays information about the quality of the mesh in the console, including the minimum     orthogonal quality and the maximum aspect ratio. The level of detail displayed depends on the     setting specified for mesh/check-verbosity.
contents.desTs: 显示有关控制台中网格质量的信息，包括最小值     垂直质量和最大长宽比。显示的详细程度取决于     为网格/检查详细指定的设置。

contents.des: Redistributes the nodes in the hex and/or wedge cells in a          boundary layer zone to achieve a desired growth rate.
contents.desTs: 重新分布十六进制和/或楔形单元中的节点          边界层区以实现所需的生长率。

contents.des: Reorders domain menu.
contents.desTs: 重新订购域菜单。

children.des: Prints cell bandwidth.
children.desTs: 打印单元带宽。

children.des: Reorders cells and faces using the reverse Cuthill-McKee algorithm. Note that you must save a        new case file (and a data file, if data exists) after reordering with this text command, as        well as recreate any ray files and/or surface cluster information.
children.desTs: 使用反向Cuthill-McKee算法重新排序单元格和面。请注意，您必须保存        使用此文本命令重新排序后，新案例文件（以及数据文件，如果存在数据），如        以及重新创建任何射线文件和/或表面集群信息。

children.des: Reorders zones by partition, type, and ID.
children.desTs: 按分区、类型和ID重新排序区域。

contents.des: Allows the adjustment of the positions of nodes on boundaries as part of the mesh repairs        performed by the mesh/repair-improve/repair text command.
contents.desTs: 作为网格修复的一部分，允许调整边界上的节点位置        由mesh/repair-improvement/repair text命令执行。

children.des: Allows the adjustment of the positions of nodes on boundaries as part of the mesh repairs        performed by the mesh/repair-improve/repair text command.
children.desTs: 作为网格修复的一部分，允许调整边界上的节点位置        由mesh/repair-improvement/repair text命令执行。

children.des: Improves poor quality cells in the mesh, if possible.
children.desTs: 如果可能的话，改善网格中质量较差的单元。

children.des: Enables/disables the local conversion of degenerate cells into polyhedra based on skewness        criteria as part of the mesh repairs performed by the         mesh/repair-improve/repair text command.
children.desTs: 基于偏度启用/禁用退化像元到多面体的局部转换        作为网格修复的一部分，         mesh/repair-improve/repair text命令。

children.des: Repairs mesh problems identified by the mesh check, if possible. The repairs include fixing        cells that have the wrong node order, the wrong face handedness, faces that are small or        nonexistent, or very poor quality. Only interior nodes are repositioned by default; boundary        nodes may be repositioned if the         mesh/repair-improve/allow-repair-at-boundaries text command is        enabled. Note that highly skewed cells may be converted into polyhedra, depending on whether        the         mesh/repair-improve/include-local-polyhedra-conversion-in-repair        text command is enabled.
children.desTs: 如果可能的话，修复网格检查发现的网格问题。修复包括修复        细胞的节点顺序错误，面部利手错误，面部小或        不存在，或质量非常差。默认情况下仅重新定位内部节点;边界        如果         mesh/repair-improve/allow-repair-at-boundaries文本命令是        请注意，高度倾斜的像元可能会转换为多面体，这取决于是否        的         mesh/repair-improve/include-local-polyhedra-conversion-in-repair        文本命令已启用。

children.des: Modifies cell centroids to repair meshes that contain left-handed faces without face node        order problems.
children.desTs: 修改单元重心以修复包含左手面但没有面节点的网格        订单问题。

children.des: Modifies face nodes to repair faces with improper face node order and, therefore, eliminates        any resulting left-handed faces.
children.desTs: 修改面节点以修复面节点顺序不正确的面，因此消除        任何由此产生的左撇子面孔。

children.des: Modifies the mesh to enforce a rotational angle or translational distance for periodic        boundaries. For translationally periodic boundaries, the command computes an average        translation distance and adjusts the node coordinates on the shadow face zone to match this        distance. For rotationally periodic boundaries, the command prompts for an angle and adjusts        the node coordinates on the shadow face zone using this angle and the defined rotational        axis for the cell zone.
children.desTs: 修改网格以强制周期性的旋转角或平移距离        边界。对于变换周期性边界，命令计算平均值        平移距离并调整阴影面区域上的节点坐标以匹配此        距离。对于旋转周期性边界，命令会提示输入角度并进行调整        使用此角度和定义的旋转来确定阴影面区域上的节点坐标        单元区的轴。

children.des: Corrects wall distance at very high aspect ratio hexahedral/polyhedral cells.
children.desTs: 在非常高的长宽比六边形/多边形单元中纠正壁距离。

children.des: Reports invalid and poor quality elements.
children.desTs: 报告无效和质量差的元素。

contents.des: Rotates the mesh.
contents.desTs: 旋转网格。

contents.des: Prompts for the scaling factors in each of the active Cartesian coordinate directions.
contents.desTs: 指定每个活动Cartesian坐标方向上的比例因子。

contents.des: Enables/disables the showing of shadow zones for conformal periodic boundary zone          pairs in any list of boundary zones presented by the user interface. This text command is          enabled by default. If any shadow zones exist when this text command is disabled, they are          deleted (though the behavior of the related periodic boundary zones will not be          affected).
contents.desTs: 启用/禁用保形周期性边界区的阴影区的显示          用户界面呈现的任何边界区域列表中的对。此文本命令是          默认情况下启用。如果禁用此文本命令时存在任何阴影区域，则它们是          删除（尽管相关周期性边界区的行为不会被          受影响）。

contents.des: Prints mesh size.
contents.desTs: 打印网格尺寸。

contents.des: Smooths the mesh using quality-based, Laplacian, or skewness methods.
contents.desTs: 使用基于质量的方法、拉普拉斯方法或偏度方法平滑网格。

contents.des: Enters the Surface Mesh menu.
contents.desTs: 进入“表面网格”菜单。

children.des: Deletes surface mesh.
children.desTs: 卸载表面网格。

children.des: Displays surface meshes.
children.desTs: 显示表面网格。

children.des: Reads surface meshes.
children.desTs: 读取表面网格。

contents.des: Swaps mesh faces.
contents.desTs: 交换网格面。

contents.des: Prompts for the translation offset in each of the active Cartesian coordinate     directions.
contents.desTs: 指定每个活动直角坐标中的平移偏差     方向

contents.des: Sets the method used to calculate the wall distance for every cell. By default, it is          calculated using the geometric method, which is an exact          geometric method. You have the option to specify that it is instead calculated using the          transport-eqn method, which is a Laplacian approach that          estimates the value based on the transport equation; this can be useful if your case          requires too much memory with the geometric method. Note that the          transport-eqn method is not recommended for coarse meshes, since          it may produce inaccurate wall distance results and subsequently decrease the accuracy of          the solutions.
contents.desTs: 设置用于计算每个单元的墙距离的方法。默认情况下，为          使用几何方法计算，这是精确的          几何方法。您可以选择指定使用          运输方程法，这是一种拉普拉斯方法，          根据传输方程估计值;如果您的情况，这可能很有用          几何方法需要太多内存。请注意          对于粗网格，不建议使用传输方程方法，因为          它可能会产生不准确的墙距结果，从而降低          解决方案。

list.des: commands used to create and manage mesh properties.
list.desTs: 用于创建和管理网格属性的命令。

contents.des: Shows network bandwidth.
contents.desTs: 显示网络带宽。

contents.des: Performs checks of various factors that affect parallel performance.
contents.desTs: 对影响并行性能的各种因素执行检查。

contents.des: Sets verbosity output of the parallel check. Higher verbosity corresponds to more detailed          information.
contents.desTs: 设置并行检查的详细程度输出。详细程度越高对应于越详细          信息.

contents.des: Enters the GPGPU menu
contents.desTs: 进入GPPU菜单

children.des: Lists the available GPGPUs.
children.desTs: 列出可用的GPGPU。

contents.des: Shows network latency.
contents.desTs: 显示网络延迟。

contents.des: Enters the load balancing parameters menu.
contents.desTs: 进入负载平衡参数菜单。

children.des: Uses physical-models load balancing?
children.desTs: 使用物理模型负载平衡？

children.des: Uses load balancing for dynamic mesh?
children.desTs: 使用负载平衡来实现动态网格？

children.des: Uses load balancing for mesh adaption?
children.desTs: 使用负载平衡进行网格适应？

contents.des: Enters the multidomain architecture menu.
contents.desTs: 进入多域架构菜单。

children.des: Enters the conjugate heat transfer menu.
children.desTs: 进入结合热传递菜单。

children.des: Enables/disables loosely coupled conjugate heat transfer. This increases                      the robustness of the energy equation calculation, and specifies that                      multidomain architecture is used within a single Fluent session to enhance                      the performance of the simulation. For transient simulations, it works in                      conjunction with the                      solve/set/transient-controls/solid-time-step-size                      text command, and thereby enables the use of a user-specified time step size                      for solid zones that can be larger than that used for the fluid zones. For                      steady flows, it enables a loose coupling of the fluid and solid zone                      calculations at a specified number of iterations.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用松散耦合的共轭传热。                      能量方程计算的稳健性，并规定                      多域体系结构用于单个Fluent会话中，以增强                      仿真的性能。对于瞬态仿真，它工作在                      结合                      解决/设置/过渡控制/固体时间步尺寸                      文本命令，从而允许使用用户指定的时间步大小                      对于可能比用于流体区的固体区更大。对于                      稳定的流动，它能够实现流体和固体区域的松散耦合                      以指定的迭代次数进行计算。

children.des: Enters the set menu for loosely coupled conjugate heat transfer.
children.desTs: 进入松散耦合共轭传热的设置菜单。

children.des: Specifies the coupling method used for the fluid and solid zone                            calculations, as well as when the coupling takes place.
children.desTs: 指定用于流体和固体区域的耦合方法                            计算，以及何时发生耦合。

contents.des: Enters the partition domain menu.
contents.desTs: 进入分区域菜单。

children.des: Sets auto partition parameters.
children.desTs: 设置自动分区参数。

children.des: Enables auto partitioning by zone or by domain.
children.desTs: 启用按区域或域自动分区。

children.des: Sets the auto partition load vector.
children.desTs: 设置自动分区加载载体。

children.des: Sets the partition method.
children.desTs: 设置分区方法。

children.des: Sets auto partition pre-testing optimization.
children.desTs: 设置自动分区预测试优化。

children.des: Uses partitions in a pre-partitioned case file.
children.desTs: 使用预分区案例文件中的分区。

children.des: Merges every N partitions.
children.desTs: 合并每N个分区。

children.des: Calls the optimizer that attempts to decrease the number of interfacesby eliminating orphan cell clusters. (An orphan cluster is a groupof connected cells such that each member has at least one face thatis part of an interface boundary.)
children.desTs: 调用尝试通过消除孤儿细胞群来减少界面数量的优化器。(An孤儿集群是一组相连的单元，每个成员至少有一个面，这是界面边界的一部分。）

children.des: Sets the partition method.
children.desTs: 设置分区方法。

children.des: Prints active partition information (parallel solver).
children.desTs: 打印活动分区信息（并行求解器）。

children.des: Prints stored partition information (parallel solver).
children.desTs: 打印存储的分区信息（并行求解器）。

children.des: Reorders partitions.
children.desTs: 重新排序分区。

children.des: Reorders partitions to architecture.
children.desTs: 将分区重新排序为架构。

children.des: Enters the set partition parameters menu.
children.desTs: 进入设置分区参数菜单。

children.des: Allows partitions to cross zone boundaries (the default). If turned off, it will restrict                      partitioning to within each cell zone. This is recommended   only when cells in different zones require                      significantly different amounts of computation during the solution phase; for                      example, if the domain contains both solid and fluid zones.
children.desTs: 允许分区跨越区域边界（默认）。如果关闭，它将限制                      分区到每个单元区域内。建议这样做   仅当不同区域的细胞需要时                      解决阶段的计算量显着不同;对于                      例如，如果域同时包含固体和流体区域。

children.des: Disables all optimizations.
children.desTs: 禁用所有优化。

children.des: Enables all optimizations.
children.desTs: 启用所有优化。

children.des: Sets cell function.
children.desTs: 设置单元功能。

children.des: Enables / disables dynamic load balancing for discrete phase model cases that use a                      second domain for DPM particle tracking (that is, cases for which you have                      enabled the   define/models/dpm/parallel/hybrid-2domain? text                      command).
children.desTs: 启用/禁用使用                      第二个领域用于可扩展粒子跟踪（即您拥有的情况                      使   定义/模型/dPM/并行/混合-2域？文本                      命令）。

children.des: Uses face area as connection weights.
children.desTs: 使用面部区域作为连接权重。

children.des: Sets ISAT weight.
children.desTs: 设置ISAT权重。

children.des: Enables the Laplace smoothing option which can prevent partition boundaries from lying along                      regions of high aspect ratio cells.
children.desTs: 启用拉普拉斯平滑选项，可以防止分区边界倾斜                      高长宽比细胞区域。

children.des: Sets the number of cells desired for each partition. This is useful, for example, when                      computing on multiple machines with significantly different performance                      characteristics. If left unset, each partition will contain an approximately                      equal number of cells. Normalized relative values may be used for the                      entries.
children.desTs: 设置每个分区所需的单元格数。例如，当                      在性能明显不同的多台机器上进行计算                      特征。如果不设置，每个分区将包含大约                      相等的单元格数量。标准化的相对值可以用于                      条目

children.des: Toggles the optimizer that attempts to decrease the number of interfaces by eliminating orphan                      cell clusters.
children.desTs: 切换尝试通过消除孤立来减少接口数量的优化器                      细胞团。

children.des: Enables / disables model-weighted partitioning. This option works with the METIS partitioning                      method, and specifies that Fluent automatically calculates the weighting                      based on the cell count and the models and attributes specified as weights                      (using the parallel/partition/set/isat-weight text                      command, for example).
children.desTs: 启用/禁用模型加权分区。此选项与METIS分区一起使用                      方法，并指定Fluent自动计算权重                      基于单元计数以及指定为权重的模型和属性                      （使用并行/分区/集合/isat-weight文本                      命令，例如）。

children.des: Uses number of faces as weights.
children.desTs: 使用面数作为权重。

children.des: Sets the,, and coordinate of the origin used by those partitioning                      functions that require a radial distance. By default, the origin is set to (0,                      0, 0).
children.desTs: 设置那些分区使用的原点的、和坐标                      需要半径距离的功能。默认情况下，原点设置为（0，0，0）。

children.des: Sets DPM particle weight.
children.desTs: 设置预设粒子重量。

children.des: Enables the operation that determines the best coordinate-splitting direction.
children.desTs: 启用确定最佳坐标拆分方向的操作。

children.des: Uses solid thread weights.
children.desTs: 使用实心线重量。

children.des: Toggles the optimizer that attempts to minimize the number of interfaces by modifying the                      partition boundaries to reduce surface area.
children.desTs: 切换优化器，该优化器试图通过修改                      分隔边界以减少表面积。

children.des: Enables the Stiff Chemistry weighting to balance the reaction integration                      load for simulations with the Laminar, EDC, or PDF transport model.
children.desTs: 使Stiff Chemistry加权能够平衡反应积分                      加载使用Laminar、PDC或PDF传输模型进行模拟。

children.des: Controls the amount of information that is printed out during partitioning. If set to 1 (the                      default), a text character. is displayed during each                      bisection, and partition statistics are displayed once the partitioning                      completes. If set to 2, additional information about the bisection operation                      is displayed during each bisection. If set to 0, partition statistics and                      information during each bisection are not displayed.
children.desTs: 控制分区期间打印出的信息量。如果设置为1（                      默认值），在每次测试期间显示文本character.is                      分割后，将显示分割统计信息                      完成。如果设置为2，                      在每次平分期间显示。如果设置为0，则分区统计信息和                      不显示每次平分期间的信息。

children.des: Sets VOF free surface weight.
children.desTs: 设置VOF自由曲面权重。

children.des: Calls the optimizer that attempts to minimize the number of interfaces by modifying the                partition boundaries to reduce surface area.
children.desTs: 调用优化器，该优化器试图通过修改                分隔边界以减少表面积。

children.des: Uses this partitioning.
children.desTs: 使用此分区。

contents.des: Enters the set parallel parameters menu.
contents.desTs: 进入设置并行参数菜单。

children.des: Uses the fast I/O option.
children.desTs: 使用快速I/O选项。

children.des: Sets partition mask.
children.desTs: 设置分区屏蔽。

children.des: Sets spawn time-out in seconds.
children.desTs: 以秒为单位设置产卵超时。

children.des: Sets the parallel verbosity.
children.desTs: 设置平行冗长。

contents.des: Prints the network connectivity for the selected compute node.
contents.desTs: 打印选定计算节点的网络连接。

contents.des: Sets the maximum number of threads on each machine.
contents.desTs: 设置每台机器上的最大线程数。

contents.des: Enters the timer menu.
contents.desTs: 进入计时器菜单。

children.des: Prints performance statistics in the console window.
children.desTs: 在控制台窗口中打印性能统计信息。

children.des: Adjusts domain timers.
children.desTs: 调整域计时器。

list.des: commands specific to parallel processing.
list.desTs: 并行处理专用命令。

contents.des: Enter the parametric study menu.
contents.desTs: 进入参数研究菜单。

contents.des: Enter the design point menu for a parametric study.
contents.desTs: 输入参数研究的设计点菜单。

children.des: Adds the design point to the parametric study.
children.desTs: 将设计点添加到参数研究中。

children.des: Enters the auto-create menu for automatically creating and adding design points                to your parametric study.
children.desTs: 进入自动创建菜单，以自动创建设计点并将其添加到参数化研究中。

children.des: Creates design points based on your settings. Choose from a list of                      sampling types, specify the number of samples, whether or not you want to                      remove existing design points, as well as upper and lower limits for your                      input parameters.
children.desTs: 根据您的设置创建设计点。从采样类型列表中进行选择，指定样本数量、是否要删除现有设计点以及输入参数的上限和下限。

children.des: Generates an optiSLang-compatible output file to a location of your choice,                      containing the details of the updated design points.
children.desTs: 将optiSang兼容的输出文件生成到您选择的位置，其中包含更新设计点的详细信息。

children.des: Computes the number of designs of experiments, based on the sampling type                      designation and the number of levels.
children.desTs: 根据抽样类型指定和水平数计算实验设计数。

children.des: Creates a copy of the optiSLang project from the simulation directory                      (*.opf), places it inside your working directory (as                      designated in the Fluent Launcher, and opens the copied project in optiSLang.
children.desTs: 从模拟目录（*.opf）创建optiSang项目的副本，将其放入工作目录中（如Fluent Launcher中指定的那样），并在optiSang中打开复制的项目。

children.des: Lists the current settings for the automatically generated design points                      (for example, samping type, number of levels,number of samples, etc.).
children.desTs: 列出自动生成的设计点的当前设置（例如，采样类型、级别数、样本数等）。

children.des: Opens the optiSLang postprocessor using a generated optiSLang-compatible                      output file (located, by default, under the current simulation directory)                      containing the details of the updated design points.
children.desTs: 使用生成的optiSang兼容的输出文件（默认位于当前模拟目录下）打开optiSang后处理器，该文件包含更新设计点的详细信息。

children.des: Enters the print-to-console menu where you can manage settings for                      automatically creating design points for your parametric study.
children.desTs: 进入打印到控制台菜单，您可以在其中管理为参数化研究自动创建设计点的设置。

children.des: Prints the current value of the Delete Existing Design                            Points setting.
children.desTs: 打印“删除现有设计点”设置的当前值。

children.des: Prints the current value of the Number of                            Levels setting.
children.desTs: 打印"层数“设置的当前值。

children.des: Prints the current value of the Number of                            Samples setting.
children.desTs: 打印“样本数”设置的当前值。

children.des: Prints the current range of the specified input parameter
children.desTs: 打印指定输入参数的当前范围

children.des: Prints the current value of the Sampling Type                            setting.
children.desTs: 打印“采样类型”设置的当前值。

children.des: Removes the data of a designated design point, allowing you to reset the design                point and enter new information.
children.desTs: 初始化指定设计点的数据，允许您重置设计点并输入新信息。

children.des: Enters the concurrent menu for parametric design points.
children.desTs: 进入参数化设计点的并发菜单。

children.des: Stops the concurrent update of all design points.
children.desTs: 停止所有设计点的并发更新。

children.des: Stops the concurrent update of the design point.
children.desTs: 停止设计点的并发更新。

children.des: Interrupts the concurrent update of all design points.
children.desTs: 中断所有设计点的并发更新。

children.des: Interrupts the concurrent update of the design point.
children.desTs: 中断设计点的并发更新。

children.des: Downloads all related output files.
children.desTs: 下载所有相关的输出文件。

children.des: Interrupts the concurrent update of all design points.
children.desTs: 中断所有设计点的并发更新。

children.des: Interrupts the concurrent update of the design point.
children.desTs: 中断设计点的并发更新。

children.des: Downloads all related output files.
children.desTs: 下载所有相关的输出文件。

children.des: Refreshes the status of the design points that are being updated in the                      session, if any.
children.desTs: 刷新会话中正在更新的设计点（如果有的话）的状态。

children.des: Removes the design point from the parametric study.
children.desTs: 从参数研究中初始化设计点。

children.des: Creates a copy of a specified design point.
children.desTs: 创建指定设计点的副本。

children.des: Takes the case data for the current design point and loads the data into                Fluent.
children.desTs: 获取当前设计点的案例数据并将数据加载到Fluent中。

children.des: Enters the print-to-console menu for the design points of your parametric                study.
children.desTs: 进入参数化研究的设计点的“打印到控制台”菜单。

children.des: Prints the value for the Capture Simulation Report                      Data setting for the design point, where this field determines                      whether or not design point data is captured for the simulation report.
children.desTs: 打印设计点的“捕获模拟报告数据”设置的值，其中此字段确定是否为模拟报告捕获设计点数据。

children.des: Prints the "current" design point.
children.desTs: 打印“当前”设计点。

children.des: Prints the value(s) for the input parameters of a design point.
children.desTs: 打印设计点的输入参数的值。

children.des: Prints the value(s) for the output parameters of a design point.
children.desTs: 打印设计点的输出参数的值。

children.des: Prints the status for all design points in the study.
children.desTs: 打印研究中所有设计点的状态。

children.des: Prints the status for the current design point in the study.
children.desTs: 打印研究中当前设计点的状态。

children.des: Prints the value for the Write Data setting for the                      design point (where the Write Data field determines how a                      design point writes its data upon update).
children.desTs: 打印设计点的“写入数据”设置的值（其中“写入数据”字段确定设计点在更新时如何写入其数据）。

children.des: Allows you to save the journal files for all design points that are currently in                a "Needs Update" state.
children.desTs: 允许您保存当前处于“需要更新”状态的所有设计点的日志文件。

children.des: Enter the set menu for the design points of your parametric study.
children.desTs: 输入参数研究设计点的设置菜单。

children.des: Sets the value for the Capture Simulation Report Data                      setting for the design point, where this field determines whether or not                      design point data is captured for the simulation report.
children.desTs: 设置设计点的“捕获模拟报告数据”设置的值，其中此字段确定是否为模拟报告捕获设计点数据。

children.des: Sets the designated design point to be "current."
children.desTs: 将指定设计点设置为“当前”。"

children.des: Sets the value(s) of the input parameters for a design point.
children.desTs: 设置设计点的输入参数的值。

children.des: Sets the value for the Write Data setting for the                      design point (where the Write Data field determines how a                      design point writes its data upon update).
children.desTs: 设置设计点的“写入数据”设置的值（其中“写入数据”字段确定设计点在更新时如何写入其数据）。

children.des: Enter the table menu for the design points of your parametric study.
children.desTs: 输入参数研究设计点的表格菜单。

children.des: Export the contents of your design point table to an external                        .csv file.
children.desTs: 将设计点表的内容输出到外部.CSV文件。

children.des: Import the contents for your design point table from an external                        .csv file.
children.desTs: 从外部.csv文件导入设计点表的内容。

contents.des: Enter the study menu for a parametric analysis. If a parametric study has yet to be          defined, then only the initialize text command is available. Once          a study is initialized, then additional parametric commands become available to          use.
contents.desTs: 进入参数分析的研究菜单。如果参数研究尚未定义，则仅可用初始化文本命令。一旦研究初始化，则可以使用其他参数命令。

children.des: Removes a specified parametric study.
children.desTs: 初始化指定的参数研究。

children.des: Creates a copy of a specified parametric study.
children.desTs: 创建指定参数研究的副本。

children.des: Initializes and starts the parametric study using the current case and/or data                files to set up the supporting files and structures for the associated parametric                project.
children.desTs: 使用当前案例和/或数据文件初始化并启动参数研究，以设置相关参数项目的支持文件和结构。

children.des: Prints a listing of the available studies.
children.desTs: 打印可用研究的列表。

children.des: Allows you to assign a new name for a specified study.
children.desTs: 允许您为指定的研究指定新名称。

children.des: Allows you to set a specified study as the "current" study.
children.desTs: 允许您将指定的研究设置为“当前”研究。

children.des: Assigns the data of a specified study to use the data from the base case of the                original study.
children.desTs: 指定指定研究的数据使用原始研究基本案例中的数据。

children.des: Assigns the data from a previously updated design point.
children.desTs: 从之前更新的设计点分配数据。

contents.des: Enter the update menu for a parametric study where you can control how to update your          design points.
contents.desTs: 进入参数研究的更新菜单，您可以在其中控制如何更新设计点。

children.des: Allows you to generate the full design point report automatically when the                design point is updated. If this is not enabled, only the required data for the                parametric report will be captured. Enabling this option allows access to the                additional export commands.
children.desTs: 允许您在更新设计点时自动生成完整的设计点报告。如果未启用此功能，则将仅捕获参数报告所需的数据。启用此选项允许访问其他输出命令。

children.des: Allows you to export the report as an HTML file during the design point update.                This HTML report is stored in the design point directory of the project and a zipped                version is registered with the project.
children.desTs: 允许您在设计点更新期间将报告输出为HTML文件。此HTML报告存储在项目的设计点目录中，并向项目注册压缩版本。

children.des: Allows you to export the report as a .pdf file during                the design point update. This .pdf report is stored in the                design point directory of the project and is registered with the project.
children.desTs: 允许您在设计点更新期间将报告输出为.pdf文件。此.pdf报告存储在项目的设计点目录中，并在项目中注册。

children.des: Allows you to export the report as a .pptx file during                the design point update. This .pptx report is stored in the                design point directory of the project and is registered with the project.
children.desTs: 允许您在设计点更新期间将报告输出为. ppyx文件。此. ppyx报告存储在项目的设计点目录中，并在项目中注册。

children.des: Allows you to automatically generate the parametric report at the end of the                current batch of design point updates. If you are only updating a single design                point, it will occur after that design point is updated. If you are submitting                multiple design points at once, it will occur after all submitted design points are                finished running. In an optimization study, it will occur after the optimization                study is completed. This is the most useful when submitting many design points at                once and you require the parametric report to be created automatically at the end.                Enabling this option allows access to the additional export commands.
children.desTs: 允许您在当前批量设计点更新结束时自动生成参数报告。如果您只更新单个设计点，则会在该设计点更新后发生。如果您同时提交多个设计点，则会在所有提交的设计点运行结束后发生。在优化研究中，它将在优化研究完成后发生。当同时提交多个设计点并且您需要在最后自动创建参数报告时，这是最有用的。启用此选项可以访问额外的输出命令。

children.des: Allows you to specify that when you generate the parametric report at the end of                the parametric run, and you want to ensure that the parametric report is completely                up to date. Enabling this will cause any design point reports that are out of date                with the design point report settings to be regenerated prior to generating the                parametric report.
children.desTs: 允许您指定当您在参数运行结束时生成参数报告并且希望确保参数报告完全是最新的。启用此功能将导致在生成参数报告之前重新生成与设计点报告设置过时的任何设计点报告。

children.des: Allows you to export the parametric report as an HTML file after the parametric                run is complete. This HTML report is stored in the simulation directory of the                project and a zipped version is registered with the project.
children.desTs: 允许您在参数化运行完成后将参数化报告导出为HTML文件。此HTML报告存储在项目的模拟目录中，并向项目注册压缩版本。

children.des: Automatically executes any configured mesh morphing definitions that are                specified. This command is available if there are any defined input parameters                attached to mesh morphing definitions. When invoked, Fluent executes the mesh                morphing operation(s) after updating the parameter values and before solution                initialization.
children.desTs: 自动执行指定的任何已配置网格变形定义。如果有任何已定义的输入参数附加到网格变形定义，则此命令可用。调用此命令时，Fluent会在更新参数值之后和解决方案初始化之前执行网格变形操作。

children.des: Enter the concurrent menu for updating your parametric study.
children.desTs: 进入并发菜单以更新参数研究。

children.des: Removes the end point of the concurrent update of all design                      points.
children.desTs: 指定所有设计点并发更新的终点。

children.des: Enter the licensing menu for concurrently updating the parametric                      study.
children.desTs: 进入许可菜单以同时更新参数研究。

children.des: Prints the current license type.
children.desTs: 打印当前许可证类型。

children.des: Prints the current license type.
children.desTs: 打印当前许可证类型。

children.des: Prints the number of optiSLang licenses.
children.desTs: 打印optiSang许可证的数量。

children.des: Prints the type optiSLang license.
children.desTs: 打印optiSang许可证类型。

children.des: Enter the settings menu for licensing options when updating your                            concurrent parametric study.
children.desTs: 更新并发参数研究时，输入许可选项的设置菜单。

children.des: Sets the license type for the concurrent parametric study.                                  Choices include "Solver License" or                                  "HPC Parametric".
children.desTs: 设置并发参数研究的许可类型。选择包括“求解器许可”或“IPC参数”。

children.des: Sets the number of optiSLang licenses.
children.desTs: 设置optiSang许可证的数量。

children.des: Sets the type of optiSLang license. Choices include                                  "None",                                  "Premium", or                                  "Enterprise". Using                                  "None" initiates standard HPC parametric                                  licensing.
children.desTs: 设置optiSang许可证的类型。选择包括“无”、“高级”或“企业”。使用“无”会启动标准的IPC参数许可。

children.des: Enter the print-to-console menu for updating parametric studies using                      concurrent design points.
children.desTs: 进入打印到控制台菜单以使用并行设计点更新参数研究。

children.des: Prints the number of concurrent design points to update.
children.desTs: 打印要更新的并发设计点的数量。

children.des: Prints the number of cores to allocate for each design point                            run.
children.desTs: 打印为每个设计点运行分配的内核数。

children.des: Registers a new end point for parametric studies using concurrent design                      points.
children.desTs: 使用并行设计点注册参数研究的新终点。

children.des: Enter the settings menu for parametric studies using concurrent design                      points.
children.desTs: 使用并行设计点进入参数研究的设置菜单。

children.des: Specify the license level (either CFD HPC                            Ultimate, CFD Enterprise or                            CFD Premium).
children.desTs: 指定许可级别（差价合约高级版、差价合约企业版或差价合约高级版）。

children.des: Choose whether or not to start the Ansys Fluent web interface using the                            web-server-token from the current session. For                            more details about the Fluent web interface, see Introduction to Ansys Fluent's Web Interface.
children.desTs: 选择是否使用当前会话中的Web服务器令牌启动Ansys Fluent Web界面。有关Fluent Web界面的更多详细信息，请参阅Ansys Fluent Web界面简介。

children.des: Specify the number of cores per node.
children.desTs: 指定每个节点的核心数量。

children.des: Specify a URL for the cluster as well as a user name and password.
children.desTs: 指定群集的URL以及用户名和密码。

children.des: Specify the maximum amount of time (hours) needed to execute this                            job.
children.desTs: 指定执行此作业所需的最长时间（小时）。

children.des: Choose whether to keep all output files or to keep specific output                            files. When you desire to keep specific output files, you can provide                            their names (separated by commas).
children.desTs: 选择是保留所有输出文件还是保留特定输出文件。当您希望保留特定输出文件时，您可以提供其名称（以逗号分隔）。

children.des: Choose whether or not to use the native GPU-powered Ansys Fluent solver                            and assign the Number of GPUs per Node accordingly.                            For more details about the Fluent GPU solver, see Using the Fluent Native GPU Solver.
children.desTs: 选择是否使用原生基于GPU的Ansys Fluent解算器，并相应分配每个节点的图形处理器数量。有关Fluent图形处理器的更多详细信息，请参阅使用Fluent原生图形处理器。

children.des: Specify the token string used to access the Ansys Fluent web interface                            using the launch-web-server? command. For more                            details about the Fluent web interface, see Introduction to Ansys Fluent's Web Interface.
children.desTs: 指定用于使用launch-web-server访问Ansys Fluent Web界面的令牌字符串？命令。有关Fluent Web界面的更多详细信息，请参阅Ansys Fluent Web界面简介。

children.des: Useful for allocating resources.
children.desTs: 有助于分配资源。

children.des: Specify the type of message passing interface (MPI) you require for                            the parallel computations. The list of MPI types varies depending on the                            selected release and the selected architecture. There are several                            options, based on the operating system of the parallel cluster. For more                            information about the available MPI types, see Table 44.1: Supported Interconnects for the Windows Platform - Table 44.2: Available MPIs for Windows Platforms.
children.desTs: 指定并行计算所需的消息传递接口（MPI）类型。MPI类型列表根据所选的版本和所选的体系结构而异。根据并行集群的操作系统，有几个选项。有关可用MPI类型的详细信息，请参阅表44.1：Windows平台支持的互连-表44.2：Windows平台可用MPI。

children.des: Specify the license level (either CFD HPC                            Ultimate, CFD Enterprise or                            CFD Premium).
children.desTs: 指定许可级别（差价合约高级版、差价合约企业版或差价合约高级版）。

children.des: Choose whether or not to start the Ansys Fluent web interface using the                            web-server-token from the current session. For                            more details about the Fluent web interface, see Introduction to Ansys Fluent's Web Interface.
children.desTs: 选择是否使用当前会话中的Web服务器令牌启动Ansys Fluent Web界面。有关Fluent Web界面的更多详细信息，请参阅Ansys Fluent Web界面简介。

children.des: Specify the number of cores per node.
children.desTs: 指定每个节点的核心数量。

children.des: Specify a URL for the cluster as well as a user name and password.
children.desTs: 指定群集的URL以及用户名和密码。

children.des: Specify the maximum amount of time (hours) needed to execute this                            job.
children.desTs: 指定执行此作业所需的最长时间（小时）。

children.des: Choose whether to keep all output files or to keep specific output                            files. When you desire to keep specific output files, you can provide                            their names (separated by commas).
children.desTs: 选择是保留所有输出文件还是保留特定输出文件。当您希望保留特定输出文件时，您可以提供其名称（以逗号分隔）。

children.des: Choose whether or not to use the native GPU-powered Ansys Fluent solver                            and assign the Number of GPUs per Node accordingly.                            For more details about the Fluent GPU solver, see Using the Fluent Native GPU Solver.
children.desTs: 选择是否使用原生基于GPU的Ansys Fluent解算器，并相应分配每个节点的图形处理器数量。有关Fluent图形处理器的更多详细信息，请参阅使用Fluent原生图形处理器。

children.des: Specify the token string used to access the Ansys Fluent web interface                            using the launch-web-server? command. For more                            details about the Fluent web interface, see Introduction to Ansys Fluent's Web Interface.
children.desTs: 指定用于使用launch-web-server访问Ansys Fluent Web界面的令牌字符串？命令。有关Fluent Web界面的更多详细信息，请参阅Ansys Fluent Web界面简介。

children.des: Useful for allocating resources.
children.desTs: 有助于分配资源。

children.des: Specify the type of message passing interface (MPI) you require for                            the parallel computations. The list of MPI types varies depending on the                            selected release and the selected architecture. There are several                            options, based on the operating system of the parallel cluster. For more                            information about the available MPI types, see Table 44.1: Supported Interconnects for the Windows Platform - Table 44.2: Available MPIs for Windows Platforms.
children.desTs: 指定并行计算所需的消息传递接口（MPI）类型。MPI类型列表根据所选的版本和所选的体系结构而异。根据并行集群的操作系统，有几个选项。有关可用MPI类型的详细信息，请参阅表44.1：Windows平台支持的互连-表44.2：Windows平台可用MPI。

children.des: Sets the input URL as the current submission endpoint.
children.desTs: 将输入URL设置为当前提交端点。

children.des: Sets the queue on which the design points will be updated.
children.desTs: 设置更新设计点的队列。

children.des: Sets the number of concurrent design points to update.
children.desTs: 设置要更新的并发设计点的数量。

children.des: Sets the number of cores to allocate for each design point                            run.
children.desTs: 设置为每次设计点运行分配的核心数量。

children.des: Prints the method used for updating the study.
children.desTs: 打印用于更新研究的方法。

children.des: Sets the method used for updating design points.
children.desTs: 设置用于更新设计点的方法。

children.des: Updates all design points in the parametric study.
children.desTs: 更新参数化研究中的所有设计点。

children.des: Updates the design point set as "current" in the parametric study.
children.desTs: 在参数研究中将设计点集更新为“当前”。

children.des: Updates a selection of design points in the parametric study.
children.desTs: 更新参数研究中选择的设计点。

list.des: commands specific to parametric studies.
list.desTs: 参数研究特定的命令。

contents.des: Enter the Ansys sound analysis menu.
contents.desTs: 进入Ansys声音分析菜单。

children.des: Read in a pressure signal or spectrum file, then optionally read in a frequency        response function (FRF) or transfer function file, before printing the acoustics        indicators.
children.desTs: 在打印声学指标之前，读取压力信号或频谱文件，然后可选地读取频率响应函数（FRF）或传递函数文件。

children.des: Read in a pressure signal or spectrum file, then optionally read in a frequency        response function (FRF) or transfer function file, before writing a WAV, output pressure,        and/or acoustic indicators file.
children.desTs: 在写入WAV、输出压力和/或声学指标文件之前，先读取压力信号或频谱文件，然后可选地读取频率响应函数（FRF）或传递函数文件。

contents.des: Changes reference acoustic pressure.
contents.desTs: 更改参考声学压力。

contents.des: Computes iso-axial band surfaces and plots data vs. axial coordinate on them.
contents.desTs: 计算等轴带面并绘制数据与轴坐标的关系。

contents.des: Computes iso-radial band surfaces and plots data vs. radius on them.
contents.desTs: 计算等半径带面并绘制数据与半径的关系。

contents.des: Plot the development of force, force coefficient, moment, or moment coefficient across the     specified wall zones.
contents.desTs: 绘制指定墙壁区域的力、力系数、扭矩或扭矩系数的发展。

children.des: Create a new cumulative plot.
