children.desTs: 创建新的累积情节。

children.des: Delete an existing cumulative plot object.
children.desTs: 删除现有的累积地块对象。

children.des: Edit an existing cumulative plot object.
children.desTs: 编辑现有的累积地块对象。

children.des: Print the names of the existing cumulative plot objects to the console.
children.desTs: 将现有累积绘图对象的名称打印到控制台。

children.des: Print the properties of the specified cumulative plot object to the console.
children.desTs: 将指定累积绘图对象的属性打印到控制台。

children.des: Plot a cumulative plot in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中绘制累积图。

children.des: Print the value of a cumulative plot to the console.
children.desTs: 将累积图的值打印到控制台。

children.des: Write a cumulative plot to a file.
children.desTs: 将累积图写入文件。

contents.des: Enters the menu for creating and modifying plots containing multiple data sources.
contents.desTs: 进入创建和修改包含多个数据源的图的菜单。

children.des: Specify an existing report plot to include in this plot.
children.desTs: 指定要包含在此图中的现有报告图。

children.des: Specify an existing XY plot to include in this plot.
children.desTs: 指定要包含在此图中的现有XY图。

children.des: Prints the names of the variables selected for plotting.
children.desTs: 打印选择用于绘图的变量的名称。

children.des: Prints the names of the selected/loaded data sources including the files and in-session        plot objects.
children.desTs: 打印所选/加载的数据源的名称，包括文件和会话中绘图对象。

children.des: Prints the names of the legends to the console.
children.desTs: 将传奇的名称打印到控制台。

children.des: Specify a file to load for plotting. The file must be located in the working        directory.
children.desTs: 指定要加载以进行打印的文件。该文件必须位于工作目录中。

children.des: Plots the selected data in the active graphics window.
children.desTs: 在活动图形窗口中绘制选定的数据。

children.des: Prints the properties of whichever plot or file included in the multiple data sources        plot that you specify.
children.desTs: 打印您指定的多个数据源图中包含的任何图或文件的属性。

children.des: Removes whichever data source (plot or file) you specify.
children.desTs: 选择指定的任何数据源（打印或文件）。

children.des: Allows you to rename legend entries. Note that you must re-plot to see the legend name        change.
children.desTs: 允许您重命名图例项。请注意，您必须重新绘图才能看到图例名称的更改。

contents.des: Plots profile data.
contents.desTs: 绘制个人资料数据。

contents.des: Plots fast Fourier transform (FFT) of file data. If you respond      yes to Acoustic Analysis?, then additional Y     axis functions are made available.
contents.desTs: 绘制文件数据的快速傅里叶变换（FT）。如果您对声学分析？回答是，然后提供额外的Y轴功能。

contents.des: Plots data from an external file.
contents.desTs: 从外部文件绘制数据。

contents.des: Plots data from multiple external files.
contents.desTs: 从多个外部文件中绘制数据。

contents.des: Sets file plot parameters.
contents.desTs: 设置文件打印参数。

children.des: Sets the range for the  and  axes. If auto-scaling is not activated for a particular axis, you are        prompted for the minimum and maximum data values.
children.desTs: 设置和轴的范围。如果未为特定轴激活自动缩放，系统会提示您输入最小和最大数据值。

children.des: Sets the color of the field within the abscissa and ordinate axes.
children.desTs: 设置横坐标和纵坐标轴内字段的颜色。

children.des: Enables/disables display of curve key and sets its window title.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用曲线关键点的显示并设置其窗口标题。

children.des: Sets parameters for plot lines.
children.desTs: 设置地块线的参数。

children.des: Sets parameters for data markers.
children.desTs: 设置数据标记的参数。

children.des: Sets labels for plot axes.
children.desTs: 设置地块轴的标签。

children.des: Sets parameters for plot lines.
children.desTs: 设置地块线的参数。

children.des: Uses log scales for one or both axes.
children.desTs: 对一个或两个轴使用原木刻度。

children.des: Sets parameters for data markers.
children.desTs: 设置数据标记的参数。

children.des: Sets number formats for axes.
children.desTs: 设置轴的数字格式。

children.des: Specifies a file in which to write XY plot data.
children.desTs: 指定要在其中写入XY地块数据的文件。

children.des: Sets parameters for display of major and minor rules.
children.desTs: 设置显示主要规则和次要规则的参数。

children.des: XYplot window options. For a description of the items in this menu,see  display/set/windows/xy.
children.desTs: XY plot窗口选项。有关此菜单中项目的描述，请参阅map/set/Windows/xy。

contents.des: Enters the flamelet curves menu.
contents.desTs: 进入火焰曲线菜单。

children.des: Plots of a curve property.
children.desTs: 曲线属性的地块。

children.des: Writes curve to a file instead of plot.
children.desTs: 将曲线写入文件而不是绘图。

contents.des: Plots a histogram of the specified solution variable using the defined range and number of     intervals.
contents.desTs: 使用定义的范围和间隔数绘制指定解决方案变量的图表。

contents.des: Sets histogram plot parameters. Sub-menu items are the same as      file-set/ above.
contents.desTs: 设置柱状图参数。子菜单项与file-set/以上相同。

contents.des: Set the orientation of XY plot axis labels as either horizontal or axis-aligned.
contents.desTs: 将XY打印轴标签的方向设置为水平或轴对齐。

contents.des: Plots solution on surfaces.
contents.desTs: 在表面上绘制溶液。

contents.des: Sets plot direction for XY plot.
contents.desTs: 设置XY打印的打印方向。

contents.des: Contains commands that allow you to select the variablesfor which you want to display XY plots of residual histories in theactive graphics window.
contents.desTs: 包含允许您选择要在活动图形窗口中显示剩余历史的XY图的变量的命令。

contents.des: Sets residual plot parameters. Sub-menu items are the same as      file-set/ above.
contents.desTs: 设置剩余地块参数。子菜单项与file-set/以上相同。

contents.des: Disables the use of boundary face values when node values are disabled in solution XY     plots. This option is disabled by default, that is, boundary face values are used when node     values are disabled.
contents.desTs: 当在解决方案XY图中禁用节点值时，禁用边界面值。默认情况下禁用此选项，即当禁用节点值时，使用边界面值。

contents.des: Plots solution on surfaces and/or zones. Zone and surface names can be indicated using a    wildcard (*).
contents.desTs: 表面和/或区域上的绘图解决方案。区域和表面名称可以使用星号（*）指示。

contents.des: Sets solution plot parameters. Sub-menu items are the same as      file-set/ above.
contents.desTs: 设置解图参数。子菜单项与file-set/以上相同。

list.des: commands specific to plotting data.
list.desTs: 特定于打印数据的命令。

contents.des: Enter the menu for preferences covering appearance.
contents.desTs: 进入涵盖外观的首选项菜单。

children.des: Enter the menu for controlling Ansys logo visibility.
children.desTs: 进入控制Ansys徽标可见性的菜单。

children.des: Enable or disable the visibility of the Ansys logo in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 启用或禁用图形窗口中Ansys徽标的可见性。

children.des: Specify whether the Ansys logo is white or black.
children.desTs: 指定Ansys徽标是白色还是黑色。

children.des: Set the font size for the Fluent graphical user interface (GUI).
children.desTs: 设置Fluent图形用户界面（GUI）的字体大小。

children.des: Enable or disable the visibility of the axis triad in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中启用或禁用轴三坐标轴的可见性。

children.des: Enter the menu for controlling the display of 2D charts/plots.
children.desTs: 进入控制2D图表/图显示的菜单。

children.des: Specify the initial set of default colors for the rendering of curves.            Note that changing this setting requires any plots to be replotted before you            see the effect of the new setting.
children.desTs: 指定渲染曲线的初始默认颜色集。请注意，更改此设置需要在看到新设置的效果之前重新绘制任何图。

children.des: Enables enhanced plots, which is a beta feature. Enabling this feature exposes new           fields (all beta functionality).
children.desTs: 启用增强型绘图，这是一个测试版功能。启用此功能会公开新字段（所有测试版功能）。

children.des: Specify a color theme for the appearance of Ansys Fluent.
children.desTs: 为Ansys Fluent的外观指定颜色主题。

children.des: Enable/disable the console automatic-completer, which suggests available commands as        you type in the console.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用控制台自动完成器，当您在控制台中输入时，它会建议可用的命令。

children.des: Controls the primary background color of the graphics window.
children.desTs: 控制图形窗口的主背景色。

children.des: Controls the secondary background color when the style is set as a gradient.
children.desTs: 当样式设置为渐变时，控制次背景色。

children.des: Specify whether the background color is uniform or if there is a gradient.
children.desTs: 指定背景色是否均匀或是否有渐变。

children.des: Provides predefined color and style selections for the graphics window background        color.
children.desTs: 为图形窗口背景色提供预定义的颜色和样式选择。

children.des: Specify the color of graphics window text.
children.desTs: 指定图形窗口文本的颜色。

children.des: Specify whether the default view is orthographic or perspective.
children.desTs: 指定默认视图是正射视图还是透视视图。

children.des: Set the default face color for when the mesh is displayed.
children.desTs: 设置显示网格时的默认面颜色。

children.des: Specify how boundary conditions are grouped in the tree.
children.desTs: 指定边界条件在树中分组的方式。

children.des: Controls how many recently-used files are listed in the File        ribbon tab and the Fluent Launcher.
children.desTs: 控制“文件”功能区选项卡和“Fluent Launcher”中列出了最近使用的文件的数量。

children.des: Enables/Disables the "quick-edit" properties panels that appear when you select a        boundary in the graphics windows.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用在图形窗口中选择边界时出现的“快速编辑”属性面板。

children.des: Adds or removes the ruler from the graphics window. Note that you must be in          orthographic view for the ruler to be visible in the graphics         window.
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中添加或删除标尺。请注意，必须在正交视图中，标尺才能在图形窗口中可见。

children.des: Enters the menu for controlling selections in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以控制图形窗口中的选择。

children.des: Applies the selection color transparency to front-facing edges.
children.desTs: 将选区颜色透明化到正面边缘。

children.des: Specifies the color used to highlight edges when the Hover-Over           Highlight feature is enabled           (mouse-over-highlight-enabled). It is also the color used when items are selected in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 指定启用“悬停-上方高光”功能（启用鼠标悬停在高光上）时用于高光边缘的颜色。它也是在图形窗口中选择项目时使用的颜色。

children.des: Specifies the thickness of the edge highlights when the Hover-Over            Highlight feature is enabled            (mouse-over-highlight-enabled). It is also the thickness used when items are selected in the graphics window. Valid inputs are 1-10.
children.desTs: 指定启用悬停高光功能（启用鼠标悬停在高光上）时边缘高光的厚度。它也是在图形窗口中选择项目时使用的厚度。有效输入为1-10。

children.des: Specify which color indicates that a face is selected.
children.desTs: 指定指示选择面的颜色。

children.des: Specify the transparency of the coloring on a selected surface. 0.1 is fully opaque           and 1 is fully transparent.
children.desTs: 指定选定表面上着色的透明度。0.1是完全不透明的，1是完全透明的。

children.des: Enable/disable the display of result values in the graphics window upon mouse-over, when graphics objects displaying solution results are displayed.
children.desTs: 当显示显示解决方案结果的图形对象时，将鼠标放在图形窗口中启用/禁用结果值的显示。

children.des: Enable/disable the highlighted outline of a surface when hovered-over. Note that           objects must be redisplayed after changing this setting before the new setting is           visible.
children.desTs: 悬浮时启用/禁用表面的突出显示轮廓。请注意，更改此设置后必须重新显示对象，然后才能看到新设置。

children.des: Enable/disable the showing of the non-overlapping zones associated          with one-to-one mesh interfaces under Setup / Mesh Interfaces (under the name of their mesh interface) in the outline view tree as opposed to under their boundary condition types (such as Setup / Boundary           Conditions / Wall).
children.desTs: 启用/禁用与轮廓视图树中的“设置/网格界面”（在其网格界面的名称下）下的一对一网格界面关联的非重叠区域的显示，而不是在其边界条件类型（例如设置/边界条件/墙）下。

children.des: Enable/disable whether mesh edges are shown in a mesh display.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用网格边缘是否显示在网格显示中。

children.des: Enable/disable the display of the startup page when Ansys Fluent is started without loading        a mesh or case file.
children.desTs: 在不加载网格或案例文件的情况下启动Ansys Fluent时启用/禁用启动页面的显示。

children.des: Specify the specularity of all surfaces except those included in contour plots.        Sepecularity is the reflectiveness of a surface; higher values (closer to 1) equate to a more        reflective surface.
children.desTs: 指定除等值线图中包含的表面之外的所有表面的镜面性。镜面性是表面的反射率;值越大（接近1）等于反射性越强的表面。

children.des: Specify the specularity of contour surfaces. Sepecularity is the reflectiveness of a        surface; higher values (closer to 1) equate to a more reflective surface.
children.desTs: 指定轮廓表面的镜面性。镜面性是表面的反射性;较高的值（接近1）相当于反射性更强的表面。

children.des: Enable/disable the display of solver information in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用图形窗口中求解器信息的显示。

contents.des: Enter the menu for general preferences.
contents.desTs: 进入菜单查看一般偏好设置。

children.des: Select a Laplace smoothing option so that auto-partitioning prioritizes convergence and scalability during        solution. Through these options, the Laplace smoothing method is enabled so that adjacent highly-stretched cells        are grouped together in order to prevent partition boundaries from passing through areas of high-aspect ratio         cells. The options include:
children.desTs: 选择拉普拉斯平滑选项，以便自动分区在解决过程中优先考虑收敛和可扩展性。通过这些选项，启用拉普拉斯平滑方法，以便将相邻的高度拉伸单元分组在一起，以防止分区边界穿过高长宽比单元的区域。这些选项包括：

children.des: Enable/disable the automatic creation of a transcript file for each Ansys Fluent        session.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用为每个Ansys Fluent会话自动创建笔录文件。

children.des: Specify the default file format for saving mesh, case, and data files.
children.desTs: 指定用于保存网格、事例和数据文件的默认文件格式。

children.des: Specify the default file format for saving case and data files.
children.desTs: 指定保存案例和数据文件的默认文件格式。

children.des: Contains a listing of messages that can be displayed as Fluent starts.
children.desTs: 包含可以在Fluent启动时显示的消息列表。

children.des: You are given the choice of the default Fluent color theme or the new Dark color theme. You can also opt to keep your current color theme.
children.desTs: 您可以选择默认的Fluent颜色主题或新的Dark颜色主题。您还可以选择保留当前的颜色主题。

children.des: The message identifies changes in Fluent's behavior or capabilities deemed important enough to elevate with a mention outside of the Release Notes.
children.desTs: 该消息确定了Fluent的行为或功能中的更改，这些更改被认为足够重要，可以在发行说明之外提及。

children.des: The message informs you that Ansys Fluent is included in an Ansys QA service agreement. Speak with your service representative for information on the QA service agreement.
children.desTs: 该消息通知您Ansys Fluent包含在Ansys QA服务协议中。有关QA服务协议的信息，请与您的服务代表联系。

contents.des: Enter the menu for preferences covering appearance.
contents.desTs: 进入涵盖外观的首选项菜单。

children.des: Specify whether the entire model or just a wireframe is shown during manipulations in        the graphics window.
children.desTs: 指定在图形窗口中操作期间显示整个模型还是仅显示线框。

children.des: Enter the boundary markers menu.
children.desTs: 进入边界标记菜单。

children.des: Specify whether boundary markers are a fixed color or if they match the color of the           surface they are identifying.
children.desTs: 指定边界标记是否为固定颜色，或者是否与所识别的表面的颜色匹配。

children.des: Enable/disable boundary marker display.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用边界标记显示。

children.des: Specify the color of the inlet boundary markers.
children.desTs: 指定入口边界标记的颜色。

children.des: Specify marker density factor (0.1-1).
children.desTs: 指定标记密度因子（0.1-1）。

children.des: Specify the maximum number of markers at each boundary.
children.desTs: 指定每个边界处的最大标记数量。

children.des: Specify the color of the outlet boundary markers.
children.desTs: 指定出口边界标记的颜色。

children.des: Specify the scale factor for the boundary markers (0.1-10), which controls the           overall size of the markers.
children.desTs: 指定边界标记的比例因子（0.1-10），用于控制标记的总体大小。

children.des: Enable/disable the display of boundary markers for inlets.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用进水口边界标记的显示。

children.des: Enable/disable the display of boundary markers for outlets.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用插座边界标记的显示。

children.des: Enter the colormap settings menu.
children.desTs: 进入色彩映射设置菜单。

children.des: Specify the default colormap location.
children.desTs: 指定默认颜色映射位置。

children.des: Specify the length vs. width ratio for a vertical colormap, which controls the           thickness of the colormap; smaller values mean a thicker colormap.
children.desTs: 指定垂直色图的长度与宽度比，该比控制色图的厚度;较小的值意味着色图更厚。

children.des: Specify how/when the colormap border appears.
children.desTs: 指定颜色图边界的显示方式/时间。

children.des: Choose the default colormap.
children.desTs: 选择默认色彩映射表。

children.des: Specify whether there is a label for every colormap value or if some are           skipped.
children.desTs: 指定每个色彩映射值是否都有标签，或者是否跳过某些色彩映射值。

children.des: Specify the default colormap size.
children.desTs: 指定默认颜色映射大小。

children.des: Enable/disable the use of a logarithmic scale for the colormap.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用色彩图的对数比例。

children.des: Choose the length of the colormap as a fraction of graphics window height, when the           colormap is vertical.
children.desTs: 当颜色映射是垂直的时，选择颜色映射的长度作为图形窗口高度的一小部分。

children.des: Specify the colormap number label precision.
children.desTs: 指定色彩图编号标签精度。

children.des: Specify how colormap numbers are displayed.
children.desTs: 指定颜色图编号的显示方式。

children.des: Enable/disable the display of colormaps.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用色彩图的显示。

children.des: Specify how many number labels are skipped in the colormap.
children.desTs: 指定在色彩映射表中跳过多少个数字标签。

children.des: Specify whether colormap label text automatically scales with the colormap           size.
children.desTs: 指定色彩映射表标签文本是否根据色彩映射表大小自动缩放。

children.des: Specify the initial font size as a ratio of the colormap overall size, for vertically           aligned colormaps.
children.desTs: 对于垂直对齐的色彩图，将初始字体大小指定为色彩图总体大小的比率。

children.des: Set the font size for colormap labels.
children.desTs: 设置色彩映射标签的字体大小。

children.des: Set the font for colormap labels.
children.desTs: 设置颜色映射表标签的字体。

children.des: Specify whether the colormap appearance is smooth or banded.
children.desTs: 指定颜色映射表的外观是平滑的还是带状的。

children.des: Options for how drawing commands are stored in a video card's memory.
children.desTs: 用于如何将绘制命令存储在视频卡内存中的选项。

children.des: For better performance, the software can store list information using the graphics card. Alternatively, you can turn this off or specify that only segments or geometry lists are stored.
children.desTs: 为了获得更好的性能，该软件可以使用图形卡存储列表信息。或者，您可以关闭该功能或指定仅存储分段或几何列表。

children.des: Enable/disable double-buffering, which reduces screen flicker, but may use more memory        on some machines.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用双缓冲，这会减少屏幕闪烁，但可能会在某些机器上使用更多内存。

children.des: Controls for how embedded window dashboards are created and how they look.
children.desTs: 控制嵌入式窗口仪表板的创建方式及其外观。

children.des: Enable/disable the automatic embedding of the mesh graphics window (if displaying the mesh by default or via the 'Display Mesh' toolbar button), upon initialization.
children.desTs: 在初始化时启用/禁用网格图形窗口的自动嵌入（如果默认显示网格或通过“显示网格”工具栏按钮显示网格）。

children.des: Enable/disable the automatic embedding of the residual plot window into a new window Fluent starts computing.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用将剩余图窗口自动嵌入到新窗口中Fluent开始计算。

children.des: The layout of the dashboard displayed when the case file is saved is preserved for the next time the case is read.
children.desTs: 保存案例文件时显示的仪表板布局将保留，以便下次读取案例时使用。

children.des: A border is drawn around the windows embedded within the parent window.
children.desTs: 在嵌入父窗口中的窗口周围绘制边界。

children.des: Allows for the ability to view various graphics displays (mesh, contours, vectors, pathlines, particle tracks) without creating an object in the outline view tree that is saved with the case file.
children.desTs: 允许能够查看各种图形显示（网格、轮廓、载体、路径线、粒子轨迹），而无需在与案例文件一起保存的轮廓视图树中创建对象。

children.des: The software adjusts the camera near planes to improve z-buffer precision and to avoid graphical display artifacts like z-fighting. When this option is disabled, the camera near planes is adjusted automatically. Enable this option with surface priority to avoid z-fighting.
children.desTs: 该软件调整靠近平面的摄像机，以提高z缓冲区的精度，并避免图形显示瑕疵，如z战斗。当禁用此选项时，将自动调整靠近平面的摄像机。启用此选项并具有表面优先级，以避免z战斗。

children.des: Options and settings for how animation videos are saved.
children.desTs: 用于保存动画视频的选项和设置。

children.des: Options for specifying the bitrate quality and whether the H.264 compression technique is used.
children.desTs: 用于指定比特率质量以及是否使用H.264压缩技术的选项。

children.des: Specifies the bitrate quality of the saved video file.
children.desTs: 指定保存视频文件的比特率质量。

children.des: Choose whether or not to use the H.264 compression technique when writing the video file.
children.desTs: 选择在写入视频文件时是否使用H.264压缩技术。

children.des: Specifies the default format for saving video files.
children.desTs: 指定保存视频文件的默认格式。

children.des: Specifies the default frame rate (in frames per second) for saving video files.
children.desTs: 指定保存视频文件的默认帧速率（每秒帧）。

children.des: Specifies the default quality for saving video files.
children.desTs: 指定保存视频文件的默认质量。

children.des: Specifies the x-component of the resolution for saving video files.
children.desTs: 指定保存视频文件的分辨率的x分量。

children.des: Specifies the y-component of the resolution for saving video files.
children.desTs: 指定用于保存视频文件的分辨率的y分量。

children.des: Specifies the default scaling for saving video files.
children.desTs: 指定保存视频文件的默认缩放比例。

children.des: Choose whether or not to use smoothing on image resolution when scaling for saving video files.
children.desTs: 选择在缩放以保存视频文件时是否对图像分辨率使用平滑。

children.des: Choose whether or not to use the graphics window resolution when saving video files.
children.desTs: 选择保存视频文件时是否使用图形窗口分辨率。

children.des: Enter the graphics effects menu.
children.desTs: 进入图形效果菜单。

children.des: Enable/disable the smoothing of lines and text.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用线条和文本的平滑。

children.des: Specify the color of the grid lines when the ground plane grid is shown.
children.desTs: 显示地平面网格时指定网格线的颜色。

children.des: Enable/disable the display of the ground plane grid.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用地平面网格的显示。

children.des: Set the grid plane offset from the model as a percentage of the model size.
children.desTs: 将网格平面与模型的偏差设置为模型大小的百分比。

children.des: Specify the direction of the plane for the ground plane grid and reflections.
children.desTs: 指定地平面网格和反射的平面方向。

children.des: Enable/disable model reflections (mirror-type reflections).
children.desTs: 启用/禁用模型反射（镜像类型反射）。

children.des: Enable/disable dynamic shadows, which show shadows of geometric entities on other           objects based on lighting and object orientation.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用动态阴影，该阴影根据照明和对象方向显示其他对象上几何实体的阴影。

children.des: Enable/disable the display of model edges in reflections. Note that this can           negatively affect performance.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用反射中模型边缘的显示。请注意，这可能会对性能产生负面影响。

children.des: Enable/disable the display of static shadows on the ground plane.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用地平面上静态阴影的显示。

children.des: Enable/disable the updating of graphics effects as a model is being manipulated in           the graphics window.
children.desTs: 在图形窗口中操纵模型时启用/禁用图形效果的更新。

children.des: Specify the thickness of lines that appear in the graphics window.
children.desTs: 指定图形窗口中显示的线的厚度。

children.des: Specify the symbol used for indicating points in the graphics window (like the points        in an XY plot).
children.desTs: 指定用于指示图形窗口中的点（例如XY图中的点）的符号。

children.des: Enter the menu for saving picture settings.
children.desTs: 进入保存图片设置的菜单。

children.des: Specify the default format for saving pictures.
children.desTs: 指定保存图片的默认格式。

children.des: Specify the thinkness of lines for saved pictures.
children.desTs: 指定已保存图片的线条思维。

children.des: Enable/disable the use of hardware acceleration when saving images, where           possible.
children.desTs: 尽可能在保存图像时启用/禁用硬件加速的使用。

children.des: Specify the method for removing hidden surfaces. These methods vary in speed and        quality, depending on your machine.
children.desTs: 指定删除隐藏表面的方法。这些方法的速度和质量各不相同，具体取决于您的机器。

children.des: Enter the lighting menu.
children.desTs: 进入照明菜单。

children.des: Turn the headlight on or off or set it as automatic.
children.desTs: 打开或关闭前灯或将其设置为自动。

children.des: Specify the intensity of the headlight.
children.desTs: 指定前照灯的强度。

children.des: Specify the default lighting method.
children.desTs: 指定默认照明方法。

children.des: Enter the menu for meshing-specific graphics settings.
children.desTs: 进入网格特定图形设置的菜单。

children.des: Enable/disable graphics window display timeout.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用图形窗口显示超时。

children.des: Specify the graphics window display timeout value.
children.desTs: 指定图形窗口显示超临界值。

children.des: Enter the menu for selecting the predefined graphics effects settings.
children.desTs: 进入菜单以选择预定义的图形效果设置。

children.des: Enter the menu for controlling fast graphics performance preferences.
children.desTs: 进入控制快速图形性能首选项的菜单。

children.des: Specify whether or not faces are shown when interacting with the model.
children.desTs: 指定与模型交互时是否显示面。

children.des: Specify whether or not nodes are shown when interacting with the model.
children.desTs: 指定与模型交互时是否显示节点。

children.des: Specify whether or not the perimeter edges are shown when interacting with the       model.
children.desTs: 指定与模型交互时是否显示周边边。

children.des: Specify whether or not the silhouette is shown when interacting with the model.
children.desTs: 指定与模型交互时是否显示轮廓。

children.des: Specify whether the fast interactive display settings are on, off, or automatic.
children.desTs: 指定快速交互式显示设置是打开、关闭还是自动。

children.des: Specify whether or not transparencies remain when interacting with the model.
children.desTs: 指定与模型交互时是否保留透明度。

children.des: Enter the menu for minimum frame-rate settings.
children.desTs: 进入最低帧率设置菜单。

children.des: Enable/disable dynamic adjustment of quality loss per frame to get to the desired              frame rate.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用每帧质量损失的动态调整，以达到所需的帧率。

children.des: Enable/disable minimum frame rate.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用最低帧率。

children.des: With minimum frame rate enabled, Fluent will not cull beyond this number of              pixels.
children.desTs: 启用最低帧率后，Fluent不会剔除超过此像素数。

children.des: With minimum frame rate enabled, Fluent will cull at least this number of              pixels.
children.desTs: 启用最低帧率后，Fluent将至少剔除此数量的像素。

children.des: Specify the target frames-per-second.
children.desTs: 指定目标每秒帧数。

children.des: Choose a preset selection for how graphics are displayed.
children.desTs: 选择图形显示方式的预设选择。

children.des: Settings related to input data performance.
children.desTs: 与输入数据性能相关的设置。

children.des: Choose whether or not large surfaces are split into smaller ones, improving mesh display and interactive performance. A downside is that partition lines are always visible.
children.desTs: 选择是否将大表面拆分为小表面，以改善网格显示和交互性能。缺点是分隔线始终可见。

children.des: Choose whether or not surfaces are cached for improved performance of mesh redisplay and incremental display, even across objects.
children.desTs: 选择是否缓存表面，以提高网格重新显示和增量显示的性能，甚至跨对象也是如此。

children.des: Specify the size of the point tool (10-100).
children.desTs: 指定点工具的大小（10-100）。

children.des: Enable/disable the display of hidden surfaces.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用隐藏曲面的显示。

children.des: Enter the menu for specifying transparency preferences.
children.desTs: 进入指定透明度首选项的菜单。

children.des: Specify how Fluent applies transparency in the graphics window: Depth Peeling - best balance of performance and control, Z-Sort - Transparency is applied to all specified objects.
children.desTs: 指定Fluent如何在图形窗口中应用透明度：深度剥离-性能和控制的最佳平衡，Z排序-透明度应用于所有指定对象。

children.des: Specify how much transparency is applied to the interior of an object. Increasing the number of layers can increase rendering cost.
children.desTs: 指定对象内部应用多少透明度。增加层的数量可能会增加渲染成本。

contents.des: Enter the menu for preferences covering the Fluent Icing workspace.
contents.desTs: 进入涵盖Fluent Icing工作空间的首选项的菜单。

children.des: Enable/disable the exposure of advanced settings.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用高级设置的暴露。

children.des: Enable/disable the exposure of beta features.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用测试版功能的暴露。

children.des: Specify which boundaries are displayed by default after the mesh is read.
children.desTs: 指定读取网格后默认显示的边界。

children.des: Enable/disable the use of the Fluent Launcher for starting the Fluent solver when connecting to or creating a new Simulation. This allows you to launch calculations using a different number of CPUs, a different machine, or a queuing system..
children.desTs: 在连接到或创建新的模拟时启用/禁用使用Fluent Launcher来启动Fluent解算器。这允许您使用不同数量的中央处理器、不同的机器或排队系统启动计算。

contents.des: Enter the menu for preferences covering the Fluent Meshing workflows.
contents.desTs: 进入包含流畅网格工作流的首选项菜单。

children.des: Specify how Fluent Meshing will save data when you edit a task.
children.desTs: 指定编辑任务时Fluent Meshing将如何保存数据。

children.des: Enter the menu for specifying drawing settings.
children.desTs: 进入指定图形设置的菜单。

children.des: Enable/disable the automatic display of changes in the graphics window based on the           current task.
children.desTs: 根据当前任务启用/禁用图形窗口中自动显示更改。

children.des: Specify the cutoff number of face zones, beyond which, Fluent Meshing will not           automatically display changes.
children.desTs: 指定面部区域的截止数量，超过该数量，Fluent Meshing将不会自动显示更改。

children.des: Specify the cutoff number facets, beyond which, Fluent Meshing will not automatically           display changes.
children.desTs: 指定截止数量方面，超过该数量，Fluent Meshing将不会自动显示更改。

children.des: Enable/disable the saving of task editing data when writing a mesh file.
children.desTs: 写入网格文件时启用/禁用任务编辑数据的保存。

children.des: Specify a temporary location to hold generated mesh files. If nothing is specified,        Fluent Meshing will write to %TEMP% on Windows and to         /tmp on Linux.
children.desTs: 指定临时位置来保存生成的网格文件。如果没有指定任何内容，Fluent Meshing将在Windows上写入%BEP %，在Linux上写入/mp。

children.des: Enable/disable the printing of additional information  and messages in the        Console.
children.desTs: 在控制台中启用/禁用附加信息和消息的打印。

contents.des: Enter the menu for controlling navigation in Ansys Fluent.
contents.desTs: 进入Ansys Fluent中控制导航的菜单。

children.des: Enable/disable the printing of additional information  and messages in the        Console.
children.desTs: 在控制台中启用/禁用附加信息和消息的打印。

children.des: Enter the menu for controlling mouse mappings that include a modifier button such as            Ctrl and Shift.
children.desTs: 进入用于控制鼠标映射的菜单，其中包括修改器按钮（例如Alt和Alt）。

children.des: Specify the action/behavoir for Ctrl + left-mouse-button +              click.
children.desTs: 为Ctrl +鼠标左键+单击指定操作/按钮。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior for Ctrl + left-mouse-button +              drag.
children.desTs: 指定按住鼠标左按钮+拖动的动作/行为。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior for Ctrl + middle-mouse-button +              click.
children.desTs: 指定Alt+鼠标中键+单击的动作/行为。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior for Ctrl + middle-mouse-button +              drag.
children.desTs: 指定按住鼠标中键+拖动的动作/行为。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior for Ctrl + right-mouse-button +              click.
children.desTs: 指定按住鼠标右键+单击的动作/行为。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior for Ctrl + right-mouse-button +              drag.
children.desTs: 指定按住鼠标右键+拖动的动作/行为。

children.des: Specify whether the probe action provides a long description or a short              description.
children.desTs: 指定探测操作提供长描述还是短描述。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior of the mouse-wheel.
children.desTs: 指定鼠标轮的动作/行为。

children.des: Specify the sensitivity of the mouse-wheel (0 is least sensitive, 1 is most              sensitive).
children.desTs: 指定鼠标轮的灵敏度（0表示最不敏感，1表示最敏感）。

children.des: Reverse the behavior of the mouse-wheel.
children.desTs: 逆转鼠标轮的行为。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior for Shift + left-mouse-button +              click.
children.desTs: 指定Shift +鼠标左键+单击的操作/行为。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior for Shift + left-mouse-button +              drag.
children.desTs: 指定Alt+鼠标左按钮+拖动的动作/行为。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior for Shift + middle-mouse-button +              click.
children.desTs: 指定Alt+鼠标中键+单击的动作/行为。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior for Shift + middle-mouse-button +              drag.
children.desTs: 指定Alt+鼠标中键+拖动的动作/行为。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior for Shift + right-mouse-button +              click.
children.desTs: 指定Alt+鼠标右键+单击的动作/行为。

children.des: Specify the action/behavior for Shift + right-mouse-button +              drag.
children.desTs: 指定Alt+鼠标右键+拖动的动作/行为。

contents.des: Enter the menu for simulation preferences.
contents.desTs: 进入模拟首选项的菜单。

children.des: Specify the default turbulence model (viscous).
children.desTs: 指定默认的湍流模型（粘性）。

children.des: Use local residual scaling for solution residuals.
children.desTs: 对解残差使用局部残差缩放。

children.des: Enable/disable the application of poor mesh numerics to non-premixed or partially        premixed combustion cases, with the goal of increasing the robustness of the        calculations that use a PDF table. When enabled, the register-based definition for poor mesh        numerics treatment that is automatically created at initialization or when data is read (named        pmn_pdf_stability_marker) is activated, and thus applies the        treatment at regular intervals throughout the calculations to the cells that have an enthalpy        value that is less than the minimum enthalpy defined in the PDF table.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用将不良网格数字应用于非预混或部分预混燃烧情况，目标是提高使用PDF表的计算的稳健性。启用后，不良网格数字处理的基于寄存器的定义将在初始化或读取数据时自动创建（名为pmon_pdf_stability_marker）被激活，因此，在整个计算过程中以规律的时间间隔将处理应用于具有小于最小值的热塑性电池PDF表中定义的热函。

children.des: Enter the menu for report definition preferences.
children.desTs: 进入报告定义首选项菜单。

children.des: New report definitions will automatically create associated report files and        plots.
children.desTs: 新的报告定义将自动创建关联的报告文件和图。

children.des: Specify how many data points are read from the associated report file and plotted in the graphics window. If the        case/data files are already open, read the case and data again, after changing this setting, and re-plot to see the updated report plot.
children.desTs: 指定从关联的报告文件中读取并在图形窗口中绘制的数据点数量。如果案例/数据文件已打开，请在更改此设置后再次读取案例和数据，并重新绘制以查看更新的报告图。

list.des: commands for controlling preferences.
list.desTs: 控制偏好的命令。

contents.des: Enables the collection of detailed information about DPM evaporated mass for selected          zone types. Zone type choices include "none",            "lagr-wall-film-zones", "cell-zones"          (for free-stream particles), and "all-zones".
contents.desTs: 允许收集有关选定区域类型的拉曼蒸发质量的详细信息。区域类型选择包括“无”、“膜壁区”、“细胞区”（用于自由流颗粒）和“所有区”。

contents.des: Create an extended discrete phase summary report of the discrete phase injection(s). You can choose whether you want to save the extended report to a file or print it in the console window. For unsteady tracking, you will be asked whether you want to include in-domain particle/tracks in the report. You will be also prompted whether you want to select a single injection for the summary report. By default, all injections are included. The output depends on whether you have enabled the report/dpm-zone-summaries-per-injection? text command, in which case additional information is printed for escaped particles, such as per-injection data. Note that, for unsteady particle tracking, it is necessary to enable the report/dpm-zone-summaries-per-injection? text command before any particle parcels are injected into the domain.
contents.desTs: 创建离散相注入的扩展离散相总结报告。您可以选择是要将扩展报告保存到文件还是在控制台窗口中打印。对于不稳定跟踪，系统会询问您是否要在报告中包括域内粒子/轨迹。系统还会提示您是否要为总结报告选择单次注入。默认情况下，包括所有注射。输出取决于您是否启用了report/dpm-zone-sumaries-per-injection？文本命令，在这种情况下，会打印逸出颗粒的附加信息，例如每次注射的数据。请注意，对于不稳定颗粒跟踪，需要启用report/dpm-zone-sumaries-per-injection？在将任何粒子包注入域之前，文本命令。

contents.des: Enters the DPM histogram menu.
contents.desTs: 进入收件箱矩形菜单。

children.des: Computes the minimum/maximum of a sample variable.
children.desTs: 计算样本变量的最小值/最大值。

children.des: Deletes a sample from the loaded sample list.
children.desTs: 从加载的样本列表中删除样本。

children.des: Shows all samples in a loaded sample list.
children.desTs: 显示加载的样本列表中的所有样本。

children.des: Select a sample to be reduced.
children.desTs: 选择要缩小的样本。

children.des: Plots a histogram of a loaded sample.
children.desTs: 绘制已加载样本的图表。

children.des: Generates named expressions from DPM sample data collected on a planar surface.                The named expressions can be used for contour plotting on the planar surface where                DPM particles were sampled.
children.desTs: 根据在平面上收集的NPS样本数据生成命名公式。命名公式可用于在对NPS颗粒进行采样的平面上绘制轮廓。

children.des: Reads a sample file and adds it to the sample list.
children.desTs: 读取示例文件并将其添加到示例列表中。

children.des: Reduce a sample as specified by the data reduction parameters. This command is                available only after you selected the sample using the                  pick-sample-to-reduce text command.
children.desTs: 根据数据简化参数指定的简化样本。仅在使用pick-sample-to-reduce文本命令选择样本后，此命令才可用。

children.des: Enters the settings menu for the histogram.
children.desTs: 进入矩形图的设置菜单。

children.des: Automatically computes the range of the sampling variable for histogram plots.
children.desTs: 自动计算矩形图的采样变量的范围。

children.des: Computes the correlation of the sampling variable with another variable.
children.desTs: 计算抽样变量与另一个变量的相关性。

children.des: Computes a cumulative curve for the sampling variable or correlation variable when                        correlation? is specified.
children.desTs: 当相关性时，计算抽样变量或相关变量的累积曲线？指定了

children.des: Computes the Rosin Rammler parameters, Sauter, and other mean diameters.
children.desTs: 计算Rosin Rammler参数、Sauter和其他平均直径。

children.des: Uses bars for the histogram plot or xy-style.
children.desTs: 使用条形图或xy-style。

children.des: Enables/disables the use of logarithmic scaling on the abscissa of the                      histogram.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用在图表横坐标上使用对数缩放。

children.des: Specifies the maximum value of the x-axis variable for histogram plots.
children.desTs: 指定矩形图的x轴变量的最大值。

children.des: Specifies the minimum value of the x-axis variable for histogram plots.
children.desTs: 指定矩形图的x轴变量的最小值。

children.des: Specifies the number of bins.
children.desTs: 指定箱的数量。

children.des: Uses percentages of bins to be computed.
children.desTs: 使用要计算的箱的百分比。

children.des: Uses the cubic of the cumulation variable during computation of the cumulative curve.
children.desTs: 在计算累积曲线期间使用累积变量的立方。

children.des: Uses weighting with additional variables when sorting data into samples.
children.desTs: 在将数据分类到样本中时使用带有附加变量的加权。

children.des: Writes a histogram of a loaded sample into a file.
children.desTs: 将加载样本的图表写入文件。

children.des: Enters the settings menu for the sample data reduction. This command is                available only after you selected the sample using the                  pick-sample-to-reduce text command.
children.desTs: 进入示例数据简化的设置菜单。仅在使用pick-sample-to-reduce文本命令选择示例后，此命令才可用。

children.des: Sets the number of bins to be used for all variables in the data                      reduction.
children.desTs: 设置数据简化中用于所有变量的箱数。

children.des: Prints all current sample data reduction settings for all variables in the                      selected sample in the console.
children.desTs: 在控制台中打印选定示例中所有变量的所有当前示例数据简化设置。

children.des: Enables/disables the logarithmic scaling for a selected variable.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用选定变量的对数缩放。

children.des: Enables/disables the unsteady sample reduction into a steady-state                      injection file. This command is available only for sample files from unsteady                      particle tracking.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用将不稳定样本还原为稳态注入文件。此命令仅适用于来自不稳定颗粒跟踪的样本文件。

children.des: Sets the maximum value of the range to be considered for a specific                      variable.
children.desTs: 设置特定变量要考虑的范围的最大值。

children.des: Sets the minimum value of the range to be considered for a specific                      variable.
children.desTs: 设置特定变量要考虑的范围的最小值。

children.des: Sets the number of bins for a specific variable.
children.desTs: 设置特定变量的箱数。

children.des: Resets the specified maximum and                        minimum values for a specific variable.
children.desTs: 重置特定变量的指定最大和最小值。

children.des: Enables/disables the use of weighting in the data averaging in each                      bin.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用在每个箱中的数据平均中使用加权。

children.des: Sets the weighting variable for the data averaging in each bin.
children.desTs: 为每个bin中的数据求平均设置加权变量。

contents.des: Samples trajectories at boundaries and lines/planes.
contents.desTs: 在边界和线/平面处采样轨迹。

contents.des: Allows you to hook a previously loaded DEFINE_DPM_OUTPUT UDF          for file format specification for sampling of trajectories and VOF-to-DPM lump conversion          transcripts.
contents.desTs: 允许您勾连之前加载的DEFINE_RST_UTHER_UPUTE，以获取轨迹采样和VOF到RST块转换文字记录的文件格式规范。

contents.des: Enables/disables writing of sorted DPM sample files.
contents.desTs: 启用/禁用写入排序的示例文件。

contents.des: Prints discrete phase summary report.
contents.desTs: 打印离散阶段汇总报告。

contents.des: Enables/disables calculation of the escaped mass per injection. Note that for unsteady          particle tracking, if you want to report the mass of escaped particles per injection, this          text command must be enabled before any particles are injected into the domain.
contents.desTs: 启用/禁用每次注入逃逸质量的计算。请注意，对于不稳定颗粒跟踪，如果您想报告每次注入逃逸颗粒的质量，则必须在将任何颗粒注入域之前启用此文本命令。

contents.des: Prints a list of element flow rates at inlets and outlets. This reports the mass flow rates of          all chemical elements (in kg/s) flowing through the simulation boundaries. Note that          element mass flow rates are not stored in the data file. Therefore, you need to run at          least one iteration or time step to obtain these values.
contents.desTs: 打印入口和出口处的元素流量列表。这会报告流经模拟边界的所有化学元素的质量流量（以公斤/秒为单位）。请注意，元素质量流量不存储在数据文件中。因此，您需要运行至少一个迭代或时间步才能获得这些值。

contents.des: Enables/disables printing the detailed per-zone information about DPM evaporated mass          in DPM extended summary reports. This option is automatically enabled once            report/calc-exchange-data-on-zone-types is set to anything          other than "none".
contents.desTs: 启用/禁用在NPS扩展摘要报告中打印有关NPS蒸发质量的详细每个区域信息。一旦report/calc-exchange-data-on-zone-types设置为除“无”之外的任何内容，该选项就会自动启用。

contents.des: Enters the fluxes menu.
contents.desTs: 进入通量菜单。

children.des: Prints the electric current rate at boundaries. This text command is available                when potential equation is enabled.
children.desTs: 打印边界处的电流率。当启用势方程时，此文本命令可用。

children.des: Prints the wall film heat transfer rate at boundaries. This text command is only available                when you enable the Eulerian wall film model.
children.desTs: 打印边界处的墙膜热传递率。此文本命令仅在启用欧拉墙膜模型时可用。

children.des: Prints the wall film mass flow rate at boundaries. This text command is only available when                you enable the Eulerian wall film model.
children.desTs: 打印边界处的墙膜质量流量。此文本命令仅在启用欧拉墙膜模型时可用。

children.des: Prints the heat transfer rate at boundaries.
children.desTs: 打印边界处的热传递率。

children.des: Prints the sensible heat transfer rate at the boundaries.
children.desTs: 打印边界处的显热传递率。

children.des: Prints the mass flow rate at inlets and outlets.
children.desTs: 打印入口和出口的质量流量。

children.des: Prints the pressure work rate at the boundaries. This text command is only                available when the energy equation is enabled, the absolute velocity formulation is                selected, and zone motion is enabled for a fluid cell zone.
children.desTs: 打印边界处的压力功率。此文本命令仅在启用能量方程、选择绝对速度公式并为流体单元区域启用区域运动时可用。

children.des: Prints the radiation heat transfer rate at boundaries.
children.desTs: 打印边界处的辐射热传递率。

children.des: Prints the viscous work rate at the boundaries.  This text command is only                available when the energy equation is enabled and the pressure-based solver is                selected.
children.desTs: 打印边界处的粘性功率。此文本命令仅在启用能量方程并选择基于压力的求解器时可用。

contents.des: Enters the forces menu.
contents.desTs: 进入部队菜单。

children.des: Prints the center of pressure on wall zones.
children.desTs: 在墙壁区域上打印压力中心。

children.des: Computes the forces along the specified force vector for all wall zones.
children.desTs: 计算所有墙区域沿指定力向的力。

children.des: Computes the moments about the specified moment center for all wall zones.
children.desTs: 计算所有墙区域的指定矩中心的矩。

contents.des: Enters the heat exchanger menu.
contents.desTs: 进入热交换器菜单。

children.des: Prints total heat rejection.
children.desTs: 打印完全散热。

children.des: Prints inlet temperature.
children.desTs: 打印入口温度。

children.des: Prints outlet temperature.
children.desTs: 打印出口温度。

children.des: Prints mass flow rate.
children.desTs: 打印质量流量。

children.des: Prints fluid’s specific heat.
children.desTs: 打印液体的比重。

contents.des: Enter the modified settings menu.
contents.desTs: 进入修改后的设置菜单。

children.des: Specify which areas of setup will be checked for non-default settings for                generating the Modified Settings Summary table. The table is                displayed tabbed with the graphics window.
children.desTs: 指定将检查哪些设置区域的非默认设置以生成“修改设置摘要”表。该表与图形窗口一起显示。

children.des: Write the contents of the Modified Settings Summary table                to a file.
children.desTs: 将“修改设置摘要”表的内容写入文件。

contents.des: Prints summary report for a multiphase case setup.
contents.desTs: 打印多阶段病例设置的总结报告。

contents.des: Prints summary report for all current particles.
contents.desTs: 打印所有当前颗粒的摘要报告。

contents.des: Prints pathline summary report.
contents.desTs: 打印路径线摘要报告。

contents.des: Enables/disables calculation of volume reports at the phase level for multiphase          simulations. This option is disabled by default.
contents.desTs: 启用/禁用多相模拟的阶段级别的体积报告计算。默认情况下禁用此选项。

contents.des: Prints a histogram of a scalar quantity.
contents.desTs: 打印纯量的图表。

contents.des: Computes the area of the projection of selected surfaces along the , , or  axis.
contents.desTs: 计算选定表面沿、或轴的投影面积。

contents.des: Enters the simulation reports menu.
contents.desTs: 进入模拟报告菜单。

contents.des: Removes an existing simulation report. You are prompted to provide the name of the          existing report that you wish to delete.
contents.desTs: 删除现有模拟报告。系统会提示您提供要删除的现有报告的名称。

contents.des: Creates a copy of a specified simulation report. You are prompted to provide the name          of the existing report that you wish to copy.
contents.desTs: 创建指定模拟报告的副本。系统将提示您提供要复制的现有报告的名称。

contents.des: Writes the simulation report to an HTML file. Specify the name of the existing report,          as well as the name of the file and the output directory for the HTML report.
contents.desTs: 将模拟报告写入HTML文件。指定现有报告的名称以及文件名称和HTML报告的输出目录。

contents.des: Writes the simulation report to a PDF file. Specify the name of the existing report,          as well as the name of the file and the output directory for the PDF report.
contents.desTs: 将模拟报告写入PDF文件。指定现有报告的名称以及PDF报告的文件名称和输出目录。

contents.des: Creates a simulation report based on default settings or your own custom simulation          report settings. Once you provide a name for the report, the report is generated, while a          progress bar indicates the status of the report generation. When the report is completely          generated, it is dispayed in its own tab of the Fluent interface.
contents.desTs: 根据默认设置或您自己的自定义模拟报告设置创建模拟报告。一旦您提供了报告的名称，就会生成报告，而进度条则指示报告生成的状态。当报告完全生成时，它会在Fluent界面的自己的选项卡中显示。

contents.des: Prints a list of the generated reports for the current case into the console.
contents.desTs: 将当前案例生成的报告列表打印到控制台中。

contents.des: Enters the paremetric study menu for generating simulation reports.
contents.desTs: 进入参数研究菜单以生成模拟报告。

children.des: Generates a simulation report for a specified design point using the current                settings. Provide the identifying number of the design point (for example, use '0'                for the base design point (DP0), '1' for DP1, '2' for DP2, and so on).
children.desTs: 使用当前设置为指定设计点生成模拟报告。提供设计点的标识号（例如，对基本设计点（DP 0）使用“0”，对DP 1使用“1”，对DP 2使用“2”，等等）。

children.des: Generates a parametric simulation report using the current settings. If a report                already exists, you are asked if you would like to overwrite the existing                report.
children.desTs: 使用当前设置生成参数化模拟报告。如果报告已存在，系统会询问您是否要覆盖现有报告。

contents.des: Opens and reads a template file that contains customized settings for a simulation          report.
contents.desTs: 打开并读取包含模拟报告的自定义设置的模板文件。

contents.des: Allows you to present another name for a selected simulation report. You are prompted          to provide the name of the existing report, as well as the new name for the report.
contents.desTs: 允许您为所选模拟报告提供另一个名称。系统会提示您提供现有报告的名称以及报告的新名称。

contents.des: Resets all property settings to default values. You are prompted to provide the name          of the existing report for which you wish to reset the default values.
contents.desTs: 将所有属性设置重置为默认值。系统会提示您提供想要重置默认值的现有报告的名称。

contents.des: Displays the simulation report in the user interface. You are prompted to provide the          name of the existing report that you wish to view in the Fluent interface.
contents.desTs: 在用户界面中显示模拟报告。系统会提示您提供希望在Fluent界面中查看的现有报告的名称。

contents.des: Allows you to view the simulation report in your default web browser.
contents.desTs: 允许您在默认Web浏览器中查看模拟报告。

contents.des: Creates a text file that contains a list of the generated report names for the current          case. You are prompted for the file name and the desired path. By default, the current          working directory is used and the default name for the text file is            simulation-reports.txt.
contents.desTs: 创建一个文本文件，其中包含为当前案例生成的报告名称列表。系统会提示您输入文件名和所需路径。默认情况下，使用当前工作目录，并且文本文件的默认名称为simulation-reports.tt。

contents.des: Creates a file that contains a template of customized settings for a simulation          report.
contents.desTs: 创建一个包含模拟报告自定义设置模板的文件。

contents.des: Enters the reference value menu.
contents.desTs: 进入参考值菜单。

children.des: Sets reference area for normalization.
children.desTs: 设置标准化的参考区域。

children.des: Computes reference values from zone boundary conditions.
children.desTs: 根据区域边界条件计算参考值。

children.des: Sets reference density for normalization.
children.desTs: 设置标准化的参考密度。

children.des: Sets reference depth for volume calculation.
children.desTs: 设置体积计算的参考深度。

children.des: Sets reference enthalpy for enthalpy damping and normalization.
children.desTs: 为焓阻尼和标准化设置参考焓。

children.des: Sets reference length for normalization.
children.desTs: 设置规范化的引用长度。

children.des: Lists current reference values.
children.desTs: 列出当前参考值。

children.des: Sets reference pressure for normalization.
children.desTs: 设置标准化的参考压力。

children.des: Sets reference temperature for normalization.
children.desTs: 设置标准化的参考温度。

children.des: Sets reference velocity for normalization.
children.desTs: 设置标准化的参考速度。

children.des: Sets reference viscosity for normalization.
children.desTs: 设置标准化的参考粘性。

children.des: Sets reference yplus for calculation of Yplus Based Heat Transfer                Coefficient.
children.desTs: 设置参考yplus以计算基于Yplus的热传递系数。

children.des: Sets reference zone.
children.desTs: 设置参考区域。

contents.des: Prints a list of species mass flow rates at inlets and outlets. This reports the mass flow          rates of all species (in kg/s) flowing through the simulation boundaries. Note that          species mass flow rates are not stored in the data file. Therefore, you need to run at          least one iteration or time step to obtain these values.
contents.desTs: 打印入口和出口处的物质质量流率列表。这会报告流经模拟边界的所有物质的质量流率（以公斤/秒为单位）。请注意，物质质量流率不存储在数据文件中。因此，您需要运行至少一个迭代或时间步才能获得这些值。

contents.des: Prints the current settings for physical models, boundary conditions, material properties, and          solution parameters.
contents.desTs: 打印物理模型、边界条件、材料属性和解决方案参数的当前设置。

contents.des: Creates a surface integral report.
contents.desTs: 创建表面积分报告。

children.des: Prints the area of the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 打印选定表面的区域。

children.des: Prints area-weighted average of the specified quantity over the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 选定表面上指定数量的印刷面积加权平均值。

children.des: Prints the facet average of the specified quantity over the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定表面上打印指定数量的切面平均值。

children.des: Prints the maximum of the specified quantity over facet centroids of the selected                surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定表面的小面重心上打印指定数量的最大值。

children.des: Prints the minimum of the specified quantity over facet centroids of the selected                surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定表面的小平面重心上打印指定数量的最小值。

children.des: Prints the flow rate of the specified quantity over the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定表面上打印指定数量的流速。

children.des: Prints the integral of the specified quantity over the selected surfaces. You can include a                wildcard (*) within the surface names.
children.desTs: 在选定曲面上打印指定量的积分。您可以在曲面名称中包含一个星号（*）。

children.des: Prints the mass flow rate through the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 打印通过选定表面的质量流量。

children.des: Prints the mass-averaged quantity over the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定表面上打印质量平均量。

children.des: Prints the standard deviation of the scalar at the facet centroids of the surface.
children.desTs: 在表面的小面重心处打印纯量的标准差。

children.des: Prints sum of scalar at facet centroids of the surfaces.
children.desTs: 在表面的小平面重心处打印纯量和。

children.des: Prints the area-weighted uniformity index of the specified quantity over the selected                surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定曲面上打印指定数量的面积加权均匀性指数。

children.des: Prints the mass-weighted uniformity index of the specified quantity over the selected                surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定曲面上打印指定数量的质量加权均匀性指数。

children.des: Prints the vector-based flux of the specified quantity over the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定表面上打印指定量的基于载体的通量。

children.des: Prints the vector flux over the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定表面上打印向通量。

children.des: Prints the vector-averaged quantity over the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定表面上打印垂直平均量。

children.des: Prints the vertex average of the specified quantity over the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定表面上打印指定数量的平均点。

children.des: Prints the maximum of the specified quantity over vertices of the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定表面的顶点上打印指定数量的最大值。

children.des: Prints the minimum of the specified quantity over vertices of the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 在选定表面的顶点上打印指定数量的最小值。

children.des: Prints the volume flow rate through the selected surfaces.
children.desTs: 打印通过选定表面的体积流量。

contents.des: Enters the system menu.
contents.desTs: 进入系统菜单。

children.des: Prints information about installed general purpose graphical processing units.
children.desTs: 打印有关已安装的通用图形处理单元的信息。

children.des: Prints Ansys Fluent process information. This is used to report the memory                usage of each of the Ansys Fluent processes, both the virtual memory and the resident                memory. For Windows, the virtual memory corresponds to private bytes and the                resident memory corresponds to the working set; for further details, see the                Microsoft online documentation.
children.desTs: 打印Ansys Fluent进程信息。这用于报告每个Ansys Fluent进程的内存使用情况，包括虚拟内存和常驻内存。对于Windows，虚拟内存对应于专用字节，常驻内存对应于工作集;有关更多详细信息，请参阅Microsoft在线文档。

children.des: Systeminformation. This is used to report the CPU configuration of the machineswhere Ansys Fluent processes have been spawned.
children.desTs: Systeminform。这用于报告Ansys Fluent进程所在的机器的中央处理器配置。

children.des: Timerinformation. This is used to report CPU timings for user and kernelprocesses and detailed solver timings.
children.desTs: Timerinformation.这是用来报告用户和内核进程的CPU计时以及详细的求解器计时。

contents.des: Prints list of user-defined scalar flow rate at boundaries.
contents.desTs: 打印边界用户定义的纯量流量列表。

contents.des: Creates a VBM report. You will be prompted to select the Report          Type (Rotor Thrust, Rotor Power,          Rotor Torque, Rotor Roll-Moment,          Rotor-Pitch-Moment, Rotor-Xp-Force, and          Rotor-Yp-Force). You will then enter the Rotor          Names, specify the Output Type          (Quantity or Coefficient) is required,          provide the Report Files name and indicate whether you want the          report to be written.
contents.desTs: 创建VBM报告。系统将提示您选择报告类型（旋转推力、旋转功率、旋转扭矩、旋转滚转扭矩、旋转桨距扭矩、旋转桨Xp力和旋转桨Yp力）。然后您将输入旋转桨名称，指定需要的输出类型（数量或系数），提供报告文件名称并指示是否要编写报告。

contents.des: Creates a volume integral report.
contents.desTs: 创建体积积分报告。

children.des: Prints total mass of a phase within a selected cell                zone.
children.desTs: 打印选定单元区内相的总质量。

children.des: Prints mass-average of scalar over cell zones.
children.desTs: 打印单元区域上的纯量的质量平均值。

children.des: Prints mass-weighted integral of scalar over cell zones.
children.desTs: 打印单元区域上的纯量的质量加权积分。

children.des: Prints maximum of scalar over all cell zones.
children.desTs: 在所有像元区域上打印最大的纯量。

children.des: Prints minimum of scalar over all cell zones.
children.desTs: 在所有像元区域上打印最小的纯量。

children.des: Prints sum of scalar over all cell zones.
children.desTs: 打印所有像元区域上的纯量总和。

children.des: Prints sum of scalar over all cell zones multiplied by 2π.
children.desTs: 打印所有像元区域上的纯量总和乘以2 pi。

children.des: Prints total volume of specified cell zones.
children.desTs: 打印指定单元区的总体积。

children.des: Prints volume-weighted average of scalar over cell zones.
children.desTs: 打印单元区域上的标量的体积加权平均值。

children.des: Prints integral of scalar over cell zones.
children.desTs: 打印单元区域上的纯量积分。

list.des: commands used to return statistics for the simulation.
list.desTs: 用于返回模拟统计信息的命令。

contents.des: Enters the animation menu.
contents.desTs: 进入动画菜单。

children.des: Enters the animation definition menu.
children.desTs: 进入动画定义菜单。

children.des: Defines new animation.
children.desTs: 定义新动画。

children.des: Changes animation monitor attributes.
children.desTs: 更改动画监视器属性。

children.des: Contains options related to keyframe animations.
children.desTs: 包含与关键帧动画相关的选项。

children.des: Specifies a keyframe number and adds a frame to the keyframe                      animation.
children.desTs: 指定关键帧编号并将帧添加到关键帧动画。

children.des: Deletes all defined keyframes.
children.desTs: 初始化所有定义的关键帧。

children.des: Allows for the deletion of a single keyframe.
children.desTs: 允许删除单个关键帧。

children.des: Plays the defined keyframe animation.
children.desTs: 播放定义的关键帧动画。

children.des: Allows for the reading of a animation file                      (.anm).
children.desTs: 允许读取动画文件（.anm）。

children.des: Contains options for setting how the keyframes are played as an                      animation.
children.desTs: 包含用于设置如何将关键帧作为动画播放的选项。

children.des: Specifies which keyframe is used as the last frame in the                            animation.
children.desTs: 指定哪个关键帧用作动画中的最后一帧。

children.des: Specifies the increment used to control how the animation                            progresses. For example, a value of 1 means the                            animation will play every frame, a value of 2                            means the animation will play every other frame, and so on.
children.desTs: 指定用于控制动画如何进行的增量。例如，值1意味着动画将播放每一帧，值2意味着动画将每隔一帧播放一帧，等等。

children.des: Specifies which keyframe is used as the first frame in the                            animation.
children.desTs: 指定哪个关键帧用作动画中的第一帧。

children.des: Saves the keyframe animation with the provided name in the specified                      format.
children.desTs: 以指定格式使用提供的名称重命名关键帧动画。

children.des: Enters the object manipulation menu.
children.desTs: 进入对象操作菜单。

children.des: Clears solution animation object history.
children.desTs: 清除解决方案动画对象历史记录。

children.des: Copies solution animation object.
children.desTs: 复制解决方案动画对象。

children.des: Creates new solution animation object.
children.desTs: 创建新的解决方案动画对象。

children.des: Deletes solution animation object.
children.desTs: 卸载解决方案动画对象。

children.des: Edits solution animation object.
children.desTs: 编辑解决方案动画对象。

children.des: Enters the animation playback menu.
children.desTs: 进入动画播放菜单。

children.des: Deletes animation sequence.
children.desTs: 卸载动画序列。

children.des: Plays the selected animation.
children.desTs: 播放选定的动画。

children.des: Reads new animation from file or already defined animations.
children.desTs: 从文件或已定义的动画中读取新动画。

children.des: Specify a custom start frame, increment, and end frame for video                      export.
children.desTs: 指定视频输出的自定义开始帧、增量和结束帧。

children.des: Plays the 3D animation sequence using the view stored in the                      sequence.
children.desTs: 使用序列中存储的视图播放三维动画序列。

children.des: Enters the video menu.
children.desTs: 进入视频菜单。

children.des: Enters the advanced quality menu.
children.desTs: 进入高级质量菜单。

children.des: Sets the bitrate scale for saving the video file. The best is                                  64000 | high is 32000 | medium is 16000 | low is 8000.
children.desTs: 设置保存视频文件的比特率比例。最好是64000|最高为32000|中等为16000|最低为8000。

children.des: Controls whether H.264 encoding is used when the video file is                                  written.
children.desTs: 控制写入视频文件时是否使用H.264编码。

children.des: Specifies what format the video file will be written in (MP4 | AVI |                            MOV | MPEG).
children.desTs: 指定视频文件将以何种格式写入（MP4| AVI| MOV| MPG）。

children.des: Sets the target frames per second (FPS) for the saved video                            file.
children.desTs: 为保存的视频文件设置目标每秒帧（FPS）。

children.des: Sets the name of the saved video file.
children.desTs: 设置保存的视频文件的名称。

children.des: Sets the quality of the saved video file.
children.desTs: 设置保存的视频文件的质量。

children.des: Expands or collapses the resolution based on this scaling                            factor.
children.desTs: 根据此缩放因子扩展或折叠分辨率。

children.des: Controls whether the resolution of the saved video file matches that                            of the images used to create it.
children.desTs: 控制保存视频文件的分辨率是否与创建该文件所用图像的分辨率相匹配。

children.des: Writes animation sequence to the file.
children.desTs: 将动画序列写入文件。

children.des: Enter the pulse animation menu (only available when one or more particle track                or pathline graphics objects are defined).
children.desTs: 进入脉冲动画菜单（仅在定义了一个或多个粒子轨迹或路径线图形对象时可用）。

children.des: Enter the pulse hardcopy menu.
children.desTs: 进入脉冲硬拷贝菜单。

children.des: Enters the hardcopy/save-picture color mode menu.
children.desTs: 进入硬拷贝/保存图片颜色模式菜单。

children.des: Plots hardcopies in color.
children.desTs: 以彩色绘制硬拷贝。

children.des: Converts color to grayscale for hardcopy.
children.desTs: 对于硬拷贝，将颜色复制为灰度。

children.des: Displays the current hardcopy color mode.
children.desTs: 显示当前硬拷贝颜色模式。

children.des: Converts color to monochrome (black and white) for                                  hardcopy.
children.desTs: 对于硬拷贝，将颜色切换为单色（黑色和白色）。

children.des: Sets the resolution for EPS and Postscript files; specifies the                            resolution in dots per inch (DPI) instead of setting the width and                            height.
children.desTs: 设置PS和PostScript文件的分辨率;以每英寸点（DPA）为单位指定分辨率，而不是设置宽度和高度。

children.des: Enters the set hardcopy driver menu.
children.desTs: 进入设置硬拷贝驱动程序菜单。

children.des: Produces encapsulated PostScript (EPS) output for                                  hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成封装的EPS输出。

children.des: Produces GLB output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成GLB输出。

children.des: Produces HOOPS Visualize Stream Format (HSF) output for                                  hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成HOOPS可视化流格式（HSF）输出。

children.des: Produces JPEG output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成JPEG输出。

children.des: Lists the current hardcopy driver.
children.desTs: 列出当前硬拷贝驱动程序。

children.des: Sets the hardcopy options. Available options are: “no                                  gamma correction", disables gamma correction of colors;                                  “pen speed = f", where f is a real number in [0,1];                                  “physical size = (width, height)", where width and height                                  are the actual measurements of the printable area of the page in                                  centimeters; “subscreen = (left, right, bottom, top)",                                  where left, right, bottom, and top are numbers in [-1,1]                                  describing a subwindow on the page in which to place the hardcopy.                                  The options may be combined by separating them with commas. The                                  pen speed option is only meaningful to the HPGL driver.
children.desTs: 设置硬拷贝选项。可用选项包括：“无伽玛修正”，禁用颜色的伽玛修正;“笔速= f”，其中f是[0，1]中的真实数;“物理大小=（宽度、高度）”，其中宽度和高度是页面可打印区域的实际测量值，单位为厘米;“子屏幕=（左、右、底部、顶部）”，其中左、右、底部和顶部是[-1，[1]描述页面上用于放置硬拷贝的子窗口。可以通过用逗号分隔来组合这些选项。笔速选项仅对HPGL驱动程序。

children.des: Uses PNG output for hardcopies. (This is the default file                                  type.)
children.desTs: 硬拷贝使用PNG输出。(This是默认文件类型。）

children.des: Enters the PostScript driver format menu.
children.desTs: 进入收件箱驱动程序格式菜单。

children.des: Enables a raster file that may be larger than the                                        standard raster file, but will print much more                                        quickly.
children.desTs: 启用可能比标准格栅文件大但打印速度更快的格栅文件。

children.des: Enables the standard raster file.
children.desTs: 启用标准格栅文件。

children.des: Enables a run-length encoded raster file that will be                                        about the same size as the standard raster file, but will                                        print slightly more quickly.
children.desTs: 启用行程编码的格栅文件，其大小与标准格栅文件大致相同，但打印速度稍快。

children.des: Enables the standard vector file.
children.desTs: 启用标准载体文件。

children.des: Produces PostScript output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成收件箱输出。

children.des: Produces PPM output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成PPM输出。

children.des: Produces TIFF output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 为硬拷贝生成Tivf输出。

children.des: Uses VRML output for hardcopies.
children.desTs: 使用TLR输出进行硬拷贝。

children.des: Save the image with a white background.
children.desTs: 将图像保存为白色背景。

children.des: Controls the size and quality of how JPEG files are saved based on a                            scale of 0-100, with zero being low quality small files and 100 being                            high quality larger files.
children.desTs: 根据0-100的比例控制JPEG文件的保存方式的大小和质量，0表示低质量的小文件，100表示高质量的大文件。

children.des: Specify the orientation of the picture. If this option is enabled,                            the picture is made in landscape mode; otherwise, it is made in portrait                            mode.
children.desTs: 指定图片的方向。如果启用此选项，则以横向模式制作图片;否则，以纵向模式制作图片。

children.des: Applies the settings of the color-mode, invert-background (white or                            as seen in the graphics window), and landscape options to the currently                            active graphics window to preview the appearance of printed                            hardcopies.
children.desTs: 将颜色模式、倒置背景（白色或如图形窗口中所示）和横向选项的设置初始化到当前活动的图形窗口，以预览打印硬拷贝的外观。

children.des: Disables/enables the use of the current graphics window resolution                            when saving an image of the graphics window. If disabled, the resolution                            will be as specified for x-resolution                            andy-resolution.
children.desTs: 当保存图形窗口的图像时，禁用/启用当前图形窗口分辨率。如果禁用，分辨率将与x分辨率和y分辨率相同。

children.des: Sets the width of raster-formatted images in pixels (0 implies                            current window size).
children.desTs: 以像素为单位设置格栅格式图像的宽度（0表示当前窗口大小）。

children.des: Sets the height of raster-formatted images in pixels (0 implies                            current window size).
children.desTs: 以像素为单位设置格栅格式图像的高度（0表示当前窗口大小）。

children.des: Set whether the pulse is a single pulse or continuous.
children.desTs: 设置脉冲是单脉冲还是连续脉冲。

children.des: Enters the pulse video menu.
children.desTs: 进入脉冲视频菜单。

children.des: Enters the advanced quality menu.
children.desTs: 进入高级质量菜单。

children.des: Sets the bitrate scale for saving the pulse video file. The                                  best is 64000 | high is 32000 | medium is 16000 | low is                                  8000.
children.desTs: 设置保存脉冲视频文件的比特率比例。最好是64000|最高为32000|中等为16000|最低为8000。

children.des: Controls whether H.264 encoding is used when the pulse video                                  file is written.
children.desTs: 控制写入脉冲视频文件时是否使用H.264编码。

children.des: Specifies what format the pulse video file will be written in (MP4 |                            AVI | FLV | MOV | MPEG).
children.desTs: 指定脉冲视频文件将以何种格式写入（MP4| AVI| FLV| MOV| MPG）。

children.des: Sets the target frames per second (FPS) for the saved pulse video                            file.
children.desTs: 为保存的脉冲视频文件设置目标每秒帧（FPS）。

children.des: Sets the name of the saved pulse video file.
children.desTs: 设置保存的脉搏视频文件的名称。

children.des: Sets the quality of the saved pulse video file.
children.desTs: 设置保存的脉搏视频文件的质量。

children.des: Expands or collapses the resolution based on this scaling                            factor.
children.desTs: 根据此缩放因子扩展或折叠分辨率。

children.des: Controls whether the resolution of the saved pulse video file                            matches that of the images used to create it.
children.desTs: 控制保存的脉冲视频文件的分辨率是否与用于创建该文件的图像的分辨率相匹配。

children.des: Select a pathline or particle track graphics object, specify whether you                      want to write a video file or picture files, and enter the destination                      directory for the files. Continuous pulse animations                      result in a 5 second video. Single pulse animations run                      for a full cycle.
children.desTs: 选择路径线或粒子轨迹图形对象，指定是要写视频文件还是图片文件，然后输入文件的目标目录。连续脉冲动画会生成5秒的视频。单脉冲动画会运行一个完整的周期。

contents.des: Enters the cell register operations menu.
contents.desTs: 进入单元格寄存操作菜单。

children.des: Creates a new cell register operation.
children.desTs: 创建新的单元寄存器操作。

children.des: Deletes a cell register operation.
children.desTs: 初始化单元格寄存器操作。

children.des: Edits an existing cell register operation.
children.desTs: 编辑现有的单元格寄存器操作。

children.des: Lists the currently defined cell register operations.
children.desTs: 列出当前定义的单元格寄存器操作。

children.des: Lists the properties of a report register operation.
children.desTs: 列出报表寄存器操作的属性。

list.des: commands used to create and manage solution controls, such as animation, cell registers, monitors, initialization, etc.
list.desTs: 用于创建和管理解决方案控件的命令，例如动画、单元寄存器、监视器、初始化等。

contents.des: Makes it so that points are snapped to their closest valid location on the                         domain. This setting, when enabled, avoids point surface creation failures                         when the point surface is created from the TUI or GUI.
contents.desTs: 使点捕捉到域上最近的有效位置。启用此设置后，可以避免从TUI或图形界面创建点表面时点表面创建失败。

contents.des: Extracts a circular slice.
contents.desTs: 提取圆形切片。

contents.des: Removes a defined data surface.
contents.desTs: 初始化定义的数据表面。

contents.des: Allows you to edit any of the listed available surfaces.
contents.desTs: 允许您编辑任何列出的可用表面。

contents.des: Enters the list of surfaces to imprint from and the name of the new imprinted surface.
contents.desTs: 输入要压印的表面列表以及新压印表面的名称。

contents.des: Clips a data surface (surface, curve, or point) between two isovalues.
contents.desTs: 裁剪两个等值线之间的数据表面（表面、曲线或点）。

contents.des: Extracts an iso-surface (surface, curve, or point) from the current data field.
contents.desTs: 从当前数据字段提取等值面（表面、曲线或点）。

contents.des: Extracts a linear slice in 2D, given the normal to the line and a distance from the origin.
contents.desTs: 给定线的法向和距原点的距离，提取2D线性切片。

contents.des: Defines a “line" surface by specifying the two endpoint coordinates.
contents.desTs: 通过指定两个端点坐标来定义“线”表面。

contents.des: Displays the ID and name, and the number of point, curve, and surface facets of the current     surfaces.
contents.desTs: 显示ID和名称以及当前表面的点、曲线和表面刻面的数量。

contents.des: Extracts a line surface that you define by using the mouse to select the endpoints.
contents.desTs: 提取通过使用鼠标选择端点定义的线表面。

contents.des: Extracts a planar surface defined by selecting three points with the mouse.
contents.desTs: 提取通过用鼠标选择三个点定义的平面表面。

contents.des: Extracts a “rake" surface that you define by using the mouse to select the endpoints.
contents.desTs: 提取您通过使用鼠标选择端点定义的“耙”表面。

contents.des: Creates multiple iso-surfaces at once. Accepts zone names, lists of zone                         ID’s, and wildcards.
contents.desTs: 一次创建多个等值面。接受区域名称、区域ID列表和通配符。

contents.des: Creates multiple planes at once. Accepts zone names, lists of zone                         ID’s, and wildcards.
contents.desTs: 一次创建多个平面。接受区域名称、区域ID列表和通配符。

contents.des: Creates multiple data surfaces at one time. Accepts zone names, lists of zone ID’s, and     wildcards.
contents.desTs: 一次创建多个数据表面。接受区域名称、区域ID列表和外卡。

contents.des: Defines a data surface consisting of mesh faces on the partition boundary.
contents.desTs: 定义由分区边界上的网格面组成的数据表面。

contents.des: Extracts a planar slice.
contents.desTs: 提取平面切片。

contents.des: Create a plane from a coordinate plane, point and normal, or three                         points.
contents.desTs: 从坐标平面、点和法向或三个点创建平面。

contents.des: Extracts a rectangular array of data points.
contents.desTs: 提取数据点的矩形数组。

contents.des: Defines a “point" surface by specifying the coordinates.
contents.desTs: 通过指定坐标定义“点”表面。

contents.des: Extracts a quadric slice.
contents.desTs: 提取二次切片。

contents.des: Extracts a “rake" surface, given the coordinates of the endpoints.
contents.desTs: 给定端点的坐标，提取“耙子”表面。

contents.des: Renames a defined data surface.
contents.desTs: 重命名已定义的数据表面。

contents.des: Recreates missing surface zones by resetting the case surface list.
contents.desTs: 通过重置事例曲面列表重新创建缺失的曲面区域。

contents.des: Extracts a spherical slice.
contents.desTs: 提取球形切片。

contents.des: Defines a structural “point" surface by specifying the                         coordinates.
contents.desTs: 通过指定坐标定义结构“点”曲面。

contents.des: Extracts all cells intersected by a data surface.
contents.desTs: 提取数据表面叠加的所有单元格。

contents.des: Sets the rendering priority for surfaces as low, medium, or high, which is                         used to determine which surface will be displayed when there is a conflict                         of coincident surfaces.
contents.desTs: 将表面的渲染优先级设置为低、中或高，用于确定当重合表面存在冲突时将显示哪个表面。

contents.des: Transforms surface.
contents.desTs: 变形表面。

contents.des: Creates a surface of a designated zone and gives it a specified name.
contents.desTs: 创建指定区域的表面并为其赋予指定的名称。

list.des: commands related to creating and manipulating surfaces.
list.desTs: 与创建和操纵表面相关的命令。

contents.des: Switches from the solution mode to the meshing mode. This text command is only available if     you have not yet read a mesh or a case file.
contents.desTs: 从解决方案模式切换到网格模式。此文本命令仅在您尚未阅读网格或案例文件时可用。

list.des: the command to transfer your solution data to Fluent in meshing mode.
list.desTs: 以网格模式将解决方案数据传输到Fluent的命令。

contents.des: Commands associated with transient postprocessing.
contents.desTs: 与瞬时后处理相关的命令。

children.des: Create a transient animation by selecting one or more of the existing animation        definitions.
children.desTs: 通过选择一个或多个现有动画定义创建瞬时动画。

children.des: Compare the results of 2 data files using a contour plot. A difference plot is also        displayed.
children.desTs: 使用等值线图比较2个数据文件的结果。还显示差异图。

children.des: Allows you to select an existing graphics object and the software will reset the        minimum and maximum values for the given plot, allowing it to have a range that reflects the        absolute minimum and maximum values for the entire dataset. This ensures that the colormap        will show the same range for an entire transient display or animation.
children.desTs: 允许您选择现有的图形对象，软件将重置给定图的最小和最大值，使其具有反映整个数据集绝对最小和最大值的范围。这确保色彩图将为整个瞬时显示或动画显示相同的范围。

children.des: Allows you to select an object to create a transient display, which is an animation        that you can watch as it is played in the graphics window, but no files are saved.
children.desTs: 允许您选择对象来创建暂时显示，这是一个动画，您可以在图形窗口中播放时观看，但不保存任何文件。

children.des: Choose whether or not to perform transient postprocessing on a completed transient run.                If you intend to perform additional calculations, you must start a new Fluent                session to avoid any issues.
children.desTs: 选择是否对已完成的临时运行执行临时后处理。如果您打算执行其他计算，则必须启动新的Fluent会话以避免出现任何问题。

children.des: Allows you to select a report file to generate the complete data for the report        definitions contained within it based on the selected dataset.
children.desTs: 允许您选择报告文件，以根据所选数据集为其中包含的报告定义生成完整数据。

children.des: Options and settings related to selecting timesteps for the transient dataset.
children.desTs: 与选择瞬时数据集的时间步相关的选项和设置。

children.des: Select all of the timesteps for transient postprocessing. These are the data files           that the software finds in the working directory according to the latest data file loaded           in the session.
children.desTs: 选择暂时后处理的所有时间步。这些是软件根据会话中加载的最新数据文件在工作目录中找到的数据文件。

children.des: Settings related to customizing the selected timesteps.
children.desTs: 与自定义所选时间步相关的设置。

children.des: Allows you to select individual timesteps to be used for transient                            postprocessing.
children.desTs: 允许您选择要用于暂时后处理的各个时间步。

children.des: Allows you to pick the first and last timestep and specify an increment to select                            the timesteps in-between.
children.desTs: 允许您选择第一个和最后一个时间步，并指定增量来选择中间的时间步。

children.des: Selects only the first timestep in the list.
children.desTs: 仅指定列表中的第一个时间步。

children.des: Selects only the last timestep in the list.
children.desTs: 仅指定列表中的最后一个时间步。

list.des: commands related to using transient postprocessing.
list.desTs: 与使用瞬时后处理相关的命令。

contents.des: Enter the turbo setup workflow menu.
contents.desTs: 进入涡轮设置工作流程菜单。

contents.des: Enter the workflow menu for the turbo setup workflow.
contents.desTs: 进入涡轮设置工作流程的工作流程菜单。

contents.des: Disables the turbo setup workflow.
contents.desTs: 禁用涡轮设置工作流程。

contents.des: Enables the turbo setup workflow.
contents.desTs: 启用涡轮设置工作流程。

contents.des: Resets the turbo setup workflow.
contents.desTs: 重置涡轮设置工作流程。

list.des: commands related to using the Turbo Workflow.
list.desTs: 与使用涡轮工作流程相关的命令。

contents.des: Displays 2D contours.
contents.desTs: 显示2D轮廓。

contents.des: Displays average contours.
contents.desTs: 显示平均轮廓。

contents.des: Computes turbomachinery quantities.
contents.desTs: 计算可重写数量。

contents.des: Sets the current turbo topology for global use.
contents.desTs: 设置全局使用的当前turbo拓扑。

contents.des: Writes the turbo report to file.
contents.desTs: 将涡轮报告写入文件。

contents.des: Displays average XY plots.
contents.desTs: 显示平均XY图。

list.des: commands related to results and reporting for turbomachinery.
list.desTs: 与收件箱的结果和报告相关的命令。

contents.des: Controls whether and how graphics displays are mirrored. That                                        is, you can choose from existing symmetry boundaries and                                        defined mirror planes                                                (views/mirror-planes/create).                                        Enter () on the first prompt to                                        remove any applied mirror planes.
contents.desTs: 控制图形显示是否以及如何镜像。也就是说，您可以从现有的对称边界和定义的镜像平面（视图/镜像平面/创建）中进行选择。在第一个提示下输入（）以删除任何应用的镜像平面。

contents.des: Scales and centers the current scene without changing its orientation.
contents.desTs: 缩放当前场景并将其中心化，而不更改其方向。

contents.des: Enters the camera menu to modify the current viewing parameters.
contents.desTs: 进入相机菜单以修改当前查看参数。

children.des: Adjusts the camera position and target.
children.desTs: 调整相机位置和目标。

children.des: Sets the field of view (width and height).
children.desTs: 设置视野（宽度和高度）。

children.des: Adjusts the camera position without modifying the target.
children.desTs: 在不修改目标的情况下调整相机位置。

children.des: Adjusts the camera target without modifying the position.
children.desTs: 调整相机目标而不修改位置。

children.des: Sets the camera position.
children.desTs: 设置相机位置。

children.des: Toggles between perspective and orthographic views.
children.desTs: 在透视视图和正投影视图之间切换。

children.des: Adjusts the camera up-vector.
children.desTs: 调整摄像机上向量。

children.des: Sets the point to be the center of the camera view.
children.desTs: 将该点设置为相机视图的中心。

children.des: Sets the camera up-vector.
children.desTs: 设置相机向上方向。

children.des: Adjusts the camera’s field of view. This operation is similar to dollying the camera in        or out of the scene. Dollying causes objects in front to move past you. Zooming changes the        perspective effect in the scene (and can be disconcerting).
children.desTs: 调整相机的视野。此操作类似于将相机放入或移出场景。抚摸会导致前面的物体从您身边移动。缩放会改变场景中的透视效果（并且可能会令人不安）。

contents.des: Resets view to front and center.
contents.desTs: 将视图重置为前方和中心。

contents.des: Removes a view from the list.
contents.desTs: 从列表中删除视图。

contents.des: Returns to the camera position before the last manipulation.
contents.desTs: 返回到最后一次操作之前的摄像机位置。

contents.des: Lists predefined and saved views.
contents.desTs: 列出预定义和保存的视图。
