contents.des: Controls related to user-defined mirror planes (that is,                                        non-symmetry planes).
contents.desTs: 与用户定义的镜像平面（即非对称平面）相关的控制。

children.des: Creates a new mirror plane.
children.desTs: 创建新的镜像平面。

children.des: Deletes a user-defined mirror plane.
children.desTs: 初始化用户定义的镜像平面。

children.des: Lists the available user-defined mirror                                                  planes.
children.desTs: 列出可用的用户定义镜像平面。

children.des: Lists the properties of the specified                                                  user-defined mirror plane. Specifically, it lists                                                  the coefficients, distance and whether the plane                                                  is currently applied.
children.desTs: 列出指定用户定义的镜像平面的属性。具体来说，它列出了系数、距离以及平面当前是否应用。

contents.des: Sets the zones about which the domain is mirrored (symmetry                                        planes).
contents.desTs: 设置域镜像的区域（对称平面）。

contents.des: Reads views from a view file.
contents.desTs: 从视图文件读取视图。

contents.des: Uses a saved view.
contents.desTs: 使用保存的视图。

contents.des: Saves the current view to the view list.
contents.desTs: 将当前视图复制到视图列表。

contents.des: Options for synchronizing graphics when multiple windows are                                        displayed.
contents.desTs: 显示多个窗口时同步图形的选项。

children.des: Adds the specified graphics windows to the                                                  list of synchronized windows.
children.desTs: 将指定的图形窗口添加到同步窗口列表中。

children.des: Adds all of the open graphics windows to the                                                  list of synchronized windows.
children.desTs: 将所有打开的图形窗口添加到同步窗口列表中。

children.des: Prints a listing of the windows that are                                                  synchronized to the Console.
children.desTs: 打印同步到控制台的窗口列表。

children.des: Removes the specified graphics window(s)                                                  from the synchronization process.
children.desTs: 从同步过程中同步指定的图形窗口。

children.des: Starts the synchronization process for the                                                  specified graphics windows. You are prompted for                                                  the primary window.
children.desTs: 开始指定图形窗口的同步过程。系统会提示您输入主窗口。

children.des: Stops the window synchronization                                                  process.
children.desTs: 停止窗口同步过程。

contents.des: Writes selected views to a view file.
contents.desTs: 将选定的视图写入视图文件。

list.des: commands related to camera and view manipulation in the graphics window.
list.desTs: 与图形窗口中的相机和视图操纵相关的命令。

contents.des: Enters the battery model menu.
contents.desTs: 进入电池型号菜单。

children.des: Enables the menu for the battery pack builder.
children.desTs: 启用电池组构建器的菜单。

children.des: Constructs the battery pack.
children.desTs: 构建电池组。

children.des: Creates non-conformal interfaces between the battery modules and the cold           plate.
children.desTs: 在电池模块和冷板之间创建非保形接口。

children.des: Sets battery connections.
children.desTs: 设置电池连接。

children.des: Enters the menu for the battery ROM took kit. See Using the Battery ROM Tool Kit in the Fluent User's Guide for details about the below        text commands.
children.desTs: 进入电池只读存储器套件的菜单。有关以下文本命令的详细信息，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中的使用电池只读存储器工具套件。

children.des: Allows you to specify heat fluxes through the selected faces.
children.desTs: 允许您指定通过选定面的热通量。

children.des: Allows you to specify temperature at the selected faces.
children.desTs: 允许您指定选定面的温度。

children.des: Adds the selected cell zones to the list of the LTI output parameters. This text           command is available only for the LTI-ROM.
children.desTs: 将选定的单元区域添加到LTI输出参数列表中。此文本命令仅适用于LTI-ROM。

children.des: Adds the selected face zones to the list of the LTI output parameters. This text           command is available only for the LTI-ROM.
children.desTs: 将选定的面部区域添加到LTI输出参数列表中。此文本命令仅适用于LTI-ROM。

children.des: Adds the selected user-created points to the list of the LTI output parameters. This           text command is available only for the LTI-ROM.
children.desTs: 将选定的用户创建的点添加到LTI输出参数列表中。此文本命令仅适用于LTI-ROM。

children.des: Adds the selected report definitions that you previously created to the list of the                      LTI output parameters. This text command is available only for the                      LTI-ROM.
children.desTs: 将您以前创建的选定报告定义添加到LTI输出参数列表中。此文本命令仅适用于LTI-ROM。

children.des: Adds the selected surfaces that you previously created to the list of the LTI output                      parameters. This text command is available only for the LTI-ROM.
children.desTs: 将之前创建的选定表面添加到LTI输出参数列表中。此文本命令仅适用于LTI-ROM。

children.des: Adds the selected cell zones for which you want to export temperature information to           the list of the SVD output parameters. This text command is available only for the           SVD-ROM.
children.desTs: 将您想要输出温度信息的选定单元区域添加到DID输出参数列表中。此文本命令仅适用于SVD-ROM。

children.des: Allows you to specify heat sources in the selected volumes.
children.desTs: 允许您指定选定体积中的热源。

children.des: Deletes the specified ROM parameter. The name of the parameter must be entered in                      double quotes.
children.desTs: 重新定义指定的ROM参数。参数名必须用双引号括起来。

children.des: Allows you to specify the frequency with which the solution files should be           saved.
children.desTs: 允许您指定解决方案文件的保存频率。

children.des: Prints information on all ROM-related lists in the Fluent console.
children.desTs: 在Fluent控制台中的所有ROM相关列表上打印信息。

children.des: Sets up the LTI-ROM generation tool.
children.desTs: 设置LTI-ROM生成工具。

children.des: Selects the ROM type (LTI or SVD).
children.desTs: 指定ROM类型（LTI或MVD）。

children.des: Allows you to set up the transient solver.
children.desTs: 允许您设置瞬时求解器。

children.des: Allows you to define the total heat source for each battery active zone for the CHT        coupling solution method.
children.desTs: 允许您为CHT耦合解决方案方法定义每个电池活动区域的总热源。

children.des: Sets ECM model-specific parameters (see Inputs for the Equivalent Circuit Model for definitions of the ECM model        parameters).
children.desTs: 设置特定于EM模型的参数（有关EM模型参数的定义，请参阅等效电路模型的输入）。

children.des: Enters the electric field setup menu.
children.desTs: 进入电场设置菜单。

children.des: Specifies active conductive regions.
children.desTs: 指定活动导电区域。

children.des: Specifies contact resistance regions.
children.desTs: 指定接触电阻区域。

children.des: Sets cathode tap.
children.desTs: 设置阴极分接头。

children.des: Sets anode tap.
children.desTs: 设置阳极分接头。

children.des: Enables/disables battery model.
children.desTs: 启用/禁用电池型号。

children.des: Allows you to hook up FMU output parameters to the Ansys Fluent parameters for the FMU-CHT        coupling solution method.
children.desTs: 允许您将FMU输出参数连接到FMU-CHT耦合解决方案方法的Ansys Fluent参数。

children.des: Includes entropic heat in the heat source calculation and sets the entropic heat                definition method. See Including the Entropic Heat Effects in the Fluent User's Guide for details.
children.desTs: 在热源计算中包括热并设置热热定义方法。有关详细信息，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中包括热热效应。

children.des: Sets battery model options (see Specifying Battery Model Options for definitions of the model general        parameters).
children.desTs: 设置电池模型选项（有关模型常规参数的定义，请参阅“卸载电池模型选项”）。

children.des: Sets Newman model-specific parameters (see Inputs for the Newman’s P2D Model for definitions of the Newman model        parameters).
children.desTs: 设置Newman模型特定的参数（有关Newman模型参数的定义，请参阅Newman P2D模型的输入）。

children.des: Sets NTGK model-specific parameters (see Inputs for the NTGK/DCIR Model for definitions of the NTGK model        parameters).
children.desTs: 设置NTGK模型特定的参数（有关NTGK模型参数的定义，请参阅NTGK/DCIR模型的输入）。

children.des: Computes the model parameters from battery's testing data. You can use the                estimation tool to compute model parameters for the NTGK or ECM model, or for the                One-Equation thermal abuse model. You must provide battery's testing data as a text                file in a specific format for each model. When you enable this tool and select the                model option, Fluent will show the required format for the input file in the                console. For more details, see Using Parameter Estimation Tools. You can contact Ansys                Technical Support for clarifications on how to use this tool.
children.desTs: 根据电池测试数据计算模型参数。您可以使用估计工具计算NTGK或EC模型或One方程热滥用模型的模型参数。您必须以每个模型的特定格式将电池测试数据作为文本文件提供。当您启用此工具并选择模型选项时，Fluent将在控制台中显示输入文件所需的格式。有关更多详细信息，请参阅使用参数估计工具。您可以联系Ansys技术支持以了解如何使用此工具的说明。

children.des: Allows you to run the electro-chemistry models and the physics-based battery life model        in the standalone mode. For more information, see Running the Standalone Echem Model and Simulating the Aging Process of a Battery (Standalone Mode) in the Fluent User's Guide.
children.desTs: 允许您在独立模式下运行电化学模型和基于物理的电池寿命模型。有关更多信息，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中的运行独立Echem模型和模拟电池老化过程（独立模式）。

children.des: Sets solution method options (see Specifying Battery Model Options in the Fluent User's Guide for        details).
children.desTs: 设置解决方案方法选项（有关详细信息，请参见《Fluent用户指南》中的“电池型号选项”）。

children.des: Sets parameters for the swelling model (see Inputs for the Newman’s P2D Model and Using the Empirical-Based Battery Swelling Model  in the Fluent User's Guide for details).
children.desTs: 设置肿胀模型的参数（有关详细信息，请参阅Fluent用户指南中Newman ' s P2 D模型的输入和使用基于经验的电池肿胀模型）。

children.des: Allows you to choose a thermal abuse model and specify its parameters (see                  Specifying Advanced Options in the Fluent User's Guide for more                details).
children.desTs: 允许您选择热滥用模型并指定其参数（有关更多详细信息，请参阅《Fluent用户指南》中的收件箱高级选项）。

children.des: Defines orthotropic thermal conductivity for the battery material (see Defining Orthotropic Thermal Conductivity in the Fluent User's Guide for                details).
children.desTs: 定义电池材料的正交各向异性热导率（有关详细信息，请参见Fluent用户指南中的“定义正交各向异性热导率”）。

children.des: Allows you to enable the venting model and specify its parameters (see Battery Venting Model in the Fluent Theory Guide for details).
children.desTs: 允许您启用通风模型并指定其参数（有关详细信息，请参见Fluent Theory Guide中的Battery Venting Model）。

children.des: Sets specific parameters for the user-defined model (see Input for the User-Defined E-Model for definitions of the                model parameters).
children.desTs: 为用户定义的模型设置特定参数（有关模型参数的定义，请参阅用户定义的E模型的输入）。

list.des: commands related to battery models.
list.desTs: 与电池型号相关的命令。

contents.des: Set and apply external magnetic field scale factor.
contents.desTs: 设置并应用外部磁场比例因子。

contents.des: Define MHD boundary conditions
contents.desTs: 定义MHD边界条件

children.des: List Ansys Fluent zone information.
children.desTs: 列出Ansys Fluent区域信息。

children.des: Set fluid zone boundary condition.
children.desTs: 设置流体区边界条件。

children.des: Set solid zone boundary condition.
children.desTs: 设置实体区边界条件。

children.des: Set wall boundary condition.
children.desTs: 设置墙边界条件。

contents.des: Enable/disable MHD model.
contents.desTs: 启用/禁用MHD模型。

contents.des: Set and apply external magnetic field data.
contents.desTs: 设置和应用外部磁场数据。

contents.des: Initialize DPM related MHD variables.
contents.desTs: 初始化与收件箱相关的MHD变量。

contents.des: Initialize MHD model.
contents.desTs: 初始化MHD模型。

contents.des: Select MHD method.
contents.desTs: 选择MHD方法。

contents.des: Reset external magnetic field data.
contents.desTs: 重置外部磁场数据。

contents.des: Set MHD solution control parameters.
contents.desTs: 设置MHD溶液控制参数。

list.des: commands related to magnetohydrodynamics models.
list.desTs: 与磁流体动力学模型相关的命令。

contents.des: Enter the continuous-fiber menu.
contents.desTs: 进入连续光纤菜单。

children.des: Define fiber models and injections.
children.desTs: 定义纤维模型和注射。

children.des: Define and modify fiber injections.
children.desTs: 定义和修改纤维注射。

children.des: Select a fiber model.
children.desTs: 选择光纤模型。

children.des: Read and write fiber data.
children.desTs: 读取和写入光纤数据。

children.des: Read in fiber data file.
children.desTs: 读取光纤数据文件。

children.des: Write a fiber data file in binary format.
children.desTs: 以二进制格式编写光纤数据文件。

children.des: Write a fiber data file in standard format.
children.desTs: 以标准格式编写光纤数据文件。

children.des: Print the fiber data of all defined injections into history files.
children.desTs: 将所有定义的注射的纤维数据打印到历史文件中。

children.des: Select two fiber variables for plotting into an xy file.
children.desTs: 选择两个纤维变量，以打印到xy文件中。

children.des: Solver settings for computing fibers.
children.desTs: 计算光纤的解算器设置。

children.des: Compute the fibers for all of the injections.
children.desTs: 计算所有注射的纤维。

children.des: Initialize all of the fibers and injections.
children.desTs: 初始化所有纤维和注射。

children.des: Set solution parameters for the fiber model.
children.desTs: 为纤维模型设置解决方案参数。

children.des: Select the discretization scheme for convection terms.
children.desTs: 选择对流项的离散化方案。

children.des: Choose a discretization scheme for the fiber energy                                    equation.
children.desTs: 为纤维能量方程选择离散化方案。

children.des: Choose a discretization scheme for the fiber momentum                                    equation.
children.desTs: 选择纤维动量方程的离散格式。

children.des: Choose a discretization scheme for the fiber species                                    equation.
children.desTs: 为纤维物种方程选择离散化方案。

children.des: Select the equations that will be solved.
children.desTs: 选择要求解的方程。

children.des: Specify the energy equation that will be solved.
children.desTs: 指定要求解的能量方程。

children.des: Specify the momentum equation that will be solved.
children.desTs: 指定要求解的动量方程。

children.des: Specify the species equation that will be solved.
children.desTs: 指定要求解的物种方程。

children.des: Set parameters for coupled fiber calculations.
children.desTs: 为耦合光纤计算设置参数。

children.des: Select whether to couple fiber and fluid flow                                    calculations.
children.desTs: 选择是否将光纤和流体流量计算结合起来。

children.des: Set the number of fluid flow iterations per fiber                                    iteration.
children.desTs: 设置每次纤维迭代的流体流动迭代次数。

children.des: Set the underrelaxation factor of the fiber source terms in                                    the fluid flow.
children.desTs: 设置流体流中纤维源项的欠松弛因子。

children.des: Set the residual monitors of the fibers.
children.desTs: 设置光纤的残留监测器。

children.des: Choose which currently-selected equations should be checked                                    for convergence.
children.desTs: 选择应检查当前选择的方程的收敛性。

children.des: Set the criteria to stop the fiber calculation.
children.desTs: 设置停止光纤计算的条件。

children.des: Choose whether relative or absolute convergence criteria                                    will be used.
children.desTs: 选择使用相对收敛标准还是绝对收敛标准。

children.des: Set the number of fiber iterations that will be computed.
children.desTs: 设置要计算的光纤迭代次数。

children.des: Set the reporting frequency for the fiber model.
children.desTs: 设置光纤模型的报告频率。

children.des: Set the underrelaxation parameters.
children.desTs: 设置欠松弛参数。

children.des: Specify the underrelaxation factor for the energy                                    equation.
children.desTs: 指定能量方程的欠松弛因子。

children.des: Specify the underrelaxation factor for the momentum                                    equation.
children.desTs: 指定动量方程的欠松弛因子。

children.des: Specify the underrelaxation factor for the species                                    equation.
children.desTs: 指定物种方程的欠松弛因子。

list.des: commands related to the continuous fiber model.
list.desTs: 与连续纤维模型相关的命令。
